1a1(rgyud): rgyud na pa bzhugs so//
1b1(rgyud): @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ mahA ma yU rI bid+ya rA dz+nyI/ bod skad du/ rig sngags kyi
1b2(rgyud): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo/ /'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
1b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
1b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
2a1(rgyud): @##/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa bdun po dag la phyag
2a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na dgra bcom pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems
2a3(rgyud): dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams
2a4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten na yang dag par song ba rnams
2a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la phyag 'tshal nas rig sngags
2b1(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag la rig sngags de grub par gyur cig /'byung po'i tshogs gang su dag sa la
2b2(rgyud): rgyu ba rnams dang / nam mkha' la rgyu ba rnams dang / chu la rgyu ba rnams dang / lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang /
2b3(rgyud): rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams dang / gnod
2b4(rgyud): sbyin rnams dang / srin po rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / sha za rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / grul bum rnams dang /
2b5(rgyud): srul po rnams dang / lus srul po rnams dang / skem byed rnams dang / smyo byed rnams dang / grib gnon rnams dang / brjed byed
2b6(rgyud): rnams dang / gnon po rnams bdag la nyon cig /'byung po'i tshogs gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mngal za ba rnams
3a1(rgyud): dang / zas su khrag 'thung pa rnams dang / zas su zhag za ba rnams dang / zas su sha za ba rnams dang / zas su
3a2(rgyud): tshil za ba rnams dang / zas su rkang za ba rnams dang / zas su btsas pa za ba rnams dang / srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su
3a3(rgyud): gtor ma za ba rnams dang / zas su phreng ba za ba rnams dang / zas su dri za ba rnams dang / zas su bdug pa za ba rnams dang / zas
3a4(rgyud): su me tog za ba rnams dang / zas su 'bras bu za ba rnams dang / zas su lo tog za ba rnams dang / zas su sbyin sreg za ba rnams
3a5(rgyud): dang / zas su rnag za ba rnams dang / zas su phyi sa za ba rnams dang / zas su gcin 'thung ba rnams dang / zas su lhag ma za ba
3a6(rgyud): rnams dang / zas su mchil ma za ba rnams dang / zas su ngar snabs za ba rnams dang / zas su snabs za ba rnams dang / zas
3b1(rgyud): su mi gtsang ba za ba rnams dang / zas su skyug pa za ba rnams dang / zas su stor khung nas 'bab pa 'thung ba rnams dang / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i
3b2(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams bdag la nyon cig /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo
3b3(rgyud): 'di brjod par bya'o/ /spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / gtor ma yang sbyin no/ /bdag la sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa
3b4(rgyud): rnams dang / drag shul gyi sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa rnams dang / zas su mdangs za ba'i gdon thams cad ni/ dengs shig /zhi ba'i
3b5(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams dang / dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bdag la nyon cig /sangs rgyas dang / chos dang /
3b6(rgyud): dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa rnams bdag la nyon cig /'di lta ste/ nag mo bzhin sgyur ma/ grul bum ma/ dung can ma/ me tog ka ma la lta bu'i mig can ma/ 'phrog
3b7(rgyud): ma| skra mdog ljang gu ma/ dpal ldan ma/ spre'u ltar dmar ser ma/ 'phyang ma/ rab tu 'phyang ma/ dus kyi zhags pa ma/ bum lto ma/ gshin rje'i pho nya mo/ gshin
4a1(rgyud): rje'i sring mo/ 'byung po za ba mo/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / gtor ma 'di dbul gyi/ bzhes shig /'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams
4a2(rgyud): cad las bdag la srung du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /bdag la rig sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ 'di
4a3(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/ de'i
4a4(rgyud): tshe mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong sa ri zhes bya ba/ gzhon nu thor bu lang tsho la bab pa rab tu byung
4a5(rgyud): nas ring po ma lon pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lon pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir 'ongs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi bsro gang bya
4a6(rgyud): ba'i phyir shing gshags pa dang / shing rul ba'i ser ka zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthe bong la zin pa dang / lus sbrid nas
4a7(rgyud): sa la 'gyel te lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal ba dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri nad kyis btab ste sdug bsngal zhing nad tshabs che
4b1(rgyud): nas sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /mthong nas kyang rings pa rings par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas
4b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
4b3(rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di na dge slong sa ri zhes bgyi ba gzhon
4b4(rgyud): nu thor bu/ lang tsho la bab pa/ rab tu byung nas ring po ma lags pa/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas ring po ma lags pa/ chos 'dul ba 'dir mchis nas ring por ma lags pa
4b5(rgyud): zhig gnas pa de dge 'dun gyi bsro gang bgyi ba'i slad du shing gshags pa dang / shing rul pa'i ser ka zhig nas sbrul nag po chen po zhig byung nas rkang pa g.yas pa'i
4b6(rgyud): mthe bong la zin pa dang / lus sbrid nas dog sa la 'gyel te/ lbu bar skyug cing mig kyang gyur nas nyal zhing mchis na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ de la bdag gis
4b7(rgyud): ji ltar nan tan du bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kun dga' bo/ de bzhin
5a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bkas khyod song la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang /
5a2(rgyud): rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang / srin
5a3(rgyud): po'i gdon dang / yi dwags kyi gdon dang / sha za'i gdon dang / 'byung po'i gdon dang / grul bum gyi gdon dang / srul po'i gdon dang / lus srul po'i gdon dang /
5a4(rgyud): skem byed kyi gdon dang / smyo byed kyi gdon dang / grib gnon gyi gdon dang / brjed byed kyi gdon dang / gnon po'i gdon dang / skar ma'i gdon dang / gshed byed dang /
5a5(rgyud): sgyur pa'i las dang / byad dang / g.yeng byed dang / ro langs dang / sems sgyur ba dang / rbod gtong dang / bza' nyes dang / skyug nyes dang / gnod sgrib dang / gnod bltas
5a6(rgyud): dang / bri nyes dang / sgom nyes dang / smad pa dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa dang / zla ba
5a7(rgyud): phyed pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / nyin mo pa dang / yud tsam pa dang / rtag pa'i rims dang / rims drag po dang / 'byung po'i rims dang / mi'i rims dang / mi ma
5b1(rgyud): yin pa'i rims dang / rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / rims thams cad las dge slong
5b2(rgyud): sa ri la srung ba gyis shig / sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang pa dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa
5b3(rgyud): spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /klad pa na ba med par gyis shig /gzhogs
5b4(rgyud): phyed na ba dang / yi ge 'chus pa dang / mig nad dang / sna nad dang / kha nad dang / mgul nad dang / snying nad dang / lkog ma'i lha gor na ba dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang /
5b5(rgyud): snying na ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / rgyab na ba dang / lto na ba dang / mkhur pa na ba dang / chu so na ba dang / skye gnas na ba dang / rab tu skye gnas na ba dang / rked pa na ba dang /
5b6(rgyud): brlan ba dang / byin pa na ba dang / lag pa na ba dang / rkang pa na ba dang / yan lag na ba med par gyis shig /mtshan mo dge dang nyin mo dge/ nyi ma'i gung gi dge ba dang / /
5b7(rgyud): nyin mtshan kun gyi dge ba dag /sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol/ /tad+ya thA/ i Di bi Di/ ki Di/ hi Di/ mi Di ni Di/ me The do dum+bA/ A De/ g+hA De/ durgA De/ hi ri ni/ ba
6a1(rgyud): gu De| pA na su/ pi shA tsi ni/ baR+Sha Ni/ A ro ha ni/ a ha ta nri/ e le/ me le te le/ ti li ti li/ me le me le/ ti me ti me/ du me du me/ du du me/ iT+Ti/ miT+Ti/
6a2(rgyud): biSh+Ta ba d+he/ tsa pa le/ bi ma le/ hu lu hu lu/ a shwa mu khi/ kA li kA li/ ka ra li/ mahA kA li/ pra kir+Na ki she/ ku lu ku lu/ ba s+phu lu ba s+phu lu/ ko lu ko lu/ hu lu hu lu/ ba
6a3(rgyud): hu lu ba hu lu/ bo sa dum+bA/ do duM bA/ duM ma duM bA/ go lA yA/ be lA yA/ pa ri be lA yA pi shu pi shu/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi li hi li/ hi
6a4(rgyud): li hi li| mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ mi li mi li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ ti li ti li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu
6a5(rgyud): lu| tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ mu hu mu hu/ mu hu mu hu/ mu hu mu hu/ mu hu mu hu/ mu hu mu hu/ mu lu mu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ mu lu mu lu/ mu lu mu lu/
6a6(rgyud): mu lu mu lu/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA bA/ pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA pA/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ da ma
6a7(rgyud): da ma ni| ta pa ta pa ni/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/ pa tsa pa tsa ni/ dun+du b+hi/ gardza ni/ baR+Sha ni/ s+pho Ta ni/ ta pa ni tA pa ni/ pa tsa ni pA tsa ni/ ha ri Ni hA ri Ni/ kA ri Ni/ ki mi ni/ kaM
6b1(rgyud): pa ni| marda ni/ maN+Da ti ke /k+She maM ka ri ma ka ri/ sha ka ri/ sharka ri/ karka ri/ sha ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ni/ du ma duM ba ni/ su ku su me/ go lA yA/ be lA yA/ pa ri pe lA
6b2(rgyud): yA| lhas kun tu char phobs shig / i li ki si swAhA/ nga ni yul 'khor srung la byams/ /sa srung bu la'ang nga byams te/ /nga ni mig mi bzang la byams/ /go'u ta ma ni
6b3(rgyud): nag po dang / /nga ni klu rgyal nor bu dang / /nga ni nor rgyas bu la'ang byams/ /dbyug ba rkang gi klu dag dang / /gang ba bzang la'ang nga rtag tu/ /klu gang dga' bo nye dga' bo/ /
6b4(rgyud): kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing lha min dang / /lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed/ /ma dros klu dang chu lha dang / /dzam pa len pa la yang byams/ /
6b5(rgyud): 'jog po dang ni mtha' yas dang / /de bzhin nor gyi sgo dang ni/ /gzhan las rgyal la nga byams te/ /gcod dang ldan pa'i bu la byams/ /rtag par gzi can chen po dang / /gzi
6b6(rgyud): can la yang de bzhin no/ /phub ma med dang dung can dang / /longs spyod ldan dang dge tshul dang / /kha na zho dang nor bu dang / /pad+ma dkar po phyogs dag dang / /stobs kyi rgyu dang
6b7(rgyud): dung skyong dang / /lwa ba dang ni mgyogs mchog dang / /klu yi rgyal po de dag la/ /nga ni rtag tu byams pa yin/ /gnas bcas chu srin kum+b+hi ra/ /de bzhin khab kyi spu dag dang //
7a1(rgyud): brang 'gro'i bdag po nag po dang / /drang srong la yang nga byams so/ /de bzhin rna ba tshang ba dang / /shing rta'i bzhin la byams pa ste/ /gzi can dang
7a2(rgyud): ni rab dga' dang / /bad sa'i bu la nga rtag tu/ /nga ni e la'i 'dab la byams/ /'phyang pa'i tshul la'ang nga byams te/ /mi min klu ni gang dag dang / /de bzhin mi yi
7a3(rgyud): bla ma dang / /klu chen tshol ba'i tshul can dang / /btang bzung zhes ni grags pa dang / /klu gang sa la rgyu dag dang / /de bzhin chu la gnas rnams dang / /gang dag bar
7a4(rgyud): snang rgyu ba dang / /gang dag lhun por gnas pa dang / /mgo gcig pa dang mgo gnyis pa/ /de dag la ni nga rtag byams/ /rkang pa med la nga byams te/ /rkang gnyis
7a5(rgyud): pa la'ang pa byams so/ /rkang bzhi pa la'ang nga byams so/ /rkang mang la yang nga byams so/ /rkang med nga la gnod ma byed/ /rkang gnyis nga la gnod ma byed/ /rkang
7a6(rgyud): bzhi nga la gnod ma byed/ /rkang mang nga la gnod ma byed/ /gang dag chu la gnas pa yi/ /klu rnams kun la nga byams so/ /gang su sa la gnas pa yi/ /'byung po
7a7(rgyud): kun la nga byams so/ /sems can gang dag gnas par bcas/ /sems can kun la nga byams so/ /sems can kun dang srog chags kun/ /'byung po dag ni
7b1(rgyud): thams cad kyang / /thams cad bde ba 'ba' zhig shog /thams cad nad ni med gyur cig /kun gyis bzang po mthong bar shog /gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig /byams
7b2(rgyud): pa'i sems la gnas nas su/ /dug ni rab tu gsad par bya/ /bsrung dang yongs su gzung ba dang / /de bzhin yongs su bskyang bar bya/ /sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal byang chub phyag
7b3(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /grol gyur phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /zhi gyur phyag 'tshal zhi la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam grol phyag 'tshal grol la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze gang
7b4(rgyud): dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /'jigs pa thams cad dang / gnod pa thams cad
7b5(rgyud): dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / nad thams cad dang / gdon thams cad dang / dug thams cad las srung ba gyis shig /lo
7b6(rgyud): brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig / ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ sngon byung ba ri'i rgyal po gangs ri'i lho phyogs kyi ngos la rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes
7b7(rgyud): bya ba zhig gnas te/ de nang par rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bde legs su 'gyur bar byas te nyin mo dge bar gnas/ nub kar bde legs su 'gyur
8a1(rgyud): par byas te mtshan me dge bar gnas so/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags
8a2(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ hu hu/ hu hu/ hu hu/ nA ga le le le/ duM ba le le le/ nA ga le le le/ hu ya hu ya/ bi dza bi dza/ thu su thu su/ gu
8a3(rgyud): lu gu lu| hu tse dzi ni tse dzi ni/ a gu lu/ e lA me lA/ e lA me lA/ ti li me lA/ i li mit+te/ i li ti li mit+te/ duM be su duM be/ to su to su/ go lA be lA/ tsa pa lA/
8a4(rgyud): bi ma lA| iT+Ti ri/ b+hiT+Ti ri/ riT+Ti ri/ na mo bud+d+ha nan/ tsi li ki si/ go do hi kA/ na mo ar+ha tAn/ hA la hA la/ lhas phyogs bcu kun tu char phobs shig /sangs rgyas
8a5(rgyud): rnams la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ de dus gzhan zhig na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba ma byas par 'dod pa rnams
8a6(rgyud): la zhen cing chags te rgyags pas myos nas rab tu rmongs shing brgyal ba dang 'dra bar gyur nas rab tu zhen te/ nags kyi rma bya gzhon nu mang po dang lhan cig tu
8a7(rgyud): kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar/ skyed mos tshal nas skyed mos tshal du/ ri'i ngos nas ri'i ngos su rgyu zhing song song ba las de bag med par gyur nas/
8b1(rgyud): ri'i ser ka zhig tu chud nas de der rigs ngan gzhon nu yun ring du phyir rgol ba/ dgrar gyur pa/ 'tshe bar gyur pa/ glags lta ba rnams kyis rma bya rnyis bzung ste/ de mi
8b2(rgyud): mdza' ba'i nang du son pa dang dran pa slar rnyed nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di nyid yid la byas so/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
8b3(rgyud): dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ hu hu hu hu/ nA ga le le le/ duM ba le le le/ nA ga le le le/ hu ya hu ya/
8b4(rgyud): bi dza bi dza/ thu su thu su/ gu lu gu lu/ hu tse dzi ni/ tse dzi ni/ a gu lu/ e lA me lA/ e la me lA/ ti li me lA/ i li mit+te/ i li ti mi lit+ti/ duM be/ su duM be/ to su to su/
8b5(rgyud): go lA| be lA/ tsa be lA/ bi ma lA/ iT+Ti ri/ biT+Ti ri/ riT+Ti ri/ na mo bud+d+hA nAn/ tsi li ki si/ go do hi kA/ na mo ar+ha tAn/ hA la hA la/ lhas phyogs kun tu char phobs
8b6(rgyud): shig / sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/ de nas de sdug bsngal de las thar te dge ba dang / bde bar bdag gi yul du phyin nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang
8b7(rgyud): bzlas so/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo//
9a1(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ si d+he/ su sid+d+he/ mo tsa ni/ mo k+Sha Ni/ muk+te/ bi muk+te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ nirma
9a2(rgyud): le| aN+Da re/ paN+Da re/ maM ga le/ maM ga l+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ hi ra N+ye/ gar+b+he rat+ne/ rat+na gar+b+he b+ha dre/ su b+ha dre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ shI b+ha dre/ sarba ar+tha sA dA ni/ pa ra mAr+tha sA d+ha ni/
9a3(rgyud): sar+b+ba a nar+tha pra sha ma ni/ sar+b+ba maM ga la sA d+ha ni/ sarba a maM ga la sA d+ha ni/ ye sho ba ti/ ma na si/ mA na si/ ma hA ma na si/ ad b+hu de/ a t+yad b+hu de/ muk+te/ bi muk+te/ mo
9a4(rgyud): tsa ni| mo k+Sha ni/ a ts+yu te/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bi ma le/ a mr-i te/ a mr-i ta baR+Sha Ni/ a ma re/ a ma ri Ni/ brah+me/ brah+ma swa re/ pUr+Ne/ pUr+Na ma no ra the/ amr-i te a mr-i ta
9a5(rgyud): sany+dzI ba ni/ shI b+ha dre/ tsan+d+re/ tsan+d+ra/ pra b+he/ sUR+ya/ sUR+ya kAn+te/ bI ta b+ha ye/ sarba su bar+Ne/ su bar+Na pra b+he/ brah+ma g+ho Sha/ brah+ma dzuSh+Te/ sar+b+ba tra/ a pra ti ha te swAhA/ sangs rgyas
9a6(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la dge ba dang srung ba mdzad du gsol/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig/ tad+ya thA/ hu tsi gu tsi g+hu tsi/ mu
9a7(rgyud): tsi swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta'o/ /de
9b1(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rma bya'i rgyal po gser du snang ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po'i
9b2(rgyud): snying po 'di yang bzla bar bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mit+te/ ti li mit+te/ ti li mi li mit+ti/ ti li mi li mit+ti/ ti li mi li/ mi li ti li/ ti li mit+ti/ bi li mi li mit+ti/ bi li
9b3(rgyud): mi li mit+ti/ bi li mi li mi li ti li mi li/ su duM bA/ duM bA/ su ba tsa/ tsi ri ki si yA/ b+hin na ma Di/ na mo bud+d+hA nan/ tsi li ki si/ prAn+ta mU le/ i ti hA re/ lo hi ta mU le/
9b4(rgyud): duM bA| su duM bA/ kuT+Ti/ ku naT+Ti/ ku ku naT+Ti/ ti la kuny+dza/ naT+Ti/ lcang lo can du lhas zla ba dgu'am/ zla ba bcur char phobs shig /i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ ki li me
9b5(rgyud): le| ke tu mU le/ du duM be/ su duM pe De/ da bi me/ san+du baT+Te/ bu sa baT+Te/ bu sa ra/ bu sa ra/ d+ha na ba sta ra ke/ nak+ka lA/ narka li mi/ kha li ma g+ho Sha/ ra khi le/ i ti sad dza
9b6(rgyud): le| duM be/ su duM be/ aT+Te/ naT+Te/ pra naT+Te/ a na NaT+Te/ a na mA le/ lhas kun nas chu gsar pa'i char phobs shig /nA rA ya ni/ pA rA ya ni/ ha ri tI la/ kun+tA li/ i li
9b7(rgyud): mi sti| ki la ti li mi sti/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag grub par gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i snying
10a1(rgyud): po yin no/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di grong na 'dug pa na yang yid la bya'o/ /dgon pa na 'dug gam/ lam na 'dug
10a2(rgyud): gam| lam gol ba na 'dug gam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na 'dug gam/ chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ me'i nang na 'dug gam/ chu'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i
10a3(rgyud): nang na 'dug gam/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'khor gyi nang na 'dug gam/ rtsod pa'i nang na 'dug gam/ sbrul gyis zin tam dug 'thungs
10a4(rgyud): sam| 'jigs pa thams cad 'dus pa na yang yid la bya'o/ /rlung las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang /
10a5(rgyud): nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi las nad gang yang rung bas btab par gyur pa dang / phongs par gyur pa na yang shin tu yid la bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo/ gsad
10a6(rgyud): pa'i rigs pa ni/ chad pas bral bar 'gyur ro/ /chad pas gcad pa'i rigs pa ni/ bzhu btsog gis so/ /bzhu btsog pa'i rigs pa ni/ spyo bas so/ /spyo ba'i
10a7(rgyud): rigs pa ni/ dam bcas pas so/ /dam bcas pa'i rigs pa ni/ spu zing zhes bya bas so/ /spu zing zhes bya ba'i rigs pa ni/ de bzhin du thar par 'gyur te/ de'i
10b1(rgyud): de'i nad thams cad kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di yang yid la bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ tsi li mi li/ ki li mi li/ ke dU
10b2(rgyud): mU le| bu sa baT+Te/ bu sa ri Ni/ bu da ri Ni/ ke baT+Te/ ke baT+Te ka/ mU le/ i ti sha ba re/ duM ba/ be duM be/ pri yaM ka re/ A baT+Te/ pa ri baT+Te/ lhas kun tu chu sar pa'i char phobs
10b3(rgyud): shig / na mo b+ha ga ba te/ iT+TaT+Ta ya/ in+d+ra go mi si kA ya/ b+h-ing+ga ri kA ya/ A sha ne/ bA sha ne/ pA pa ni ku'u le/ ka pi li miT+Te/ i li miT+Te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
10b4(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis
10b5(rgyud): srung bar gyis shig / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon
10b6(rgyud): cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing bgyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog
10b7(rgyud): cig / kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas shing sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba
11a1(rgyud): dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad
11a2(rgyud): pa dang / sa bcing ba byas pa la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir 'ong ba/ lha'am/ lha mo'am/ lha'i bu pho'am/ lha'i bu mo'am/ lha rgan po'am/ lha rgan mo'am/ lha'i 'khor pho'am/
11a3(rgyud): lha'i 'khor mo'am/ klu'am/ klu mo'am/ klu'i bu pho'am/ klu'i bu mo'am/ klu rgan po'am/ klu rgan mo'am/ klu'i 'khor pho'am/ klu'i 'khor mo'am/ lha ma yin nam/ lha ma
11a4(rgyud): yin mo'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu pho'am/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo'am/ lha ma yin rgan po'am/ lha ma yin rgan mo'am/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor pho'am/ lha ma yin gyi 'khor mo'am/
11a5(rgyud): rlung lha'am/ rlung lha mo'am/ rlung lha'i bu pho'am/ rlung lha'i bu mo'am/ rlung lha rgan po'am/ rlung lha rgan mo'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor pho'am/ rlung lha'i 'khor mo'am/
11a6(rgyud): nam mkha' lding ngam/ nam mkha' lding mo'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu pho'am/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo'am/ nam mkha' lding rgan po'am/ nam mkha' lding rgan
11a7(rgyud): mo'am| nam mkha' lding gi 'khor pho'am/ nam mkha' lding gi 'khor mo'am/ dri za'am/ dri za mo'am/ dri za'i bu pho'am/ dri za'i bu mo'am/ dri za rgan po'am/ dri
11b1(rgyud): za rgan mo'am/ dri za'i 'khor pho'am/ dri za'i 'khor mo'am/ mi'am ci'am/ mi'am ci mo'am/ mi'am ci'i bu pho'am/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo'am/ mi'am ci'i rgan po'am/ mi
11b2(rgyud): 'am ci rgan mo'am/ mi'am ci'i 'khor pho'am/ mi'i ci'i 'khor mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/ lto 'phye chen mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu pho'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo'am/
11b3(rgyud): lto 'phye chen po rgan po'am/ lto 'phye chen po rgan mo'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor pho'am/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'khor mo'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo'am/ gnod sbyin
11b4(rgyud): gyi bu pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo'am/ gnod sbyin rgan po'am/ gnod sbyin rgan mo'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor pho'am/ gnod sbyin gyi 'khor mo'am/ srin po'am/ srin mo'am/ srin
11b5(rgyud): po'i bu pho'am/ srin po'i bu mo'am/ srin po rgan po'am/ srin po rgan mo'am/ srin po'i 'khor pho'am/ srin po'i 'khor mo'am/ yi dwags sam/ yi dwags mo'am/
11b6(rgyud): yi dwags kyi bu pho'am/ yi dwags kyi bu mo'am/ yi dwags rgan po'am/ yi dwags rgan mo'am/ yi dwags kyi 'khor mo'am/ sha za'am/
11b7(rgyud): sha za mo'am/ sha za'i bu pho'am/ sha za'i bu mo'am/ sha za rgan po'am/ sha za rgan mo'am/ sha za'i 'khor pho'am/ sha za'i 'khor mo'am/ 'byung po'am/ 'byung po
12a1(rgyud): mo'am| 'byung po'i bu pho'am/ 'byung po'i bu mo'am/ 'byung po rgan po'am/ 'byung po rgan mo'am/ 'byung po'i 'khor pho'am/ 'byung po'i 'khor
12a2(rgyud): mo'am| grul bum mam/ grul bum mo'am/ grul bum gyi bu pho'am/ grul bum gyi bu mo'am/ grul bum rgan po'am/ grul bum rgan mo'am/ grul bum gyi
12a3(rgyud): 'khor pho'am/ grul bum gyi 'khor mo'am/ srul po'am/ srul po mo'am/ srul po'i bu pho'am/ srul po'i bu mo'am/ srul po rgan pho'am/ srul po rgan mo'am/
12a4(rgyud): srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ srul po'i 'khor mo'am/ lus srul po'am/ lus srul po mo'am/ lus srul po'i bu pho'am/ lus srul po'i bu mo'am/
12a5(rgyud): lus srul po rgan po'am/ lus srul po rgan mo'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor pho'am/ lus srul po'i 'khor mo'am/ skem byed dam/ skem byed mo'am/
12a6(rgyud): skem byed kyi bu pho'am/ skem byed kyi bu mo'am/ skem byed rgan po'am/ skem byed rgan mo'am/ skem byed kyi 'khor pho'am/ skem byed kyi 'khor mo'am/ smyo byed
12a7(rgyud): dam| smyo byed mo'am/ smyo byed kyi bu pho'am/ smyo byed kyi bu mo'am/ smyo byed rgan po'am/ smyo byed rgan mo'am/ smyo byed kyi 'khor pho'am/ smyo byed kyi 'khor mo'am/
12b1(rgyud): grib gnon nam/ grib gnon mo'am/ grib gnon gyi bu pho'am/ grib gnon gyi bu mo'am/ grib gnon rgan po'am/ grib gnon rgan mo'am/ grib gnon gyi 'khor
12b2(rgyud): pho'am| grib gnon gyi 'khor mo'am/ brjed byed dam/ brjed byed mo'am/ brjed byed kyi bu pho'am/ brjed byed kyi bu mo'am/ brjed byed rgan po'am/ brjed byed rgan
12b3(rgyud): mo'am| brjed byed kyi 'khor pho'am/ brjed byed kyi 'khor mo'am/ gnon po'am/ gnon po mo'am/ gnon po'i bu pho'am/ gnon po'i bu mo'am/ gnon po rgan
12b4(rgyud): po'am| gnon po rgan mo'am/ gnon po'i 'khor pho'am/ gnon po'i 'khor mo'am/ 'ga' yang 'ong bar ngas lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang
12b5(rgyud): bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye rgu dang bcas pa/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ma mthong ngo / /glags tshol bar 'dod cing glags lta na
12b6(rgyud): yang glags mi rnyed do/ /lha ni/ lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ klu ni/ klu 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lha ma yin ni/ lha ma yin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ rlung lha ni/
12b7(rgyud): rlung lha 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ nam mkha' lding ni/ nam mkha' lding 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ dri za ni/ dri za 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ mi'am ci ni/ mi'am
13a1(rgyud): ci 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po ni/ lto 'phye chen po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ gnod sbyin ni/ gnod sbyin 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/
13a2(rgyud): srin po ni/ srin po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ yi dwags ni/ yi dwags 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ sha za ni/ sha za 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ 'byung po ni/
13a3(rgyud): 'byung po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ grul bum ni/ grul bum 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ srul po ni/ srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ lus srul po ni/
13a4(rgyud): lus srul po 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ skem byed ni/ skem byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ smyo byed ni/ smyo byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ grib gnon ni/ grib
13a5(rgyud): gnon 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin/ brjed byed ni/ brjed byed 'du ba'i gnas su ma yin te/ gnon po ni/ gnon po 'du ba'i gnas su mi byed do/ /gang la la zhig
13a6(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo las 'gal bar byed na/ de'i mgo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang yid
13a7(rgyud): la bya'o| |tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ kin dug d+he/ muk+te/ su muk+te/ /A De nA De su NA De/ lcang lo can du mchog tu lhas char phobs shig /A rA pA rA/ go do hi
13b1(rgyud): kA| i li mi li/ b+hi dz+dzi li kA/ u du kA/ u du kA/ kA du Tu kA/ i li mi li/ ti li mi li/ sa man+ta ta/ kri twA/ hu lu hu lu/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ pi li pi li/ ki li ki li/
13b2(rgyud): shIr She Na/ baR+Sha tu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ shi khi shi khi/ shi khi shi khi/ i Ta Ti bi Ti Ta khi khi khi khi/ dzu hu dzu hu dzu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu
13b3(rgyud): hu dzu hu dzu hu dzu hu/ ha ra ha ra/ ha ra Ne/ dzam+b+he/ pra dzam+b+he/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta pra duSh+TA nAM/ dzam+b+he mi/ stam+b+he mi/ bdag la srung ba gyis shig /spa ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang
13b4(rgyud): ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba
13b5(rgyud): gyis shig swAhA/ lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ tsi tre tsi tre mU le/ tsi tre tsi tre mA le/ ha le ha le mA le/ pha le pha la mA le/ khu ru khu
13b6(rgyud): ru| ba ru Ne/ bI re d+ha ye/ su ru su ru/ mu ru mu ru/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzi brjid kyis sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba rnams kyi dug dang / mche ba'i dug dang / rtsa ba'i
13b7(rgyud): dug dang / kha zas kyi dug bcom mo/ /su ru su ru ke /tsa ra tsa ra ke /ba ra ba ra ke /tsa rak+ke/ pi ri hi ri/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
14a1(rgyud): dang bcas pa bdun po dag gi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /dug nges par bcom mo/ /dug med do/ /e lA me lA/ i li mi lA/ ti li ti li/ ti li mA/
14a2(rgyud): ti ha du ha/ ti li mA/ ti mA/ du mA/ d+hi mA/ d+hu mA/ d+hu su kuM b+hA kum+b+ha su kum+b+ha suM bA/ tuM bA/ sa ma tuM bA/ A De nA De/ ti la/ kuny+tsa NA De/ baR+Sha tu de ba/ i li ki si/ nga sems
14a3(rgyud): can thams cad la byams pas lhas zla ba dgu'am/ zla ba bcur kun tu char phobs shig/ bu Sha De sha ba ri Ni/ bu d+hA ri Ni/ ke baT+Te/ ke baT+Te/ ke baT+Ta/ ka mU le/ i ti sha
14a4(rgyud): ba re| tum+be tum+b+hA pri yaM ka re/ A baT+Te/ pa ri baT+Te/ lhas kun nas chu gsar ba'i char phobs shig/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ in+d+ra go mi/ si kA ya/ iT+TaT+TI ya/ go do hi kA yA/ b+h+riM
14a5(rgyud): gA ri kA ya/ a le ta le/ kun+ta le/ aT+Te naT+Te/ ku naT+Te/ A sa ne/ pA sha ne/ pA pa ni kU le/ pra ti kU le/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag 'tshal lo swAhA/
14a6(rgyud): rgyal ba rnam gzigs mya ngan 'tshang la gnas/ /rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung / /thams cad skyob pa sA la'i drung na gnas/ /bram za 'khor ba 'jig ni
14a7(rgyud): shiR+Sha'i drung / /sangs rgyas gser thub u dum wa ra'i drung / /'od srung n+ya gro d+ha'i drung na gnas/ /shAkya thub mchog khyad par gnas drung du/ /phyin nas byang chub
14b1(rgyud): thob gyur gau'u ta ma/ /sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la/ /mngon par dad pa'i lha gang 'khod pa dag /lha rnams de dag yid dga' mgu gyur nas/ /rtag tu dge dang
14b2(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ba byas/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi li/ ki li mi li/ ki li tsi li/ ki li bo li/ u du rA/ su du ru/ su du mo de/ bu sa ra bu sa ra/ hu hu ka rany+dze/ ka rany+dza/ mU le/ i
14b3(rgyud): ti| san tA/ kund li/ kun tA li/ nA rA ya Ni/ pA rA ya ni/ pa sh+ye ni/ pa sh+ya pa sh+ya ni/ ki pa li bA stu ni/ 'gro lding ba'i sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swAhA/
14b4(rgyud): kun dga' bo/ sman chen po 'di dag ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
14b5(rgyud): chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bshad pa ste/ kun dga' bo/ gang sman chen po 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la 'ga' zhig rab tu ldang ba'i sems kyis 'ong na/ de'i mgo ardza
14b6(rgyud): ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /tad+ya thA/ kIrti mU le/ e raN+De mU le/ sa man+ta mU le na Da nA De/ a De/ nA De/ ku sha nA De/ it+te/ mit+te/ pA ru/ a ra Da
14b7(rgyud): ka| ma ra Da kA/ i li ku shi/ go do hi ka/ ud d+huM d+hu ma/ b+hin na/ me DA/ sangs rgyas rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog /rkang bzhi
15a1(rgyud): khyed cag bde legs shog / lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog /phyir 'ong dag kyang bde legs shog /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi
15a2(rgyud): ma'i gung la'ang bde legs shing / /khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog /de dag sdig par ma gyur cig /nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin/ /rgyu skar thams cad bzang
15a3(rgyud): po yin| |sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che/ /dgra bcom thams cad zag pa med/ /bden pa'i tshig 'dis kun tu bde legs su gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs
15a4(rgyud): pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs
15a5(rgyud): su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa
15a6(rgyud): dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ /gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i gnod
15a7(rgyud): sbyin de dag dang / gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang / 'brog rnams dang / 'brog chen po rnams dang / klung rnams dang /
15b1(rgyud): klung chen po rnams dang / sman ljongs rnams dang / 'bab chu rnams dang / lteng ga rnams dang / lu ma rnams dang / ri'i phug rnams dang / dur khrod rnams dang / dur khrod chen po
15b2(rgyud): rnams dang / bzhi mdo rnams dang / grong rnams dang / grong khyer rnams dang / lha rnams dang / skyed mos tshal rnams dang / nags rnams dang / nags tshal rnams dang / lam
15b3(rgyud): rnams dang / lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang / kun dga' bo/ gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
15b4(rgyud): bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig / lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ ha ri hA ri Ni/ tsa li tsa li Ni/ b+h+ra ma ni/ b+h+ra ma ni/ mo ha Ni/
15b5(rgyud): stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ swa yaM b+hu be swahA/ kun dga' bo/ shar phyogs na dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba dri za thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dri za 'bum phrag du ma
15b6(rgyud): yod pa| dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon
15b7(rgyud): po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la
16a1(rgyud): srung ba gyis shig / sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa
16a2(rgyud): spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
16a3(rgyud): mthong bar shog cig / tad+ya thA/ dz+hu dz+hu ru/ dz+hu dz+hu ru/ dz+hu dz+hu ru/ dz+hu ru/ dz+hu ru/ dz+hu ru me swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba
16a4(rgyud): grul bum gyi bdag po 'khor grul bum brgya stong du ma yod pa/ grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar
16a5(rgyud): byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/
16a6(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs
16a7(rgyud): su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams
16b1(rgyud): gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ be lu ke /be lu ke /a mr-i ta g+hA ta ni/ ba ru Na ba ti/ so ma ba
16b2(rgyud): ti| be Nu mA li ni be lu ni/ pri tre ke /tso tsu tsi tsu swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ nub phyogs na klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzang zhes bya ba klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor klu brgya stong du ma
16b3(rgyud): yod pa| klu rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po
16b4(rgyud): dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung
16b5(rgyud): ba gyis shig / sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon
16b6(rgyud): cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /
16b7(rgyud): tad+ya thA| be du ri be du ri/ be dU rI/ be dU rI/ maT+Ti ta/ maT+Ti te/ maT+Ti te/ ko Ti/ ko Ti/ bi d+yu ma ti bi d+yu ma ti/ hu hu hu hu hu hu hu hu/ ru ru ru ru ru ru ru ru/ tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu tsu/
17a1(rgyud): tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa dzu swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya ba gnod sbyin thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor
17a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma yod pa/ gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te/ gang byang phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha
17a3(rgyud): bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ sde dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas rig sngags
17a4(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig / sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde
17a5(rgyud): legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /
17a6(rgyud): lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/ ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ so ri so ri/ shi ri shi ri/ ma ti ma ti/ ti ri ti ri/ ma ti/ ki ri ki ri/ hi ri hi ri/ pe lu pe lu/ piM
17a7(rgyud): ga le| tsu lu tsu lu/ ha taM bi ShaM/ ban d+hu ma ti/ ni ha taM bi ShaM/ ban+d+hu ma ti swAhA/ shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs
17b1(rgyud): na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /rgyal po chen po 'di bzhi dag /'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan/ /phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed/ /sde bo che
17b2(rgyud): la stobs po che/ /pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms/ /gzhan gyis mi thub thul bar dka'/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul
17b3(rgyud): che zhing lha min dang / /lha yi g.yul yang myong bar byed/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung bgyis shig /sba ba dang / yongs su bskyab
17b4(rgyud): pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad
17b5(rgyud): pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /tad+ya thA/ e ma le/ ke le ti le/ mi le/ shi le/ pA
17b6(rgyud): le| duM be/ du duM be/ lhas kun tu char phobs shig /hi li mi li/ duM be/ du duM be/ aT+Te/ baT+Te/ pa ra ma du baT+Te/ lhas 'ur 'ur kun tu char phobs shig /ku Tu gu Tu na ta/ a Da
17b7(rgyud): ka bad dA yAM/ aNAnaN+De/ tun+De/ tu tuN+De/ tsuk+ke/ buk+ke/ mak+ke/ i ri Di/ mi ri Di/ ni ri Di/ pi ri Di/ hi ri Di/ hi ri hi le/ hi le/ hu lu hu lu/ mi li mi li/ tu le/ ta ta le
18a1(rgyud): swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi ming zungs shig /'di lta ste/ lus lan gyi ni bu thu bo/ /kun tu rgyal pa
18a2(rgyud): mi la zhon/ /phrugs su ldan na gnas pa ste/ /lha yi bden pa gsal ba po/ /des kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo
18a3(rgyud): brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig / ston brgya mthong bar gyur cig /tad+ya thA/ ra le bak+ka le/ mA taM gi tsaN+DA li/ pu ra Sha ni/ bi tsi li ni/ gau ri/ gAn+d+ha ri/ mA taM gi /tsaN+DA li/ mA
18a4(rgyud): li ni| hi li hi li/ a ga ti/ gau ri/ gAn+d+ha ri/ koSh+Tha ki ba tsa ri/ bi hA ri/ hi li hi li/ ku bye swAhA/ skya snar bu na 'khor ba 'jig /gzhan gyis mi thub ka ba na/ /grong
18a5(rgyud): khyer bzang na gnod sbyin brag / shed kyi bu ni byang phyogs na/ /lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab/ /bya rgod phung por gnas bcas pa/ /rgya mtsho'i mtha' yi bar gyi sar/ /
18a6(rgyud): lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa/ /stobs che zhing ni gzi brjid che/ /dpag tshad bcur ni rnam par gnon/ /gnod sbyin mkha' lding rgyal ba na/ /sna tshogs sbed
18a7(rgyud): pa gnas sgo na/ /gnod sbyin ba ku rgyal khab na/ /sde bo che la stobs po che/ /gnod sbyin nag po nye nag po/ /ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/ /thub pa chen po shAkya'i
18b1(rgyud): tog |sangs rgyas thub pa gar bltams pa/ /rkang bkra po ni dgra can na/ /tsi ra ta na dbang phyug che/ /gnyan yod na ni phur bu 'o/ /gnas bcas na ni rgya mtsho gnas/ /yangs
18b2(rgyud): pa can na rdo rje mtshon/ /spre'u ltar dmar ser gyad yul na/ /wA rA NA sir nag po che/ /blta na sdug na tsam pa na/ /gnod sbyin khyab 'jug sgo can na/ /'dzin pa po ni sgo drung
18b3(rgyud): na| |'jigs byed zangs kyi 'dab ma can/ /brang gis 'gro na 'dzems pa'o/ /'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog gnas po/ /ser skya po ni 'bru mang na/ /'phags rgyal na ni nor
18b4(rgyud): srung ba| |srung byed na ni nor 'byor pa/ /gso ba'i mtha' na gso pa po/ /dga' bo nye dga' grong khyer gnas/ /phreng ba 'dzin pa chu mchog na/ /kun dga' 'chi med sa zhag
18b5(rgyud): na| |mche ba dkar po dngos bzang na/ /mi brtan pa ni gzi can na/ /rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na/ /nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams gnas/ /smin drug bu ni gzhon nu zhes/ /
18b6(rgyud): 'jig rten grags pa skyes yod pa/ /'od ma'i 'gram na lag brgya pa/ /ka ling ka na shing rta che/ /thul bar dka' ni 'gro 'joms na/ /srid sgrub nags na srid sgrub pa/ /
18b7(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'joms pa mdun khang na/ /phreng ba srung na ri brtsegs pa/ /rta dmar na ni bzang po pa/ /ma rdzogs pa na thams cad bzang / /snyems pa can na skyong ba po/ /
19a1(rgyud): ded dpon nor gyi dbang phyug go /ma rgyal rgyal na mche ba gtsigs/ /gnas can na ni nor bzang po/ /zhi ba zhi ba'i grong len na/ /zhi ba bzang po 'jigs
19a2(rgyud): byed na| |gnod sbyin dbang po dbang grong na/ /me tog tog ni rdo grong na/ /shing pa shing gi grong khyer na/ /kha dog can na ser skya gnas/ /nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang / /
19a3(rgyud): spun gnyis tshangs pa ldan pa na/ /ba lang 'dzin na 'joms pa po/ /rab tu 'joms pa rdo 'jog na/ /gnod sbyin chen po bong srung sel/ /skyug pa yi ni ri la gnas/ /gsum
19a4(rgyud): sbas 'gram pa ldan ngogs na/ /hu nu na ni 'od byed pa/ /dga' ba can dang 'phel byed pa/ /dga' ba 'phel byed grong khyer na/ /rlung gi sa na rlung ldan pa/ /'phyang bar gyur na
19a5(rgyud): 'thab dga' ba/ /bcom brlag na ni bong bu pa/ /lang ka na ni bum pa'i lto/ /gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na/ /ko sa la ni ri mgo bo/ /rnam par rgyal dang rnam rgyal
19a6(rgyud): ldan| |dkar po bcom brlag yul na gnas/ /gnod sbyin gang ba ma la yar/ /ti se gangs na mi'am ci/ /sprin gyi phreng can pon tra na/ /rab tu gnas na dum bu pa/ /
19a7(rgyud): pi tang ga l+yar yang dag byed/ /rlangs dang ldan na bde byed pa/ /sna nas byung na gnod sbyin mdzes/ /gso ba'i mtha' na ma chags pa/ /dga' byed dang ni pha dga'
19b1(rgyud): dang / /dpa' dang gser gyi lag pa dang / /ka ling ka na lto 'phyang po/ /ko sa la na nag po che/ /dge ba dge ba'i pho brang na/ /wA ra NA sir skyong ba po/ /'gram ldan phung po rna
19b2(rgyud): ba bzang / /grong khyer drug na nor gzhan po/ /gnod sbyin stobs can mtha' ma la/ /srung ba can na mthong dka' ba/ /ba lang 'joms na gtsug phud can/ /phyogs
19b3(rgyud): mtshams na ni thal mo dga'/ /gdugs 'dra na ni dkris pa po/ /grong khyer drug na chu srin 'dul/ /tshang tshing gcig na mig yangs pa/ /u dum ba rar sgo nga'i 'od/ /
19b4(rgyud): kau'u sham+b+hi na lhun gyis grub/ /rnam par snang byed zhi ldan na/ /sbrul gyi gdugs na dga' ba po/ /g.yo ba 'dzin na ser skya 'o/ /gyen du 'gro na ba ku la/ /gang po snying po
19b5(rgyud): thob byed na/ /grong rdal tshol ba lnga mang na/ /glang chen brjod pa 'du ba mchog /chu lha'i yul na gzhu brtan po/ /g.yul 'gyed ldan par grong khyer rgyal/ /sgra ngan zhing ni
19b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / /gnyi dang rgyal ngan rgyal gnyi na/ /gnod sbyin mor grags de nyid na/ /gtum chen gser gyi 'od bag can/ /gnod par byed dang don grub dang / /'byung
19b7(rgyud): bar byed pa nags na gnas/ /'gro ba drug pa 'gro 'joms na/ /ka ba na ni ka ba nyid/ /seng+ge'i stobs na gnod sbyin gang / /seng+ge stag stobs med byed gnyis/ /bye ba
20a1(rgyud): 'dab na sde bo che/ /de bzhin gzhan gyi grong las rgyal/ /me tog so ni tsam pa na/ /mnyam dga' ba ni ri mang na/ /ba lang sbyor na gnod sbyin ri/ /
20a2(rgyud): grong khyer na ni sde bzang po/ /gnas dang bcas na lag pa ba/ /kha la byin na bde byed pa/ /kau'u sham+b+hi na tshegs med pa/ /bzang po can na bzang po pa/ /skya snar can
20a3(rgyud): gyi bu na ni/ /gnod sbyin 'byung po'i gdong zhes bya/ /'ching bu na ni mya ngan med/ /ma la gnas na sha thang ba/ /tshang tshing gcig na don grub pa/ /ma rgyal rgyal na
20a4(rgyud): dman pa po/ /chu mchog na ni mun dza'i skra/ /sen da pa na nor bu'i gnas/ /gnod sbyin mi bzad 'gro ldan dag ser skya yi ni gnas na gnas/ /ba lang 'dzin
20a5(rgyud): dang gzhan brnyas dang / /sgo ba gnas can rtag pa dang / /dbu ma pa yi gnod sbyin dag /grags pa chen po bzang mdzes na/ /grong khyer snying por dgras dogs pa/ /
20a6(rgyud): mya ngan sa na rmongs byed pa/ /khyus 'gro na ni gnod sbyin grags/ /ma rungs pa yang de bzhin te/ /nga rgyal bral dang lha rtse ba/ /'jigs byin na ni yid 'jigs
20a7(rgyud): pa| |kha che'i yul na 'od byed pa/ /gtum po ral pa can grong na/ /kha che'i yul gyi sa mtshams na/ /lngas rtsen zhes ni bya ba gnas/ /de la bu ni lnga brgya ste/ /
20b1(rgyud): sde bo che la stobs po che/ /lngas rtsen gyi ni bu thu bo/ /rgya yul gyi ni sa la gnas/ /phrag pa'i mig ces bya ba ni/ /mdzod ldan na ni spun dang bcas/ /ka ling ka na mche ba rkang / /
20b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khor stan na dkyil 'khor ro/ /ka pu sha na lang ka'i bdag /'od can dga' ba'i tshang tshing na/ /nam mkha' srung na chos skyong ba/ /lag pa chen po ngan pa na/ /rnam
20b3(rgyud): thos bu yi bu dpa' ldan/ /rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal po'i bu/ /gnod sbyin bye bas yongs bskor cing / /tho gar gyi ni yul na gnas/ /'gror bcas ri dang gangs can dang / /

20b5(rgyud): bzhin ni 'brog na ste/ /'gro 'am ci ni 'og na gnas/ /pad+ma dkar po 'od gsal ba/ /grong khyer che na brtse ba can/ /'jigs pa sbyin na rab 'jigs pa/ /chu dang
20b6(rgyud): ldan na dmar ser gnas/ /ba ba da bskyed ba pa Da/ /'dod pa sbyin na ma dang ldan/ /bu mo 'jug na rab sad pa/ /ka bu sha na nal ku ba/ /pha rol mtha' med dngul chu
20b7(rgyud): na| |nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa/ /pa lha pa na thag bzang ris/ /ke ta ka na dmar ser po/ /'phral ris 'phel na bzhin rgyas pa/ /u rgyan yul na ma rungs pa/ /thong shol
21a1(rgyud): ngan na bum lto po/ /chu srin rgyal mtshan mya ngan na/ /sna tshogs sde ni po ka na/ /dga' dang ldan na sgra sgrog bu/ /phung po'i bdag por dmar ser

22a6(rgyud): gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ seng+ge dang / nye ba'i seng+ge dang / dung can dang / dga' po'o/ /de

22b1(rgyud): bo| nub phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ 'di lta ste/ seng+ge dang / seng+ge'i ral pa dang / bla

23a1(rgyud): gnas te/ gang dag sa srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag /'di lta ste/ sa pa dang / shin tu sa pa dang / nag po dang / nye nag go /de dag
23a2(rgyud): gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig / lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /kun dga' bo/ gnod
23a3(rgyud): sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gang dag bar snang la gnas te/ gang dag bar snang srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag /'di lta ste/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / me

23b2(rgyud): gnas dang mi'i rgyal po dang / rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / tshigs lnga ser po dang / bzhin bzang dang / gnod sbyin ring po 'khor dang bcas pa dang / dri za sna tshogs sde dang /
23b3(rgyud): 'bras bu gsum pa dang / mgul gsum pa dang / lcags mdung ring po dang / ma ldan te/ gnod sbyin de dag ni/ gnod sbyin chen po'o/ /sde rnams kyis yongs su 'dren pa/ rdzu
23b4(rgyud): 'phrul dang ldan pa/ 'od dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa dag ste/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus
23b5(rgyud): gnod sbyin 'di ni/ nga la rnam par 'tshe'o/ /gnod sbyin 'di ni/ nga mi gtong ngo / /zhes gang dag la go bar byed pa de dag ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i spun te/

23b7(rgyud): rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab mo dang / 'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig/ mi'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / lha'i gdon dang / klu'i gdon
24a1(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin gyi gdon dang / rlung lha'i gdon dang / nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang / dri za'i gdon dang / mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i

36b7(rgyud): bram ze gang dag sdig pa'i chos rnams bsal bar gyur pa de dag la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag gis kyang bdag la srung ba dang / bskyab pa gyis shig swAhA/ kun dga'
37a1(rgyud): bo| rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ a ra De/ ka ra
37a2(rgyud): De| ma de/ ma da bar+d+ha ni/ a ba re sha ba re/ tu re tu re/ tsu re tsu re/ sha ba re/ par+Na sha ba re/ hu tsi hu tsi mu tsi mu tsi swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen
37a3(rgyud): mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can gyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ iT+Ti/ miT+Ti/ khu re bi khu re/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ke tu mU le/ am+ba
37a4(rgyud): rA+e| ba ti/ duM be/ do duM be/ hi li hi li/ ku tsi ku tsi/ mu tsi mu tsi swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
37a5(rgyud): thams cad skyob kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ mo ri mo ri/ ke baT+Ti/ maN+Di maN+Di ti ke/ ha re ha re/ g+ha re g+ha re/ kha re kha re/ hi li hi li ni ha la ha la ni/ pha le/ pha li ni/ dAn+te/
37a6(rgyud): dan+ti ni/ dan+ti li/ sha ka ti/ ma ka Ti/ ma ka Ti/ na De/ na Di ni/ shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri shi ri swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/
37a7(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi Di hi Di/ mi Di mi Di/ ku Di ku Di/ mu Di mu Di/ tu Di tu Di/ a Di a Di/ daN+te/
37b1(rgyud): dan+te le| sha ka ri/ tsa ka ri/ ba ga ri/ b+ha ga ri/ tha ga ri/ ta ga ri/ kAny+tsa ne/ kAny+tsa nA ba ti/ tsa re tsa re tsa re tsa re/ ba re ba re/ ba re ba re/ dan+ti sid+d+hi swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig
37b2(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser thub kyis gsungs pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ ta ta le ta ta le/ ta ta le/ ta ta le/ ta ta le/ ta la te ta
37b3(rgyud): la te| ba le/ bI re bi dza re/ bidz+dzu d+ha re/ a ra dze/ bi ra dze/ bi ra dzA/ mi sa/ ma ti ma ti/ mA li mA li ni/ muN+di shA muN+di dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ b+ha dra ba ti/ b+ha dra ba ti/ sid+d+hi swAhA/

37b5(rgyud): dzam+bu dzam+bu na da/ dzam+bu ba ti/ mat+te/ maN+Di ti ke/ a ma re/ sid+d+hi/ ha ra ha ra ha ra ha ra/ pa shu pa shu pa shu pa shu pa shu pa ti sid+d+hi swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma
37b6(rgyud): bya chen mo 'di ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ngas sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir da ltar bshad pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ ki li ki
37b7(rgyud): li| i li le/ ka ta le/ ke dU mU le/ a Da ma li/ ma Ta ma li/ a Ta ma li/ an Ti/ Dap+pe/ Daph+pe/ Da Daph+phe/ e ka ba hu a na b+hi Ta Ta ba b+ha ru ru pa ka ru pa/ pu sa ra ke /bu sa Te/
38a1(rgyud): na ra kan+te/ ka mi Ni/ kam+bu/ kA ma ru ba ni/ ki hi li/ tse tse le ke/ kaM bu da ra ki/ ta ru da ra ki/ ta ru ta ru/ ba ru Ni/ tsa ru ta ru Ni/ ta ru Ni ta ru Ne/
38a2(rgyud): ba ti dzaM ba le bA sa ra Ni/ b+ha ran+ta raT+Te ba ra naM/ da ra ki ru ru ta ra/ ba ra Ni blo ga b+ha ra Ni/ pra kri ti/ daMSh+Te/ mi li ta le/ hi ti hA se/ a ba le/ tu ba le/ bi laM ke /ba li
38a3(rgyud): ke| baT+Ti baT+Ti ti ke/ a Dan+tu be/ ba ti tuM me/ phyogs bcu kun tu lhas char phobs shig /bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sa la dga' bas chu dbab tu gsol//
38a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo/ /i ri dza ya/ go do hi kA ye/ b+h+ri ga ri kA ye/ a ru tsi/ na ru tsi/ a ru tsi/ a ru dze/ na ra dze/ aT+Te/ naT+Te/ naT+Te/ naT+Te/ badzre badzre
38a5(rgyud): naT+Te/ u pa la na pri ye/ a le tA le/ kuM la tA le/ nA ra yA Ni/ pA rA ya Ni/ pa sh+ya ni pa sh+ya spar sha ni swAhA/ 'gro lding ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur
38a6(rgyud): cig swAhA/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ngas bstan cing rjes su yi rang nas dge slong kun dga' bos dge slong sa ri la bde legs su 'gyur bar byas pa de

38b1(rgyud): dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig/

38b3(rgyud): thA| shi ri shi ri shi ri/ b+ha dre/ dz+yo ti dz+yo ti/ dz+yo ti b+ha dre/ ha re ha re ha re/ hA ri Ni/ dan+ti sha ba re/ shi be/ shU la pA Ni ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ satwa bo d+hi/ ba ri tsA Ni ye swAhA/

38b7(rgyud): bcom pa'i gzi brjid kyis dub bcom mo/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /rgyun du zhugs
39a1(rgyud): pa'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /bden par smra ba'i gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /tshangs pa'i me dbal gyi gzi brjid kyis dug bcom mo/ /dbang

39a5(rgyud): la'i dug dang / nag po brtsegs pa'i dug dang / mche ba'i dug dang / rtsa ba'i dug dang / kha zas kyi dug dang / phye ma'i dug dang / lta ba'i dug dang / glog gi dug dang / sprin
39a6(rgyud): gyi dug dang / sbrul dang / byi ba dang / srin bu ki ta dang / lu ta dang / ka na b+ha ba dang / sbal pa dang / sbrang bu dang / bung ba dang / ba ta ri dang / tre ma pu ga dang / trai la ta'i
39a7(rgyud): dug dang / mi'i dug dang / sdig pa'i dug dang / mi ma yin pa'i dug dang / dogs pa'i dug dang / sman gyi dug dang / rig sngags kyi dug las bde legs su gyur cig/

39b3(rgyud): bi be ti ma ti/ ku ru ku ru se/ ba ru ba ru se d+ha ra se re badzra/ tu Ta tu Ta se/ ba Ta ba Ta se/ si li si li ka pi le/ ka pi la mu le/ hA hI hU/ sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba thams cad rab

42b2(rgyud): rgyal po ba lang srung dang / ri'i rgyal po bya rog sgra can dang / ri'i rgyal po bstan pa 'dzin dang / sa'i dkyil 'khor 'di na ri'i rgyal po 'di dag dang / gzhan dag kyang yod
42b3(rgyud): pa de la lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / dri za rnams dang / mi 'am ci rnams dang / lto 'phye chen

42b6(rgyud): pa rnams dang / rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag rgyun du gnas pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya
42b7(rgyud): 'tsho bar gyur cig / ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /sdig pa thams cad sol cig /dge ba rnams snang bar gyur cig /mi dge ba sol cig /don rnams la snang
43a1(rgyud): bar gyis shig / gnod pa rnams sol cig /mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs/ /nyi ma'i gung gi bde legs dang / /nyin mtshan kun gyi bde
43a2(rgyud): legs dag / sangs rgyas kun gyis bdag la stsol swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis rgyu skar gang dag nam mkha' la rgyu zhing snang bar byed pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig /
43a3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ smin drug dang ni snar ma dang / /mgo dang lag dang snabs so dang / /rgyal ni bkra shis phun sum tshogs/ /de bzhin skag ste bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar
43a4(rgyud): bdun po 'di dag ni/ shar gyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
43a5(rgyud): rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig / lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /mchu ni mi mdza' 'joms pa dang / /de bzhin gre
43a6(rgyud): dang dbo gnyis dang / /ma bzhi nag pa sa ri dang / /sa ga de ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ /lho phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag
43a7(rgyud): lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go / de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar
43b1(rgyud): gyur cig / ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /lha mtshams gzi brjid chen mo dang / /de bzhin snron dang snubs dang ni/ /chu stod pa dang ni chu smad dang / /de ltar byi bzhin gro bzhin no/ /
43b2(rgyud): de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ nub phyogs kyi sgo na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag nub phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go /de dag gis kyang rig sngags
43b3(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig / lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya mthong bar shog cig /mon gru dang ni mon gre dang / /de bzhin khrums
43b4(rgyud): stod khrums smad dang / /nam gru dang ni tha skar dang / /bra nye de ni bdun pa yin/ /de ltar rgyu skar bdun po 'di dag ni/ byang gi phyogs na gnas pa dag ste/ gang dag byang phyogs
43b5(rgyud): srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed pa dag go / de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
43b6(rgyud): mthong bar shog cig / kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis gza' gang dag rgyu skar rnams kyi khrod na rgyu zhing 'grib pa dang / 'phel ba dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / lo legs
43b7(rgyud): pa dag lo nyes pa dag kyang ston pa rnams kyi ming zungs shig / 'di lta ste/ gza' nyi ma dang / gza' zla ba dang / gza' phur bu dang / gza' pa sangs dang / gza' spen pa dang /
44a1(rgyud): gza' mig dmar dang / gza' lhag pa dang / gza' lha min dbang po sgra gcan dang / gza' du ba mjug ring ngo / /rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni/ /de
44a2(rgyud): ltar phyogs na bdun bdun no/ /skar ma gza' bdun de bzhin te/ /rdzu 'phrul che zhing dka' thub che/ /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /sum cu rtsa bdun tshang ba dag /'char
44a3(rgyud): ba dang ni nub pa dang / /'khor lo mtshon cha bzhin du rgyu/ /'jig rten du ni zad 'phel byed/ /gzi che rdzu 'phrul chen po dag /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis su/ /rig
44a4(rgyud): sngags rjes su yi rang byas/ /de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig /lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig /ston brgya
44a5(rgyud): mthong bar shog cig / kun dga' bo/ drang srong rnying pa brtul zhugs grub pa/ rig sngags grub pa/ grags pa 'bar ba dang / klung dang ri la gnas pa/ dmod pa'i
44a6(rgyud): mtshon cha can/ dka' thub drag pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ nam mkha' la 'gro ba de dag gi ming brjod kyi/ khyod kyis zungs shig /
44a7(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ drang srong chen po rgyas pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po g.yon phyogs lha zhes bya ba dang / drang srong
44b1(rgyud): chen po lha skyabs kyi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'od zer can zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po kun gyi bshes zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnas 'jog
44b2(rgyud): ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grog mkhar ba zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'drob skyong gi bu rgan po zhes bya ba
44b3(rgyud): dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ngan spong dga' zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro 'dzin ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'gro dga'

44b5(rgyud): chen po mdun du bdar zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po mgo bo che zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen bo gshin rje'i me zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung gi bu
44b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gnyis 'thung nag po'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ljang sngo'i tsha bo zhes bya ba dang /

45a1(rgyud): bzod pa smra zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po grags pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rab grags zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po bla ma zhes

45a5(rgyud): srong chen po phur bu zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po spen pa zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po gza' lhag ces

45b1(rgyud): chen po 'jigs byed ces bya ba dang / drang srong chen po 'jigs byed glang po zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po ser skya zhes bya ba dang / drang srong chen po go'u ta ma zhes bya ba dang

45b3(rgyud): srong chen po srin bu 'dzin ces bya ba ste/ kun dga' bo/ drang srong chen po rnying pa 'di dag ni/ rig byed rnams byed pa/ gsang sngags rnams byed pa/ dmod pa 'dor ba/ brtul

45b7(rgyud): ni| stam+b+ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni swa yaM b+hu swAhA/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis skye rgu'i bdag po chen po gang dag lha rnams dang / klu rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / lha ma yin rnams

46a2(rgyud): dang / mi dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi dge ba dang / mi dge ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i khyad par grangs med pa dag gis 'jig

46a6(rgyud): bdag po mkhas pa dang / skye rgu'i bdag po gus yod de/ kun dga' bo/ skye rgu'i bdag po bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni/ gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs

47b7(rgyud): bdag po tshangs pas kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang smras shing rjes su yi rang ba'o/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis

49b6(rgyud): ro| |rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis kyang gshur zhes bya ba la thug gi bar gyi gsang sngags kyis de la sdug bsngal chen po byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyi dbang

50a1(rgyud): rlog par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ su zhig gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis srung ba byas sam/ skud pa btags na/ de gsang pa'i

50a4(rgyud): 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la dug gis
