50a7(rgyud): du 'tsho bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni/ ma gtogs so/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni/ ha cang
50b1(rgyud): char che ba 'am/ char dkon pa'i tshe bklag par bya'o/ /des ni/ klu thams cad spro bar 'gyur te/ char chen po ni/ gcod par byed/ char dkon pa'i tshe rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs
50b2(rgyud): kyi bu mo de'i bsam pa ji srid par char 'bebs par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di dran pas kyang 'jigs pa dang / dgra thams cad
50b3(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur na/ sus dum bur ma gyur cing rdzogs par 'chang ba'am/ bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyi rig sngags kyi
50b4(rgyud): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di zungs shig/ 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i
50b5(rgyud): phyir rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo dgra thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ 'di kun chub par gyis shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig/ tad+ya thA/ yA ba ti/ d+hA ba ti/
50b6(rgyud): d+hA ra ki/ hu lu/ hu lu me swAhA/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan dug med pa/ /sangs rgyas bden
50b7(rgyud): pas dug bcom mo/ /'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /bcom ldan chos ni dug med pa/ /chos kyi bden pas dug bcom mo/ /
51a1(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams/ /de dag 'jig rten dug gsum ste/ /bcom ldan dge 'dun dug med pa/ /dge 'dun bden pas dug bcom
51a2(rgyud): mo| |sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs gang dang / /dgra bcom rnams kyi grags gang dang / /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid kyis/ /ngas ni bde legs 'gyur ba byas/ /
51a3(rgyud): kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mos dug bcom mo/ /dge slong sa ri bde legs su gyur cig /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan
51a4(rgyud): 'das la legs so zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas dge
51a5(rgyud): slong sa ri ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis dge slong sa ri la chad pa spang ba byas te/ yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su
51a6(rgyud): gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug gzhil ba dang / dug gsad pa dang /
51a7(rgyud): mtshams gcad pa dang / sa bcing ba byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos srung ba dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba byas pas/ tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri nad de las
51b1(rgyud): sos so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa dge slong sa ri bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
51b2(rgyud): 'tshal te/ ji ltar gyur pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
51b3(rgyud): pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di'i mthu mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gsung
51b4(rgyud): ba de la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ ci'i slang du ma 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ 'di ltar rgya mtsho
51b5(rgyud): chen po bzhi ni/ skam yang srid/ sa ni/ nam mkha' la 'phags kyang srid/ zla ba dang nyi ma ni/ sa la ltung yang srid/ klung ni/ rgyun las ldog kyang srid kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
51b6(rgyud): bka' ni/ gzhan du 'gyur mi srid do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ de lta bas na/ rig sngags kyi rgyal
51b7(rgyud): mo rma bya chen mo 'di la 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams mos par gyis shig /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos
52a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan nas 'khor bzhi po dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen
52a2(rgyud): dang / dge bsnyen ma de rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la mos par byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun
52a3(rgyud): dga' bo dang / tshe dang ldan pa sa ri dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod
52a4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa gang dag 'khor der 'dus te 'khod pa de dag thams cad yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
52a5(rgyud): bstod do/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nyA na sid+d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / zhu chen
52a6(rgyud): gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya mahA pra ti sa ra bid+yA rI dz+nyI/ bod
52a7(rgyud): skad du| 'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
52b1(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lhun po chen po'i zom na khang pa brtsegs pa rdo rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sa'i gnas/ rdo rje chen po'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pas
52b2(rgyud): legs par brgyan pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rdzing gi rin po che dang pad+ma'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa/ sa phyogs rdo rje chen po'i bye ma bdal ba/ rdo rje chen por byin gyis brlabs pa/
52b3(rgyud): 'khor gyi khyams rdo rje chen po las byas pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rdo rje'i seng+ge'i khri chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis rnam par mdzes pa/ chos bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul can sangs
52b4(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba na byang chub sems dpa'
52b5(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa/ mthu chen
52b6(rgyud): po thob pa/ rdo rje chen po'i rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du mar rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po kun tu ston pa/ sems kyi skad cig/
52b7(rgyud): thang gcig /yud tsam gcig la sems can thams cad kyi sems dang / spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa'i chos ston pa sna tshogs snyan cing rgya che la zab cing yangs pa dang /
53a1(rgyud): spobs pa dang / cho 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi'i du mar de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod pa dang / rnam par
53a2(rgyud): thar pa'i sgo dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ma 'dres pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / sa dang / pha rol
53a3(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms dang / byams pa'i stobs dang / bden pa dang /
53a4(rgyud): yongs su byang ba'i sems kyi rgyun dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i lus dang / rdo rje'i blo gros
53a5(rgyud): dang / lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'dus pa dang / rdo rje mthu bo che dang / rdo rje rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rdo rje brtsegs pa dang / rdo rje phung po dang / rdo rje bzang po dang / byang chub
53a6(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / nyan thos chen
53a7(rgyud): po rab tu mang po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su chad pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol
53b1(rgyud): ba| rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthu chen po thob pa/ lta ba chags pa med pa/ thams cad kyang dri ma dang bral ba thob pa/
53b2(rgyud): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyi sa bon nges par bsregs pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / tshe dang
53b3(rgyud): ldan pa ka pi na dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa mau dgal gyi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od
53b4(rgyud): srung dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / de dag la sogs pa nyan thos chen po rab tu mang po dang / lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la
53b5(rgyud): sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu grangs med dpag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs
53b6(rgyud): ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i bu rab 'thab bral g.yog 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul
53b7(rgyud): dbang byed dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin lha'i bu thams cad kyi 'khor can dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris dang / stobs can dang / rab sim dang / sgra gcan
54a1(rgyud): dang / rnam par snang byed dang / de dag la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / 'jog
54a2(rgyud): po dang / nor rgyas kyi bu dang / dung skyong dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po dang / de dag la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams
54a3(rgyud): dang / mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa dri za'i rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / rig sngags 'chang
54a4(rgyud): gi rgyal po don thams cad grub pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po g.yog
54a5(rgyud): du ma can dang / gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang / nor bu bzang dang / gang ba bzang dang / lngas rtsen gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po g.yog du ma can dang / 'phrog
54a6(rgyud): ma bu lnga brgya'i g.yog du ma can dang / 'jig rten gyi ma bdun dang / srin mo chen mo bdun dang / drang srong gi mchog chen po bdun dang / bar snang la rgyu ba'i rgyu skar
54a7(rgyud): dang / gza' thams cad kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs mtshams kyi lha rnams dang / sa'i lha dang / dbyangs can dang / 'byung po rnams dang /
54b1(rgyud): bgegs rnams dang / log 'dren rnams dang / yi dwags rnams dang / 'byung po rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams dang / ri'i rgyal po thams cad dang / 'jig rten skyong ba chu lha g.yog
54b2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i lha thams cad dang bcas pa dang / 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang dang / lag na be con dang / bden bral dang / me'i lha dang / rlung gi lha chen po bdun dang /
54b3(rgyud): dbang bdag chung ma dang bcas pa g.yog bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma can dang / sred med kyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa dang / byin pa po dang / phrang ba can dang / zla ba can
54b4(rgyud): dang / lcags can dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / sprin ta la la dang / log 'dren gyi dbang po bgegs log 'dren gyi dbang po g.yog du ma can dang / shing gseb
54b5(rgyud): kyi lha drug cu dang / sring mo bzhi ming po dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje'i lu gu rgyud dang / rdo rje'i pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / rdo rje'i sde dang / lag bzang dang / gtsug gis 'gro rdo
54b6(rgyud): rje'i ris kyi 'khor du ma dang bcas pa dang / de las gzhan pa sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
54b7(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / grib gnon dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang /
55a1(rgyud): skem byed dang / sgrub pa dang / sbrul 'dzin bcas pa dang / gnon po tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / lha'i bu nyi ma dang / lha'i bu zla
55a2(rgyud): ba dang / nub ka'i lha dang / nang par gyi lha dang / dus kyi lha thams cad dang / sa'i lha dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das de chos kyi 'khor lo ni shin
55a3(rgyud): tu bskor/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ shin tu yongs su mthar phyin/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni
55a4(rgyud): shin tu yongs su bzung / byang chub chen po'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa dang sa ni brnyes/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa'i sku ni rab tu 'bar/
55a5(rgyud): yan lag dang nying lag thams cad ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par spras/ dbu'i gtsug ni sems can thams cad kyis bltar mi mthong / bdud kyi las
55a6(rgyud): thams cad la ni mkhas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa ni shes/ spyan rnam pa lnga ni mnga'/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ni ldan/ thams
55a7(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ni ldan/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang ni ldan/ bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad ni bcom/ grags pa dang / sgra
55b1(rgyud): dang / tshigs su bcad pas ni 'phags/ khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i sgra ni sgrog /ma rig pa'i mun pa ni kun tu bsal/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med dpag tu med par sbyin pa
55b2(rgyud): dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyi pha rol
55b3(rgyud): tu phyin pa dang / bya dka' ba'i spyod pa las ni phyir ma log /sku ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan te rab tu mdzes shing rdo rje rin po che'i
55b4(rgyud): pad+ma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri chen po rdo rje rin po che dang / mu tig dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba du ma sgra 'byung ba/ rtsa ba'i drung na rdo rje rin po che'i stegs bu du ma shin
55b5(rgyud): tu brtan par gnas pa/ rdo rje'i rin po che'i chu srin du ma'i kha nas byung ba'i mu tig dmar po'i phreng ba bres pa'i phang bshams pa/ rin po che du ma pad+ma'i snying po la chags pa/
55b6(rgyud): rin po che ke ke ru dang / ke ke ru chen po dang / an+da rnyil dang / an+da rnyil chen po dang / dun las kyi 'od zer chen po 'tsher bas snang bar byas te kun nas mdzes
55b7(rgyud): pa| gdugs rtsa ba dang bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i shar bu du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ skye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas rnam par brgyan pa/ bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phra
56a1(rgyud): du mas kun nas bskyabs pa/ dpag bsam gyi shing du mas rgyas par mdzes par byas pa/ rdo rje rin po che'i khri ri rab tsam la bzhugs te gser gyi ri bo'i
56a2(rgyud): rgyal po ltar dpal ni/ rab tu 'bar/ sa phyogs ni/ nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par brgyan/ zla ba nya ba ltar 'jig rten thams cad la sdug
56a3(rgyud): par ni| snang / dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa chen po ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni/ shin tu rgyas shing chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge
56a4(rgyud): ba| tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par rab tu ston to/ /de nas
56a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas 'od zer gyi dra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba bkye ste/ 'od zer gyi dra ba des stong gsum
56a6(rgyud): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas khyab par gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das seng+ge'i khri bkod pa du ma'i khang pa
56a7(rgyud): brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang na nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
56b1(rgyud): ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu chos ston pa'i
56b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba des khyab par gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor phal po che la bka' stsal
56b3(rgyud): pa| sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /nyes par byas dang gnod pa kun/ /rab 'joms so sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'di rab tu bshad par bya/ /'di ni thos pa tsam gyis
56b4(rgyud): kyang / /sdig pa kun ni zad par 'gyur/ /sems can kun la bde ba sbyin/ /nad do cog las grol bar byed/ /sems can kun la snying brtse bas/ /lus can ngan 'gror
56b5(rgyud): 'gro ba dang / /de dag thams cad bskyab pa'i phyir/ /'jig rten dag gi mgon pos gsungs/ /'di yis srung ba byas na ni/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'jug /de bzhin
56b6(rgyud): lcang lo can dang ni/ /srin po'i gnas kyi sar yang 'gro/ /'byung po klu dang sha za rnams/ /mi bzad 'jigs pa'i g.yul 'gyed par/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams
56b7(rgyud): cad dang / /dgra bo cog gis mi tshugs so/ /ming tsam bzung ste brjod byas kyang / /skem byed brjed byed smyo byed dang / /mkha' 'gro ma dang sha za dang / /gdon rnams
57a1(rgyud): rab tu brlag par 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ /gzi chen mdangs rnams za ba dang / /mi yi skye rgu rnams 'tshe ba/ /de dag thams
57a2(rgyud): cad rengs byed 'gyur/ /byad stems mi bzad gang yin dang / /pha rol dmag tshogs phung bar byed/ /sngags kyi las kyis gnod mi 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i las las rnam
57a3(rgyud): par grol/ /dug dang dug sbyar mes mi tshugs/ /mtshon dang chus kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /lce 'bab glog gis mi tshugs te/ /dus kyi rlung gis gnod mi 'gyur/ /
57a4(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ /dgra kun rab tu 'joms par 'gyur/ /de yi don rnams thams cad 'grub/ /rtag tu rgyal ba thob par 'gyur/ /gang gis
57a5(rgyud): rtag tu mgul pa'am/ /lag par rig pa btags na ni/ /de yi dgos pa yod do cog /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / /
57a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams dang rang 'dren dang / /de bzhin klu yi rgyal po dang / /lha dbang rnams ni rtag tu srung / /so sor 'brang ba'i gzungs 'dzin la/ /nyan thos sangs
57a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad dang / /rig pa'i lha mo rdzu 'phrul che/ /rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang / /de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang / /de
57b1(rgyud): la nyin dang mtshan rnams su/ /srung bar byed de the tshom med/ /brgya byin lha dang bcas pa dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen dang / /dga' ba'i dbang po nag po che/ /
57b2(rgyud): smin drug bu dang tshogs kyi dbang / /ma mo'i tshogs rnams thams cad dang / /de bzhin bdud ris gzhan rnams dang / /drang srong gzi brjid che rnams dang / /rdzu 'phrul chen
57b3(rgyud): po'i lha rnams dang / /de kun so sor 'brang ba yi/ /gzungs 'dzin de la srung bar byed/ /sangs rgyas bdag nyid che rnams dang / /rig pa'i lha mo stobs chen dang / /bdag gi
57b4(rgyud): ma dang khro gnyer dang / /lha mo sgrol ma lcags kyu dang / /rdo rje lu gu rgyud dang dkar/ /de bzhin dkar mo chen mo dang / /nag mo che dang pho nya dang / /de bzhin rdo rje pho nya dang /
57b5(rgyud): zhags pa bzang dang rdo rje zhags/ /lag na rdo rje stobs po che/ /rig pa lha mo rdo rje phreng / /bdud rtsi thab sbyor byed pa dang / /gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che/ /rna ba nag
57b6(rgyud): mo stobs chen mo/ /dpal yon ldan pa skal chen dang / /rna cha gdub kor pad+ma 'dra/ /me tog so can nor bu gtsug /skra mdog mdzes dang khyab pa mo/ /lha mo gzi brjid
