64a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur rig par bya'o/ /rdo rje'i lus yin par rig
64a7(rgyud): par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi snying po can yin par rig par bya'o/ /de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan yin par rig par
64b1(rgyud): bya'o| |de rdo rje chen po'i lus su rig par bya'o/ /de 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i lus dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /de mi shigs pa'i go cha can du rig par bya'o/ /de dgra thams
64b2(rgyud): cad rab tu 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad 'joms par rig par bya'o/ /de sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba rnams sbyong bar rig par bya'o/ /
64b3(rgyud): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yongs su shes pa yin te/ bram ze chen po/ phyogs gzhan zhig na dge slong ma dad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bslab pa 'dral ba/ ma
64b4(rgyud): byin par len pa/ bza' ba 'du ba'i sgo 'phrog pa/ dge 'dun gyi dang / phyogs bzhi dang / tshogs rdzas su gyur pa de thams cad gang zag gir byin gyis brlabs te za ba zhig
64b5(rgyud): dus gzhan zhig na nad tshabs chen pos btab pa dang / sdug bsngal chen po'i tshor ba myong ngo / /nyon mongs te skyabs med dpung gnyen med nas ku co'i sgra chen po 'byin
64b6(rgyud): to| |bram ze chen po/ de nas phyogs de na dge bsnyen zhig gnas pa des sgra de thos so/ /thos nas kyang dge slong de ga la ba der song ste phyin nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor
64b7(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo 'di bris te dge slong de'i mgul du btags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo dge slong de'i mgul du btags ma thag tu tshor ba thams
65a1(rgyud): cad ni| rab tu zhi/ nad thams cad las ni/ yongs su thar te sos par gyur nas de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang / dran pa shin tu nye bar bzhag ste
65a2(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus byas so/ /lus de bor ba dang sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so/ /de'i ro de yang dge slong dag gis sgang bu zhig la bzhag
65a3(rgyud): go / rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo de yang de'i mgul du btags pa bzhin du gnas so/ /dge slong de mnar med par der skyes ma thag tu sems can
65a4(rgyud): d myal ba'i sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba thams cad rab tu zhi nas sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag thams cad bde ba thams cad kyis
65a5(rgyud): tshim par gyur to/ /mtshams med pa'i me'i phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang yongs su zhi bar gyur to/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag thams cad ngo
65a6(rgyud): mtshar skyes nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la nges pa'i tshig 'di dag rgyas par brjod do/ /sems can las las skyes pa yi/ /sdug bsngal mi bzad rab tu zhi/ /
65a7(rgyud): shin tu ngo mtshar 'di ni lha/ /sems dmyal nyam nga rnams na 'da'/ /sems can lus la rtag gnas pa'i/ /me ma mur de rab tu zhi/ /sog le rnams kyis gsheg
65b1(rgyud): ma mchis/ /spu gri'i sos kyang gcod mi bgyid/ /lcags sdong shal ma ri yang chag /lcags zangs thams cad rab tu zhi/ /ral gri lo ma can nags na/ /las skyes lo
65b2(rgyud): ma gnod mi 'gyur/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje khyod/ /mi rnams la ni chos kyis ston/ /rgyu 'di mi chung bdag cag la/ /khyod kyis brjod par mdzad pa'i rigs/ /de nas
65b3(rgyud): chos kyi bdag nyid can/ /chos nges chos kyi rgyal po des/ /snying rje'i bsam pa nyams rnams kyi/ /'di 'dra'i tshig de thos gyur nas/ /myur du 'di ni ci yin smras/ /'di ni ci
65b4(rgyud): 'dra yang smros shig / de nas mi bzad gshin rje'i mi/ /gnod pa'i rgyun can de dag gis/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la/ /'di skad kyi ni tshig smras so/ /mnar med rab
65b5(rgyud): tu nyam nga bar/ /sems can chen po 'di skyes lha/ /gang gi ming ni mnar med pa/ /des na de ni nyam ngar brjod/ /gang gis sems can bde bgyis pa/ /rnam pa sna tshogs
65b6(rgyud): las la gzigs/ /'di ni kun tu bde gyur nas/ /slar yang lha yi gnas su mchi/ /chos kyi rgyal po gshin rjes kyang / /mthong nas ngo mtshar smras pa ni/ /'di ni rdzu 'phrul
65b7(rgyud): che ba ste| |'di ni tshe rabs lnga lus tshe/ /ji ltar sku gdung brgya mang pos/ /ston pa'i mchod rten mdzes pa ltar/ /so sor 'brang ba mgul btags pas/ /de yi lus ni de
66a1(rgyud): bzhin mdzes/ /de nas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha/ ji ltar na 'di so sor
66a2(rgyud): 'brang ba zhes bgyi/ chos kyi rgyal pos smras pa/ gang gis tshig rnams so sor dran/ /de ni ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ba sgom pa yi/ /shes rab can
66a3(rgyud): de bde 'gror 'gro / sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma khyod/ /rab tu rgyas dang ldan par dong / /der ni sgang bu mthon po la/ /lha rnams kyis ni bskor ba ltos/ /de
66a4(rgyud): mthong sems can thams cad la/ /byams pa'i sems su 'gyur bar gyis/ /de nas gshin rje'i mi de dag de nyid kyi nub mo rgyas pa dang ldan par dong ngo / /de tshe
66a5(rgyud): der ni de dag gis/ /rgyal po'i pho brang nye ba na/ /sgang bu de yi khor yug na/ /'bar ba gcig gis gang bar mthong / /mi ro zhig gi mgul ba na/ /so sor 'brang
66a6(rgyud): ba btags pa'ang mthong / /lha dang klu dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po mi 'am cis/ /kun nas 'khor bar bskor nas ni/ /bla na med pa'i mchod pa byed/ /de la
66a7(rgyud): gnod sbyin de dag gis/ /so sor 'brang ba'i sgang zhes btags/ /de nas gnod sbyin de dag gis chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje'i nges pa de rtogs te slar log
66b1(rgyud): nas lha| khyod kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin no/ /zhes rgyas par brjod do/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu chig de smras pa'i tha ma la sems can chen po de sems can dmyal ba'i
66b2(rgyud): lus de bor nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /rgyu des na sngon so sor 'brang ba'i lha'i bu zhes bya'o/ /bram ze chen po/ des na sngon chad yongs
66b3(rgyud): su shes so/ /de'i phyir so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di gdon mi za bar gzung bar bya'o/ /yi ger bri bar bya/ bklag par bya'o/ /cho ga bzhin du rtag tu lus la btags
66b4(rgyud): nas bcad bar bya ste/ de rtag tu sdug bsngal zhing nyam thag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur/ ngan 'gro'i 'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rgal bar
66b5(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /glog gis 'gyel bar byed mi nus so/ /glog gis ji ltar mi nus she na/ bram ze chen po/ sngon yongs su shes te/ grong khyer chen po'i mchog shing kun
66b6(rgyud): rdzi ba na tshong dpon chen po dri med dung zhes bya ba/ nor mang ba/ gser shin tu 'byor ba/ mdzod dang bang ba kun tu gang zhing phun sum tshogs pa zhig gnas te/ ded
66b7(rgyud): dpon zhes bya bar grags so/ /de nas ded dpon chen po des gru bo che de rnyed nas rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa dang / nya mid rnams kyis de'i gru de bzung nas rnam par
67a1(rgyud): gzhig par 'dod pa'i klu rnams kyang 'khrugs te 'brug sgra chen po sgrog go / glog dang skar mda' yang gtong ngo / /rdo rje'i lce 'bebs par yang
67a2(rgyud): bshams so/ /de nas tshong pa de dag sdug bsngal chen pos sems non to/ /klu 'khrugs pa chen po de dang / glog dang / skar mda' dang / rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa dang /
67a3(rgyud): nya mid de dag gis kyang gru bo che bzung bar mthong nas ku co'i sgra chen po bton to/ /de dag lha khyad par can rnams la gsol ba btab kyang 'ga' tsam yang de dag gi
67a4(rgyud): dpung gnyen du ma gyur to/ /de nas de dag tshong dpon sems rab tu brtan pa'i gan du song nas de dag gis snying rje rje skad du tshig 'di skad smras so/ /sems can
67a5(rgyud): chen po khyod kyis bdag cag bskyab cing 'jigs pa chen po las thar par mdzad du gsol/ de nas ded dpon chen po sems brtan pa blo gros chen po des tshong pa
67a6(rgyud): 'khrugs par gyur pa rnams la tshig 'di skad smras so/ /ma 'jigs ma 'jigs tshong ba rnams/ /khyed cag brtan par dengs shig dang / /khyed rnams sdug bsngal
67a7(rgyud): chen po yi/ /rgya mtsho che las ngas bsgral lo/ /de nas yid ni brtan gyur nas/ /tshong pa rnams kyis tshig 'di smras/ /sems can chen po 'di ci lags/ /bgegs
67b1(rgyud): bral myur du bka' stsol cig / blo gros chen po khyod kyi mthus/ /bdag cag ji srid 'tsho ba'i tshe/ /ye shes che ba'i bdag nyid gsungs/ /slad na khyod kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /de
67b2(rgyud): nas mgron mang bdag po yis/ /de dag la ni tshig 'di brjod/ /de la so sor 'brang ba yi/ /rig pa chen mor grags pa yod/ /gnod byed thams cad sel bar byed/ /stobs
67b3(rgyud): chen pha rol gnon byed pa/ /des ni rab tu sdug bsngal ba'i/ /'jigs pa che las ngas bsgral lo/ /de nas ded dpon chen pos de'i tshe rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bris nas rgyal
67b4(rgyud): mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags ma thag tu nya mid de dag thams cad kyis gru bo che de
67b5(rgyud): me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo / /de nas klu de dag byams pa'i yid kyis de dag gi drung du lhags nas mchod pa bya bar bshams so/ /nya mid de dag kyang rig pa'i rgyal
67b6(rgyud): po so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus tshig nas byer te zhi bar gyur to/ /mgron po phal po che de dag kyang klu chen po de dag gis rin po che'i gling chen por phyin par
67b7(rgyud): byas so| |de ltar na ye shes dang ldan pa rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ bram ze chen po/
68a1(rgyud): rgyu des na 'di rig pa chen mo zhes grags so/ /'di ni/ nges par rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te bcad bar bya'o/ /rlung dang / grang ba dang /
68a2(rgyud): dus ma yin pa'i sprin dang / glog dang / lce 'bab pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed de/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin gyi 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa las yongs su
68a3(rgyud): thar par byed do/ /sbrang bu mchu ring dang / sha sbrang dang / byi ba dang / srog chags kyi rigs gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs lo tog ma rung bar byed pa thams cad
68a4(rgyud): mthu med cing rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ri dwags dang / bya dang / gcan gzan gnod par sems pa thams cad rnam par 'jigs par 'gyur ro/ /me tog dang /
68a5(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang / nags tshal dang / sman dang / lo tog la sogs pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rab tu bro zhing zhim pa dang / 'jam par 'gyur
68a6(rgyud): ro| |legs par yongs su smin par 'gyur ro/ /ha cang char che ba dang / char dkon pa'i nyes pa rnams yongs su mi 'byung ngo / /char dus su 'bab cing / dus
68a7(rgyud): ma yin par mi 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /yul de'i klu chen po gang yin pa de dag kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun legs par 'bebs so/ /yul gang na rig pa'i
68b1(rgyud): rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba 'di spyod pa'i yul der sems can de dag gis shes par bya ste/ spos sna tshogs dang / bdug pa sna tshogs dang / me tog sna
68b2(rgyud): tshogs kyis mchod cing bsti stang byas la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis dkris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas glu dbyangs dang / rol mo sil snyan byas te/ bskor ba
68b3(rgyud): byas nas lha rnams dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa la sogs pa'i sems can chen po de dag gis bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par
68b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du de lta de lta bur 'grub ste/ bu pho 'dod na'ang khye'ur 'grub/ /mngal na 'dzin pa dam par 'gyur/ /mngal na bde bar skye ba dang / /
68b5(rgyud): mngal nas bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur/ /mngal na dus bzhin skye ba dang / /dus bzhin rab tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ /cis mngon zhe na/ bram ze chen po/ snga ma bzhin du de
68b6(rgyud): nyon cig / yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya ba de bu med par gyur to/ /ci'i phyir lag brkyang zhes bya zhes na/ rgyal po de btsas ma thag tu lag pa
68b7(rgyud): brkyangs nas ma'i nu zho la bzung ste/ nu zho ngoms ngoms su 'thungs so/ /nu ma de gnyis la reg ma thag tu gser gyi kha dog tu gyur te/ dus kun tu nu zho 'phel bar gyur
69a1(rgyud): to| |rgyu des na rgyal po lag brkyang zhes bya bar btags par gyur to/ /gzhan yang gang gi tshe rgyal po'i gan du skye bo slong mo ba 'ongs pa de'i tshe/ rgyal
69a2(rgyud): po de lag ba g.yas pa bar snang la brkyang ba dang / rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' de rgyu des sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis lha'i rin po che khyad
69a3(rgyud): par du 'phags pa gser dang / nor bu rnams kyis lag pa gang bar byed do/ /rgyal po des kyang skye bo slong mo pa lhags pa rnams la rab tu byin no/ /bsam pa
69a4(rgyud): tsam gyis slong mo pa thams cad la 'dod pa bzhin du bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad byin to/ /bu pho 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la mchod pa dang / bsti
69a5(rgyud): stang cher byas kyang bu pho ma rnyed nas de sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag gi mchod rten rnams kyi mdun du bsti stang bya bar brtsams te/ mchod pa dang / bsti
69a6(rgyud): stang chen po byas so/ /sbyin pa chen po byin to/ /bsnyen gnas la yang nye bar gnas so/ /bsod nams chen po byas so/ /sbyin pa chen po de dag kyang mi zad par
69a7(rgyud): byin to| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bram ze chen po/ sngon byung ba yul ma ga d+ha 'di nyid na gyad yul zhes bya ba'i grong khyer ku sha'i tshong dus chen po'i mchog na bcom
69b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rin chen mang gi bstan pa la zhugs pa/ tshong dpon chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba chos sems pa'i sems can chen po zhig gnas pa de sems can thams cad
69b2(rgyud): la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ma 'di nyid las brtsams te chos ston to/ /de nas mi dbul po zhig gis chos de thos nas
69b3(rgyud): tshong dpon chen po de la tshig 'di skad ces bdag jo bo'i khab tu gla bgyi'o/ /chos kyang nyan no/ /gang gi tshe bdag gis cung zad rnyed par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag chos
69b4(rgyud): la mchod pa bgyid do zhes smras nas de'i khyim na las byed cing chos kyang nyan to/ /dus gzhan zhig na de la tshong dpon des di na ra gcig byin pa dang / des sems can
69b5(rgyud): t hams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas rin po che snyim pas so sor 'brang ma chen mo la
69b6(rgyud): phul nas sbyin pa'i 'bras bu chen po 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi dbul ba kun tu gcod par gyur cig ces smon lam de skad kyang btab bo/ /rgyu
69b7(rgyud): des na sbyin pa de yongs su mi zad par gyur to/ /de ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba rnam pa mang po rnam pa du ma byas te lha rnams kyang mchod pa nas sangs
70a1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bar du mchod pa dang / de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis rmi ltas su bstan te 'di skad du kye rgyal po chen po/ so sor
70a2(rgyud): 'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba kun nas me lce'i phreng ba rnam par dag pas rgyas pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya dang / snying po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs chen mo
70a3(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo cho ga las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bris la/ btsun mo dam pa smyung ba byas la cho ga bzhin du lus la btags na khyod bu pho yod par 'gyur ro zhes
70a4(rgyud): bsgo'o| |de nas rgyal po sad de mtshan mo zad nas rtsis dang / yi ge'i 'bru dang / rgyu skar dang / gza' rnam par 'byed pa'i bram ze rnams bsags nas cho ga
70a5(rgyud): l as 'byung ba bzhin du rgyu skar gyi rgyal po rgyal gyi nyin par btsun mo dam pa lus shin tu legs par bkrus te smyung ba byas nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yang
70a6(rgyud): cho ga bzhin du bris te btsun mo dam pa'i mgul du btags so/ /sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten rnams la mchod pa chen po byas so/ /rin po che khyad par can du ma
70a7(rgyud): yang sems can rnams la sbyin pa byin no/ /de nas zla ba dgu lon pa dang / bu pho gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang pe/ rgyas pa
70b1(rgyud): mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar shes nas rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa/ 'dod pa thams cad
70b2(rgyud): du 'gro ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa so sor 'brang ma chen mo dkon mchog ces grags so/ /'di ni/ rtag tu brgya byin gyi gtsug gi nor bu yin no/ /gang gi tshe lha'i dbang
70b3(rgyud): po brgya byin lha ma yin rnams dang / g.yul chen po 'gyed par 'dod pa de'i tshe 'di nyid kyis go cha byas nas spyi gtsug tu btags te lha ma yin thams cad pham par
70b4(rgyud): byas| pha rol pham par byas nas dge ba dang bde bas bde bar lha'i grong khyer du 'jug ste/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa yin no/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar
70b5(rgyud): na sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di 'chang pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /'di
70b6(rgyud): gang gis lus la btags sam/ mgul du btags pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' thams
70b7(rgyud): cad yang dag par srung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / mi dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du phyag
71a1(rgyud): bya zhing mchod pa dang / rim gro byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen pos rjed cing mchod par 'gyur
71a2(rgyud): ro| |bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi dpung rab tu 'joms pas kyang de la sems can chen po zhes gsungs so/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de la yams
71a3(rgyud): kyi nad dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / nad 'go ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can chen po de mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de la
71a4(rgyud): lha thams cad kyang rtag par rgyun tu srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sped par byed par 'gyur ro/ /des gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gsang sngags chen po'i snying po 'di
71a5(rgyud): dag bris te rtag par rgyun du lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya/ rtag par rgyun du yid la bya'o/ /kha ton du bya'o/ /bsam pa thag pa nas bsgom par bya'o/ /sdug
71a6(rgyud): bsngal ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad rnam par 'joms par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa thams
71a7(rgyud): cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /'di ni/ gsang sngags gyi gzhi las thams cad byed pa dge ba rnams grub pa'o/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mr-i te a mr-i ta ba re/ ba ra ba re/
71b1(rgyud): pra b+ha re bi shud+d+he hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ oM a mr-i ta bi lo ki ni gar+b+ha sa ma rak+Sha Ni/ A kaR+Sha Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i snying po'o/ /oM bi ma le bi bu le
71b2(rgyud): dza ya ba re/ dza ya bA hi ni/ a mr-i te/ bi ra dze hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM b+ha ra b+ha ra saM d+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ in+d+ri ya ba la bi sho d+ha ni/ ru ru tsa le hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ nye ba'i snying
71b3(rgyud): po'i rig pa'o/ /oM ma Ni d+ha ri/ badzri Ni ma hA pra ti sa re hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa thams
71b4(rgyud): cad thabs cig tu 'dus nas sgra dbyangs gcig tu gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gsungs so/ /gsang sngags 'di dag ni/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so
71b5(rgyud): sor 'brang ma chen mo'i snying po dang go cha'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /'di thos par yang rab tu dka' na/ yi ger bri ba dang /
71b6(rgyud): tshig tu 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / gzhan la yang ston pa lta ci smos te/ de ni/ sangs rgyas la bya ba byas par rig par bya'o/ /'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs
71b7(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis rab tu bsngags so/ /rjes su yi rang ngo / /lung bstan to/ /so sor 'brang ma chen mo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di mchog tu dkon pa'o/ /so
72a1(rgyud): sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di'i ming thos par yang shin tu dka' ste/ gzungs chen mo 'di ni/ sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed pa/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon
72a2(rgyud): pa| gzi brjid che ba/ 'od che ba/ yon tan brjod par che ba/ mthu che ba/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor
72a3(rgyud): ba'i bdud kyi zhags pa gcod pa/ pha rol gyi sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dug dang / byad dang / g.yeng byed kyi sbyor ba dang / gnod par bya ba dag drag shul du spyod pa
72a4(rgyud): dang / gnod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa'i tshogs thams cad la mchod pa dam pa
72a5(rgyud): byed par mngon par dga' ba rnams la yongs su skyong bar byed pa/ theg pa chen po 'dzin pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba dang / klog pa dang / tshig tu 'don pa dang / kha
72a6(rgyud): ton byed pa dang / nyan pa dang 'chang bar mngon par brtson pa rnams la yongs su skyong ba'o/ /bram ze chen po/ so sor 'brang ma chen mo rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di ni/
72a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ gang du'ang thogs pa med do/ /ston pa dgra las rgyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad du yang mchod
72b1(rgyud): pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /ci mngon zhe na/ rig pa chen mo bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sngon yongs su shes te/
72b2(rgyud): gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang gser dang rin
72b3(rgyud): po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang po mngon par sangs rgyas nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der gshegs te/ sangs rgyas thams
72b4(rgyud): c ad kyis bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bzhed pa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de la bdud g.yog dang bcas pa bdud bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas
72b5(rgyud): bskor ba/ gzugs sna tshogs/ mi sdug pa/ 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/ sgra mi snyan pa/ bdud kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis rlob pa
72b6(rgyud): mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa mngon par sprul nas lhags te phyogs bzhi nas bskor te bar chad bya bar brtsams pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das
72b7(rgyud): r gya cher rab tu bzhad pa'i zhal nor bu dang gser dang rin po che 'bar ba'i 'od zer snang ba mngon par 'phags pa'i rgyal po yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung par bzhugs
73a1(rgyud): nas rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo 'di yid kyis lan bdun brjod do/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ma chen po 'di
73a2(rgyud): b rjod ma thag tu skad cig de nyid la bdud sdig can de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re nas skyes bu go cha gyon pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
73a3(rgyud): stong du ma ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / tho ba dang / rtse gsum 'bar ba lag na thogs pa sha stag tshig 'di skad du/ gang dag bcom ldan 'das la
73a4(rgyud): gnod par byed pa bdud gnod sems can rnams zungs shig zungs shig / chings shig chings shig /gnod par sems pa thams cad rab tu choms shig /
73a5(rgyud): gnod sems can dang / gza' dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad kyi srog phye mar gyis shig ces 'dzer cing thon pa mthong ngo / /de nas bdud de dag
73a6(rgyud): thams cad byams pa'i ral gris mngon par btul nas la las ni/ bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bzung ba nas la la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
73a7(rgyud): byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i bar du'o/ /de la mthu che ba gzhan dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i bu ga nas thon pa'i skyes bu chen po de dag mthong
73b1(rgyud): nas grong khyer de nyid du spa bkong bar gyur/ rdzu 'phrul yongs su nyams/ spobs pa dang / stobs dang / rtsal med par gyur cing / mda' gzhu dag kyang chag nas byer ro/ /
73b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud sdig can thams cad rab tu bcom nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor
73b3(rgyud): lo rab tu bskor to/ /brgal to/ /pha rol tu rab tu gshegs so/ /bram ze chen po/ de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ma chen mo stobs kyi drag shul che ba/ rdzu
73b4(rgyud): 'phrul gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pa tsam gyis sems can bsam pa yongs su dag pa rnams dang / gzhan gnod sems can rnams kyang sdug bsngal ba dang / 'jigs
73b5(rgyud): skrag pa thams cad las yongs su thar par byed do/ /bram ze chen po/ de lta bas na rtag par rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pas yid la bya'o/ /yi ger bris te rtag tu
73b6(rgyud): lus la gdags shing bcang bar bya'o/ /ci mngon zhe na/ snga ma bzhin du nyon cig /rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyi yul na grong khyer chen po 'phags rgyal du mi zhig la
73b7(rgyud): nyes pa byung nas rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyis gshed ma'i mi rnams la khyod kyis mi 'di sod cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal pos bsgo ba
74a1(rgyud): bzhin du mi de khrid de ri sul zhig tu phyin nas ral gri shubs nas phyung ste gsad par bshams pa dang / de'i tshe mi des rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor
74a2(rgyud): 'brang ba chen mo 'di yid la dran no/ /yi ger bris nas lag pa g.yas pa la btags shing 'dug go /sems can chen po de'i rig pa 'di'i mthus ral gri me lce
74a3(rgyud): gcig tu gyur nas rdul gtor ba bzhin du dum bu dum bur gyur to/ /de nas gshed ma'i mi dag gis nges pa 'di rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad do/ /de nas rgyal po de rab
74a4(rgyud): tu 'khrugs nas kye mi 'di dag sa phyogs shig na gnod sbyin gyi phug yod de/ de na gnod sbyin brgya stong mang po sha rje na za ba gnas kyi/ der khrid de 'or cig ces
74a5(rgyud): bsgo'o| |de nas mi de gshed ma'i mi de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ro/ /gnod sbyin gyi phug der bor ma thag tu de nas gnod sbyin de dag thams cad yid
74a6(rgyud): dga' ste mi sha bza'o snyam du brgyugs pa dang / de dag gis so sor 'brang ba 'di'i mthus mi de la me lce gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od 'phro ba rab tu 'bar bar mthong ngo / /
74a7(rgyud): mthong nas kyang thams cad sdangs nas rang rang gi lus tshig par mthong ngo / /de nas gnod sbyin de dag ngo mtshar skyes nas mi de khrid de sgo'i phyi rol tu bzhag
74b1(rgyud): nas bskor ba bya bar brtsams pa nas gshed ma'i mi de dag gis rgyal po la zhib tu bsnyad pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ /de nas rgyal po cher 'khrugs te sdangs nas
74b2(rgyud): gal te de ltar na khyed cag dengs la mi 'di chings te chur bor cig ces bsgo ba dang / gshed ma'i mi de dag gis khrid de chur bor ro/ /mi de chur bor ma thag tu mi
74b3(rgyud): de ji ltar thang la 'dug pa bzhin du chu med par gyur to/ /chings pa de dag kyang dum bur chad do/ /rgyal pos de skad thos pa dang / de nas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur nas
74b4(rgyud): mig tshugs su bltas te/ kye ma'o mi 'di ngo mtshar to/ /'di la rgyu ci zhig yod snyam du rnam par rtog par gyur to/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal po des mi de bkug ste/
74b5(rgyud): kye mi khyod ci zhig shes zhes de skad smras so/ /mi des smras pa/ rgyal po chen po/ rig pa chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'chang ba las/ gzhan ni/ ci yang ma 'tshal
74b6(rgyud): te| lha/ de ni/ de'i mthu lags so/ /rgyal pos smras pa/ ngo mtshar che'o/ /rig pa chen mo dge bar gsungs/ /'chi bdag nan tur rmongs byed pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis
74b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs/ /sems can thams cad rab tu sgrol/ /nad dang sdug bsngal thar par byed/ /rig pa chen mo gzi brjid che/ /dus min 'chi las rab tu sgrol/ /
75a1(rgyud): nad chen rnams ni zlog byed pa/ /mgon po thugs rje can gyis gsungs/ /de nas rgyal po rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so
75a2(rgyud): sor 'brang ba chen mo la mchod nas mngon par bstod do/ /mi de yang blon thabs byin te rang gi gnyen gyi mdun du grong khyer gyi gtso bor dbang bskur to/ /bram ze
75a3(rgyud): chen po| de ltar na rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'dis thams cad du yang mchod pa chen po rnyed do/ /sems can gnod sems can thams cad kyis kyang
75a4(rgyud): 'gal bar mi bya'o/ /de ltar na/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo 'di yongs su shes te gang du yang thogs pa med do/ /de lta bas na gdon mi za bar rtag tu lus la gdags
75a5(rgyud): shing bcang bar bya'o/ /bram ze chen po/ /skar ma bzang po la cho ga legs par byas te rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di bri bar bya'o/ /de nas bram ze chen po de yid rab tu dga'
75a6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal te zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di'i cho ga ji ltar bgyis te bri bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
75a7(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po/ /khyod nyon cig /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /ngas ni khyod la bshad par bya/ /gang gis sems can bde byed cing / /nyam nga ba yi
75b1(rgyud): las las 'grol/ /nad rnams las kyang thar bya dang / /bud med sbrum mar 'gyur ba dang / /sems can rnams kyi dbul ba yi/ /rma rnams gso bar bya phyir ro/ /bsnyen gnas dag la
75b2(rgyud): gnas gyur nas/ /rgyu skar rgyal du shes pa la/ /sangs rgyas mchod la brtson byas te/ /byang chub phyir ni sems kyang bskyed/ /snying rjes kun tu brlan sems dang / /byams pa dang yang
75b3(rgyud): ldan gyur nas/ /rtag tu sems can thams cad la/ /phan pa bskyed pa brtson par bya/ /tsan+dan dang ni gur gum dang / /gla rtsir bsres pa'i chus bkrus te/ /bdug pa rnams kyis bdugs
75b4(rgyud): pa yi| |gos gtsang rnams kyis bgo bar bya/ /sa dang lci ba bsres pa yi/ /de yi 'og tu dkyil 'khor bya/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi bzhag ste/ /lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag /
75b5(rgyud): de la rin thang chen po yi/ /me tog bdug pa spos rnams gsol/ /tsan+dan spri ka de bzhin du/ /a ga ru dang du ru ka/ sha kha ra dang lnga sbyar ba'i/ /bdug pa cho ga bzhin du dbul//
75b6(rgyud): cho ga ji bzhin dus bzhin bya/ /lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs rnams/ /me tog 'bras bu sa bon dang / /spos rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan/ /mar dang sbrang rtsi 'o ma dang / /
75b7(rgyud): nas thug 'o thug la sogs pas/ /gtor ma'i bum pa dgang bar bya/ /mtshan ma shin tu bkra shis pa/ /phyogs bzhi rnams su gzhag par bya/ /lnga pa dkyil 'khor dbus
76a1(rgyud): su gzhag/ spos kyis bkang ba'i phur bu rnams/ /gra bzhi dag tu gzhag par bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'gram logs su/ /seng ldeng phur bu bzhi
76a2(rgyud): btsugs la/ /tshon skud kha dog sna lnga yis/ /'khor bar dam du dkri bar bya/ /gal te bdag 'grub 'dod na ni/ /bram ze de ltar byas nas bri/ /kha zas dkar po zos nas su/ /phan par
76a3(rgyud): 'dod pas bri bar bya/ /dar ram ras sam gro ga 'am/ /ci yang rung ba gzhan la bri/ /bud med dag la bu 'dod na/ /gi wang gis ni legs par bri/ /dbus su khye'u zhig bris nas
76a4(rgyud): ni| |rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /de bzhin rin chen gang ba'i snod/ /lag pa g.yon na thogs par bya/ /pad+ma rab tu rgyas gyur cing / /brgyan pa la ni de 'dug bya/ /nor
76a5(rgyud): bu do shal gser dag dang / /rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/ /gdul bar shin tu dka' ba bri/ /gra bzhi dag tu ri bo bri/ /gal te bde bar 'tsho 'dod na/ /rab tu bsgrims
76a6(rgyud): te de ltar bri/ /bye brag tu ni skyes pa rnams/ /gur gum gyis ni bri bar bya/ /de yi dgos pa 'dod pa rnams/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /pad+ma gnyis sam yang na
76a7(rgyud): gsum| |bzhi 'am yang na lnga bris te/ /pad+ma la ni phyag rgya'i mtshan/ /rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs su bri/ /de bzhin du ni pad+ma rnams/ /ze bas kun tu 'khor bar bri/ /pad+ma 'dab
76b1(rgyud): ma rab rgyas la/ /sdong bu dar gyis bcings par bri/ /pad+ma la ni rtse gsum pa/ /zur brgyad la ni dar dbyangs bri/ /de bzhin pad+ma dgra star bcas/ /'dab ma brgyad dang ldan par bri/ /
76b2(rgyud): pad+mar bcas pa'i ral gri bri/ /pad+ma de ni dkar por bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du dung yang bri/ /thams cad du yang rgyas par bya/ /kun tu cho ga'i mtshan ma rnams/ /mkhas pa dag gis bri bar bya/ /
76b3(rgyud): gang la gnod pa'i sems 'byung ba/ /byis pa'i gzugs rnams mi bri'o/ /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi/ /lha yi gzugs ni bri bar bya/ /dge slong phyir ni rdo rje 'chang / /gnod
76b4(rgyud): sbyin bsdigs par brtson par bri/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyang / /ngos bzhi rnams su bri bar bya/ /bram ze'i phyir ni dbang ldan no/ /rgyal rigs la ni dbang phyug che/ /dmangs
76b5(rgyud): rigs phyir ni rtag zhi ba/ /khyab 'jug legs par bri bar bya/ /rje'u rigs phyir ni rnam thos bu/ /lha yi dbang phyug dbang po bri/ /khye'u yi phyir ni skye rgu'i bdag /blo gros chen po bri bar
76b6(rgyud): bya| |sngo bsangs mdog ni gang yin pa/ /de yi ched du khros pa bri/ /dkar mo'i phyir ni grags ldan pa/ /phun sum tshogs pa'i gzugs su bri/ /sbom ma'i phyir ni nor bu bzang / /rab tu
76b7(rgyud): bsgrims te bri bar bya/ /skem mo'i phyir ni gang ba bzang / /rang byung nga yis bstan par bri/ /sbrum ma'i phyir ni nag po che/ /tshangs lha rnams kyang bri bar bya/ /gzhan yang ji ltar
77a1(rgyud): cho ga las/ /gong du bshad pa bzhin du bri/ /las kyi cho ga mthong nas ni/ /rab tu bsgrims te de bzhin bri/ /rtag tu mgul du btags na ni/ /de ni bde bar
77a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i pad+ma la/ /yid bzhin nor bu 'bar ba bri/ /pad+ma'i snying por zhags pa dang / /de bzhin 'khor lo'ang bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i steng du rdo
77a3(rgyud): rje dang / /pad+ma'i snying por tho ba bri/ /cho ga las ni 'byung ba bzhin/ /pad+ma'i steng du mdung thung bri/ /cho ga las ni brjod pa bzhin/ /nor bu thams cad rtse mo 'bar/ /'od
77a4(rgyud): zer 'phro bas rgyas pa dang / /dar gyis bcings pa bri bar bya/ /klu mgo gdengs ka dgu yod la/ /nor bu rab tu 'bar ba dang / /de dag kun gyi snying gar yang / /rdo rje gnas
77a5(rgyud): par bsgrims te bri/ /rgyal po rnams phyir stobs can dang / /ded dpon mkhas pas rtag tu bri/ /rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad bri/ /rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyang bri/ /zla
77a6(rgyud): ba nyi ma rgyu skar bcas/ /sgra gcan mjug ring gza' brgyad bri/ /cho ga bzhin du nges bris la/ /blo gros ldan pa'i mis sel na/ /za ma rnams ni ma ning yang / /bu pho
77a7(rgyud): rnyed par 'gyur ba yin/ /'dis ni thams cad 'grub par byed/ /shis shing sdig pa zhi bar byed/ /rang byung gi ni bka' bzhin du/ /gnas kyi dam pa thob par 'gyur/ /
77b1(rgyud): 'jig rten 'di na'ang mchog tu bde/ /'jig rten pha rol shin tu bde/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gnas la sogs/ /lha gnas de yi gnas su 'gyur/ /'dzam gling bzang zhing nyams dga'
77b2(rgyud): bar| |khyad par can rigs grags pa dang / /rgyal rigs khyad par 'phags pa dang / /bram ze khyad par 'phags rnams su/ /bdag nyid chen po de skyes te/ /rtag tu rig dang bde
77b3(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /so sor 'brang ma 'chang ba'i mis/ /bsod nams thob pa gang yin pa/ /sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis/ /bsod nams phung po brjod mi nus/ /sems can
77b4(rgyud): dmyal ba'i sgo rnams bcad/ /mtho ris sgo rnams rab tu phye/ /bde ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / /blo gros chen por 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpas kyang / /rtag
77b5(rgyud): tu dbugs ni 'byin par 'gyur/ /lus kyi bde ba phun sum tshogs/ /stobs kyang che bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ltar/ /'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ba
77b6(rgyud): yin| |mi dang lha rnams dbugs 'byin te/ /gnod par sems pa skrag par byed/ /gang phyir rig pa legs bshad pa/ /de ni ring po mi thogs so/ /de ni mtshon gyis mi tshugs
77b7(rgyud): te| |dug dang mes kyang tshugs mi 'gyur/ /dus min 'chi ba'i sdig ba yang / /de las thag ni ring du 'gro/ /rnam pa kun tu nyan pa 'am/ /mthong ba dang ni reg pa'ang rung / /'byung
78a1(rgyud): po gdon dang rtsod pa dang / /chu dang me yis 'jigs pa dang / /gcan gzan sbrul dang seng+ge dang / /klu dang nad ni mi bzad rnams/ /gang la rig pa legs
78a2(rgyud): bshad pa/ /de la de dag kun mi 'byung / /de dag sems can kun mchog 'gyur/ /bdud rnams kun gyis thams cad du/ /mchod par 'gyur ba'i 'os yin te/ /yang dag
78a3(rgyud): bshad kyis mnyan par byos/ /rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i cho ga rdzogs so// //de nas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir rig
78a4(rgyud): sngags 'chang srung ba'i tshul gyi cho ga bshad par bya'o/ /srung ba'i cho ga gang zhig gis/ /dngos grub chen po 'grub 'gyur ba/ /gang dang gang du bsrungs byas nas/ /don
78a5(rgyud): yod 'gyur te the tshom med/ /'jigs med rims kyis mi 'debs te/ /gza' rnams thams cad zlog par byed/ /rgyu skar rnams kyang mthun par 'gyur/ /las kyi lu gu
78a6(rgyud): rgyud kyang gcod/ /bza' nyes pa dang sgom nyes dang / /dgra tshogs kun gyis byas pa dang / /gnod par bltas dang bri nyes dang / /byad dang gang yang mi bzad dang / /phye ma sngags
78a7(rgyud): kyis btab pa dang / /dug 'thungs pa dang sbyor ba'i dug /gang zhig srung ba 'chang de la/ /de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig rig las 'gal byed pa/ /yan lag
78b1(rgyud): rnams la rnam par smin/ /so sor 'brang ba'i dmod bsdigs na/ /pha rol 'khor ni mi bzad dang / /'jigs pa chen po dgra yi rnams/ /de dag thams cad rab tu 'bros/ /sangs rgyas
78b2(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' des pas srung / /nyan thos dka' thub chen po dang / /rang sangs rgyas kyis srung bar 'gyur/ /gzhan yang rnam pa mang po yi/ /lha
78b3(rgyud): klu rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams/ /'di la rtag tu brtson byed pa/ /de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /rig pa yi ni rgyal mo 'di/ /thos pa tsam gyis mi mchog rnams/ /kun tu 'jigs pa
78b4(rgyud): med 'gyur zhes/ /thub pa yis ni de skad gsungs/ /rmi lam ngan dang ngan byas dang / /gang yang nad 'go mi bzad dang / /nad kyis btab dang nad chen gyis/ /gang dag zin cing
78b5(rgyud): khrag skyug dang / /gzhan yang rnam pa mang po'i nad/ /'bras dang shu ba skam po dang / /gang yang gnod pa mi bzad pas/ /mi yi skye rgu zin pa dang / /mi rnams ma rungs bya ba'i phyir//
78b6(rgyud): mchog tu mi bzad gnod byed rnams/ /srung ba stobs chen ga la bar/ /de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /'di las srung ba byas na ni/ /bcings pa ngag kyang grol bar 'gyur/ /
78b7(rgyud): so sor 'brang ba bris pas kyang / /gal te dus kyi zhags pa yis/ /bzung nas gshin rje'i gnas khrid pa/ /de yi tshe ni rnam par 'phel/ /gang zhig tshe ni zad gyur tam/ /zhag bdun
79a1(rgyud): na ni 'chi 'gyur ba/ /yi ge bris pa'i bar tsam gyis/ /'tsho bar gyur te the tshom med/ /cho ga bzhin du srung ba byas/ /yang na thos pa tsam gyis kyang / /kun tu
79a2(rgyud): dge ba thob par 'gyur/ /'dod pa bzhin du bde bar 'tsho/ /gang dag sum cu rtsa gsum lha/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang / /bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya dang / /brgya byin
79a3(rgyud): mdun nas 'gro ba kun/ /sems can de la bsrung ba'i phyir/ /phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas par byed/ /'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dang / /lag na rdo rje stobs chen yang / /rig
79a4(rgyud): pa'i rigs ni brgya dag dang / /lhan cig rtag tu srung bar byed/ /zla ba yid bzang nyi ma dang / /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che/ /nor bu bzang dang gshin rje dang / /stobs
79a5(rgyud): kyi lha ni stobs chen dang / /gang ba bzang po dpal chen dang / /'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang / /lnga 'dzin pa dang lngas rtsen dang / /smin drug bu dang tshogs dbang dang / /lha
79a6(rgyud): mo chen mo dpal can dang / /rnam thos bu dang dbyangs can dang / /dung can dang ni me tog so/ /de bzhin ral pa gcig pa dang / /gnod sbyin chen mo dpal yon can/ /
79a7(rgyud): rtag tu srung ba byed par 'gyur/ /za ma rnams kyi bu yang skyed/ /mngal na gnas pa bde bar byed/ /de ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar/ /'di ni srung ba chen por 'gyur/ /'jigs
79b1(rgyud): med 'thab mo g.yul 'gyed par/ /dpa' bo rnams la rtag rgyal sbyin/ /chos la nges pa'i lha rnams la/ /'dis ni gnang ba sbyin par byed/ /sdig pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir//
79b2(rgyud): gus par byas te bris na ni/ /de bzhin gshegs dang de bzhin du/ /byang chub sems dpa'ang lta bar 'gyur/ /de yi grags pa rnam par 'phel/ /bsod nams dang ni tshe yang 'phel//
79b3(rgyud): nor rnams dang ni 'bru dag kyang / /'byor par 'gyur te the tshom med/ /bde bar gnyid kyis log pa dang / /bde bar rab tu sad par 'gyur/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams
79b4(rgyud): cad dang / /dgra kun gyis kyang mi rdzi'o/ /g.yul 'gyed pa yi tshe na yang / /rig pa sgrub pa byas na ni/ /srung ba bla na med pa 'dis/ /rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur bar byed/ /bde bar
79b5(rgyud): rig pa sgrub byed cing / /de la bgegs ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ /de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub/ /dkyil 'khor kun tu zhugs pa yin/ /skye ba dag ni thams cad du/ /de
79b6(rgyud): ni myur du dam tshig shes/ /rgyal ba'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i phyir/ /de ni yid brtan 'os yin no/ /bkra shis thams cad rab tu rdzogs/ /bsam pa thams cad grub par byed//
79b7(rgyud): 'di ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang / /bde ba thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/ /bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/ /mtho ris su ni 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'thab pa dang ni rtsod pa dang / /
80a1(rgyud): 'byed pa mchog tu mi bzad par/ /'jigs pa kun las grol 'gyur te/ /rgyal bas ji skad gsungs bzhin no/ /skye ba rnams su skye ba ni/ /rtag tu skye dran
80a2(rgyud): the tshom med/ /rgyal po btsun mo 'khor bcas pa/ /'di yi dbang du 'gyur ba yin/ /'jig rten dge bar grags pa yin/ /rtag tu thun mong 'gyur ba yin/ /de ni kun la
80a3(rgyud): sdug par 'gyur/ /lha dang mi ni gang yang rung / /nyin dang mtshan rnams rtag par yang / /de la srung ba bde bar 'gyur/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs/ /sngags
80a4(rgyud): tshig 'di dag 'dir 'grub bo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
80a5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams
80a6(rgyud): cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel bya'i phyir/ /de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ /sems can kun la snying brtse'i phyir/ /da ni nga yis brjod
80a7(rgyud): par bya| |rig pa gzi brjid chen mo 'di/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa ste/ /rdo rje gdan la thug pa yis/ /'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang / /bdud dang bdud kyi rigs
80b1(rgyud): rnams dang / /gza' dang log par 'dren pa dang / /bgegs rnams ji snyed gang yod pa/ /thams cad de yi mod la 'byer/ /tad+ya thA/ oM gi ri gi ri/ gi ri Ni gi ri Ni/ gi ri ba ti/
80b2(rgyud): gu Na ba ti/ A kA sha ba ti/ A kA sha bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba pA paM bi ga te/ A kA sha ga ga na ta le/ A kA sha bi tsa ri Ni/ dz+wA li ta shi kha re/ ma Ni mau ga ti/ kha tsi ta mau li d+ha re/ su ke she /su
80b3(rgyud): bak+te| su ne tre/ su bar+N+Ne/ su bar+Na gau re/ a tI te/ a nA ga te/ pra t+yud pan+ne na ma/ na maHsar+b+be ShAM/ bud+d+hA nAn dz+wa la ti/ te dza sAM/ bud+d+he/ su bud+d+he/ b+ha ga ba ti/ su ruk+Sha Ni/ suk+Sha me/ su pra phe/
80b4(rgyud): su da me| su dAn+te/ ba re ba re te/ b+ha ga ba te/ b+ha dra ba ti/ b+ha dre su b+ha dre /bi ma le/ dza ya b+ha dre/ tsaN+Di tsaN+Di/ pra tsaN+De/ pra tsaN+De/ badzra tsaN+De/ mahA tsaN+De/ gau ri/ gAM d+hA ri/ gau ri/ tsau ri/ tsaN+Da
80b5(rgyud): li| mA taM gi / brtsa si/ puk+ka si/ su ma ti/ shA ba ri/ shA ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dra mi Di/ drA mi Di/ rau dri Ni/ sarba gra ha bi dA ri Ni/ sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+hA ni/ /pa ra mAr+tha sA d+hA ni/ ha na ha na /sar+b+ba
80b6(rgyud): sha trUM| da ha da ha/ sar+b+ba duSh+TAM/ pre ta bi sha tsa DA ki nI NI/ ma nuM ShA/ a ma nu Sh+ya nAny+tsa/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hr-i da yan/ gdon ma rungs pa rnams kyi srog gzhom du gsol/ bcom ldan
80b7(rgyud): 'das ma/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad gzhig tu gsol/ gzhig tu gsol/ thams cad du 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bdag la srung du gsol/ srung du
81a1(rgyud): gsol| ma rungs pa thams cad bcing du gsol/ sar+b+ba ki wi Sha nA sha ni/ mArtaN+Da/ mr-i t+yu daN+Da ni bA ra Ni mA na ni/ daN+Da mA na ni/ ma hA mA na ni/ ma Ni d+ha ri Ni/
81a2(rgyud): mArta da ne ma ni ni marta ni mr-ita daN+De/ tsa le tsa le bi ma le/ tsi Ti tsi Ti/ bi Ti bi Ti/ ni Ti ni Ti/ ti Ti ti Ti/ na tu Ti/ g+ha ri ni g+ha ri ni/ ni mi Ni/ pI ri NI/ bIR+yi ni pra ba re/ pra ba
81a3(rgyud): ra sa ma re/ tsaN+Da li/ mA taM gi/ run+d+ha si/ ka ra si/ sa ri/ brtsa si/ su ma ti/ buk+ka si/ sha ba ri/ shA ba ri/ shaM ka ri/ dra mi Di/ dra mi Di/ da ha Ni/ pa tsa Ni/ ma tha Ni/ marda ni/
81a4(rgyud): sa ra li| sa ra le/ sa ra laM b+he/ hI na ma d+h+yod kriSh+Ta/ bi d+hA ra Ni/ bi d+hA ri Ni/ ma hi le/ ma hi le/ ma hA ma hi le/ ni ga Da/ ni ga Da/ b+hany+dza/ mat+ti/ mat+te/ mat+ti ni/ dAn+ti/ tsakre/ tsakra
81a5(rgyud): bA ki ni/ dz+wa le dz+wa le/ dz+wA le dz+wA le/ dz+wA la ni/ sha ba ri sha ba ri/ shA ba ri shA ba ri/ sar+b+ba byA d+hi ha ra ni/ mu ni mu ni/ tsU Di tsU Di/ tsU Da ni tsU Da ni/ ma hA tsu Di ni/ ni mi ni
81a6(rgyud): mi| ni min+d+ha ri/ trai lo ka/ da ha ni/ trai lo ka A lo ka ka ri/ trai d+hA tu ka byA ba lo ki ni/ badzre/ ba ra shu/ pA sha/ mung+ga ra/ gang+ga/ shaM kha/ tsakra/ tri shU la/ tsin+tA ma Ni/
81a7(rgyud): ma hA bid+yA d+ha ra Ni/ bdag thams cad du gnas thams cad na gnas pa na ma rungs pa thams cad dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang /
81b1(rgyud): nad thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las srung du gsol/ srung du gsol/ badzre badzre badzra pa ti/ badzra pA Ni d+ha re/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ ki li ki li/ tsi li tsi la
81b2(rgyud): bi li bi li/ si li si li/ ba ra ba ra/ ba ra de/ sar+b+ba tra/ dza ya lab+d+he swAhA/ sar+b+ba bA paM/ bi dA ri Ni swAhA/ sar+b+ba tra/ sar+b+ba byA d+hi ha ra Na swAhA/ sar+b+ba tra/ sar+b+ba sha trUM b+ha ya har Ni
81b3(rgyud): swAhA/ sar+b+ba b+ha ra Ni swAhA/ swasti r+b+ha pa tu mAM swAhA/ shAn+tiM ka ri swAhA/ puSh+TiM ka ri swAhA/ ba la bar+d+ha ri Ni swAhA/ dza ya tu/ dza ye dza ye/ dza ya ba ti/ ka ma le/ bi ma le/ bi pu le
81b4(rgyud): swAhA| sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mUrte swAhA/ oM b+hu ri ma hA shAn+ti swAhA/ oM b+hu ri b+hu ri/ badzra pa hi/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya/ pU ra Ni/ A yuHsan+d+ha ra ni/ ba la ba la/ ba la ba ti/ dza ya
81b5(rgyud): bi dz+ye/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swAhA/ bram ze chen po/ gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi gzungs 'dis yongs su srung ba byas shing
81b6(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / dbyug pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba byas na/
81b7(rgyud): de tshe yongs su zad pa las kyang rnam par 'phel te ring du bde bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dran pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /bskrad pa tsam dang / rdo rjes byabs
82a1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / nad chen po las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de'i nad thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur
82a2(rgyud): ro| |rgyun ring du na ba la yang byabs pa tsam gyis rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nyin gcig bzhin du kha ton du bton na/ shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/ /gzi brjid
82a3(rgyud): dang | stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sdig pa dang las kyi sgrib pa gdon mi za bar myong bar 'gyur ba thams cad
82a4(rgyud): kyang ma lus par yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa thams cad kyang de'i
82a5(rgyud): lus la gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus snon par 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba chen po mang bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze chen po/ tha na rig pa chen mo'i gsang sngags
82a6(rgyud): kyi gzhi 'di dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba ri dwags dang / bya'i rna lam du thos na yang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
82a7(rgyud): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur na/ so sor 'brang ba chen mo'i gzungs 'di la dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge
82b1(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rgyal po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po'am/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ de las gzhan pa 'ga' zhig gis lan gcig thos te/ thos nas kyang
82b2(rgyud): dad pa chen po dang / gus pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pas yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug gam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ yid drag pos sgom mam/ gzhan la rgya
82b3(rgyud): cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta ci smos te/ bram ze chen po/ de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba brgyad rnam pa thams cad du 'byung du ma dogs shig /de'i lus la nad chen
82b4(rgyud): po rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug sbyar mas ma yin/ byad kyis ma yin/ g.yeng byed kyis
82b5(rgyud): ma yin/ sngags kyi las kyis ma yin/ phye ma'i sbyor bas ma yin/ yan lag na bar mi 'gyur/ rims kyis btab par mi 'gyur/ klad pa na ba dang / nyin gcig pa
82b6(rgyud): dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / nyin bdun pa'i rims rnams de'i lus la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dran bzhin du bde bar gnyid
82b7(rgyud): log cing dran bzhin du bde bar sad par 'gyur ro/ /yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig gis chos dang ldan pa'i dbang
83a1(rgyud): phyug chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gang dang gang du skye ba'i skye ba de dang der skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang byams par
83a2(rgyud): 'gyur| phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro ba thibs po kun dang / yi dwags su skye ba rnams las yongs su thar
83a3(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sems can thams cad la snang bar byed pa de bzhin du 'od zer gyis snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil
83a4(rgyud): 'khor bdud rtsi'i mthus sems can thams cad kyi lus sim par byed pa de bzhin du chos kyi bdud rtsis sems can thams cad kyi rgyud tshim par byed par 'gyur ro/ /
83a5(rgyud): rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brad ba chen mo'i mthus de la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / skem byed dang / brjed byed dang /
83a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang / gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren la sogs pa thams cad kyis gtse bar mi nus so/ /de dag 'ongs na yang rig pa'i rgyal
83a7(rgyud): mo chen mo 'di dran par bya'o/ /'on kyang 'di lta ste/ rig pa'i rgyal mo chen mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo 'di nyid kyi mthus ma rungs pa de dag thams cad rig pa 'dzin pa'i
83b1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyur te/ bsgo ba bzhin du ngag nyan par 'gyur ro/ /de la dga'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /dgra'i tshogs thams cad dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal po'i blon po dang / bram ze
83b2(rgyud): dang / khyim bdag rnams kyang 'gal bar byed par mi 'gyur ro/ /tha na gsad par 'os pa zhig la gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis mtshon gdab par gzas na yang mtshon rnams rdul
83b3(rgyud): bzhin du dum bu dum bur chag par 'gyur ro/ /de nyid kyi dus na de la chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ /de'i dran pa'i stobs kyang char 'gyur ro/ /'di ni srin po 'joms pa'i mchog/
83b4(rgyud): gtsang zhing sdig pa 'jig par byed/ /dpal du byed cing blo yang byed/ /yon tan thams cad rnam par 'phel/ /'di ni bkra shis thams cad byed/ /bkra shis ma yin rnam par 'jig /
83b5(rgyud): rmi lam bzang po rmi bar byed/ /rmi lam ngan pa rnam par 'jig/ rig pa mthu stobs chen mo 'di/ /skyes pa bud med srung ba'i mchog /'brog dgon dang ni mya ngan las/ /rtag
83b6(rgyud): tu de yi mod la thar/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bka' bzhin du/ /'dod pa dag ni kun kyang rnyed/ /lam las lam gol zhugs na yang / /rig pa 'di ni rjes dran na/ /myur
83b7(rgyud): du lam dang bza' ba dang / /btung ba mchog kyang rnyed par 'gyur/ /lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis/ /mi dge mang po gang yang rung / /tshe rabs snga mar ci byas pa/ /
84a1(rgyud): de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/ /dran pa dang ni 'chang ba dang / /'dzin dang yi ger 'bri ba dang / /tshig tu 'don nam klog pa dang / /bzlas brjod byed dam
84a2(rgyud): gzhan ston na/ /de ni ring por mi thogs par/ /chos kun rtogs par khong du chud/ /de ltar chos kyi ro rnyed na/ /sdig pa rnams ni zad par 'gyur/ /yid kyis ci dang ci 'dod pa/ /
84a3(rgyud): dgos pa thams cad 'grub par byed/ /'chi ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang / /rgyal po dang ni me dang chu/ /glog dang de bzhin kun 'joms las/ /'di ni de las skyob par
84a4(rgyud): 'gyur/ /rig pa 'bum du bzlas na ni/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang rtsod pa dang / /gang yang gcan gzan ma rungs pa/ /de dag thams cad 'bros par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas kun
84a5(rgyud): gyis gsungs pa yi/ /dngos grub mchog gi rig pa 'di/ /brjod na sgyid lug mi 'gyur bar/ /byang chub tshogs rnams rdzogs par byed/ /bdag dang gzhan gyi don
84a6(rgyud): sgrub phyir/ /gnas kyi rnam pa thams cad du/ /rig pa 'di la sbyor na ni/ /'dod pa'i las rnams gang yin pa/ /sgrim mi dgos par rig 'di las/ /'grub 'gyur 'di la
84a7(rgyud): the tshom med/ /nad pa rnams ni gso bya ba/ /da ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /sa dang lci ba bsres pa yis/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/ /tshon gyi phye ma sna lnga yis/ /
84b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sdug gur bri bar bya/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis cho ga bzhin/ /bum pa gang ba bzhi yang gzhag /de la me tog sil mas gtor/ /bdug pa mchog gis bdug
84b2(rgyud): par bya| |sems can chen po gdul ba'i phyir/ /gtor ma yis ni las kyang bya/ /snga ma bzhin du me tog spos/ /cho ga bzhin du 'di la mchod/ /dar gyis bcings pa'i mda'
84b3(rgyud): bzhi yang / /dkyil 'khor gra bzhir gzugs par bya/ /de yi 'og tu nad pa yang / /dri zhim spos kyis lus bskus te/ /gtsang ma'i gos rnams bskon nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor dbus
84b4(rgyud): su gzhag par bya/ /de nas shar phyogs kha bstan te/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod par bya/ /lan bdun bzlas brjod byas nas su/ /mkhas pas de la bsrung bar bya/ /de nas nad pa'i
84b5(rgyud): don gyi phyir/ /lan grangs nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /rig pa 'di ni brjod byas nas/ /de ni nad kun zhi bar 'gyur/ /de nas gtor ma'i bum pa la/ /lan bdun legs par sngags
84b6(rgyud): kyis gdab/ /de nas bshos kyang bshos gdab ste/ /gtor ma me tog cho ga bzhin/ /de ltar lho phyogs ngos su ni/ /lan bdun kho nar gtor bar bya/ /nub phyogs su yang bdun
84b7(rgyud): nyid de| |byang phyogs su yang de bzhin no/ /'og dang steng du'ang lan bdun te/ /srung ba byas par 'gyur ba yin/ /bram ze dam pa de lta bur/ /byas na sdug bsngal kun las
85a1(rgyud): grol| |skyob pa shAkya seng+ge yis/ /srung ba 'di ni yang dag bshad/ /'di ma gtogs par khams gsum na/ /srung ba'i rig pa gzhan med do/ /de ni mi
85a2(rgyud): 'chi mi rgas te/ /nad kyis mi btab mi sdug min/ /sdug pa dang ni 'bral mi 'gyur/ /rig pa 'di ni bdag gi lus/ /shin tu bsgom pa byas na ni/ /de la 'chi bdag tshogs
85a3(rgyud): kyis mchod/ /chos kyi rgyal po dam pa gshin rje yang / /gus dang bcas pas de la mchod par 'gyur/ /skad cig nga yi sems dmyal 'di byos la/ /lha yi grong khyer song
85a4(rgyud): zhes smra bar 'gyur/ /de nas gzhal med khang pa rnam mang pos/ /rdzu 'phrul chen po lha gnas bzang por 'gro/ /de ltar der ni lha mi gnod sbyin dang / /srin po rnams kyis
85a5(rgyud): de la rtag mchod 'gyur/ /lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang / /bde sogs bdag po dbang po dang / /'phrog ma dang ni lngas rtsen dang / /'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul che/ /zla ba nyi
85a6(rgyud): ma rgyu skar bcas/ /mchog tu mi bzad gza' rnams dang / /gang yang klu chen thams cad dang / /lha dang de bzhin drang srong dang / /lha min mkha' lding dri za dang / /mi'am ci
85a7(rgyud): dang lto 'phye che/ /srung phyir rtag tu 'brang bar byed/ /gang gis rig pa stobs chen mo/ /rdzu 'phrul chen mo bris nas ni/ /shes rab can gyi lag la gdags/ /mchod pa chen po
85b1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu phun sum tshogs par 'ong / /'phags pa rig pa'i rgyal mo so sor 'brang ba chen mo rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
85b2(rgyud): dA na shI la dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ slar yang lo tsA ba gzhon nu dpal gyis chos rje chag lo'i
85b3(rgyud): rgya dpe dang bstun nas zhus dag par bgyis so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA shI ta pa ni sU tra/ bod skad du bsil ba'i tshal chen po'i mdo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag
85b4(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gang gis thog mar rig sngags rnams/ /'dzam bu'i gling du gsungs pa yi/ /sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
85b5(rgyud): da ltar byung dang 'das pa dang / /ma byon sangs rgyas gang lags pa/ /thams cad la yang bdag phyag 'tshal/ /de dag kun la skyabs su mchi/ /'khor lo bskor ba bla med pa/ /mar
85b6(rgyud): me mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/ /thams cad gnon la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa grags ldan pa/ /pad+ma'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan
85b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa skyob mdzad pa/ /rab mthor gshegs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ded dpon bla na med pa po/ /grags pa'i bla la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi zla lta bur 'od mdzad pa/ /bde mdzad de la
86a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi me long ston pa po/ /don gzigs la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /dul ba'i tshul khrims 'jigs med pa/ /rgyal zhes bya la phyag
86a2(rgyud): 'tshal lo/ /mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan/ /skar rgyal la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal ldan pa/ /rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /
86a3(rgyud): 'od can gzi brjid ldan pa po/ /gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /legs par mchod pa grags ldan pa/ /thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud dpung rab tu
86a4(rgyud): 'joms pa po/ /log dad sel la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze dpal dang ldan pa po/ /gser thub de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse ba/ /'od srung de la
86a5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya seng+ge 'od mdzad pa/ /gser mdog can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ser sna med pa thugs rje can/ /byams pa la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas kun la'ang
86a6(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la ni bdag skyabs mchi/ /gang dag gis ni chos bstan pa/ /sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la sangs rgyas gus mdzad pa'i/ /chos la
86a7(rgyud): bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la phul na don che ba'i/ /dge 'dun la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos shes rab mchog gyur pa/ /shA ri'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdzu 'phrul
86b1(rgyud): can gyi mchog gyur pa/ /mau gal bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos kyi gtam la 'jigs med pa/ /kA tA'i bu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan thos sbyangs pa'i mchog gyur pa/ /'od srung
86b2(rgyud): la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /skyob pa yi ni dbang gyur pa/ /kau'u di n+ya la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mang du thos pa rig sngags 'chang / /kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus ngan dang ni
86b3(rgyud): yul 'khor srung / /mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /phyogs bzhi'i kho ra khor yug gi /rgyal chen rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gnod sbyin gyi ni sde dpon mchog /nyi
86b4(rgyud): shu brgyad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang / /lha rnams la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /de dag la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /rig sngags 'di ni grub gyur cig /gang
86b5(rgyud): gi don du bya ba yi/ /don de bdag la grub gyur cig /sdang bar sems shing gnod byed pa'i/ /mi ma yin rnams gud du dengs/ /gnod par 'dod pa glags lta rnams/ /ston
86b6(rgyud): pa'i bstan pa mnyan par gyis/ /byams par sems shing phan 'dod pa'i/ /mi ma yin pa gang yin rnams/ /thams cad 'dus shing mthun gyur nas/ /'jig rten skyong ba
86b7(rgyud): rnams kyi tshig / ston pas rjes su yi rang ba/ /dga' ba'i sems kyis bdag la nyon/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba chen po ste/
87a1(rgyud): 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang /
87a2(rgyud): grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen rgyu dang / rgyu ba
87a3(rgyud): dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa dang / rjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa
87a4(rgyud): dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / mi phan par 'dod pa dang / gnod par byed pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
87a5(rgyud): 'das kyi bstan pa la mi dga' ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / phan par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / 'khor
87a6(rgyud): bzhi po rnams la mi dga' ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / phan par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / ming 'di zhes
87a7(rgyud): bya ba la mi dga' ba dang / gnod par 'dod pa dang / phan par mi 'dod pa dang / bde bar mi 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang bde bar mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bsil
87b1(rgyud): ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas dengs shig / skrag par gyur cig /dngangs bar gyur cig /kun tu dngangs par gyur cig /'di na ma 'khod cig /ngan sems dang / gnod sems kyi mgo bo
87b2(rgyud): tshal ba bdun du 'gas ta re/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri ba dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang /
87b3(rgyud): srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun pa dang / ngan byed dang /
87b4(rgyud): gzi byin 'phrog pa dang / brjed byed dang / rims drag po dang / rims zhag gcig pa dang / zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / zhag bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin
87b5(rgyud): pa sdang bar sems pa ma yin pa rnams dang / glags mi lta ba dang / phan par 'dod pa dang / gnod par mi 'dod pa dag /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dga'
87b6(rgyud): ba dang / don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa dang / phan par 'ded pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa dang / ming 'di zhes bya ba la dga' ba dang / don du 'gyur
87b7(rgyud): bar 'dod pa dang / phan par 'dod pa dang / bde bar 'dod pa dang / grub pa dang bde bar 'dod pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas 'dir 'khod
88a1(rgyud): cig / ma skrag cig /ma dngangs par gyur cig /kun tu dngangs par ma gyur cig /mi 'jigs pa kho nar gyur cig /ming 'di zhes bya ba'i don dang / phan pa
88a2(rgyud): dang / bde ba dang / bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bdag gis bstan cing bshad par bya'o/ /de la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen
88a3(rgyud): po bdag la srung ba ni/ 'di yin te/ s+yAd ya the da na/ kha Te kha Te/ khat+t+ya si/ pa la ka ba De/ ro ga b+ha dri ga Ne/ hi li hi li/ du ma te/ grit+t+ya ti/ a dza Ti/ ka tha ri/ ma sA ra kalbe/
88a4(rgyud): sa man+te na/ tsa tur di shi/ yo dza na sha ta At+ma rak+Sha/ a Ni ti kra ma Ni/ sar+b+ba be he Tha ke b+h+ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te/ bud+d+ha s+ya/ sid+d+h+ya n+tu man+t+ra pa dA/ da ra du bi d+yA/ prat+ma No/ man+du swAhA/ 'di
88a5(rgyud): skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal 'jigs su rung ba skyi bung zhes byed pa ni dge slong stong
88a6(rgyud): nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po bzhi po lus ngan dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang /
88a7(rgyud): 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas/ mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa/ kha dog 'phags
88b1(rgyud): bdag nam phyed na lhags nas gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste/ rang bzhin gyi kha dog dang mthus 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas bcom ldan
88b2(rgyud): ' das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas lan gsum bskor ba byas nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das 'ba'
88b3(rgyud): zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa/ 'jig rten
88b4(rgyud): mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /go'u tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /lan gnyis lan gsum du yang rgyal po
88b5(rgyud): chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad nas bstod pa/ 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/ /go'u tam khyod kyis gang
88b6(rgyud): mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das yul dang 'phrod lags sam/
88b7(rgyud): 'tsho ba dang ldan lags sam/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sku bde lags sam/ snyun mi mnga' lags sam/ nyam nga ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gnod
89a1(rgyud): pa mi mnga' lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba ba dang / 'byung po

89a5(rgyud): bgyid par sems pa lta ma mchis lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal po
89a6(rgyud): chen po dag / nga la ni/ thams cad yod de/ yul dang yang 'phrod/ 'tsho ba dang yang ldan/ lus kyang bde/ nad kyang med/ nyam nga ba yang med do/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /nga'i lus
89a7(rgyud): la ni| gnod pa yang med do/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /ngas ni/ 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i
89b1(rgyud): skye rgu dang / lha dang mir bcas pa'i nang na gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnod pa byed par sems pa yang dag par ma mthong
89b2(rgyud): ngo / /kye rgyal po chen po dag /de lta mod kyi/ khyod kyi 'khor rnams nga'i 'khor la gnod pa byed par sems so/ /de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po
89b3(rgyud): chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gsol ba mchis te/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang /
89b4(rgyud): bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / bcom ldan 'das nyid la zhu ba'i slad du bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan
89b5(rgyud): 'das| dgon pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal 'di dag na shin tu sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / 'byung po
89b6(rgyud): dang / grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / sha za dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / skem byed dang / 'tshe rgyu dang / smyo byed dang / mi 'am ci dang / gyen du rgyu dang / rgyu ba
