90a1(rgyud): bzhi pa dang / mi dang mi ma lags pa sdang bar sems pa dang / glags lta ba dang / phan par mi sems pa dang / gnod pa bgyid pa dag mchis so/ /btsun pa
90a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag kyang de na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das kye nyan thos de dag ni/ srod dang tho rangs mi nyal bar sbyor ba la brtson par gnas lags so/ /btsun
90a3(rgyud): pa bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ nyung zad cig
90a4(rgyud): mchis par bas so/ /gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ ches mang lags te/ de dag ni/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi
90a5(rgyud): nyan thos srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa rnams la gnod par bgyid par sems lags te/ de dag dgag pa'i slad du gnod sbyin ma rungs
90a6(rgyud): pa ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang / dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang / bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang / ma lus par
90a7(rgyud): shin tu mnyam par gzhog par 'gyur ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par 'tshal lo/ /mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/ /rgyal ba'i bstan la
90b1(rgyud): ma dad pa/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya/ /rgyal chen rnams ni bdag la nyon/ /mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang / /mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed/ /gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams
90b2(rgyud): dang / /nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/ /phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung / /de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / /lha mo'i tshogs kyis gang ba yi/ /
90b3(rgyud): gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni/ /me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing / /nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra ba/ /rin chen las byas shin tu snang / /bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang / /bar snang
90b4(rgyud): gdon rnams rnam par spangs/ /mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i/ /'byung po grul bum srin po dang / /yi dwags srul po de dag gis/ /rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste/ /gzi byin ldan
90b5(rgyud): pa'i lha rnams kye/ /grong khyer du yang de mi 'gro/ /'byung po chen po 'du ba na/ /de yang de dag 'dur mi dbang / /stan nam yang na chu yang rung / /zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo / /lus
90b6(rgyud): ngan gyi ni pho brang du/ /nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po rnams kyi tshig /'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa/ /de yi kha nas khrag dron dag /myur du rab tu 'bab par
90b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/ /phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ /de ni nad kyis 'chi 'gyur zhing / /gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur/ /'jig rten
91a1(rgyud): skyong gis bshad pa yi/ /mdo las gang zhig 'gal byed pa/ /'jigs pa thams cad de la 'ong / /mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas/ /rgyal po chen po
91a2(rgyud): rnams kyi tshig / gnod sbyin gang dag mi nyan pa/ /'byung po srin po gang yod pa/ /ngan phreng lhag pa'i ngan phreng rnams/ /lcags las byas pa'i 'khor lo yi/ /mtshon cha spu
91a3(rgyud): gri so 'dra bas/ /gnod sbyin de dag brlag par bya/ /rgyal po chen po dpal dang ldan/ /go cha sra zhing mtshon rnol/ /stan rnams la ni 'khod pa dag /shar phyogs na ni yul
91a4(rgyud): 'khor srung / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /de dag de na 'khod pa yi/ /nye 'khor gnod sbyin 'di
91a5(rgyud): rnams gnas/ /seng+ge gzugs dang stag gi gzugs/ /mi sdug pa dag 'gro zhing rgyu/ /glang chen gzugs dang rta yi gzugs/ /kha cig ma he'i gzugs can la/ /dred
91a6(rgyud): mo dang ni wa yi gzugs/ /lug dang spyang ki phag rgod rnams/ /rna ba 'phyang dang rna bo che/ /rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa/ /sgra cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa/ /sa gzhi rab tu g.yo
91a7(rgyud): bar byed/ /bong bu dang ni rnga mo khyi/ /cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod/ /rgyal po chen po stobs po che/ /de dag phan tshun 'du ba na/ /lha yi shing rta bcas pa yis/ /nam
91b1(rgyud): mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/ /gnod sbyin dag ni bdag po yang / /mi rnams la ni bde legs byed/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ ba ka hu mu le/ ha shi Na sha shi Na ba na mu ha le sa mu hA
91b2(rgyud): le| u du ha la/ sa ma hA le/ pra sha ma mI/ rAk+Sha sa/ a ma nu Sh+yA/ bA re mi yak+Sha ni/ bA rA mi pre ta ma b+he the/ du ma nu Sh+yA/ ma sap+ta ha d+ha murnan/ su ti Sha ti/ rgyal po chen po rnam
91b3(rgyud): thos bu| |mi la zhon pa sder bcas pas/ /'di smras nas ni 'tshub ma langs/ /de bzhin ri yang g.yos par gyur/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i/ /rin chen shing rta bcas pa
91b4(rgyud): na| |lha dang mi yi sgra skad grags/ /rgyal po chen po mchi ba na/ /dngos po rnams kyang 'bar bar 'gyur/ /srin po 'dod rgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs/ /de yi mdun na rgyug par
91b5(rgyud): bgyid| |mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/ /'jigs shing skrag pa skyed par bgyid/ /che zhing gtum la mi bzad pa/ /drag cing mthong na mi sdug la/ /spu yang ring zhing
91b6(rgyud): sen mo ring / /lag na ral gri tho ba thogs/ /so ni zangs can 'jigs par bgyid/ /sna che rnga mo stag gi 'dra/ /drag cing lag pa khrag dmar ba/ /yan lag ma tshang phyed tsam
91b7(rgyud): lus| |mig ser lus kyang shin tu sar/ /dri ma can la lus skem pa/ /skra brdzes lcags kyi mchu can la/ /mtshon cha tshabs cher 'debs par bgyid/ /rna ba gzhu sna gsus
92a1(rgyud): po che| |sbrul gyi gzugs can be 'u'i gzugs/ /phag gi gzugs can lto bo che/ /mgo bo che la lag ring ba/ /rna 'phyang ba la nu ma 'phyang / /de 'dra'i
92a2(rgyud): gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni lim log can/ /g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig
92a3(rgyud): tu| |bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchi/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /drag cing rgod la gtum pa dang / /mgo bo che la skra ring
92a4(rgyud): ba| |mi rnams dang ni ri dwags dang / /bya rnams gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid/ /me 'bar za dang mang du za/ /mig gcig pa dang mig ser dang / /sna dang rna ba bcad pa dang //
92a5(rgyud): chad pa mang pos bcad pa dang / /mgo ma mchis dang mgo bcad dang / /lus kyang sgur la gnyer ma gdong / /mig la me 'bar rkang med pa/ /mi rnams 'jigs par bgyid
92a6(rgyud): pa ste| |'phel ka che la rgod bag can/ /de bzhin 'gro zhing rgyu bar bgyid/ /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /gnod sbyin bye ba
92a7(rgyud): phrag stong rnams/ /de dag ma ni rkun ma lags/ /g.yog 'khor de dag lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin
92b1(rgyud): mthun bar lta zhing mchis/ /bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na/ /shing rta zhes bgyi srin mo mchis/ /de la bu pho stobs ldan pa/ /stong phrag bcu yis grangs snyed mchis/ /de dag
92b2(rgyud): bdag gi g.yog lags te/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /bdag cag gi ni gnas rnams na/ /
92b3(rgyud): mgrin ring zhes bgyi srin mo mchis/ /srin mo shin tu nag pa dang / /srin mo nag mo zhes bgyi dang / /srin mo rab nag rnams mchis te/ /de dag go'u tam mthun par blta/ /sa yi
92b4(rgyud): gnod sbyin bdag nyid che/ /de dag sa steng gnas pa ste/ /g.yog 'khor de dag rnams kyis ni/ /yongs su bskor te 'dir mchis lags/ /de dag kun dang lhan cig tu/ /bdag ni
92b5(rgyud): phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /bdag gi mdun na rgyug pa yi/ /yi dwags gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /lus chen
92b6(rgyud): shugs kyang drag po ste/ /so yang che la lto bo che/ /rna 'phyang 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /slo ma rna la rab tu 'phyang / /yan lag drug pa so brtan pa/ /gur gum mdog can tho ba 'dra/ /
92b7(rgyud): so yang rtsub cing rno ba dang / /mdung thung gsal zhing 'jigs par bgyid/ /glang chen mgo dang bum rna can/ /mgo bo stag dang seng+ge 'dra/ /lcags kyi so can lcags kyi skra/ /gdon
93a1(rgyud): rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/ /lag na lcags kyi gtun bu thogs/ /lag na lcags kyi tho ba thogs/ /so rnon lag pa ring ba ste/ /'jigs pa'i
93a2(rgyud): gzugs can lcags kyi mchu/ /mgo bo che la skra g.yengs pa/ /nag cing mig ser sna zhom pa/ /bum pa'i mgrin dang mig dmar dang / /mig gcig pa dang lto bo che/ /mchu
93a3(rgyud): 'phyang ba dang lag gcig pa/ /rkang gcig pa dang rkang gnyis pa/ /kha med kha gnyis drag po ste/ /mi rnams rab tu 'jigs par bgyid/ /lag na khar ba dbyug pa thogs/ /mdung
93a4(rgyud): rtse gsum pa skrag cing 'jigs/ /skrag cing 'jigs par byed pa ste/ /gdon rnams rnam par skrag bgyid pa/ /skrag par bgyid cing smra bar bgyid/ /sems kyang 'khrul
93a5(rgyud): par bgyid pa ste/ /skyo bar bgyid cing rmongs par bgyid/ /de nas gzi byin 'phrog par bgyid/ /de dag 'jig rten 'jigs pa ste/ /stobs po che la bsten par dka'/ /stong
93a6(rgyud): phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi po/ /rgyal po chen po'i mdun na rgyug /de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mang po yi/ /g.yog 'khor dag gis yongs su bskor/ /gnod sbyin bye ba phrag stong rnams//
93a7(rgyud): de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /sa ga lngas rtsen zla ba dang / /seng+ge sde dang rab gnon dang / /ma la
93b1(rgyud): sbyin brtson drag po dang / /gang po dang ni nor 'dzin dang / /tsan+dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang / /sna tshogs sde dang gtor ma len/ /yid bzhin rab 'byor bzhin bzang dang / /'dam
93b2(rgyud): bu can dang shin tu rgyal/ /'dod pa thams cad 'byor pa dang / /dbang po rgyal ba khyu mchog dang / /nor bu bzang sras rdzogs bzang dang / /'dam bu sa mchog 'dam bus dga'//
93b3(rgyud): khab kyi spu can ring bzang dang / /lag mchog skye rgu'i bdag po dang / /'dam bu'i rgyud dang mdung ring dang / /rig pa stobs can nor bu dang / /'jog po nag po chen po dang / /la ba
93b4(rgyud): can dang dre'u dang gnyis/ /klu yi rgyal po sa srung bu/ /yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che/ /nam mkha' lding ni shugs chen ldan/ /'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ /bya yi gzugs
93b5(rgyud): kyis mchi bgyid cing / /rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid/ /lha dang lha min dri za rnams/ /'jigs par bgyid dang dge ba'ang rung / /ma dad pa dang dad pa rnams/ /de dag thams cad
93b6(rgyud): 'dir mchis te/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /'phrog ma zhes bgyi gnod sbyin mo/ /'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo/ /de yi bu
93b7(rgyud): ni lnga brgya rnams/ /'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu rtsal can/ /bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags te/ /de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin
94a1(rgyud): mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /ma ga d+ha na thams cad mthong / /ka shi ka na pad+ma 'chang / /yangs pa can na rgyal mchog gnas/ /gyad yul na ni grags
94a2(rgyud): 'dzin gnas/ /rgyal po'i khab na ku be ra/ /ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ /ta ma la na 'byor pa gnas/ /mi ti la na kun tu rgyal/ /ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/ /gnod sbyin
94a3(rgyud): rnams kyi sde dpon mchog / rdzu 'phrul chen po skal ba che/ /stobs chen de dag thams cad ni/ /yid dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs
94a4(rgyud): mchis pas/ /de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang / /rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis/ /yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan la/ /mi rnams la ni snying brtse'i slad/ /gnod sbyin
94a5(rgyud): 'byung po yi dwags dang / /sdang ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang / /mi ma yin rnams zlog pa yi/ /srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyis/ /de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /
94a6(rgyud): thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /'khon dang 'jigs pa kun 'das pa/ /rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis//
94a7(rgyud): khyed la lha dang grub pa dang / /bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ /gnod sbyin bye ba drug khri dang / /bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /
94b1(rgyud): thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu/ /byang phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /gnod sbyin rgyu skar smyo byed dang / /
94b2(rgyud): brjed byed dang ni mi'am ci/ /skem byed dang ni rims drag dang / /de bzhin rims nad zhag bzhi pa/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /s+yAd ya the daM/ u ha haM/ u ha haM/ ma hA
94b3(rgyud): ha| u ha ma hA haM/ sa la mu dzi/ i lI mi lI/ i lI mi lI/ ki lI mi le/ tsi ri Ti/ i u b+hi u tu b+hi/ pi ti li ye/ ma Ta ma li/ ma nan+da ye swAhA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu
94b4(rgyud): lus ngan lcang lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig / gnod sbyin dang / rgyu skar dang / smyo byed dang / brjed byed dang / mi'am ci dang / gyen du rgyu dang / rgyu ba dang / 'dun
94b5(rgyud): pa dang / ngan byed dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yang
94b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin
94b7(rgyud): mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/ /sangs rgyas dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /go'u
95a1(rgyud): tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /go'u tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to/ /srin po mtho
95a2(rgyud): na rab 'jigs pa/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /kho ra 'khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod 'gyur lags/ /bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung / /
95a3(rgyud): shar phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /srin po rnams dang sha za dang / /dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi//
95a4(rgyud): s+yad ya the ngan/ i ti mi TI/ khu ra Te/ phu ra Te/ ma ti bi ma ti/ u ma ti/ ak+ke/ mak+ke/ nak+ke/ a Tu mi/ ba Tu mi/ ma b+he/ i ri Ti/ pi ri Ti swAhA/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor
95a5(rgyud): srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / dri za dang / rlung lha dang / mi'am ci dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig /lha'i nang na lha'i
95a6(rgyud): rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun
95a7(rgyud): mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /de nas rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /thal sbyar 'dug ste
95b1(rgyud): smras pa ni/ /'jig rten mgon po skyabs mdzad pa/ /'jig rten kun la phan pa mdzad/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /grul bum yi dwags
95b2(rgyud): srul po rnams/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams/ /kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /bdag ni rgyal po 'phags skyes po/ /lho phyogs
95b3(rgyud): skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du/ /'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin 'phrog /grul bum yi dwags srul po rnams/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /s+yAd
95b4(rgyud): ya the dan/ a le/ i le le/ ki li ki le le/ ku pa ku pa sa/ si le si le le/ si li li li/ /li li li li li/ hi ti si le/ ma ti/ su ma ti/ su su ma ti/ su su su su/ su su ma ti/
95b5(rgyud): hi li Sha li Sha swAhA/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig /grul bum dang / yi dwags dang / srul po dang / 'byung po dang / rgyu ba dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa
95b6(rgyud): rnams bzlog par gyur cig / lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/
95b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /de nas rgyal po
96a1(rgyud): mig mi bzang / /thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ /mun par gyur pa'i 'jig rten la/ /bcom ldan lam rnams ston mdzad pa/ /go'u tam dpa' bo khyod la
96a2(rgyud): ni| |chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /'jig rten dag na nyi zla 'dra/ /rin chen snying po stobs po che/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ /stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams//
96a3(rgyud): kho ra khor yug yongs bskor nas/ /thal mo sbyar te 'khod gyur lags/ /bdag ni rgyal po mig mi bzang / /nub phyogs skyong bar bgyid pa ste/ /'jig rten mgon po'i nye
96a4(rgyud): 'khor du/ /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ /lha min dbang po stobs po che/ /de dag bdag gis bzlog par bgyi/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ da ge da ge /su ba ti ye pa Te/ a Ta/ ka maT+Te/
96a5(rgyud): bi ma ba da ma/ bi da da ma/ b+hi da da ma ni/ a b+hi na me/ gats+tsha b+hu te/ na la phi ye/ ba ra da ra tra tsi tsi le/ tsi li li li li li li swAhA/ rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang phyogs skyong bar
96a6(rgyud): gyur cig / klu dang / nam mkha' lding dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par gyur cig /lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi
96a7(rgyud): ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la
96b1(rgyud): 'dud| |yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
96b2(rgyud): la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das 'ba' zhig la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun pa dang / skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
96b3(rgyud): gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba ste/ 'khor bzhi po rnams la yongs su khyab pa'o/ /gnod
96b4(rgyud): sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar du bzlog par bgyi ba dang / 'khor bzhi rnams la srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa dang / bde legs su 'gyur ba dang / bde
96b5(rgyud): bar gnas par bgyid pa lags so/ /de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /rig
96b6(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo bzung zin to/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po ngas yongs su bzung zin to/ /kye rgyal po chen po dag /gzhan yang ngas bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po
96b7(rgyud): la rjes su yi rang ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo brjod kyi/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang / ngas bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/ /
97a1(rgyud): zhes rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas na bza' chos gos phye
97a2(rgyud): nas 'byung po'i tshogs de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /ngas 'di bstan par bya'o/ /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la dbye bar bya'o/ /thams cad la go bar
97a3(rgyud): bya'o| |de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi srig sngags 'di bka' stsal to/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ hi lI hi lI/ b+hi si ni bak+ke /a ha ra ye/ ta ma
97a4(rgyud): ti| ta ma ti/ ti la bak+ke/ ba lI ta ke/ da ri ti na/ d+hi na da/ phu T+yi phu phu T+yi/ gu gu T+ya/ hi tsa kaM ti/ mA mA kAM tI swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'di
97a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa na sa 'di kun tu g.yos/ 'byung po thams cad rab tu 'dar nas kye ma kyi hud/ kye ma sdug bsngal lo/ /zhes sgra chen po byung ngo / /srin po rnams kyis kyang 'di
97a6(rgyud): skad ces smras te/ 'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse nas/ /'byung po kun 'jigs nyen pa yi/ /rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar
97a7(rgyud): mdzad| |de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po/ /sems can kun la thugs brtse bas/ /gnod sbyin srin po dri za dang / /klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba po/ /'byung po rgyu ba gzi byin
97b1(rgyud): 'phrog / grul bum yi dwags srul po dang / /lha min gshed byed ro langs dang / /brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci/ /skem byed dang ni rims drag dang / /de bzhin bram ze srin po dang / /skyo byed
97b2(rgyud): rims nang zhag gsum pa/ /de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams/ /skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te/ /phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang / /de dag la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/ /rig
97b3(rgyud): sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad/ /s+yAd ya the dan/ hi ri ma kha/ ti ri kha kha/ ka Ta ma TA/ sid+d+ha mahA ta ri/ a Da ti ni/ da Da da Da/ da ti li/ da muT+Tu/ da mad+de/ d+hu d+hu ri/ da ra ri/ da ra
97b4(rgyud): mi ra| ki la kA ye/ ka ta ba re Ne/ su su ma le swAhA/ gsang sngags chen mo rig sngags chen mo 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi chos la yang
97b5(rgyud): dag par so sor rtogs shig / khyed kun lus zhig ste shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye zhing 'khor bar 'gro ba re/ de nas
97b6(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing dngangs te/ mi dga' las kyi bung zhes byed nas thal mo sbyar te
97b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun pa dang / skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /sdang ba'i 'byung po zad bgyid pa//
98a1(rgyud): rig sngags 'di ni legs par gsungs/ /mi yi 'jig rten bde bgyi ba'i/ /rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal/ /de la rig sngags 'di lags
98a2(rgyud): te| |'jig rten mgon po bdag la gson/ /s+yAd ya the daM/ u hu ha la/ ku li dzi ba/ u b+hu ya/ ma su ra bi la/ ad d+yA bad d+yA/ ad d+yA ba d+yA/ ad d+yA ba te/ nad da bad d+ye/ ma
98a3(rgyud): rud+h+ya/ ma ru d+h+ya/ ba di ma rung d+ya pha la swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa 'di gzung bar gsol/ s+yAd ya the daM/ i li i li/ mi li mi li/ ki li ki
98a4(rgyud): li| ba na ra/ ni la pa ya/ b+hu b+hu b+hu ra/ thi ru phu phu phu ra/ ga sha lI rau kha da ya ma la/ khu li khu li pa ya swAhA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/ lo gcig gi bar du mtshams
98a5(rgyud): gcod pa dang / 'byung po thams cad zlog pa dang / don thams cad grub pa lags so/ /de nas gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams kyis
98a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo sngon ma thos pa 'di yang thos/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i srung ba sngon ma thos pa 'di thos nas skrag cing sdangs la mi dga'
98a7(rgyud): ste| skyi bung zhes byas nas sa la 'dzul/ kun tu 'dzul/ kun tu rab tu 'dzul bar byed do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa gzhi rdo rjer sprul nas de dag phyogs bzhir
98b1(rgyud): rgyug go/ /de nas rgyal po bzhis phyogs bzhir me'i phung po chen po sprul te/ de nas nam mkha' la rgyug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' gser du sprul to/ /de nas
98b2(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lha dang dri zas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ steng gi bar snang la 'phags nas gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par byed pa'i
98b3(rgyud): bar rnams gzhom pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa dang / 'khor bzhi po rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / bde
98b4(rgyud): legs su 'gyur ba dang / bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'di brjod do/ /s+yAd ya the daM/ gi mi gi mi gi mi gi mi gi ni/ gi ni gi ni gi ni/ na khi mi na khi/ ni Sha ni Sha ni
98b5(rgyud): Sha| u ba a/ di shwa di shwa/ bi da sha/ sar+b+ba di shwa a d+hi pa ti/ gi ra bi ra/ dza ni b+hu mi pa ti/ i li lI/ i li lI/ ki li lI/ ki li lI/ ki li ki li lI/ ki li ki li lI/ ki li ki li
98b6(rgyud): lI| ki li ki li lI/ ki li li li li li li/ ki li li li li li li li li/ ad d+yi/ nad d+yi/ ku n+yad d+yi/ mahA ku nad d+yi/ ku lad d+yi/ khu laM d+yi/ ma hA khu laM d+yi/ hu lu hu lu lu/ hu
98b7(rgyud): lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu lu/ hu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu lu/ ha la ha la/ hi li hi li/ la ha ha lu/ hu le/ i ha/ hu le hu le/ u lad t+yi/ hi le/ u ha hi li/
99a1(rgyud): hi le hi le/ hu lu hi/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ hu lu hu le/ ha ha ha ha ha ha swAhA/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar gyur cig /lha rnams kyi nang na
99a2(rgyud): lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo/ /da yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ /kun
99a3(rgyud): mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /shes rab chen po khyod la 'dud/ /go'u tam khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa/ /de ni lha rnams ma
99a4(rgyud): 'tshal to/ /yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ /chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za nas gnod par bgyi ba'i bar rnams ming 'di zhes
99a5(rgyud): bya ba'i lus la babs pa las gud du dengs shig / gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du ma dong na/ de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos
99a6(rgyud): 'debs par 'gyur la/ de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang / snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang / mtha' med
99a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro/ /'brum bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang / skya rengs 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo
99b1(rgyud): chen po 'di thos nas ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du gud du dengs shig / gal te myur du gud du ma dong na/ de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs
99b2(rgyud): par 'gyur la/ de'i rkyen gyis mgo bo dang / snying tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang / mtha' med par 'gyur ro/ /
99b3(rgyud): gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/ /nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ /mdo bshad thos nas gtang bar gyis/ /sha za lus 'phags skem byed
99b4(rgyud): dang / /'byung po 'jigs byed srul po rnams/ /de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i/ /mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong / /lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / /dri za dang ni gdon gyi
99b5(rgyud): bla| |'byung po dang ni sha za dang / /de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ /kun tu 'khrugs shing kun tu g.yos/ /skrag cig kun tu rab tu 'gul/ /gdon sdang gnod pa byed pa
99b6(rgyud): rnams| |ltung zhing rab tu pham par gyur/ /sa gzhi dag kyang rab tu g.yos/ /sgra bo che dag sgrog par byed/ /yi dwags dang ni grul bum rnams/ /sdang ba'i gdon ni zlog byed
99b7(rgyud): pa'i| |mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur nas/ /'jigs pa drag pos 'debs par 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ /dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa/ /de dag mgu zhing
100a1(rgyud): yid dga' nas/ /legs par rjes su yi rang ngo / /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi par snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags
100a2(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang / tshig mthun par bcom ldan
100a3(rgyud): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyis pa dang / 'khor bzhi po
100a4(rgyud): rnams srung ba dang / yongs su skyob pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong
100a5(rgyud): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la bsrung ba dang / de dag gis kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'dri gzung bar bgyi/ bcang bar bgyi/
100a6(rgyud): brjod par bgyi/ kun chub par bgyi'o/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag bsrung ba dang /
100a7(rgyud): bdag sba pa dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / gzhan sba pa'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de la
100b1(rgyud): ni| gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la sems lags/ de gang du mtshan
100b2(rgyud): gcig tsam gnas pa der yang gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod pa bgyid pa'i bar rnams nye 'khor du yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ de gang du rtag tu gnas pa der lta smos
100b3(rgyud): kyang ci 'tshal lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gang la mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa de'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na/ de myur ba kho
100b4(rgyud): nar bde legs dang / nad ma mchis pa dang / bde bar 'gyur zhing thar par 'gyur la/ mi ma lags pa rnams de la log pa mi bgyid cing myur du gud du mchi bar 'gyur lags
100b5(rgyud): te| btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di de ltar don che ba lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen
100b6(rgyud): nam| dge bsnyen ma gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni/ dad pa can
100b7(rgyud): gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gnas su mchis nas ming smra bar bgyid de/ kye rgyal po chen po dag /dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/
101a1(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma che ge mo zhig bdag bsrung ba dang / bdag sba ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / gzhan sba ba'i phyir bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di
101a2(rgyud): 'jin par byed/ 'chang bar byed/ brjod par byed/ kun chub par byed/ sbyor bar byed do/ /zhes sgrog par bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dad pa can gyi
101a3(rgyud): g nod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can du mchis nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i mdun du gnod sbyin rnams 'dus shing 'byung po thams cad tshogs
101a4(rgyud): pa'i nang du yang bsgrags nas der de dag mngon par dga' bar 'gyur te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di ni/ de ltar don che ba lags
101a5(rgyud): mo| / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bdag bsrung ba dang / bdag sba ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba
101a6(rgyud): dang / gzhan sba ba'i slad du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni/ tshangs par
101a7(rgyud): spyad par bgyi'o/ /chang mi btung ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin can du mchis pa dang / zas rnam pa lnga la 'di lta ste/ bu ram dang / sbrang rtsi dang / til dang / sha dang / nye
101b1(rgyud): sha rnams yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams bsil ba'i tshal gyi
101b2(rgyud): mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor ba de la de'i skabs kho nar brlag pa dang / mtha' ma mchis bar bgyid pa dag mchis ta/ de
101b3(rgyud): dag gzhom pa'i slad du yi dam bgyi 'tshal lo/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la bsil ba'i
101b4(rgyud): tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor ba bgyid pa de la ni/ dad pa can gyi gnod sbyin dge bsnyen rnams gos
101b5(rgyud): dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / bo'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnams kyi spo ba bskyed par bgyid de/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di
101b6(rgyud): ni| de ltar don che ba lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ gzhan mu stegs can bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung rab la ma dad pa dang / mngon par mi dga' ba dang / gnod
101b7(rgyud): par 'tshal ba dang / sman par mi 'tshal ba dang / grub ba dang bde bar mi 'tshal ba gang la la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / brjod pa dang /
102a1(rgyud): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / sbyor bar bgyid pa de la ni/ don de 'grub par mi bgyid de/ mi ma lags pa rnams kyis bar ma dor 'gum pa dang | sdug bsngal
102a2(rgyud): du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang mtha' ma mchis par bgyid lags so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni/ de dag la gnod par 'tshal ba dang / sman par mi 'tshal ba dang / grub
102a3(rgyud): pa dang bde bar mi 'tshal ba lags pa'i slad du ste/ de dag la ni/ log par lta ba gang lags pa de brlag par bgyi lags so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ 'jig
102a4(rgyud): rten na sems can rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du rgyal po chen po bzhis srung ba bgyis pa gang ci yang rung ba'i srung ba de dag gi nang na ni/ 'di mchog
102a5(rgyud): dang / gtso bo dang / rab mchog lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/ /mi mchog gang zhig mdo 'di
102a6(rgyud): dag / yongs su rdzogs par srung ba dang / /bde legs bgyid pa de la ni/ /srin po rnams kyang 'tshe mi bgyid/ /su yang rung ste mdo 'di dag /mi mchog gis ni gsungs pa
102a7(rgyud): bzhin/ /yongs su rdzogs shing ma chad par/ /shin tu tshang bar 'chad bgyid na/ /de la gnod sbyin yi dwags dang / /'byung po grul bum srin po dang / /smyo byed rgyu ba klu rnams dang / /
102b1(rgyud): de lta bu dag 'tshe mi bgyi/ /de la mi ma lags dang gdon/ /myur du gud du mchi bar 'gyur/ /de la cis kyang mi tshugs te/ /de la 'tshe bar yong mi nus/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po
102b2(rgyud): yis| |bcom ldan phyag 'tshal zhes brjod de/ /sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /de nyid du ni mi snang gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan mo 'das te nam
102b3(rgyud): langs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la bzhugs te dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mdang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi bu dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas
102b4(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas/ mngag gzhug pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog 'phags pa dag nam sros nas lhags nas gros mthun par dur khrod
102b5(rgyud): chen po bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te/ rang gi 'od kyis snang bar byas nas lus ngan dang / yul 'khor srung dang / mig mi bzang dang / 'phags skyes po rnams nga ga la ba der
102b6(rgyud): 'ongs te lhags nas nga'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil ba'i
102b7(rgyud): tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo / /khyod kyis de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang ngas bshad do/ /btsun pa/ de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/ dge slong
103a1(rgyud): rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma
103a2(rgyud): rnams la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par gsungs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang /
103a3(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma de dag yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ zas dkar gsum za ba dang / legs par khrus byas pa dang /
103a4(rgyud): smyung ba byas pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa rgya chen po dang ldan pas rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs ldong ros sam/ btsag gis bris la/ spos thams cad
103a5(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar dus gsum du brjod par bya'o/ /bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta
103a6(rgyud): shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / dz+nya na sid+d+hi dang / shAkya pra b+ha dang / lo tsA ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ phyis 'gos gzhon
103a7(rgyud): nu dpal gyis chag lo tsA ba'i phyag dpe las zhus so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ ma hA man+t+ra a nu d+hA ra ni sU tra/ bod skad du/ gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa'i mdo/
103b1(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdun
103b2(rgyud): nyan thos dang bcas pa/ yang dag par song ba/ yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags 'di ni don du sgrub/ /rig sngags 'di
103b3(rgyud): dag grub gyur cig / gang phyir don du bsgrub pa yi/ /don de yang ni grub par shog /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal
103b4(rgyud): byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
103b5(rgyud): byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa
103b6(rgyud): brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos
103b7(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
104a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid
104a2(rgyud): pa lags te/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ 'tshal na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang yongs su skyob par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi
104a3(rgyud): ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
104a4(rgyud): khams rnams su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang / yongs
104a5(rgyud): su skyob pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad pa lags na/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
104a6(rgyud): gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
104a7(rgyud): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo / /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas
104b1(rgyud): gnas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag/ mdang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi
104b2(rgyud): lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bcas pa
104b3(rgyud): dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / 'phrog ma bu dang bcas/ g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa rnams nga ga la ba der lhags te 'ongs nas mi mjed kyi bdag
104b4(rgyud): po tshangs pas nga la 'di skad ces smras so/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su dbang phyug la dbang bgyid pa lags te/ btsun pa
104b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ 'tshal na stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung bar bgyid/ yongs su bskyab par bgyid/ yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde
104b6(rgyud): legs su 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/ /btsun pa bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag bcom ldan 'das kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
104b7(rgyud): rnams su dbang phyug la mnga' mdzad pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bzhed na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab
105a1(rgyud): pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad lags na/ bcom ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
105a2(rgyud): khams rnams su srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol/ zhes gsol to/ /dge slong dag /
105a3(rgyud): ngas kyang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo / /de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ngas cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas de nyid du mi snang
105a4(rgyud): bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni/ 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
105a5(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /
105a6(rgyud): da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga nyid kyis bshad do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
105a7(rgyud): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ khyod kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di zungs shig /chongs shig /lhogs shig /
105b1(rgyud): shod cig /kun chub par gyis shig /kun dga' bo/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen po rjes su 'dzin pa 'di ni/ 'khor bzhi po rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang /
105b2(rgyud): bde ba dang / bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ u bud+d+he/ ni bud+d+he/ bi bud+d+he/ sa ma bud+d+he/ bi shoSh+Ta bud+d+he/ i ha bud+d+he/ tat+ta bud+d+he/ ni yaM ga me/ tsha bi la/ a phu la/ ta phu la/
105b3(rgyud): tA le mA le/ maM ga ga maM ga ma nan/ i ma/ ma bid+yA hu du me/ hu hu me/ pU rba pra ha re/ kun dga' bo/ yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsangs sngags stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa
105b4(rgyud): 'di 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs/ ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
105b5(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsung par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba na yang 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'di nyid la phan par bya ba'i phyir da ltar nga
105b6(rgyud): nyid kyis bshad do/ /ngas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags chen mo rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o/ /mtshams gcad do/ /shar phyogs su rgyang
105b7(rgyud): grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad kyi bar du yang rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /tad+ya thA/ sa mu tsa bi mu tsa/
106a1(rgyud): pha la mu tsa/ dza ga d+ha ra/ ma da s+tha la/ na la ka ma ga /su mu shrA ba ti/ bi mu k+ti/ yo ga hi na sa ga ma/ a rad mu la ba haM ga mi/ i di tsi ri/ bi ta lA kha
106a2(rgyud): yo| ma kha yo/ la ga b+hi d+ha ra ni/ pra ti pra yo ge/ a tsa prap+ti/ sa ma sra ba ti/ i la ya/ mi la ya/ ba hu sa da t+ya/ a na ta ma/ ar+tha ba ti ga ra ba ti/ ti khi ni ti be/ a ka na
106a3(rgyud): ti| sa ka ti/ sa mi di ma/ ba su ba te/ a Te/ a Te/ taT+Ta/ kha ru smin/ kha ru smin/ la ha taM/ la hu taM/ saM b+ha ra/ saM b+ha ra/ bi ti ra na taM/ ni ru taM/ i la ta i la/ sa ra pha
106a4(rgyud): la| ma hu pha la/ ma ta ma ta/ daM Sh+Ti ma ta/ kun dga' bo/ yun ring po nas spyad pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs dang / mthu rtsal dang ldan pa 'di dag ni/ 'das pa'i de bzhin
106a5(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs so/ /ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
106a6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang gsung par 'gyur ro/ /da ltar byung ba na yang ngas bshad do/ /mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang bshad do/ /lha'i dbang po brgya
106a7(rgyud): byin gyis kyang bshad do/ /rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang bshad do/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon po nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis kyang bshad do/ /'phrog ma bu dang bcas/ g.yog
106b1(rgyud): 'khor dang bcas pas kyang bshad do/ /kun dga' bo/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang
106b2(rgyud): sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'di bzung nas ji ltar bstan pa dang / ji ltar kun chub par byas pa de bzhin du shes sam/ mthong ngam/ las su byed pa de la ni/ ji srid 'tsho'i
106b3(rgyud): bar du srung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/ /kun dga' bo/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
106b4(rgyud): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bkas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa 'dis ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar
106b5(rgyud): bya'o| |yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/ /mtshams gcad do/ /shar phyogs su rgyang grags gcig
106b6(rgyud): tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /de bzhin du nub phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /lho phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad
106b7(rgyud): do| |byang phyogs su rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad du rgyang grags gcig tshun chad mtshams gcad do/ /kun
107a1(rgyud): dga' bo/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i lam dang lam ma yin pa na gnas pa bzhi yod de/ de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shis ldan dang / kun
107a2(rgyud): bshes dang / gang po dang / dga' ba'i dpal rnams te/ gang de dag gi ming shes pa dang / rus shes pa de la ni/ rgyal po chen po'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /chom rkun
107a3(rgyud): gyi 'jigs pa dang / me'i 'jigs pa dang / chu'i 'jigs pa dang / ma'i 'jigs pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo / /kun dga' bo/ lag na rdo
