169a7(rgyud): dril bu sil sil sgra snyan sgrog /lda ldi gos kyi phreng bas dkris/ /ltag pa'i 'du 'dzi rnams spangs nas/ /spyod pa mthun pa'i grogs dang ni/ /bde bar byang chub bsgrub
169b1(rgyud): par bya| |'on kyang gnas dang grogs la sogs/ /rnal 'byor yid 'jug phyir brtsam ste/ /mtha' dag spangs pa'i pha rol na/ /lhag pa'i byang chub ma mchis so/ /bde dang sdug

169b4(rgyud): mnyan par gyis/ /sa gzhi bdud rtsi lnga yis byug /me yi dkyil 'khor sa bon bcas/ /dur khrod pha gus bri par bya/ /der ni pho mo thod pa la/ /phyi rol dmar nag tshon gyis
169b5(rgyud): byug / nang du sna tshogs rdo rje ni/ /mu khyud gsum ldan bri bar bya/ /dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i/ /snying po sngags bcas bri bar bya/ /rdo rje rwa ni thams cad la/ /hUM bri mu khyud
169b6(rgyud): gnyis phreng sngags/ /gsum par khro bo'i sngags bri'o/ /thod pa kha sbyor nang du ni/ /ske tshe yungs kar btsan dug dang / /lan tshwa khag dang sha chen dang / /rkang rjes sa la sogs pa
169b7(rgyud): blugs| |gcer bu rnal 'byor skra bshig nas/ /lha yi sbyor ldan lhor bltas nas/ /zhabs kyis thod pa'i 'khor lo ni/ /mnan te sngags phreng brjod par bya/ /khro bo chen po'i
170a1(rgyud): sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam bzhag nas ni stong phrag tu/ /bzlas pa mtshan phyed bar byas na/ /gsad pa nyid la the tshom med/ /dur khrod ras la 'khor lo
170a2(rgyud): ni| |dbus su me yi dkyil 'khor can/ /rtsibs brgyad mu khyud gsum ldan pa/ /dbus su snying po sngags rnams la/ /hUM gnyis bar du bsgrub bya'i ming / /gsad pa nyid
170a3(rgyud): dang ldan par bya/ /mu khyud gnyis pa phreng sngags kyang / /ming dang gsad par ldan pa'o/ /gsum pa khro bo'i sngags bris te/ /'khor lo mchod cing byin brlabs nas/ /

170b5(rgyud): dang ljang skya sngo skya dang / /dmar ser ljang ser 'dzum pa'i gzugs/ /gtso la thal mo sbyar btud nas/ /rgyu skar phreng ba dang ldan gzugs/ /'o ma 'bras can mkhal zho sha/

171a2(rgyud): ni| |char gyi rgyun yang 'bab par 'gyur/ /gal te cung zad mi 'bebs na/ /me la bsdigs pa tsam gyis ni/ /glog gi phreng ba gtor byed na/ /char chen 'bebs la the tshom
171a3(rgyud): med| |wa yi khrag gis gro ga la/ /gang gi 'khor lo bskrad pa yi/ /thabs dang ldan par bri byas nas/ /dur khrod sa las byas pa yi/ /rnga mo'i snying gar bcug nas kyang / /
171a4(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni/ /lhor bltas bka' yi sbyor ba yis/ /gsang sngags khri phrag gcig brjod na/ /bskrad pa nyid la the tshom med/ /sbrul dang sre mo'i khrag

172a1(rgyud): me tog gcal du bkram/ /der ni mchod cing sreg pa'i rdzas/ /tshogs nas rdzas rnams bsang gtor bya/ /bong bu rnga mo'i ril ma dang / /gsal zhing cher

173a1(rgyud): ya laM/ rengs par byed pa'i sngags so/ /raM dz+wa ra dz+wa ra raM/ rims skyed pa'i sngags so/ /dza A kaR+Sha ya hrIHdza/ dgug pa'i sngags so/ /oM ba ri sha

173a3(rgyud): yany+tsa| maM tra/ taM tra/ ts+tshin+daM ts+tshin+daM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ zhes pa ni/ thams cad du rig sngags gcod par byed pa'i sngags so/ /rig pa'i rgyal po bla med ni/ /gsang chen
173a4(rgyud): 'di las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gsang chen rgyud 'di ngo mtshar te/ /rmad byung bas ches rmad du byung / /bstan pa'i snying po gsang chen 'di/ /gsungs pa'i de ma thag tu ni/ /

173b1(rgyud): chos kyi dbang phyug grags pas bsgyur ba'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya tsun+de de pi nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo skul byed ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/
173b2(rgyud): dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom
173b3(rgyud): ldan 'das lha mo skul byed ma mthu dang stobs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang pha rol gnon pa grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags shing

173b5(rgyud): 'grus chen po thogs pa med pa 'dul ba/ stobs che ba/ pha rol gnon pa che ba/ phyag na ral gri dang / dgra sta dang / lcags kyu dang / zhags pa bsnams pa/ khro mo chen mo/ khro
173b6(rgyud): mo chen mo'i dbang phyug ma/ drag pa'i gzugs can ma/ zhal ras mtha' yas ma/ phyag stong mnga' ma/ ma pham ma/ gzhan gyis mi thub ma/ don yod ma/ gdul bar dka' ma/
173b7(rgyud): mig stong ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs ma/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas shing mchod pa rab tu sgrub ma/ rdo rje sen mo can /rdo rje rdo rjes 'dren ma/

174a2(rgyud): gyi gzugs can du bsgyur bar ston par mdzad ma/ sku rdo rje dang bai DUR+ya'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ oM b+ha ga ba ti tsun+de/ d+h+rUM d+h+rUM/ kruM kruM/ mruM mruM/ sruM sruM/ rlaM rluM/ a be sha ya/ gr-ih+na

174b6(rgyud): pa'i sbrul gyis mgo rgyan byas/ /mthong na gdug pa'i rna rgyan can/ /dug gi me tog rnams za zhing / /ma lu ta yi lcug khu 'thung / /nga la de 'bod 'bod du 'jug /bu khyod tshur shog
174b7(rgyud): ba la nyon/ /nga la dug sel ces bya ba/ /dug 'jig rig sngags dam pa yod/ /dug rnams gang yin de kun ni/ /nga yi ming gis 'jig par 'gyur/ /tad+ya thA/ oM i li mit+te/
175a1(rgyud): ti li mit+te/ i li ti li mit+te/ dum+be/ du mA lI ye/ du se/ du sa la ye/ tak+ke/ ta ka kar+Ne/ marme/ marme ra Ne/ kash+ma re/ kash+ma ra mu ka te/ a g+ha Ne/ a g+ha na g+ha
175a2(rgyud): Ne| i li a li ye/ a khA/ I e/ a byA i e/ shwe te/ sha ta/ tun+te/ a nu rak+te swAhA/ dge slong dag /nga'i dug sel gyi rig sngags 'di ni/ sbyin pa thams cad dkar po ste/

179b6(rgyud): a d+hiSh+Thi te d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud+d+ha a d+hi ka me dz+nyA na a ba b+ha se swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhi gshegs pas sbyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams

180a1(rgyud): phyir rgol ba'i gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ / mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug gis mi tshugs so/ /rgyal po de'i yul der pha rol gyi gnod pa mi
180a2(rgyud): 'byung ngo / /phyir rgol ba dag yul 'khor der mthus gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las rigs nags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can

180a7(rgyud): ni/ ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Thi te/ a ba ro ha ni/ o ro bya ni/ dza ya ku su me swa re sa ra ba ti/ dre D+he dri D+he dri D+he/ da dA dri d+ha pa sha ri bi d+he/ mo ha ni mo ha ni/ dzam+b+ha ni/ staM b+ha ni/ staM b+hi ta/ sarba
180b1(rgyud): a hi tiSh+Thi NaM/ na mo b+ha ga wa ti/ bud+d+h+ya s+ya/ ma hA kA ru NaM/ bi ha ri ni/ sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa da swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol
180b2(rgyud): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams
180b3(rgyud): brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ dza ya dza ya dza ya/ pa Ta pa Ta pa Ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ badzra pra ha ra/ pra ha ra bra ha ra/ b+har d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ha ra ha ra ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra b+ha ra/ dza ya ku su me/ ba la ba
180b4(rgyud): la| tsakra tsakra/ bI Da ya bI Da ya/ a kra ma a kra ma/ bi kra me bi kra me/ a tsa le/ ma tsa le/ kha ga ta ri nI/ ni la ba ti/ badzra bra ha ra Ni/ badzra saM b+ha ba/ badzra ka ye/ b+hud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi te/ bud+d+ha
180b5(rgyud): rasmi ma hA pra b+he/ u tsa gan+d+he/ ma hA te dza ba ti/ ma tsa le/ ba tsa le/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ ka ka kaM re/ kA si ni/ sa mA he ti/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni/ tsa ra tsa ra/ g+hu g+hu De/ badzra mA lA d+ha ri/ sa ra sa
180b6(rgyud): ra| ka la ba ri ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa ste/ su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal
180b7(rgyud): ba can 'di las 'da' bar bgyid pa de dag ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'khus par 'gyur ro/ 'di lta ste/ lha'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ srin po'am/ yi dwags sam
181a1(rgyud): sha za'am/ brjed byed dam/ gsod byed dam/ byad dam/ ro langs sam/ bkra mi shis pa'am/ ma mo'i gdon tam/ gong ma'i gdon tam/ skem byed
181a2(rgyud): dam| skem byed kyi gdon tam/ za ba'i gdon de dag thams cad rmugs par bgyi'o/ /rengs par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ ha na badzre/ ni ha na badzre/ khA da khA da badzre Na
181a3(rgyud): s+phaT ya s+pha Ta ya s+pha Ta ya/ badzre Na/ e daM gr-ih+na/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ gra sa gra sa gra sa/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ bdag dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang /
181a4(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad las srungs shig /dza ya ka ri/ dza yaM ku ru/ ta ra ta ra ta ra/ ma hA ta ra Ni/ ku Te ku Te
181a5(rgyud): ku Te| badzra ku Te swAhA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /lag na rdo rje/ legs so legs so/ /
181a6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje/ sems can chen po khyod sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / snying brtse ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
181a7(rgyud): rgyal ba can 'di su'i lag tu song ste lus la btags sam/ glegs bam du bris sam/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ gnas khang
181b1(rgyud): dam| 'chag sa na spyod par 'gyur ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas pas grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul der srung bar 'gyur
181b2(rgyud): ro| |yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs der mi ngas mi 'byung ngo / /dgra mi 'byung ngo / /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag
181b3(rgyud): khrig phrag 'bum phyi bzhin 'brang ba dang lhan cig der srung ngo / /yongs su skyob bo/ /yongs su 'dzin to/ /zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba byed do/ /chad pa spong ngo / /mtshon cha spong
181b4(rgyud): ngo / /dug gsod do/ /mi mdza' ba 'gog go /mtshams gcod do/ /sa bcing ngo / /tad+ya thA/ ta pa ni ta pa ni/ pra ta pa ni/ d+hu ru me d+hu ru ma/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Thi ta/ mu khe mu khe/ su mu khe su mu khe/
181b5(rgyud): spa la pra te/ sa mA hi te/ sa ma d+hi gar+d+he/ ma na si/ phu ru phu ru phu ru/ d+hu ru/ bud+d+ha mA na si ke swAhA/ lag na rdo rje/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'o/ /
181b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ mi'i rgyal po gang la la
181b7(rgyud): zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di glegs bam la legs par bris te 'chang ngam/ lus la btags te 'chang zhing de la spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / me tog
182a1(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub kyis bsti stang du byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ mi'i rgyal po de la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod
182a2(rgyud): sbyin phyi bzhin 'brang ba bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po de la phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
182a3(rgyud): thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed do/ /mthus yul der 'jug pa dang / bgegs 'jug na yang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bgegs sna tshogs brgya dang / bgegs sna tshogs
182a4(rgyud): stong byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags te mdun du bkur
182a5(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /gang du g.yul ngor 'jug gam/ dgra chen po dang 'thab pa der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di mgul du btags te g.yul ngor zhugs na/
182a6(rgyud): der rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi pus pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de pham par byed par 'gyur ro/ /der ni/ rgyal bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal
182a7(rgyud): bcan 'di su'i mgul du btags pa de rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lag na rdo rje/ grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du gal
182b1(rgyud): te nad 'go ba sna tshogs dang / mi ngas mi bzad ba chen po byung na/ der rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di dang / me tog sna tshogs dang / chog dang / gtor ma dang /
182b2(rgyud): bum pa btud ba sna tshogs kyis bkang ba bzhi phyogs bzhir bzhag ste rig sngags kyir gyal mo chen mo rgyal bcan 'di bklags na/ de'i tshe rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu tshogs kyi
182b3(rgyud): g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu nad 'go ba dang / mings de rab tu zhi par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
182b4(rgyud): la gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ 'di las lhag pa'i rig sngags ches stobs dang ldan pa'am/ gzi brjid che ba'am/ rdzu
182b5(rgyud): 'phrul che ba'am/ mthu che ba gang yang ma mchis so/ /rig sngags thams cad kyi mchog rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di yul gang dag tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i
182b6(rgyud): gnas de dag tu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /tad+ya thA/ badzre badzre badzre/ a mr-i ta badzre/ dz+wa li ta badzre/ hu tA sha ni/ b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza b+han dza/ dzaM b+ha/ staM b+ha ya/
182b7(rgyud): sa ma sa gra ha Ni/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ g+h+ra sa g+h+ra sa g+h+ra sa/ phaT phaT phaT/ ta Ta ta Ta ta Ta/ mu ru mu ru mu ru/ d+ha ma d+ha ma d+ha ma/ dz+wa la dz+wa la dz+wa la/ khu khu me khu khu me/ g+hi ri g+hi/
183a1(rgyud): ri g+hi ri/ badzra ma sA si/ badzra hu te/ hu ti ru/ phu ru phu ru/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba a hi te Shi naM/ nA b+hu ru Ni/ mu mu le/ badzra pra dI pa ni/ tsa ma le phu swAhA/ a yu
183a2(rgyud): bA la ni tsu tsu re swAhA/ dza ya dza ye dza ye/ dza ya saM b+ha b+ha swAhA/ dza yot+ta me swAhA/ dza ya ba re de swAhA/ dza ya la d+ha ne swAhA/ dza ya mA na si swAhA/ dza ya badzra swAhA/ dza ya ta badzra ya
183a3(rgyud): swAhA| ma hA badzra hu ta sha nA ya swAhA/ a mo g+ha badzra ha stA ya swAhA/ de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das
183a4(rgyud): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la srung ba stsal bar bgyi/
183a5(rgyud): yongs su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug dgum pa dang / mi mdza' ba dgag pa dang / dus ma yin par 'gum pa dgag
183a6(rgyud): pa dang / 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / khrag khrug dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dgag par bgyi'o/ /mtshams dgum
183a7(rgyud): par bgyi'o/ /t+d+ya thA/ dza ye dza ye dza ye/ ma hA dza ye/ mI lI mA na si/ dz+he dz+he dz+he/ mu ru mu ru/ tu Tu tu Tu/ mu mu le/ mArga ba ti/ d+hu d+hu me/ be ga be ga d+hA ri NI/ te dza ba ti/ bdag
183b1(rgyud): dang sems can thams cad 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad las srungs shig srungs shig swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs
183b2(rgyud): kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgus gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/ /tad+ya thA/ bud+d+he bud+d+he bud+d+he/ bud+d+he ba ti/ bud+d+ha a
183b3(rgyud): ba b+ha sa ni/ d+harma ba ti/ sa mA hI te/ sa mA d+hi gar+b+he/ bud+d+ha a ba b+ha sa ni/ bud+d+ha pa ri hi ri/ d+harma a ba b+ha sa ni swAhA/ su la la zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di
183b4(rgyud): las 'da' bar bgyid pa de'i mgo si ta ka'i 'bras bu bzhin du tshal pa bdun du 'gas so/ /su zhig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ mchod
183b5(rgyud): par bgyid dam/ yi ger 'bri 'am/ glegs bam la bris te grong ngam/ grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ ljongs sam/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor tam/ gtsug lag khang du 'jog
183b6(rgyud): na| der bdag tshogs kyi g.yog dang bcas shing / gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rig sngags 'dzin pa de'i slad bzhin du 'brangs te bsrung
183b7(rgyud): bar bgyi'o/ /dpag tshad brgyad stong tshun chad mtshams dgum par bgyi'o/ /slar rgol ba dang / dgra dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / 'thab
184a1(rgyud): mo dang / 'gyed pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/ /slar bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa rgyal bo chen po rnam thos kyi bu la
184a2(rgyud): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rgyal po chen po/ legs so legs so/ /sems can chen po khyod 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba
184a3(rgyud): dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir zhugs pa yang legs so/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal pa can 'dis gang yongs
184a4(rgyud): su bskyab pa dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba byas pa de'i lus la mtshon dang / dug dang / byad dang / gsod byed dang / rims dang / gdon thams cad kyis
184a5(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo
184a6(rgyud): chen mo rgyal ba can 'di zungs shig / chongs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig /lag na rdo rje/ phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i
184a7(rgyud): dus na sems can drag shul can dang ldan pa/ shin tu mi bzad pa/ mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po rnams dang / chos ma yin pa spyod pa'i rgyal po 'byung
184b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe thung ba chos ma yin pas yul 'khor skyong ba 'byung ba de'i tshe rig sngags kyir gyal mo rgyal ba can 'dis sems can mi mnyam pa dang / sems can mi
184b2(rgyud): bzad pa de dag dang / sdang ba dang / rab tu sdang ba'i sems can thams cad kyi don du 'gyur/ tshar gcod par 'gyur/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can bdud kyi
184b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mas gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ phyag rgyas btab pa'o/ /
184b4(rgyud): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rgyal ba can 'di ni/ lha thams cad kyis phyag byas pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
184b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ de'i phyir khyod kyis de
184b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / phyag rgya zhes bya bar yang zungs shig /bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms par byed pa rgyal ba can zhes bya bar yang
184b7(rgyud): zungs shig / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin
185a1(rgyud): dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la mngon bar bstod do/ /'phags ba rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs
185a2(rgyud): rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skar du/ AR+ya dza ya pa ti nA ma ma hA bid+yA rA dza/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo rgyal ba can zhes bya ba sangs rgyas
185a3(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das lus 'phags ri la bzhugs te/ de'i tshe
185a4(rgyud): 'byung po rnams 'khrugs par gyur nas ma dad pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po
185a5(rgyud): dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum rnams 'khrugs shing khros te dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen rnams dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams
185a6(rgyud): gang dag sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa de dag la gnod par byed de/ de'i tshe ku co'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs
185a7(rgyud): rje chen po'i shugs kyi sa yang dag par zin nas phyogs bzhir rnam par gzigs te/ phyogs bzhi nas glog las ser ba dang / char chen 'bab pa dang / skar mda' ltung ba
185b1(rgyud): 'ong ba gzigs so/ /gzigs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la brda mdzad do/ /de nas rdo rje 'chang gtum po khros te stan las langs nas shar phyogs su rdo rje 'bar ba stong mngon par
185b2(rgyud): sprul te 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'byung po'i tshogs rnams nga la nyon cig /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs 'di bya'o/ /da ltar
185b3(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung po gtum po mi rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog dag kyang ma rungs par byed pa gang dag 'byung ba de dag gi don gyi phyir ngas rig
185b4(rgyud): pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi rnams brjod par bya'o/ /tad+ya thA/ gi ri gi ri badzra/ ha la ha la badzra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badzra/ ha na ha na badzra/ da ha da ha badzra/ pa tsa pa tsa badzra/ sarba b+hu tA nA ma/
185b5(rgyud): b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ b+ho b+he badzra d+ha ra badzre Na/ pA ta ya pA ta ya/ shI g+h+raM shI g+h+raM/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pra ma tha/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ dz+wa la ya/ nA ga b+ha ba nAM/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/
185b6(rgyud): shar phyogs bcing bar bya'o/ /rdo rje snying po 'di byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ /su zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed pa'i mgo bo 'gas par 'gyur ro//
185b7(rgyud): snying 'gas par 'gyur ro/ /snying 'grum par 'gyur ro/ /badzrA ya swAhA/ ma hA badzrA ya swAhA/ badzra b+hai ra wA ya swAhA/ a pra ti ha ta ba la ba rA kra mo badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de
186a1(rgyud): nas rdo rje khro bo stan las langs te lho phyogs su rnam par bltas nas khros te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /
186a2(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ deng nyid lho phyogs kyi klu thams cad thal bar brlag bo/ /lus srul po thams cad kyi bar gyi gnas rnams 'bar bar bya'o/ /klu thams cad kyi
186a3(rgyud): gnas rnams dkrug par bya'o/ /yang smras pa/ gsang pa pa'i bdag po/ bdag gis rdo rje lha ma yin dang / klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad dang / mi dang
186a4(rgyud): mi ma yin gyi bar thams cad rmugs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rengs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ rmongs par byed pa'i rdo rje/ lce 'bab par byed pa'i rdo rje/ mgo 'gems par byed pa'i
186a5(rgyud): rdo rje| snying 'gas par byed pa'i rdo rje 'di lho phyogs su gzhag par bya'o/ /da ltar byung ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus na klu gnod par sems pa rnams 'dul bar 'gyur
186a6(rgyud): ro| |tad+ya thA/ sa ra sa ra/ bi sa ra bi sa ra/ A bar+d+hA ya/ saM go tsa la/ hUM hUM hUM/ d+ho na d+ho na d+ho na/ d+hu na d+hu na d+hu na/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ sarba pA she na/ mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/
186a7(rgyud): ha sa ha sa ha sa/ san trA sa ya/ sarba duSh+TA nAn badzra d+ha ra A dz+nya pa ya ti swAhA/ de nas rdo rje pho nya mos lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ /da ltar
186b1(rgyud): dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar bgyid na/ bdag gis kyang nub phyogs kyi klu thams cad nas lus srul po'i bar thams cad
186b2(rgyud): kyi gnas rnams rnam par gtor ro/ /snying rnams dgrum mo/ /tad+ya thA/ ki li ki li/ li li mi li/ tra Ta tra Ta/ b+ha Ta b+ha Ta/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ dz+wa la ya dz+wa la ya/ du ting yan sho Sha ya
186b3(rgyud): gang zhig gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag las 'gal bar byed na/ kye mdung rtse gsum pa 'bar ba 'dis de'i snying la me lce 'bar bar byed do/ /hUM hUM hUM/ badzra d+ha ri badzra Na/ b+haM dza
186b4(rgyud): b+haM dza/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ badzra dU ti rA dzA pa ya ti swAhA/ de nas lha mo chen mo rdo rje lu gu rgyud g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa stan las langs nas byang phyogs su rnam par bltas te gsang
186b5(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras sa/ /gsang ba pa'i bdag po g.yog nyi khri dang ldan pa bdag gis kyang byang phyogs kyi klu gnod par sems pa nas lus srul
186b6(rgyud): po gnod par sems pa'i bar dag la zlog par bgyid do/ /da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na gang dag sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba dang / lo tog kyang ma rungs par bgyid
186b7(rgyud): pa de dag gi don gyi slad du gsang sngags kyi gzhi mi bzad pa dag kyang brjod par bgyi'o/ /tad+ya thA/ hi li hi li/ mi li mi li/ tsi li tsi li/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hu ma d+hu ma/ d+hu na d+hu na/ ma tha
187a1(rgyud): ma tha| ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ nA sha ya nA sha ya/ ha ha ha ha ha/ badzra dU ti mo ha ya/ dzam+b+ha ya/ staM b+ha ya/ sar+b+ba nA gA nAM/ sarba a hi te Sha no/ badzra
187a2(rgyud): Ni bud+d+ha mai tri/ d+harma sa t+ye naM/ in+d+ra sa t+ye na/ in+d+ra ba le na/ lo ka pA la/ pra d+hA be na/ dzam+b+ha ya mi/ sarba nA ga na stem+b+ha yA mi/ sarba i ha te Sha no/ ba ru Na pA she na/ b+han+d+ha yA mi/
187a3(rgyud): sarba nA gA na in+d+ra tsi le na/ sarba i he he Shi Na che ga li ka ro mi/ ka ra ka ra/ ki ri ki ri/ ku ru ku ru/ badzra shriM kha le swAhA/ ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te me tog bkram
187a4(rgyud): la| a ga ru dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te kha shar phyogs su bltas la bzlas brjod brgyad stong bya'o/ /de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu las gang
187a5(rgyud): 'dod pa de bya'o/ /skud pa nag pos ni/ rims nad sel to/ /shing kA ra bI ra'i lcug mas ni/ sprin zlog go/ /chu'i nang du 'dug na ni/ dran par bya'o/ /gcan gzan khro bo'i

188a2(rgyud): pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gang gi lus la yod pa dang / glegs bam la yod par gyur ba de'i lus la phyir rgol ba rnams kyis
188a3(rgyud): dpag tshad brgya tshun chad gnod par byar mi chud do/ /mtshon dang / dug dang / dbyig dug dang / byad kyis mi tshugs so/ /mi'i bdag po de'i yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs

193b7(rgyud): bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya'i yang snying zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rma bya chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chos la
194a1(rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dgras 'jigs pa'am/ 'thab rtsod kyis 'jigs pa'am/ bgegs kyis 'jigs pa'am/

194b1(rgyud): brjod de/ gtor ma ri chen po la gtang bar bya'o/ /des thams cad zhi zhing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /rma bya'i snying po rig pa dang bcas pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/
194b2(rgyud): AR+ya a gra pra dI pa d+hA dru ra NI bid+yA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgron ma mchog gi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag

200b7(rgyud): na yang ngas ma mthong ngo / /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag ni/ gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byi
201a1(rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rdzogs pa'i rjes la rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /
201a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher rgyas par bgyi ba dang / chos smra ba de dag rjes su yongs su gzung ba dang / dam pa'i chos ci nas
201a3(rgyud): kyang yun ring du gnas pa dang / bdud thams cad tshar gcad pa'i slad du gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams rjes su stsal bar 'tshal na/ bcom ldan 'das
201a4(rgyud): kyis de la legs so/ /zhes bgyi ba gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la thugs brtse ba'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas
201a5(rgyud): gnang ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang bar rig nas ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de ni/ 'di lta
201a6(rgyud): ste/ de na D+De/ de naD+De/ ma hA naD+De/ dzam+b+ha ne/ stam+b+ha ne/ Ta Te/ Ta Ta ne/ ma hA Ta Ta ne/ kuT+Te/ kuT+Te ne/ ma hA kuT+Te ne/ d+harma le/ tsa ma le swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'di dag ni/
201a7(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i 'khor gyi tshig lta bur gda' ba lags te/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la gzungs sngags gzhi 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / bzlas te bton nas
201b1(rgyud): 'chang ba de ni/ sngon gyi las ma gtogs par gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad las 'da' ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro/ /de la ni/ dam pa'i chos
201b2(rgyud): thams cad yongs su gzung ba la yang bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur lags so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la grogs po dag /khyod bstan pa
201b3(rgyud): yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa legs so/ /legs so zhes bya ba byin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun
201b4(rgyud): dga' bo khyod kyis de dag rdzu 'phrul che bar 'gyur ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / byin che bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zungs shig /longs shig /chongs
201b5(rgyud): shig / lhogs shig /kun chub par gyis shig /gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis bzung lags
201b6(rgyud): so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgyas par bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/ /gzungs sngags kyi ni mdo sde 'di/ /sangs rgyas
201b7(rgyud): kun gyis gsungs pa ste/ /sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/ /de ni ngas kyang bshad pa yin/ /gang zhig gzungs sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'dzin tam yang na klog byed pa/ /tshe rabs
202a1(rgyud): nyi shu rtsa gcig tu/ /de ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/ /gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/ /mi min gang yang rung ba dang / /gnod sbyin grul bum srin po
202a2(rgyud): dag / nam yang bar chad mi byed do/ /gzungs sngags 'di rjod byed de la/ /'dod khams dbang phyug gang yin pa/ /sdig can bdud de nam du yang / /bar chad byed par mi
202a3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /gzungs kyi sngags 'di 'dzin byed de'i/ /pha ma dang ni phu nu dang / /sring mo mdza' bshes gnyen dag kyang / /log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de phyir gzungs
202a4(rgyud): sngags mdo sde 'di/ /'jigs pa med gang gis thos gyur nas/ /gzungs sngags 'di brjod byed pa des/ nam yang 'jigs par mi bya'o/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed de
202a5(rgyud): yis| |bskal pa bye bstod rnams su/ /sgrib pa'i las ni gang byas pa/ /zhag bdun gyis ni byang bar 'gyur/ /byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams gang / /bskal pa bye
202a6(rgyud): bar bsgrubs pa kun/ /gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin byed pa des/ /zhag bdun gyis ni zil gyis non/ /phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong ba po/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag /lus
202a7(rgyud): ngan dang ni yul 'khor srung / /mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes po/ /kha dog ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /'khor bcas blon bcas de dag kyang / /gzungs sngags 'di ni
202b1(rgyud): rjod byed pa/ /de la rtag tu srung bar byed/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang /
202b2(rgyud): 'phags pa byams pa dang / /'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri
202b3(rgyud): zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'phags ma rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma mchog gi gzungs rdzogs
202b4(rgyud): so|| / /rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya ASh+Ta de bi d+hA rA NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
202b5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yum sdig pa thams cad byang par mdzad ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad ma/ bgegs thams cad
202b6(rgyud): rab tu 'jigs par mdzad ma/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad mdzad ma/ gzungs sngags chen mo'i rgyal mo mchog 'di gsungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
202b7(rgyud): khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he bu d+hi mA ta ni/ sarba pA pa na sha ni/ gardza gardza/ b+han dza b+han dza/ marda marda/ ga ma ri ga ma ri/ ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+h+wa na sa ya bi d+h+wan
203a1(rgyud): sa ya| sarba sha truM ta ra ma ti/ bi ma le/ pU ra ya pU ra ya/ pra ti dz+nyA na/ sarba bud+d+ha baR+yu ba si ti/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ga na ga na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma sa ni/ kra
203a2(rgyud): ma Ni d+ha ba ni d+ha ba ni ra ma Ni mA tang+gi ge swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma ye shes chen por dbang bskur ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
203a3(rgyud): khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ a ma ri/ a ma ri/ ta Ta/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dz+ha dz+ha/ mi tsi mi tsi/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ dur dAn+ta da ma ka swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu
203a4(rgyud): khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ he he/ ki na de/ sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha ne ke /b+ho d+hi na dad/ trA Ta trA Ta/ hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gardza gardza/ ba ra ma ti/ bi hU ri ke swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba

203a6(rgyud): ya mA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha/ dza ni trA ye swAhA/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma tha/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ b+han dza b+han dza/ dun+tu b+hi/ sarba ni ra g+ho She/
203a7(rgyud): ha na ha na/ bi d+h+wan sa ya bi d+h+wa na sa ya/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ da ha da ha/ bi phu la ni rma la nirdza te/ A ha ra A ha ra/ gats+tsha gats+tsha/ sarba bud+d+ha paR+yu ba si ti ma/ ma bi lam+ba
203b1(rgyud): swAhA| bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ oM b+ha ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ke /pU ra ya
203b2(rgyud): pra ti dz+nyA na/ ta Ta ta Ta/ marda marda/ A ha ra A ha ra/ hUM hUM dza ti swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba
203b3(rgyud): thA| hUM hrIHsarba bud+d+ha mA ti ri/ b+han dza b+han dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma ni da ma ni/ gargA ri gargA ri hrI swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi pham zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/
203b4(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+yaHsarba thA/ trA ta trA ta/ mu hu mu hu/ sarba pA pa bi sho d+ha ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/
203b5(rgyud): sarba thA/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ mo Ta mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na nardza te swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma gdul dka' ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ ha
203b6(rgyud): ha mi hu mi hu/ da ma da ma/ khA hi khA hi/ d+hu na d+hu na/ mi tsi mi tsi/ dur tAn+ta na da ma ni swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma bdud thams cad rnam par 'joms ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs so/ /na maH
203b7(rgyud): sarba ta tha ga te b+h+yaH/ sarba mu khe b+h+yaH/ sarba thA/ mi tsi mi tsi/ gardza gardza/ spo Ta ya spo Ta ya/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs
204a1(rgyud): so| |'jam dpal/ ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gang gi lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur/ 'jigs pa dang bral
204a2(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ de gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis
204a3(rgyud): mi tshugs par 'gyur/ chom rkun gyis chom par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas gtse bar mi 'gyur/ de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung bar 'gyur/
204a4(rgyud): rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ de'i sdig pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig
204a5(rgyud): bzhin mngon du 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su zin par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur na/
204a6(rgyud): gang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mi gtong bar 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de sang na song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur
204a7(rgyud): ro| |des ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang bsrings par 'gyur/ gang zhig gnang par langs nas su/ /lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi/ /srid pa nyam ngar gang byas pa/ /sdig pa kun
204b1(rgyud): las grol bar 'gyur/ /srin po la sogs chom rkun dang / /mtshon dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing / /dus min 'chi las rab tu thar/ /rtag tu dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /'chi ba'i dus kyi
204b2(rgyud): tshe na yang / /ngan 'gro rnams las bsrings 'gyur te/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs bzung nas/ /bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur/ /de skad ces bka' stsal nas lha dang / mi dang / lha ma
204b3(rgyud): yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rang ste mngon par bstod do/ /'phags ma lha mo brgyad kyi gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo
204b4(rgyud): tsA ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ / //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+ha ra NI kalpa sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
204b5(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
204b6(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang
204b7(rgyud): bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu/ sdug bsngal ba
205a1(rgyud): nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi
205a2(rgyud): mtshan| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni/ tshe ring
205a3(rgyud): bsgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas
205a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
205a5(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te/ kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes
205a6(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te sarba
205a7(rgyud): trai lo kya pra ti bi shiSh+Ta ya bud+d+hA ya ta na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+he/
205b1(rgyud): uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga taHsu ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA mu dra man+t+ra pa daiH/ A ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yuHsan+d+ha ra NI/ sho d+ha ya
205b2(rgyud): sho d+ha ya| bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi sany+tso di te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA a wa lo ki ni/ Sha T+pA ra mi ta pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga
205b3(rgyud): tA mA te da sha b+hu mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga tA hraM da ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu de mu dre/ mahA mu dre/ badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/ ba ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ pra ti ni brta ya/ ma
205b4(rgyud): ma A yur bi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA ta/ b+hU
205b5(rgyud): ta ka Ti| pa ri shud+d+he/ bi s+phu Ta/ bud+d+he shud+d+he/ he he/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sarba bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badzre
205b6(rgyud): badzra| mahA badzra/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+ha/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wa la gar+b+he/ badzra ud b+ha be/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzre badzri Ni/ badzram+b+ha ba tu/ ma ma sha ri raM sar+b+ba satwa nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud+d+ho r+b+hab
205b7(rgyud): tu| ma sa dA sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hish+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa mA shwA sa yan+tu/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ sid+d+h+ya sid+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi me tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha
206a1(rgyud): ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+tA mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre ma hA
206a2(rgyud): mu dra man+t+ra pa daiHswAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ 'chi bdag chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig
206a3(rgyud): pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na/ mchog gi tshe dang /
206a4(rgyud): blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas pas zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun thub bo/ /lo bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun cu thub bo/ /de ltar mchog gi tshe
206a5(rgyud): 'thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcangs na/ nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /
206a6(rgyud): gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi ming dang bcas pa'i gzungs bris te tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba
206a7(rgyud): stong gi mchod pas mchod cing zla ba re re zhing brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na/ nad las grol zhing tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /nad med na/ 'dam
206b1(rgyud): bu'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o/ /yang gos gtsang ma la sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten la bris la rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi
206b2(rgyud): tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol la/ rang gi khyim du bzhag ste mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na/ rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /
206b3(rgyud): gzhan yang cho ga ni/ sa la ma lhung ba'i lci bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar po bkram ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/ a ga ru dang du ru
206b4(rgyud): ka'i bdug pa byas la/ de bzhin du dri'i chus gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol
206b5(rgyud): la| de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste g.yas pa'i lag pas phreng ba 'dzin pas/ nyi ma re re zhing nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba
206b6(rgyud): gsum 'thungs na/ nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang / ngag btsun par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /
206b7(rgyud): de'i chus khang pa dang / phyugs kyi ra ba'am/ rta'i ra ba'am/ rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na/ rkun po dang / sprul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung
207a1(rgyud): zhing / nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo la gtor na/ nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon chen po'i
207a2(rgyud): gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na/ de dang der zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /so shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na/ nad med pa dang / blo rno ba dang / tshe
207a3(rgyud): ring bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor ba gsum dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho
207a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor
207a5(rgyud): ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod rten gyi las ji ltar bgyi/ sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bgyi/
207a6(rgyud): 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba legs par smras pa ni/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/ /sems can kun la phan
207a7(rgyud): brtse'i phyir/ /'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de

214a2(rgyud): su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi Shek+Shai ra/ ma hA mu dra/ man+d+ra pa daiHA ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yuHsan+d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swa b+hA
214a3(rgyud): ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi saM tso di te/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ni/ ShaT+phA raM mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta mA te da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sar+b+ba ta
214a4(rgyud): thA ga tA hri da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ mahA mu dre/ badzra kA ya saM ha ta na/ pa ri shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he/ pra ti ni brda ya/ ma ma A yur bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba
214a5(rgyud): ta thA ga tA sa ma ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ne mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ mahA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ su ma ti/ ta thA ga tA/ b+hU ta ko Ti/ pa ri shud+d+he
214a6(rgyud): bi s+phu Ta/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ he he/ dza ya dza ya/ bi dza ya bi dza ya/ sma ra sma ra/ s+pha ra s+pha ra/ s+phA ra ya s+phA ra ya/ sar+b+ba bud+d+hA a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te/ shud+d+he shud+d+he/ bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badzre badzre
214a7(rgyud): ma hA badzre/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wA la gar+b+he/ badzra ud b+ha ba/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzre bidzrA ni/ badzram+b+ha ban+tu/ ma ma shi rI raM sarba satwA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri
214b1(rgyud): shud+d+hir b+h+ra ba tuM/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud+d+hi sh+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa ma shwa sa yan+tu/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ sid+h+ya sid+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi
214b2(rgyud): mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+tu/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa bi shud+d+he/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA hri da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+ThI te/ mu dre
214b3(rgyud): mu dre| ma hA mu dre ma hA mu dre man+d+rA pa daiHswAhA/ lha'i dbang po/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ sdig pa dang / las dang /
214b4(rgyud): sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i
214b5(rgyud): klung 'bum phrag bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye
214b6(rgyud): shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas
214b7(rgyud): dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams
215a1(rgyud): rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba dang / smad pa dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can
215a2(rgyud): lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag go / lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis gzungs 'di zungs la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig /
215a3(rgyud): bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang / kha ton du bya ba dang / bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / dran par bya ba dang / mchod pa dang / gzung ba dang / kun chub par bya ba la de sbyor bar
215a4(rgyud): gyis shig dang / de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi
215a5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad do/ /de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong
215a6(rgyud): du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bar skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
215a7(rgyud): rten dang / yi dwags kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / khyi
215b1(rgyud): dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grog sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs su phyis mi skye bar
215b2(rgyud): shes par bya'o/ /gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni/ ma gtogs so/ /de rigs chen po 'di lta ste/ bram ze'i rigs
215b3(rgyud): shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ tshong dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes da smra'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ de ltar na
215b4(rgyud): gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa chen po 'thob ste/ lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di ni/ de ltar mthu che ste/ lha'i dbang po
215b5(rgyud): gzungs 'di ni/ de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/ dge zhing shis pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam par
215b6(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs
215b7(rgyud): su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni/ 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go /lha'i dbang po/ de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o/ /'di lta ste/ dper
216a1(rgyud): na| 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ni/ dri ma med pa/ shin tu yongs su dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ de bzhin du sems
216a2(rgyud): can de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag
216a3(rgyud): tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / gdon pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub bar byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur
216a4(rgyud): ba der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag bar 'gyur/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
216a5(rgyud): mor gzhag par bya/ ri mthon po'am/ khang pa mthon po'am/ mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du gzhag par bya'o/ lha'i dbang po/ dge sbyong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge
216a6(rgyud): bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/ de dang de nye bar gnas par
216a7(rgyud): gyur na/ tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i dbang po/ sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs
216b1(rgyud): pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar 'gyur
216b2(rgyud): ro| |lha'i dbang po/ sems can de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o/ /
216b3(rgyud): lha'i dbang po/ mchod pa dang / rim gro byed cing me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / rgyan
216b4(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te gzungs 'di bzhag pa la thal mo sbyor ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/ lha'i
216b5(rgyud): dbang po/ sems can de ni/ sems can chen por rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
216b6(rgyud): mchod rten du rig par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo nam langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang / gos dang /
216b7(rgyud): rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang / bsti stang byas nas des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol
217a1(rgyud): to| |bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'di ni/ mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par
217a2(rgyud): sems can de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/ /
217a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ byas pa gzo bar bgyid cing byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
217a4(rgyud): byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang / bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/ de nas
217a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o/ /sems can tshe thung
217a6(rgyud): ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya la khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na/ nges sems can tshe zad pa de'i tshe phyir
217a7(rgyud): nur nas nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las
217b1(rgyud): yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrag par bya ste/ des ni/ de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par
217b2(rgyud): bya'o| |gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa thams cad kyis bye brag ma phye ba de yang nad de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de'i ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par
217b3(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang
217b4(rgyud): der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i dus byas pa de dag
217b5(rgyud): gi don du gzungs yungs kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de/ de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na/ de dag dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/
217b6(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ yi dwags sam/ de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las thar par 'gyur
217b7(rgyud): ro| |de dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten mang po'i mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro/ /
218a1(rgyud): tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang | mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas kyang
218a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gro par 'gyur ro/ /der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad
218a3(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing
218a4(rgyud): thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ thabs 'dis ni/ 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams
218a5(rgyud): cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar yang 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang bo/ song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan
218a6(rgyud): pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig / lha'i dbang po/ des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /
218a7(rgyud): stobs che bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la
218b1(rgyud): gzungs 'di byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun ba'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta ste/ ngan 'gro
218b2(rgyud): las ni/ yongs su thar/ bde 'gro'i lam la yang dag gnas/ tshe ring bar yang gyur nas a la la sangs rgyas/ a la la chos/ a la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung
218b3(rgyud): ste| des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar par gyur ro/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba gtsug tor rnam
218b4(rgyud): par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan
218b5(rgyud): la phab pa/ /rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya nA ma d+hA ra NI kalpaM hi ti/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya
218b6(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das tshe
218b7(rgyud): d pag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bde ba can gyi chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug khang bzang mchog na nye bar bzhugs
219a1(rgyud): so| |byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal ba nad kyis
219a2(rgyud): gzir ba tshe thung ba yod do/ /de rnams kyi phyir 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal gyi mtshan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug
219a3(rgyud): tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa ni/ tshe ring bar sgrub par byed pa'i ched du'o/ /de nas
219a4(rgyud): b yang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te thal mo sbyar bar gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
219a5(rgyud): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bde bar gshegs pas
219a6(rgyud): bstan du gsol/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs te kun tu gzigs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
219a7(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te/ sar+b+ba trai lo kya pra ti
219b1(rgyud): bi shiSh+TA ya bud+d+hA ya te nA ma/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta a ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swa b+hA pa bi shu d+d+he/ a b+hi
219b2(rgyud): Shiny+tsan+tu mAM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na/ a mr-i ta a b+hi She kai ra/ ma hA mu dra man+t+ra pa daiHA ha ra A ha ra/ ma ma A yuHsan+d+ha ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/

219b7(rgyud): bud+d+he/ badzre badzre/ ma hA badzre/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+wa la gar+b+he/ badzra ud b+hA be/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzre badzri Ni/ badzra m+b+ha ba tu ma ma sha rI raM sar+b+ba
220a1(rgyud): sa twA nAny+tsa kA ya pa ri shud+d+hir+b+ha ban+tu/ sa dA me sar+b+ba ga ti pa ri shud+d+heSh+tsa/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA sh+tsa mAM sa ma shwA sa yan+tu/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ sid+h+ya sid+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha
220a2(rgyud): ya| bi bo d+ha ya bi bo d+ha ya/ mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ sa man+ta tAM mo tsa ya mo tsa ya/ sa man+ta rasmi pa ri shud+d+he /sar+b+ba
220a3(rgyud): ta thA ga tA hri da ya a d+hiSh+ThA na a d+hiSh+Thi te/ mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre mahA mu drA man+t+ra pa daiHswAhA/ lha'i dbang po/ gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ ngan 'gro

220a5(rgyud): rgyas gang+gA'i klung 'bum phrag bye ba brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
220a6(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste/ sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang / ngan 'gror ltung ba rnams bzlog pa dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye
220a7(rgyud): gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyams bar gyur pa rnams dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor ltung ba'i
220b1(rgyud): sems can rnams rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o/ /de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal pa chung ba/ smad pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skye bar lhung ba rnams
220b2(rgyud): dang / bsam pa nyams pa dang / sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du sems can rnams la gzungs 'di dang / phyag rgya dang / sngags
220b3(rgyud): yongs su gtad pa yin no/ /de'i phyir lha'i dbang po/ khyod kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di lan gcig thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong du
220b4(rgyud): bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /skye bar skye ba sna tshogs pa sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /
220b5(rgyud): yi dwags kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi ris dang / 'di lta ste/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / brjed byed dang / khyi
220b6(rgyud): dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / bya dang / sbrang bu dang / sbrang ma dang / sdig sbrul dang / grog sbur la sogs pa srog chags kyi rigs rnams su phyis mi
220b7(rgyud): skye bar rig par bya'o/ /gzhan du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba dang / rigs chen por skye ba ste/ de la rigs chen po ni/ 'di lta
221a1(rgyud): ste| bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'am/ tshong
221a2(rgyud): dpon gyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes pa smra'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying po'i mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs su dag pa
221a3(rgyud): chen po 'thob ste/ lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di ni/ de ltar mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ mthu stobs che ba/ dge ba shis pa yin te/ lha'i dbang po/ sems can rnams kyi don gyi
221a4(rgyud): phyir gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di gzhag go / 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin tu dri ma med
221a5(rgyud): pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su dag pa 'od gsal ba ni/ 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go /lha'i dbang po/ de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o//
221a6(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser shin tu dri ma med pa/ yongs su dag pa/ shin tu mnyen pa/ shin tu sdug pa'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ de bzhin du sems can chen po de
221a7(rgyud): yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste/ tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang / bye brag tu na yi ge
221b1(rgyud): 'brir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba de 'gro ba thams
221b2(rgyud): cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya/ ri
221b3(rgyud): mthon po'am/ khang pa mthon po'am/ mchod rten gyi nang du gzhag par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ de las gzhan
221b4(rgyud): pa rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam/ de dang nye bar gnas par gyur na/ tha na de'i grib mas phog gam/ de'i rdul rlung gis btab pa
221b5(rgyud): phog na yang lha'i dbang po/ sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang / ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo / /sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /
221b6(rgyud): gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / yi dwags dang / lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar rig par bya'o/ /lha'i dbang po/ sems can de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung
221b7(rgyud): bstan cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya na/ lha'i dbang po/ shing bzo byed pa la yang phan yon chen por 'gyur na/ mchod pa dang rim
222a1(rgyud): gror byed cing / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / spos dang / rgyan
222a2(rgyud): rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang / lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas la gzungs 'di bzhag la thal mo sbyor ba'am/ phyag 'tshal ba'am/ bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te/
222a3(rgyud): lha'i dbang po/ sems can 'di ni/ sems can chen po yin par rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/ /chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o/ /de bzhin
222a4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o/ /de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje de'i nub mo de nam nangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste bcom ldan 'das la lha'i
222a5(rgyud): me tog dang / gos dang / rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang / bsti stang du byas nas des bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs
222a6(rgyud): nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'di ni/ mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das/ bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems
222a7(rgyud): can de'i slad bzhin 'brang zhing dus kun tu srung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o/ /sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o/ /bcom
222b1(rgyud): ldan 'das/ bdag ni/ byas pa gzo bar bgyid kyi/ byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom
222b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang / bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
222b3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i cho ga'i tshul bshad par bya'o/ /sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi
222b4(rgyud): bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba la khrus byas te gos gtsang ma gon nas smyung ba byas te lan stong bzlas brjod byas na/ de sems can tshe zad pa de yang phyir nur ro/ /
222b5(rgyud): nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /tha
222b6(rgyud): na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags bya'i rna lam du yang gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrag par bya ste/ des ni/ de'i ngan 'gro 'di nyid tha ma yin par rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig nad chen
222b7(rgyud): pos btab ste sman pa rnams kyis bye brag phye ste bor ba yang de ltar na nad de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de ni/ ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos nas
223a1(rgyud): kyang bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par shes par bya'o/ /de gang dang gang du skye ba de dang
223a2(rgyud): der pad+ma'i snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de
223a3(rgyud): dag gi don du gzungs 'di yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su brjod de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng na gtor na/ de dag sems can dmyal ba'am/ dud 'gro'i skye
223a4(rgyud): gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ yi dwags sam/ de las gzhan pa'i ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste/ de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de
223a5(rgyud): dag las thar nas kyang lhar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten pa chen po rnams kyis mchod pa'i
223a6(rgyud): 'os su 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /nad med par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro//
223a7(rgyud): shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa tha dad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /der yang de bzhin gshegs
223b1(rgyud): pa rnams dang 'phrad par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung ston par 'gyur ro//
223b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bcing ba ni/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo la sdigs mdzub gnyis bkug ste mthe bong gnyis dang
223b3(rgyud): sbyar la/ de nas gzungs 'di dran par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas te me tog sna tshogs bkram la sna tshogs pa'i bdug pas bdug cing pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
223b4(rgyud): btsugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dmigs la phyag bya zhing / de nas gzungs brgyad brgya bklag par bya'o/ /de ltar lan gcig bklags pa tsam
223b5(rgyud): gyis bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing bsnyen bkur dang / ri mor byas
223b6(rgyud): pa ste| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /de kun gyis kyang legs so/ /zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod par 'gyur ro/ /sems can de
223b7(rgyud): ni| de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid las skyes pa'i sras su rig par bya'o/ /sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing byang chub chen po'i sems kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa
224a1(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de la gzungs sgrub pa'i cho ga'i thabs 'dis ni/ lha'i dbang po/ 'gro ba thams cad sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan
224a2(rgyud): 'gro las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /de dag gi 'gro ba thams cad kyang yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dbang po/ song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu
224a3(rgyud): brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig / lha'i dbang po/ des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar 'gyur
224a4(rgyud): ro| |stobs che bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la
224a5(rgyud): gzungs 'di byin no/ /de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun pa'i bar du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson par byas nas de'i bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs te/

224a7(rgyud): 'jig rten du byung ste/ des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs su thar to/ /zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / lha'i bu shin
224b1(rgyud): tu brtan pa 'khor che ba rnams kyis me tog dang / dri dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gos kyi rgyan bzang po'i bla re dang / lha'i tshogs kyi

224b3(rgyud): te bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ de bzhin du ched du brjod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste chos nyan to/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das

224b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i gzungs 'di ni/ 'chi ba chen po'i dbyug pa 'dzin pa ste/ dag byed sdig pa 'joms par byed pa 'di gro ga'am gzhan zhig la bris te mchod
224b6(rgyud): rten gyi nang du bzhag la rab tu rgya che ba'i mchod pa ji ltar 'byor pas mchod de bskor ba stong phrag brgya byas na/ mchog gi tshe dang blo rno ba sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar byas pas
224b7(rgyud): zhag bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun thub bo/ /lo bdun pa'i tshe ni/ lo bdun cu thub bo/ /de ltar mchog gi tshe thob cing dran pa dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /
225a1(rgyud): mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol nas mgo la bcings na/ nad chen po las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /gos sam shing shun la gi wang gis rang gi
225a2(rgyud): m ing dang bcas par gzungs bris te tsan+dan gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten la bzhugs su gsol te rang gi khyim du bzhag la rgya che ba'i stong gi mchod pas mchod de zla ba re re zhing
225a3(rgyud): brgya phrag brgyad kyis bzlas pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga byas na/ nad las grol zhing lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/ /med na 'dam pa'i rang bzhin la yang bya'o/ /yang gos gtsang ma
225a4(rgyud): l a sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas pa'i mchod rten bris la rdo rje phreng bas bskor bas brgyan pa de'i nang du rang gi ming dang gzungs kyi tshig 'di gi wang gis bris la kham phor kha
225a5(rgyud): sbyar gyi nang du bzhugs su gsol te rang gi khyim du bzhag la mchod pa rgya chen pos mchod pa byas na/ rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang cho ga ni/ sa la ma ltung ba'i lce
225a6(rgyud): bas maN+Dal gru bzhir byas la me tog dkar por bkram ste mtshams bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la a ga ru dang du ru ka'i bdug pa byas la/ de bzhin du dri chus
225a7(rgyud): gang ba'i snod me tog dkar pos brgyan te gzungs kyi snying po can gyi mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs dbus su bzhugs su gsol la/ de la g.yon pa'i lag pas reg ste
225b1(rgyud): g.yas pa'i lag pa phreng ba 'dzin pas nyi ma re re zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig dus gsum du bzlas pa byas la de'i chu khyor ba gsum 'thungs na/ nad med pa dang / tshe ring ba
225b2(rgyud): dang / dgra yongs su nyams pa dang / 'dzin blo rno ba dang / ngag btsun par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba nas skye bar skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /de'i chus khang pa dang / phyugs kyi ra ba'am/ rta'i ra
225b3(rgyud): ba'am| rgyal po'i khab tu gtor na/ rkun ma dang / sprul dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung zhing nad kyis yongs su gdungs par mi 'gyur ro/ /mgo
225b4(rgyud): la gtor na/ de nad de las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar tshe dpag tu med pa'i phan yon che ba'i gzungs 'di gang dang gang du rab tu sbyar na/ de dang de ru zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /sa
225b5(rgyud): shing la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas te 'chos na/ nad med pa dang / blo rno ba dang / tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /chu khyor ba gsum la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig
225b6(rgyud): yongs su bzlas te 'thungs na/ nad thams cad las yongs su grol zhing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
225b7(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pa la bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos mchod
226a1(rgyud): rten gyi las ji ltar bya/ sku gzugs la sogs pa sgrub pa ji ltar bya/ 'dir sbyin sreg kyang ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri
226a2(rgyud): ba legs par smras pa ni/ /dpa' bo chen po legs so legs/ /sems can kun la phan brtse'i phyir/ /'dir ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kun
226a3(rgyud): t u 'od dpag tu med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshe dpag tu med pa ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di
226a4(rgyud): gsungs pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ oM a mi te/ a mi tod b+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha we/ a mi ta bi krAn+te/ a mi ta gA dre/ a mi ta gA mi ni/ a mi ta A yurda de/ ga ga na kIrti ka re/
