226a6(rgyud): rdzogs par bya'o/ /'di'i cho ga ni/ mchod rten cho ga mchog gyur pa/ /de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ /gser dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / pad+ma rA ga la sogs pa'i rang
226a7(rgyud): bzhin mang ba'i rin po ches spras pa'i sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad pad+ma'i steng na bzhugs pa/ de'i logs bzhir 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi lag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o/ /me
226b1(rgyud): tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri lag na bzung ba'i gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lag na gdugs bsnams pa dang / g.yas dang g.yon gyi logs
226b2(rgyud): gnyis na spyan ras gzigs dang / rdo rje 'chang gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa gnyis bya'o/ /de lta bu'i cho gas mchod rten la g.yas bskor gyi sbyor bas pad+ma'i 'dab
226b3(rgyud): ma la bri bar bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs bris la de'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can du byas te/ dri zhim po dang bsres
226b4(rgyud): pa'i chus gtor zhing dri zhim po'i me tog gis mchod la/ stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas te dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes brgyad kyi nyin zhag la smyung bar gnas shing / sems
226b5(rgyud): can thams cad la phan pa'i blos tshe dang blo ster ba'i yon byin te stong phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ /zla ba re re zhing byas na/ zla ba drug gis tshe lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu
226b6(rgyud): lo gcig tu byas na tshe lo 'bum thub par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu byas na/ tshe lo mi zad pa thub cing stobs dang ldan pa dang / gang gis kyang mi thub cing lha dang lha ma yin dang mi mnyam
226b7(rgyud): pa'i mkha' spyod kyi gtsug tor mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang cho ga ni/ rab tu dge ba'i gnas su sa blangs la dri zhim pos bsres la mchod rten bya'o/ /stong phrag gcig
227a1(rgyud): nas brtsams te ji srid la'am gcig gi bar du'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing mchod rten du gtogs pa gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba yang dag par bzhugs
227a2(rgyud): su gsol la/ ji skad gsungs pa'i mchod pa rgya chen po byas la stong phrag gcig nas brtsams te lan bdun gyi bar du bklag par bya'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing tshe dang blo ster bar
227a3(rgyud): byed pa'i gzungs kyi ched du byas te/ sems can thams cad la thun mong du dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can rnams la bcing ba dang brdung ba la sogs pa spang
227a4(rgyud): bar bya'o/ /zla ba gzhan re re la mchod pa nyis 'gyur du byas la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa bya ba ni/ rang ngam rang dang 'dra bas bya'o/ /cho ga 'dis ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba
227a5(rgyud): brgyad med par 'gyur ro/ /blo rno ba dang / nad med pa dang / tshe lo brgya thub cing 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du 'ong ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus
227a6(rgyud): byed pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus por te mdzes pa'i lus bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang de nyid dmyal ba dang /
227a7(rgyud): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten ngan 'gror skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rna ba'i bug par dmyal ba'i sgra yang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par lta ga la 'gyur/
227b1(rgyud): 'di rnams kyi gnas su 'gro ba med do/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag tu med pas gzhan yang sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ gang gis sems can tshe dpag tu med par
227b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / nyam nga ba'i 'khor ba las grol bar byed pa ni/ gzhon nu mas bkal ba'i skud pa tshad dang ldan pa mdzes pa'i ras mkhas pas bya'o/ /de nas gtsug tor rnam par
227b3(rgyud): rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs tshon sna ma lus pas gzungs kyi yi ge las sprul pa'i mchod rten gyi nang du bri bar bya'o/ /tshe dpag tu med pa 'od zer stong gi phreng ba can pad+ma dang zla
227b4(rgyud): ba'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bu'i 'od can/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ g.yas pa'i zhal zhi ba
227b5(rgyud): gser gyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni/ mche bas ma mchu mnan pa mi bzad pa ut+pa la sngon po'i 'od zer gyi 'od dang ldan pa'o/ /dbus ma ni/ sgeg pa dang bcas
227b6(rgyud): shing dkar po'o/ /g.yas pa'i phyag gis snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje'o/ /de bzhin du pad+ma la gnas pa'i 'od dpag tu med pa dang / mda' dang mchog sbyin pa'o/ /g.yon du sdigs
227b7(rgyud): mdzub dang bcas pa'i zhags pa dang / de bzhin du gzhu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / bum pa'o/ /yang mgo bor mchod rten la gnas pa'i oM dang / mgrin par AHdang / snying gar hUM ngo //
228a1(rgyud): dpral bar traM ngo / /lte ba'i phyogs su hrIH'o/ /rkang pa gnyis la aM aHyi ge 'di rnams bkod la rak+Sha swAhA dang bcas pa 'di'i nang du rang gi ming dang
228a2(rgyud): spel ba'o/ /de'i logs gnyis su pad+ma dang / rdo rje 'chang gi gnyis rnga yab dkar po phyag na bsnams pa'o/ /steng du bdud rtsi'i char gyi rgyun 'bebs bzhin pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i
228a3(rgyud): bu gnyis so/ /logs bzhir khro bo mi g.yo ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang / dbyug pa sngon po can dang / stobs po che zhes bya ba ste/ ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / dbyug pa dang /
228a4(rgyud): rdo rje bsnams pa'o/ /g.yon pa ni/ gdug pa can 'jigs pa'i sdigs mdzub phyed du byed pa'o/ /de ltar 'bad pas rdzogs par byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod
228a5(rgyud): rten de la smyung bar gnas pas mchod pa chen po stong phrag gcig gis mchod pa byas la 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas dkar po'i phyogs kyi tshes gcig nas
228a6(rgyud): bzung ste ji srid bco lnga'i bar du stong stong bzlas pa bya'o/ /de nas snga bar nam nangs pa dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas ji ltar dngos grub 'dod pa
228a7(rgyud): ster ro| |yang na ni/ thang ga de dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i chus byugs pa'i phyogs gcig tu yang dag par bzhugs su gsol la mchod pa rgya chen po bya zhing nyi ma re re zhing brgyad
228b1(rgyud): brgya bzlas pa bya'o/ /yang zla ba re re la stong stong gi mchod pa bya zhing stong stong gi bzlas pa byas na/ tshe dpag tu med pa dang / stobs dpag tu med pa gnon pa dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba
228b2(rgyud): dang / nad chen po med par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyi nyi ma re re tshigs bcad stong 'dzin pa'i phyin ci ma log pa'i ngag tu 'gyur ro/ /yang na kha cig gis de lta bu byed par mi
228b3(rgyud): nus na/ de'i sa rang gi khyim du dri zhim po dang bsres pa'i sa'i char bzhugs su gsol la/ ji ltar 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas la zla ba 'ong ngo cog gi tshes brgyad la brgyad brgya'i bzlas pa
228b4(rgyud): bya zhing nyi ma re re dus gsum du nyi shu rtsa gcig rtsa gcig brjod na/ blo rno ba dang / tshe ring ba dang / shes rab dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / skyid pa dang / lo brgya 'tsho ba dang / skye ba
228b5(rgyud): dran par 'gyur ro/ /yang na rang gis ma nus na/ de'i tshe rang dang 'dra bas byas na tshe ring ba dang / blo rno bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi cho ga sems can thams cad la
228b6(rgyud): phan pa'i phyir nye bar bshad par bya ste/ khru gang gi tshad kyi thab khung zlum po rdo rje'i phreng bas brgyan pa/ tsan+dan dkar po'am sa dkar gyis byugs la me tog dkar po bkram ste
228b7(rgyud): logs bzhir zhun mar gyi mar me bzhi bzhag la/ bdug spos la sogs pas yang dag par mchod la phyogs bzhir mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa rab tu mdzes pa gos dkar pos
229a1(rgyud): g.yogs pa yal gas kha brgyan pa dgod par bya'o/ /'o ma can gyi yam shing la me sbar la der me lha bkug ste dgang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor byas
229a2(rgyud): te gshegs su gsol lo/ /de nas tshe dpag tu med pa gsal por thab khung gi dbus su bsams la gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bzlas shing dgang blugs gsum dbul lo/ /yang

229a5(rgyud): 'dod pas sbyin sreg byas na/ mchog gi tshe ring ba dang / blo rno ba sbyin par byed do/ /sems can rnams la smad par mi bya'o/ /cho ga 'dis rang gi lus nad kyis gos par mi 'gyur

229a7(rgyud): chen por 'gyur ro/ /de nas gzhan yang sgrub par 'dod na/ gtsug tor gyi rgyal po chen po tshe dang blo rno ba dang bcas par 'bum phrag gcig sbyin sreg byas na/ dang po dang mthar

229b7(rgyud): pa la yang bsgrub par bya'o/ /de ltar phan yon dpag tu med pa'i gzungs chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa/ mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba 'di ji lta ji
230a1(rgyud): ltar sbyar ba de lta de ltar las 'grub par byed do/ /gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyi ma
230a2(rgyud): re re la dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa bya zhing / mchod rten chen po byas te yang dag par bcangs la gzhan la yang rgya cher gsal bar byas na/ de skyid pa thob cing stobs
230a3(rgyud): dang ldan pa dang / nad med pa dang / lo brgya thub pa dang / blo rno ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i tshe sbrul shun pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar rang gi lus
230a4(rgyud): bor te bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dmyal ba'i sgra rna bug tu yang thos par mi 'gyur na/ 'bras bu smin par ltag la 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang de

230b3(rgyud): d pag tu med pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i phug chen po'i khang bzang gi tshal bde ba la nye bar bzhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
230b4(rgyud): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu/ sems can sdug bsngal dang nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir cing tshe thung ba yod de/ de rnams kyi don du tshe ring bar nye bar

231a2(rgyud): kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di bka' stsal to/ /oM na mo b+ha ga ba te/ sar+b+ba trai lokya pra ti biSh+TI ya/ bud+d+hA ya te na maH/ tad+ya thA/ oM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha
231a3(rgyud): ya bi shod+ha ya/ a sa ma sa man+ta ba b+hA sa s+pha ra Na ga ti/ ga ga na swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu maM/ sarba ta thA ga tA/ su ga ta ba ra ba tsa nA mr-i tA b+hi She kairma hA mu dra man+d+ra pa daiH/ A ha ra A ha ra/
231a4(rgyud): ma ma A yuHsan+d+hA ra Ni/ sho d+ha ya shod+ha ya/ bi sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/ ga ga na swA b+hA ba bi shud+d+he/ uSh+NI Sha bi dza ya pa ri shud+d+he/ sa ha sra rasmi saM tso de te/ sarba ta thA ga tA ba lo ki ni/ ShaT pA ra
231a5(rgyud): mi tA pa ri pU ra Ni/ sarba ta thA ga ta mA de/ da sha b+hU mi pra tiSh+Thi te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hri da yA d+hiSh+Tha na d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu dre mu dre/ ma hA mu dre badzra gA ya sa ha ta na pa ri shud+d+he/ sarba karma A wA ra Na bi shud+d+he/
231a6(rgyud): pra ti ni bar+t+ta ya ma mA yurbi shud+d+he/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma yA d+hiSh+Tha na d+hiSh+Thi te/ oM mu ni mu ni/ ma hA mu ni/ bi mu ni bi mu ni/ ma hA bi mu ni/ ma ti ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ ma ma ti/ ma ma ti/ ma hA ma ti/ su ma ti

231b1(rgyud): shud+d+he| bud+d+he bud+d+he/ badzre badzre/ mahA badzre/ su badzre/ badzra gar+b+he/ dza ya gar+b+he/ bi dza ya gar+b+he/ badzra dz+we la gar+b+he/ badzrod+b+ha be/ badzra saM b+ha be/ badzra badzri Ni/ badzra m+b+ha ban+tu/ me sha rI raM sarba satwA nany+tsa/ kA ya pa

232b5(rgyud): rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / nub tu nyon mongs pa rab tu 'joms pa'i gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i lha mo dang / byang du phung po'i nad rab tu 'joms pa'i

233a2(rgyud): bsti stang chen po'i mchod pa byas nas tshig gzhan mi smra ba'i dam bca' 'dzin pa'i chos smra ba rnams kyis gzungs 'di bklag par bya'o/ /lan re re zhing mchod rten gyi dbur

233a6(rgyud): lo bdun pa'i tshe ni/ de ltar tshe mchog 'thob cing nad las rnam par grol nas lo brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba yang thams cad du rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /de lta
233a7(rgyud): bu'i nye bar spyod pa'i rim pa las gzhan du byas na/ des 'grub pa ma yin no/ /rab tu byed pa dang po'o// //rtog pa 'di yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen sdom brtson
233b1(rgyud): dam pa 'dul ba'i gtsug lag la zla med par smra ba ne'u mkhan po'i gsung bzhin du/ mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba gnas brtan dpal nyi ma rgyal mtshan bzang pos dpal thar pa gling gi
233b2(rgyud): gtsug lag khang du rang gis bsgyur ba'o/ / //rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta uSh+NA Shi bi dza ya nA ma d+ha ra NI kalpa sa hi ta/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
233b3(rgyud): gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rtog pa dang bcas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
233b4(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa bde ba can gyis chos yang dag par sdud pa'i khang bzang mchog na nye
233b5(rgyud): bar bzhugs so/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la nye bar gzigs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa/ kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
233b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sdug bsngal pa nad kyis yongs su gzir ba'i sems can tshe thung ba rnams yod de/ de rnams kyi phyir sems can thams cad la kun tu gzigs pa'i mtshan
233b7(rgyud): gyi dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di nyid 'chang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir

271a1(rgyud): ba phrag stong dang ldan pa/ lha'i bu mo khri brgyad stong gis bskor ba/ lha'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i rtsig pa brtsigs

271a4(rgyud): sgo bzhi dang ldan pa'i khang bzang gi nang na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor zhing rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal gyis dregs te snyems shing nyal lo/ /de nas nam phyed tsam na lha'i bu de gnyid

271a6(rgyud): gnas pa des lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa de la bskul ba/ kye nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa longs longs/ khyod gnyid la dga' zhing chags pas ci zhig bya/ dga' ba
271a7(rgyud): la goms par byed cing chags par gnas pas ci zhig bya/ lha'i longs spyod dpag tu med pa la spyod pas ci zhig bya/ da ste zhag bdun 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/ lha'i
271b1(rgyud): longs spyod dang bral zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi gnas gzhal med khang dam pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa ci dgos/ khyod kyi srog ni yong med kyi/ /

272a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi gtso bo skar mda' gdong gis bsgo ba thos nas bdag dgung bdun na 'gum pa'i dus bgyid do zhes mchi zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i tshor ba soms shig

272a7(rgyud): tu sdug bsngal bas lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ /lha'i bu/ ma 'jigs shig /gang gis 'chi bdag pham par 'gyur zhing / sems can dmyal ba'i

278a1(rgyud): 'das ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa chen po byas te lan brgya stong du bskor ba byas nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir de
278a2(rgyud): nyid du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go / de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po
278a3(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ sug las gang
278a4(rgyud): gis lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa la mi zad cing shin tu tsha ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
278a5(rgyud): skyes bu dam pa dag /legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa dag /legs par dris so/ /de'i phyir nyon cig dang bshad par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ sngon byung ba 'das
278a6(rgyud): pa'i dus na lho phyogs kyi rgyud na yangs pa 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer yod de/ de na bram ze dri ma med pa zhes bya ba mkhas pa/ byang ba/ gsal ba/ yid gzhungs pa/
278a7(rgyud): gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa/ mdog bzang po/ rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/ dad pa dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bsam pa can rig pa smra ba zhig gnas te/
278b1(rgyud): de rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di rjes su sems shing sgom la mang du byed/ sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod do/ /de nas grong khyer de nyid na khyim bdag rab snang zhes
278b2(rgyud): bya ba phyug pa/ nor che ba/ longs spyod che ba/ g.yog 'khor mang ba zhig gnas te/ khyim bdag de ni/ dad pa dang mi ldan zhing / gzhan mu stegs can la dang do/ /bram ze de
278b3(rgyud): ni| khyim bdag de la yang dang yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di snying po dang bcas pa sgrog kyang khyim bdag de ni/ de la dad pa'i sems mi skyed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/
278b4(rgyud): ngas bram ze 'di dum bu dum bur gtubs la nya dang / rul sbal sreg pa bzhin du bor te khar ngan skyug gis dgang ngo snyam mo/ /de nas 'di snyam du bsam ma thag tu khyim
278b5(rgyud): bdag de la sha bkra dang / mdze'i nad kyis btab bo/ /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas 'chi gar sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chen po myong ste shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po
278b6(rgyud): mnar med par skyes te/ der bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ngo / /de nas shi 'phos nas nya dang / phag dang / rus sbal gyi nang du bskal par sdug bsngal myong
278b7(rgyud): ngo / /de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sems can dmyal ba thig nag tu skyes te/ der yang bskal pa'i tshad du sdug bsngal chen po myong ngo / /de nas shi 'phos nas grong khyer
279a1(rgyud): de nyid du dmus long gi khyim du skyes te/ dmus long du gyur nas phan tshun du slong mo la song ba dang / gtsug lag khang zhig tu phyin pa dang / de na dge
279a2(rgyud): slong snying rje la gnas pa zhig 'dug ste/ des de mthong nas byams pas rgyas par byas te zan byin no/ /rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di yang bsgrags so/ /dmus long des
279a3(rgyud): gzungs sngags 'di thos pa dang tshe rabs dran par gyur nas bram ze de yang dran te/ rjes su sems shing / kye ma'o/ /mi bzad pa'i las byas so/ /snyam nas ngo tsha dang
279a4(rgyud): khrel yod par gyur te 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang du skyes te gzhal med khang chen po'i nang na lha'i bu mo'i
279a5(rgyud): tshogs kyis bskor cing lha'i longs spyod chen po myong bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe de'i dus na khyim bdag dmus long du gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod dogs shing the
279a6(rgyud): tshom za ba'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na/ de ltar mi blta ste/ lha'i bu nor bu'i snying po dri ma med pa 'di nyid do/ /lag na rdo rje/ de lta bas na/ sdom pa gsum gyis
279a7(rgyud): bsdam par bya'o/ /lag na rdo rje/ las des 'bras bu rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba 'di lta bu myong ngo / /lha'i bu 'dis byang chub kyi snying por mthar thug gi bar du
279b1(rgyud): las kyi 'bras bu tha ma 'di myong ngo / /lag na rdo rje/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dri ma med par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs shing the tshom mam/ yid gnyis su gyur na/
279b2(rgyud): de ltar mi lta ste/ lag na rdo rje/ khyod nyid do/ /dmus long la gzungs sngags 'di sgrog pa'i dge slong de ni/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na dge
279b3(rgyud): slong du gyur to/ /de nas lha'i 'khor mang po des sngon byung ba 'di thos nas rmad du byung bar gyur/ dga' ba thob par gyur te ca co dang ga zha'i sgra chen po byung nas a la la de bzhin
279b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dam tshig rig sngags 'di'i mthu ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu'o zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ /de nas 'khor de las lha'i bu khri nyis stong ni/ phyir
279b5(rgyud): mi ldog par gyur to/ /lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag 'bum ni/ bud med kyi dbang po dang bral nas skyes pa'i dbang po byung ste phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas so/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la
279b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ gzungs kyi tshig rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/ mthu che ba/ phan yon che ba lags so/ /
279b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ ji ltar slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing gang gis sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas yongs su
280a1(rgyud): grol bar mdzad pa'i cho ga bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje/ gzungs sngags 'di'i phan yon dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga
280a2(rgyud): 'di nyon cig/ 'di ltar phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen mas rig sngags
280a3(rgyud): kyi rgyal mo 'di dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/ /ring bsrel gyi snying po'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po can gyi mchod rten la bskor bar bya'o/ /yid
280a4(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang dus gcig tu dran par bya'o/ /des ni/ gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
280a5(rgyud): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams kyang yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sems
280a6(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song rnams las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi pags pa brjes
280a7(rgyud): pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /phyin chad mngal gyi gnas kyi dri mas mi gos par 'gyur ro/ /gang dang
280b1(rgyud): gang du skye ba de dang der rdzus te skye zhing pad+ma las skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta 'dod par
280b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gal te cho ga bya bar 'dod na/ des khrus byas la gos gsar pa bgos te spos kyi dkyil 'khor
280b3(rgyud): gru bzhi pa bya'o/ /snying po'i rig sngags gro ga la bri bar bya'o/ /mchod rten lnga gdab par bya'o/ /rig sngags 'di yang mchod rten gyi nang du gzhug par bya'o/ /mchod rten bzhi ni
280b4(rgyud): gra bzhir gzhag go / gcig ni/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o/ /shing bu btsugs te ba ngan dmar po dbyang bar bya'o/ /me tog gis gtor ro/ /bum pa gang ba
280b5(rgyud): lnga gzhag go/ gra bzhin pog phor bzhi nas du ru ka dang / a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / gu gul gyi bdug pas bdug par bya'o/ /spos kyi mchod yon gyi snod bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /
280b6(rgyud): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'di gnyis kyang lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /snying po'i sngags brjod cing dkyil 'khor la bskor ba brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o/ /nad kyis
280b7(rgyud): btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / nad tshabs che ba dang / tshe zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa dang / rgyal po dang / pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis skrag pa dang /
281a1(rgyud): bu 'dod pa dkyil 'khor la mngon par phyogs par gzhag go /rma bya'i sgro lngas bya ba par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi dkyil 'khor mchod par bya'o/ /cho ga
281a2(rgyud): 'di lan gcig byas na/ bskal par bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa dang bral nas sgrib pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / sems
281a3(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi ngan song thams cad dang / 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /'jig
281a4(rgyud): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sdug bsngal dang / sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang / gdug pa thams cad tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de byang chub kyi snying po'i
281a5(rgyud): mthar thug gi bar du rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /tshe zad pa yang phyir nur zhing tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /yun ring du nad kyis brnyongs te sha zad pa yang lus yongs su
281a6(rgyud): rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /lus shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa yang yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /phyin chad 'chi bdag gi sgo'i sdug

281b1(rgyud): gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /skye ba thams cad du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /'di'i
281b2(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bzhin du nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam
281b3(rgyud): par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod cho ga bzhin du lo gcig tshang bar byas na/ 'jigs pa med pa'i lta ba kun nas sgo'i 'od zer zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/ /
281b4(rgyud): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ces bya ba'i lus
281b5(rgyud): yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang+gA'i klung bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs
281b6(rgyud): pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rnams su yang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang
281b7(rgyud): gang du 'gro 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas skal ba mnyam pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar
282a1(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /'chi bdag gi sgo mi mthong zhing rmi lam lta bur kun tu shes so/ /tshes brgyad dam/ bcu bzhi'am/ bco lnga la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin

282a3(rgyud): gyis 'phral du mchod rten la sgra 'byung ste/ lags so zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /'phral du sdig pa'i sgrib pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'dod chags

282a7(rgyud): khyi dang / rus sbal dang / sbrul dang / byi la dang / sre mo dang / srog chags sna tshogs la smras na yang thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /bye ma la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
282b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas te dur khrod du gtor na/ gang gi rus pa la phog pa de dag sems can dmyal ba gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der yongs su thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro//

282b3(rgyud): 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /ri la gtor na ri dwags dang / bya rgyu ba de dag thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /kun nas sgor 'jug pa'i 'od zer gtsug tor dri ma med par snang
282b4(rgyud): ba dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dag mnar med par lhung nas gdung bas bsregs pa
282b5(rgyud): las 'phral du yongs su thar par 'gyur ro/ /lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ gal te 'gul nas thag pa btags te khrid pa yang gshin rje'i gnas nas 'phral du ldog par

282b7(rgyud): rje yang bran bzhin du sems shing 'jug go / lus bsam gtan gyi lam bzhin nam/ sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa bzhin du lus bor nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du mngon
283a1(rgyud): par dga' zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /'chi bdag gi sdug bsngal mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'bum bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug na/ 'bum tshang nas

283a3(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /
283a4(rgyud): de nas mchod rten chen po gcig gi nang du bcug ste shing bu bsgreng ba byas na/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po 'bum gyi mchod rten zhes bya'o//

283a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa rnams dang / gzhan yang srog chags kyi rigs sna tshogs gang dag der 'dod pa de dag kyang phyir mi ldog par
283a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /tha na grib mas phog na yang yongs su grol bar 'gyur na/ bya ba mang du byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ 'di'i yon tan dang phan yon ni/ brjod par mi nus so//

284b1(rgyud): dang mkhris pa 'dres pa dang / gzhang 'brum gyis btab pa dang / gzhan nad can dang / za gu dang / lud pa can dang / rims nad can dang / klad pa na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na

284b6(rgyud): bde bar zhu bar gyur cig swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de de dag yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par
284b7(rgyud): bstod do/ /'phags pa nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa 'od dpag med
285a1(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ i li mi ti me le/ ha ne su ha ne/ che ge mo zhig dz+wa ra ban+d+ha me/ e ka hi ka na/ tri hi kaM tsaM tu rtsa ka na/ sni t+ya dz+wa ra na swAhA/
285a2(rgyud): cho ga ni/ 'di bris te mgul du btags na/ rims nad med par byed do/ /rims nad zhi ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya dz+wa ra pra sha ma ni nA ma
285a3(rgyud): d+h+wa ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa ces bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

292a1(rgyud): gos| |thams cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin gdon/ /thams cad ma lus dga' bar mdzad/ /nad dang rims dang dal ka yams/ /bsrung
292a2(rgyud): ba'i las mdzad phyag 'tshal bstod/ /bdag la bsrung ba mdzad du gsol/ /mi gtsang ba rnams gtsang bar mdzad/ /sme ba rnams ni mi smer mdzad/ /lci ba rnams ni yang bar mdzad/ /dog
292a3(rgyud): pa yangs par mdzad la bstod/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs khyed/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs/ /gang dag khyed la mos rten rnams/ /lus bde sems bde dbang po bde/ /bde ba'i
292a4(rgyud): lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus dag sems dag dbang po dag /dag pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus gtsang sems gtsang dbang po gtsang / /gtsang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus dang sems dang
292a5(rgyud): dbang po dang / /dang ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lus gsal sems gsal dbang po gsal/ /gsal ba'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lha klu yi dwags 'dre srin sogs/ /gnod sbyin 'byung pos 'di
292a6(rgyud): thos na/ /sdug bsngal zhi nas bde bar 'gyur/ /gangs rgyud bzhin du dkar par 'gyur/ /shel dkar bzhin du gtsang bar 'gyur/ /me long bzhin du gsal bar 'gyur/ /nam mkha' bzhin du dang bar
292a7(rgyud): 'gyur/ /sa dang mkha' la 'khod pa yi/ /lha klu la sogs sde brgyad kun/ /dge ba'i bsams pas 'khod 'gyur te/ /gzhan la ma gnod zhi bar mdzod/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sme brtsegs la bstod
292b1(rgyud): pa'i sngags dang bcas pa rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ AR+ya rasmi bi ma le bi shud+d+he pra b+ha NA nA ma d+ha ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'od zer dri ma med pa rnam par dag pa'i 'od
292b2(rgyud): ces bya ba'i gzungs/ /sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen
292b3(rgyud): po ser skya'i gnas kyi pho brang gi 'khor gyi khyams chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu
292b4(rgyud): bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / lag na rdo rje dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
292b5(rgyud): phyug dang / 'jam dpal dang / shes rab 'od dang / byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa rnams dang / lha dang / klu dang /
292b6(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na ma mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa la sogs pa grangs med pas bcom
292b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la zhe sar byas/ ri mor byas/ bkur stir byas te yongs su bskor ba la chos ston cing bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe ser skya'i grong khyer na gnas pa bram ze chen po
293a1(rgyud): ser skya'i zla ba zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan pa la yid mi ches shing log par lta ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig gi tshe/ gzhan
293a2(rgyud): zhig gi rmi ltas su rmis te bstan pa/ bram ze chen po/ khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ba thos nas bram ze de shin tu yang mi dga' ste
293a3(rgyud): 'jigs skrag nas yid la bsam pa/ de bdag gi srog gi skyabs su la btsal bar bya/ yang dge sbyong gau ta ma thams cad mkhyen pa rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa zhig yin no
293a4(rgyud): zhes grags na/ bdag de'i gnas su song ste/ de thams cad mkhyen pa yin yang dag na/ de 'jigs pas nyam thag par 'gyur ba'i skyabs mdzad pa'i chos phyir ston
293a5(rgyud): gor ma chag go snyam bsam nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gan du song ba dang / rgyang ring po nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong nas
293a6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la zhu bar ma spobs te sems shing 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dus gsum mkhyen pa/ thams cad gzigs
293a7(rgyud): pa| sgrib pa mi mnga' bas bram ze'i bsam pa mkhyen nas byams pa'i thugs kyis brtse bar dgongs te bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po/ khyod da ste zhag bdun na 'chi
293b1(rgyud): ba'i dus byas nas ngan song ngan 'gro mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang rim gyis sems can dmyal ba chen po bcu drug tu kha brgyud de skye bar
293b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /de las thar nas kyang rigs ngan shan pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas shi 'phos nas yang phag gi lus su skye bar 'gyur te/ rtag tu ngan skyug mi
293b3(rgyud): gtsang ba za zhing 'dab rdzab kyi nang du yang yun ring du gnas te rgyun du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas gal te mi'i lus thob na yang shin tu dbul ba dang / mi
293b4(rgyud): gtsang ba dang / dri nga ba dang / mdog mi sdug cing nag pa dang / lus ring cing nyam chung ba dang / mdze nad can du 'gyur te/ skye bo yongs la mi sdug cing rtag tu bkres pas nyam
293b5(rgyud): thag pa| skye bo yongs kyi smad pa/ rtag par brdeg btsog bya zhing shin tu sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bka' stsal pa de thos nas bram za de shin tu 'jigs skrag ste
293b6(rgyud): yid gdungs pas dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ sems
293b7(rgyud): can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs mdzad pa lags na/ bdag ni/ sdig pa'i las thams cad 'chags te/ deng slan chad bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du bgyid na/
294a1(rgyud): bdag ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sdug bsngal las skyabs mdzad par gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
294a2(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze chen po/ khyod song la grong khyer ser skya'i lam gyi sum mdo na mchod rten ring bsrel can rnying pa ral pa zhig yod pa de slar brtsigs te mchod rten
294a3(rgyud): gyi rtse mor srog shing btsugs la gsang sngags yi ger bris pa de'i nang du bcug ste mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags lan bdun bton na/ khyod kyi tshe yang phyir nur te 'phel
294a4(rgyud): bar 'gyur la/ 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bde 'gro mtho ris kyi gnas longs spyod che ba rnams su skye ste/ bskal pa stong phrag brgya'i bar du bde ba'i longs spyod kyang
294a5(rgyud): phyir 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ de nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya stong du mar
294a6(rgyud): bde ba chen po myong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas yang shi 'phos nas rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams kyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur te/ der yang bskal pa chen po stong phrag brgya'i bar du
294a7(rgyud): bde ba'i longs spyod mi zad pa myong bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs gang du skyes pa'i gnas kun tu yang yid gzhungs shing tshe'i bar chad med pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad
294b1(rgyud): nas nam du yang sems can dmyal bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnams dang phrad cing rjes su dgongs par mdzad do/ /bram ze chen po/
294b2(rgyud): gzhan yang dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la tshe thung ba'am/ nad mang pa zhig yod na/ des mchod rten rnying pa
294b3(rgyud): bcos sam/ gsar du brtsigs kyang rung ste/ gsang sngags 'di bris la nang du gzhug nas dkyil 'khor byi don byas te mchod na/ de dag gi yon tan ni/ tshe zad pa yang tshe slar nur zhing
294b4(rgyud): ring ba dang / nad kyis btab cing sdug bsngal ba yang nad do cog las thar pa dang / nam du yang ngan song ngan 'gros sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
294b5(rgyud): 'jig rten du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ de dag gi sgra rna lam du yang grag par mi 'gyur na/ de dag tu skye ba lta ci smos/ de nas bram ze des de skad thos nas shin tu yid rangs te mchod rten
294b6(rgyud): zhig pa bcos par bsam nas de 'khor de nas langs te song ngo / /de'i tshe 'khor de nyid na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya
294b7(rgyud): ba zhig stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di ji lta bur bgyis na/ yon tan dang /
295a1(rgyud): legs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur/ da skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang sngags chen po rnams kyi
295a2(rgyud): mchog / bdag nyid che ba/ dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'di dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga bzhin byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis
295a3(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro/ /la la zhig gis gsang sngags 'di thos na/ mtshams med pa lnga byas pa'i sdig pa yang ma lus par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /
295a4(rgyud): ser sna dang / brnab sems dang / phrag dog la sogs pa mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur te/ tshe zad pa las kyang tshe ring du nur pa dang / bkra shis dang /

295a6(rgyud): par sel bas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can thams cad kyi srog gi skyabs mdzad pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa thams
295a7(rgyud): cad bsal ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'di thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' stsal du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
295b1(rgyud): ' das kyis gnang ste bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor gyi steng nas 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po byung nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'od
295b2(rgyud): kyis khyab par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la yang mkhyen par mdzad nas 'od zer de dag slar 'dus te bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor tu nub bo/ /
295b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes shing bya ka la bing+ka'i gsung dbyangs kyis gsang sngags bka' stsal pa/ na maHsap+tA nAn/ samyak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI nAn/ pa ri shud+d+he/ ma na si/
295b4(rgyud): a b+h+ya rtsi ta duSh+Ti tA nAn/ na mo b+ha ga b+ha ba ti/ a mr-i ta A yuHs+ya ta thA ga ta s+ya/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shud+d+hi/ A yur bi sho d+ha ni/ saM ha ra saM ha ra Ne/ saM ha ra saM ha ra/ sarba ta thA
295b5(rgyud): ga ta biR+ya ba le na pra ti saM ha ra/ A yuHsA ra sA ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ bud+d+h+ya bud+d+h+ya/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ ma ma sarba pA paM A ba ra Ni bi shud+d+he/ bi gta ma laM/
295b6(rgyud): tsha ra su bud+d+he bud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru swAhA/ 'di ni/ rtsa ba'i sngags te/ gang la la 'di'i cho ga byed par 'dod na/ tshes brgyad dang / bcu gsum dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga rnams gang
295b7(rgyud): yang rung ba la mchod rten ring bsrel can la lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bskor la/ gsang sngags 'di lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas te khrus byas la dkyil 'khor byas
296a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi yi ge bdun cu rtsa bdun bris te/ de'i tshe gsang sngags 'don pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba yang khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te lus
296a2(rgyud): spos kyis byugs nas kha zas gtsang ma zos la me tog dang bdug pas mchod de/ de la rin po che sna bdun yang yon du phul lam/ yang na bdag gi nyams kyis ci 'byor
296a3(rgyud): par phul yang rung ste/ sems mgu bar bya'o/ /chos btsun par bya ba'i phyir ba sti stang dang / ri mo cher bya'o/ /gsang sngags kyi yi ge la yang dkon zhing rin po cher 'du
296a4(rgyud): shes bzhag ste mchod rten che chung ji tsam nus pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gdab par bya zhing / de re re'i nang du gsang sngags bcug ste sems rtse gcig tu mchod pa chen po byas
296a5(rgyud): na| tshe zad pa las tshe slar nur te tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa tshe rabs grangs med pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang nas nam du yang sems can dmyal
296a6(rgyud): ba dang / dud 'gro dang / yi dwags kyi skye gnas thams cad du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang du skyes pa'i gnas thams cad du yang sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par 'gyur/

296b2(rgyud): de'i steng du tshon sna lngas ri mor bris te dbus kyi char ni/ 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dung dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / g.yung drung ris dang / pad+mo rnams bri'o/ /gra bzhir
296b3(rgyud): yang pad+mo re re bris te/ de'i steng du spos chus bkang ba'i bum pa re re gra bzhir gzhag go /bdug spos kyi snod bkang ba spos sna tshogs 'thul ba yang gzhag go/ kha
296b4(rgyud): dog sna lnga'i snod du kha zas sna tshogs dang / zas dkar gsum dang 'bras chan du sbyar ba gzhag /yang dri'i chu dang / me tog dang / 'bras sam 'bru'i snod bkang ba phor bu

296b6(rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po'i gzugs bris la de'i spyi bo'i steng du mar me gzhag go / de nas dkyil 'khor gyi nub phyogs su nad pa bzhag la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha bstan pa'i
296b7(rgyud): nad pa'i mdun du yang mchod pa'i bshos bzhag ste 'bul du gzhug go / de nas sngags mkhan gtsang sbra cher byas te nad pa de la gsang sngags bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis btab
297a1(rgyud): ste cho ga 'di ltar byas na/ nad pa tshe zad de 'chi ba'i dus byed du nye ba zhag bdun nas dran pa nyams shing 'khrul bar 'gyur ba yang tshe slar nur zhing ring
297a2(rgyud): por 'gyur ro/ /rmi lam gyi sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang la la zhig gis gtsang sbra cher byas te nyin gcig bzhin rtag par gsang sngags lan re re ji srid
297a3(rgyud): 'tsho'i bar du bton na/ de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas longs spyod dang / bde ba mi zad pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag par dus thams cad du bzlas brjod byas na/ sangs rgyas

297a5(rgyud): mi shi ba'i ched du phan par 'dod pas sems thag pa nas gsang sngags lan bdun cu rtsa bdun bzlas brjod byas na/ shi ba de ngan song gi gnas su lhung na yang de'i mod la
297a6(rgyud): las kyi sgrib pa rnams zad nas mtho ris kyi lha'i gnas su skye zhing bde ba myong bar 'gyur ro/ /yang gang la la zhig gis gsang sngags yi ger bris pa gzhan gyi ming nas smos
297a7(rgyud): te mchod rten gyi nang du bcug la nan tan du mchod pa byas na/ shi ba gang yin pa de ngan song gi gnas nas thar te mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /yang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su
297b1(rgyud): skye bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ngan song du lhung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mchod rten da la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag
297b2(rgyud): byas sam/ mchod pa phul yang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi las kyi sgrib
297b3(rgyud): pa rnams kyang ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na bya dang ri dwags la sogs te gang dag la mchod rten de'i grib ma phog pa de dag kyang nam yang dud 'gro la sogs pa ngan song gi
297b4(rgyud): gnas su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang la la mtshams med pa lnga'i sdig pa chen po dang ldan pa yang mchod rten de la reg gam/ de'i grib mas phog kyang rung ste/ de'i sdig pa thams
297b5(rgyud): cad byang zhing zad par 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten de'i gnas nas 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / yi dwags dang / sha za la sogs pa lus la 'jug cing gnod pa dang /
297b6(rgyud): gcan gzan khro bo dang / thog 'bab pa ngang / sdig sbrul kha gdug pa dang / sbyar dug la sogs pa thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs shing med par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang pha
297b7(rgyud): rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / mtshon dang / me dang / chu dang / ser ba dang / mu ge dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi
298a1(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad med par 'gyur ro/ /yul der ltas ngan zhig byung na yang mchod rten dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 'od zer chen po
298a2(rgyud): byung bas ltas ngan dang / bkra mi shis pa thams cad zlog par 'gyur ro/ /gang gzhan zhig bsam pa ngan pas dmag dang / chom rkun gyis gnod pa bya bar sems sam/
298a3(rgyud): dgra rgol ba zhig byung na yang gnas der mchod rten de la 'od zer chen po 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis me lce kun tu 'bar bas bskor ba'i nang
298a4(rgyud): nas dmag gi dpung dang / mtshon cha'i char mngon par bstan pas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad zhi zhing phyir zlog par 'gyur ro/ /lha rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang /
298a5(rgyud): skyob par byed de/ phyogs bzhir dpag tshang brgya tshun chad du mtshams bcad de bsrungs pas de'i nang du 'khrug pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / phyugs nad thams cad mi 'byung
298a6(rgyud): ngo / /'thab cing rtsod pa mi 'byung / chos ma yin par spyod pa med par 'gyur ro/ /'di la gsang sngags gzhan gyis gcad pa dang / mnan par mi nus te/ gsang sngags
298a7(rgyud): thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro/ /yang mchod rten de'i srog shing gi gsang sngags bshad pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA bi pu la yaSh+Ti/ ma Ni ka na rA dza ta/ bi bu shi
298b1(rgyud): ta yaSh+Ti d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+te bi lo te/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ma sarba pA baM bi sho d+ha Ni/ saM bo d+ha Ni/ pra ba ra yaSh+Ti/ pa ri ma Ni duSh+Ta hu ru tsi ra ma la bi shud+d+he hUM hUM swAhA/ rigs kyi bu/ ci nas
298b2(rgyud): kyang gsang sngags 'di nan tan du dgu bcu rtsa dgur yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi srog shing gi ngos bzhir gzhug go / de yang cho ga'i gzhung 'di nyid kyang bris te srog shing gi
298b3(rgyud): nang du gzhug go / cho ga de ltar byas na/ mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong gi srog shing btsugs pa dang 'dra'o/ /de'i gong du yang mchod rten ring bsrel can dgu khri dgu stong bzhengs pa
298b4(rgyud): dang 'dra'o/ /de'i yang gong du de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir chos bzang lha'i mdun sa dang 'dra ba'i gtsug lag khang gi mchod rten dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs
298b5(rgyud): pa dang 'dra'o/ /yang gang la la zhig gis 'jim pa las mchod rten chung ngu zhig byas te/ de'i nang du gsang sngags 'di dag bcug na yang rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten lha
298b6(rgyud): dgu khri dgu stong brtsigs pa dang 'dra'o/ /yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di la bskor ba byas sam/ phyag byas sam/ thal mo sbyar ram/ me tog phul lam/ byug pa dang /
298b7(rgyud): bdug spos phul lam/ dril bu dang / ba dan dang / gdugs 'ga' zhig phul na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgu khri dgu stong gi mchod rten la phul ba'i bsod nams dang mnyam
299a1(rgyud): pa yin no/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i dpal dang / mthu stobs rgya chen po thob par 'gyur te/ tha na bya dang sbrang ma la sogs pa
299a2(rgyud): mchod rten de'i grib mas phog na yang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen cid rjes su dgongs par mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob cing phyir mi
299a3(rgyud): ldog pa'i sa la gnas par yang 'gyur ro/ /yang gang la la zhig gis mchod rten 'di lta bu'i rmi lam du rmis sam/ rgyang nas mthong ngam/ dril bu'i sgra thos sam/
299a4(rgyud): mchod rten bzhengs pa rna bar gtam thos pa de dag kyang mtshams med pa lnga la sogs te sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad byang ste/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
299a5(rgyud): kyis srung ba dang / rjes su dgongs pa mdzad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags 'di ni/
299a6(rgyud): mchod rten gyi srog shing gi gsang sngags zhes bya'o/ /yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten bya ba'i gsang sngags de dag gi snying po ni/ 'di yin no/ /oM
299a7(rgyud): sarba ta thA gA ta ma la bi sho d+ha ni/ rud d+ha ba le bra ti saM ska ra ta thA ga ta d+hu tu d+ha re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ san+d+ha ra san+d+ha ra sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na a d+hiSh+Thi te swAhA/ dge slong ngam/ dge
299b1(rgyud): slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ gang la la zhig gis mchod rten bdag nyid kyis byas sam/ gzhan byed du bcug gam/ mchod rten rnying pa bcos legs
299b2(rgyud): byas kyang rung / sa 'jim las mchod rten chung du byas sam/ so pag gam rdo ba las byas kyang rung ste/ dang por gsang sngags kyi snying po stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas brjod
299b3(rgyud): byas te/ de'i 'og tu mchod rten sen mo gang tsam gyi sa la byas sam/ khru gang gi tshad du byas sam/ dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi tshad du byas na yang rung ste/ gsang sngags kyi
299b4(rgyud): mthu dang / sems rtse gcig tu byas pa'i stobs kyis mchod rten de la yang spos kyi ngang ldang ste/ tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i dri bro'am/ lha'i
299b5(rgyud): spos dri zhim pa'i ngad ldang bar 'gyur ro/ /bdag dang gzhan mchod rten gyi las byed pa dang / bzlas brjod byed pa de bsam pa thams cad kyang yid bzhin du 'grub par
299b6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang / legs pa phun sum tshogs pa yang thob par 'gyur/ tshe thung ba'i las shig yod na yang
299b7(rgyud): tshe nur zhing ring bar 'gyur/ nam 'chi ba'i dus byed na yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i zhal mthong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rjes
300a1(rgyud): su dgongs te/ skye gnas phyi mar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur zhing mngon sum du lung ston par 'gyur/ der yang tshe lo bye ba khrag
300a2(rgyud): khrig brgya stong thub par 'gyur te/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / lha'i mig dang / lha'i rna ba rnam par dag pa 'thob cing pha rol gyi sems shes pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba dang /
300a3(rgyud): skye ba shes pa 'thob bo/ /lus las tsan+dan gyi dri'i ngad 'byung zhing / kha nas ut+pa la'i bsung ldang bar 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi
300a4(rgyud): lam thob nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang dri'i byug pa yungs 'bru tsam yang rung ste gsang sngags bzlas nas mchod rten bskus na/ de dag gi yon
300a5(rgyud): tan dang / legs pa sngar bshad pa bzhin du thob par 'gyur ro/ /yang dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gis bdag nyid gtsang
300a6(rgyud): bar byas te gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dkon pa dang / rin po cher 'du shes pas bzung na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar dad par bya ste/ gsang sngags rnams la
300a7(rgyud): gus pa bskyed nas yi ger bri bar bya'o/ /gong du bshad pa bzhin gsang sngags dang phyag rgya cho ga bzhin du bris nas mchod rten gyi srog shing gi rtsa bar snying po bcug ste mchod
300b1(rgyud): rten byas na/ de dge ba'i rtsa brgya chen po bsags par 'gyur te/ yon tan dang legs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi phyag
300b2(rgyud): rgya'i cho ga 'di dag bshad pa'i tshe phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su thugs rangs par mdzad nas gsungs pa/ y
300b3(rgyud): ang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can thams cad mnyam par dgongs shing thams cad chos kyi dbyings la bkod nas gsang sngags chen po'i phyag
300b4(rgyud): rgya'i cho ga byin gyi rlabs 'thob par bstan pa ni/ legs so legs so/ /shin tu yang legs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
300b5(rgyud): 'thob cing phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de nyid na lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi'am ci
300b6(rgyud): dang / lto 'phye chen po 'dus pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i mes po tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang /

301a2(rgyud): pa| kye ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ni/ shin tu yang rnyed par dka'o/ /de'i bstan pa dam pa'i chos thos pa yang shin tu rnyed par dka'/ gsang sngags

301a7(rgyud): c hub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'khor der rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa nor

301b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga shin tu rnyed par dka' ba/ sems can
301b3(rgyud): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba rnams kyi mchog 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can sgrib pa che ba rnams kyi don du bshad de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing tshe ring ba dang / sdug
301b4(rgyud): bsngal gyi phung po thams cad las thar par mdzad pa lags na/ deng 'dir bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams
301b5(rgyud): cad la gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yang dag pa'i ye shes chub par bgyid pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyi tshig bshad par 'tshal to/ /na
301b6(rgyud): mo b+ha ga b+ha ba te/ na ba na ba TI nAM/ saM myak+saM bud+d+ha ko Ti yu ta sha ta sa ha sra NAM/ na maHsarba Ni ba ra Na bi skam+bi ni b+ho d+hi sa twa ya/ oM tu ru tu ru ma ma sarba A ba ra Na bi sho
301b7(rgyud): d+ha ni| sarba ta thA ga ta A yur ba lA nI bi bu la ni mA+e sarba sid+d+hi nA ma ma skri twAM/ ba ra ba ra/ sarba satwa a ba lo ki ni/ oM sarba ni bA ra Na bi skam+bi ni ma ma sarba pA paM bi

302b1(rgyud): rung ba la khrus dang gtsang sbra byas te gos gtsang ma gyon la zhag gcig smyung ba'am/ yang na zas dkar gsum zos te mchod rten la bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di

302b5(rgyud): yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis nyis brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis sum brgya rtsa brgyad bton

302b7(rgyud): kyang nye bar 'ongs nas lus mngon par bstan te/ srung ba dang / skyob par byed cing shes rab kyi stobs kyang bskyed nas bsod nams thams cad nye bar sgrub bo/ /
303a1(rgyud): gang gis lnga brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis 'dus ma byas kyi lam la gnas pa 'thob bo/ /yang gang gis drug brgya
303a2(rgyud): rtsa brgyad bton na/ rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te/ nam mkha' la rig 'dzin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis bdun brgya rtsa brgyad bton na/

303a4(rgyud): rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis dgu brgya rtsa brgyad du bton na/ phung po lnga rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /yang gang gis stong rtsa brgyad du bton na/

303b6(rgyud): tshang gi bar du bskor ba byas na/ bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams
303b7(rgyud): cad rnam par sel ba legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ legs so legs so/ /rigs kyi bu/ khyod kyis nga'i grogs byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags kyi

304b1(rgyud): gi yon tan ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bshad kyang mi rdzogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis mkhyen

305a7(rgyud): bton na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po brgyad dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang /

306a5(rgyud): bzhi po dag las rnam pa gcig kyang dgu bcu rtsa dgu bris te/ rang gi lag gis mchod rten chung ngu dgu bcu rtsa dgu gdab cing gsang sngags rnams gcig kyang re
306a6(rgyud): re'i nang du gzhug go / de nas yang gsang sngags 'di dgu bcu rtsa dgu yi ger bris te mchod rten gyi 'phang lo rnams kyi nang du bcug ste mchod rten rnams dkyil
306a7(rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du bzhag ste me tog dang / byugs pas mchod la/ lan bdun bdun du bskor zhing gsang sngags 'di yang gdon par bya'o/ /namaHna pa nA TI nAM/ ta thA
306b1(rgyud): ga ta gaM ga NA nAM Di bA lu kAM / ko Ti ni yuk+ta sha ta sa ha sa NAM/ oM po bo ri/ tsa ri Ni tsa ri/ mo ri go ri tsa la ba ri swAhA/ cho ga 'di ltar byas na pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su
306b2(rgyud): rdzogs par spyad par yang ma zad de/ des ni/ rin po che'i mchod rten bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byas par 'gyur ro/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
306b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i gong du yang lha thams cad kyis mchod pa'i sbrin sna tshogs

320b6(rgyud): snying po 'di/ /mang por bzlas shing langs nas ni/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi/ /dbyung ba'i thabs su khyab par bya/ /nang rnams thams cad sos par 'gyur/ /nyin

321a1(rgyud): brgyad bzlas nas/ /mgul du btags na bde bar 'tsho/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas shing btang / /snying
321a2(rgyud): nad rtsib logs na ba dang / /khong na nad rnams ci yod la/ /chu la sngags 'di mang bzlas nas/ /blud na phan zhing bde bar 'gyur/ /nad la phan pa'i sman rnams la/ /
321a3(rgyud): bzlas shing btang na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /g.yan pa dang ni 'brum bu dang / /phol mig dang na rma red la/ /grog tshangs la snying po 'di/ /mang du bzlas te btab na 'tsho/ /
321a4(rgyud): gzhang 'brum gzhang nad za gu dang / /pho mtshan skrangs shing na ba la/ /skyer pa'i khaN+Da'i ril bu 'am/ /byang chub sems dpa'i ril bu la/ /nyi shu bzlas shing bskus na phan/ /
321a5(rgyud): nad kyi rnam pa gang na yang / /nad tshabs che chung tshed brtags nas/ /tshigs su bcad pa'i bzlas brjod la/ /mang nyung nad dang sbyar nas su/ /lus la byab cing bzlas na
321a6(rgyud): phan| |'khru ba ga nad kyis btab ba la/ /sman nam ril bu kha zas la/ /bdun nam nyi shu bzlas nas kyang / /khong du btang na phan par 'gyur/ /de yi bzlas brjod snga ma
321a7(rgyud): ste| |'di dag rab tu bzla bar bya/ /na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ oM ye d+harmA he tu pra b+ha bA he tun+te ShAn+ta thA ga to h+ya ba da ta/ te ShAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI mahA shra ma NaHswAhA/ de dag
321b1(rgyud): bzlas na nad rnams 'tsho/ /de ni nad rnams 'tsho ba'o/ /de nas yang ni bka' stsal pa/ /nas dang gro dang sran ma dang / /'bras dang sran chung mon sran dang / /shing tog rgun
321b2(rgyud): 'brum a ru ra/ /de dag kun la zab yi /srin bu spur bu phye ma leb/ /bye'u dang byi ba ne tso dang / /lo tog za ba kha bcing na/ /zhing gi khyon dang sbyar nas kyang / /bye ma sa dang

321b4(rgyud): la phul ba yi/ /me tog dman ma re re la/ /bzlas brjod nyi shu rtsa gcig bya/ /gtsang zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus dag tu/ /bum pa gang ba'i
321b5(rgyud): steng dag tu/ /kham phor gtsang ma'i nang du yang / /me tog gtsang ma bzlas pa de/ /bsregs na char pa 'chad par 'gyur/ /ser ba drag po 'ongs pa na/ /se ba nya mig lcug
321b6(rgyud): ma la| |bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas/ /ser ba gang nas g.yo ngos su/ /klad la bskor zhing byabs na 'chad/ /yang na thal chen yungs kar la/ /bzlas brjod brgya ni rtsa

322a1(rgyud): gang gru bzhi la/ /bum pa gtsang ma lnga bzhag ste/ /gu gul dud pas bdugs nas kyang / /yungs kar ga pur tsan+dan dang / /gla rtsi la sogs sman

322a4(rgyud): pa gdon gyis 'jigs pa la/ /gi'u wang la ni sngags bzlas nas/ /snying po stobs chen 'di bris gdags/ /oM badzra kro d+ha mahA ba la/ ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya/ dza Ti

322a7(rgyud): the tshom mi za 'o/ /byis pa gdon dang nad las thar/ /bud med bu ni thogs gyur na/ /chu la bzlas brjod lnga bdun byas/ /blud na legs par btsas par 'gyur/ /
322b1(rgyud): bud med mo gsham bud med la/ /sangs rgyas sku bsil byas pa'i chu/ /de la bzlas brjod nyi shu bya/ /khrus byas lus ni gtsang ma la/ /chu de blud na bu tsha 'phen/ /rigs
322b2(rgyud): brgyud dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur/ /lam du zhugs te 'gro ba na/ /skud pa dang ni gos kyi grar/ /bzlas brjod bdun bzlas mdud pa bdun/ /mdud cing bzlas te song ba na/ /
322b3(rgyud): bde bar 'gro zhing don yang 'grub/ /dgra dang nye zho med par 'gyur/ /yid ni gzhungs par 'dod pa na/ /shu dag tshon gang tsam pa la/ /mar srang sum brgya drug cu la/ /

326a7(rgyud): na sngon gyi las kyi rnam bar smin pa ma gtogs par bar du gcod pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur/ don thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
326b1(rgyud): bka' stsal ba dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin yi rangs te/ de'i tshe 'di skad du/ kho bo lha las ma gyur la/ /'di nyid na ni 'dug bzhin du/ kho bos tshe yang thob zin gyis/ /grogs dag de ltar shes par gyis/ /

326b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i yi ge brgya pa/ na ma s+t+rai ya d+hI kA nAM ta thA ga tA nAM/ sarba trA pra ti ha tA bA p+ta d+harmA tA ba li nI/ a sa ma sa mas man+to nan+ta ba b+hi shA sa ni/ ha ra ha ra sma ra sma ra Na/ bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+harma te/ sa ra sa
326b7(rgyud): ra sa ma ba la/ ha sa ha sa/ tra ya tra ya/ b+ha ga wAn mahA pa ra lak+Sha Ne/ dz+wa la dz+wa la nA sA ga re swAhA// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa'
327a1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ smr-i ti ma ti ma ti/ te dza bid+yA/ hu ru me/ hu ru hu ru me/
327a2(rgyud): kr-iSh+NA hu ru me swAhA/ shu dag nag po la sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te zos na/ gdon mi za bar thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /thos pa 'dzin pa'i

327a6(rgyud): 'gyur ro/ /shes rab skyed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so// //dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje
327a7(rgyud): chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ a ba lo ki ni/ ba lo ka ni/ pra b+ha lo ki ni/ dzI ba ha pa ri sho d+ha ni/ d+hi da ni
327b1(rgyud): ya ga me/ a shA pa ri sho d+ha ni/ sarba satwa ma no ra the/ kA ya sid+d+he shru ti d+hA ra NI smr-i ti d+ha na swAhA/ cho ga zhag bdun gyi bar du shing a ba marga'i so shing la lan bdun bzlas brjod
327b2(rgyud): byas te nang re zhing zos na/ nyin gcig la sho lo ka brgya brgya lobs so/ /zla ba drug gi bar du byas na/ thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /sh+lau ka brgya lobs pa rdzogs so// //

328a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ tri shA tri shu la shA khi/ AR+ya ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ ba re na/ bu ha la/

333b1(rgyud): gshed po bdag nyid kyi/ /snying po rab tu gsungs pa na/ /de nas sa ni g.yos par 'gyur/ /rgya mtsho yang ni rab tu 'khrugs/ /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang / /sha za la sogs
333b2(rgyud): phung bar 'gyur/ /lha rnams kun ni phyag 'tshal zhing / /yan lag kun nas sbu langs nas/ /gshin rje'i gshed po khro bo yi/ /khro bo snying po de gzung ngo / /de nas dam chos

333b4(rgyud): gsungs/ /snying rje byang chub sems ldan pa'i/ /lha rnams kyis thos dga' gyur nas/ /dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /so so yi ni rtog pa bshad/ /de dag gi ni rtsa

334a1(rgyud): pa rmad du byung ba'i mchog / mdor ni rab tu bshad par bya/ /de la 'di yi dkyil 'khor ni/ /dngos grub thams cad sbyin mdzad pa'i/ /'jig
334a2(rgyud): rten gsum po 'khrugs par mdzad/ /yi dwags mang po zhes bya'o/ /thams cad du ni dkyil 'khor 'di/ /gnas ni gang du 'grub par 'gyur/ /sngags pas thog ma
334a3(rgyud): nyid du ni/ /de yi gnas ni brtag par bya/ /shing gcig pa 'am dur khrod dang / /khyim stong dang ni bzhi mdo dang / /mchod rten dang ni mu gnyis dang / /thibs po stong pa
334a4(rgyud): lam srang rnying / /skyed mos tshal dang ri yi rtse/ /chu yi 'gram dang nags tshal dang / /yang na mtsho yi 'gram dang ni/ /lha chen gyi ni gnas kyang rung / /ba lang lhas sam

340b5(rgyud): 'dod pa'i las kyang byed/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ /be con gyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i mchod pa rim par phye ba ste bzhi
340b6(rgyud): pa'o|| / /de nas be con phyag rgya yi/ /ji skad gsungs pa de dag sgrub/ /de yi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'ang gzhan/ /dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba/ /sgrub pas mtshan mo dur
340b7(rgyud): khrod du| |dur khrod dag gi thal ba yis/ /gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi bri/ /mi ro'i ro smad dag dang ldan/ /bla re rnga yab me long dril/ /me tog phreng bas mdzes par bya/ /lha rdzas yi dwags
341a1(rgyud): mang po dngar/ /thod pa brgyad kyis rnam par spras/ /phyis ni be con phyag rgya yang / /mgo med ro yi steng du bri/ /dkyil na yi dwags zhes bya ba'i/ /thams
341a2(rgyud): cad grub byed dkyil 'khor 'di/ /khro bo'i gtso bo'i phyag rgya yis/ /mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya/ /sme gtor thams cad byin nas ni/ /gtsang ma go cha bgos nas
341a3(rgyud): kyang / /'bum phrag gcig ni sngar bsnyen pa/ /byas nas 'di ni brtsam par bya/ /phyugs chen dag gi khrag gis kyang / /shis pa'i thod pa bkang nas kyang / /de bzhin mi
341a4(rgyud): las byung ba'i sha / phyag rgya la ni dbul bar bya/ /phyugs chen gyi ni tshil bu las/ /mar me 'bar ba byas pa dag /de yi phyi rol phyogs brgyad du/ /sngags srung de la dbul
341a5(rgyud): bar bya| |cho ga shes pas de lta bur/ /byas nas mjug la bsgrub par bya/ /dpal ldan gos ni dmar po gyon/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus mas ni/ /cung zad dag kyang mi byed
341a6(rgyud): par| |mar gyi brgyad la gcig bus byas/ /dpa' la sems drag mthu ldan pa'i/ /grogs ni gsum dang lhan cig tu/ /sgrub pa blo ldan sems stobs can/ /dbang po
341a7(rgyud): legs par bsdams pa yis/ /yi dwags kyi ni dkyil 'khor du/ /sgrub pa la ni 'jug par 'gyur/ /de nas mtshan mo rgya bcings te/ /brtan par 'dug la legs par
341b1(rgyud): bzlas| |bgegs rnams sna tshogs mtshan gcig tu/ /'byung ste de las rgyal bar bya/ /de ltar srin po'i tshogs chen las/ /rgyal nas phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi
341b2(rgyud): 'grub pa yi las rnams kyang / /de nas thogs pa med par byed/ /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo yis/ /bskul nas 'dir ni dogs pa med/ /ha ni bi s+pho Ta bany+dza bany+dza zhes/ /
341b3(rgyud): bskul ba'i tha mar hUM brjod cing / /g.yon brkyang ba yi tshul gnas nas/ /khros pas ri rtse bgrod dka' dang / /ra pa yang thog sgo gang dang / /bu shu khang pa dngar ra bdag /skad
341b4(rgyud): cig gis ni snyil bar byed/ /d+ha ra bi s+pho Ta baM dza zhes/ /bskul ba'i mjug tu hUM brjod na/ /ri bo dag ni mang po dang / /de bzhin lha min sgo dag dang / /de bzhin sa dang gzhan
341b5(rgyud): dag dang / /ji ltar 'dod pa 'gas par byed/ /pa tsa bi d+h+wan saM sho zhes/ /bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na/ /phyag rgya 'di yis chu rnams ni/ /thogs pa med par skam par byed/ /
341b6(rgyud): mtsho chen dang ni chu bo dang / /rgya mtsho dag kyang skam par byed/ /staM b+ha ya zhes lan gnyis brjod/ /tha mar hUM dang de bzhin mu/ /de nas de yi mjug tu hUM/ /se na stam+b+ha zhes
341b7(rgyud): sbyar na| |pa tsa bi d+h+wan sa ya sho Sha ya sho Sha ya da hUM phaT/ ri mo la ni gnas pa bzhin/ /nges par myur du gnon par 'gyur/ /tha mar hUM bzhag de nas driM/ /k+Sho pa ye zhes lan
342a1(rgyud): gnyis brjod/ /de yi tha mar yi ge ma/ /mkhas pa dag gis sbyor ba ni/ /dpung rnams 'khrug par 'gyur pa la/ /khros na ngo mtshar ci zhig che/ /tha
342a2(rgyud): mar hUM dang ga bzhag la/ /de nas tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha bzhag /sngags pas gal te sbyar na ni/ /cho ga 'di ni glad po gnon/ /ha na bi d+h+wa na sa mA ra ya/ bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod
342a3(rgyud): cing / /de bzhin tha mar phaT brjod na/ /dpung dag rab tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ /kha kha khA hi khA hi zhes/ /bskul nas tha mar hUM brjod na/ /dpung rnams phan tshun 'khrug par
342a4(rgyud): ni| |thogs pa med par rab tu 'gyur/ /tha mar hUM ngang de bzhin phaT/ /driM driM dza dza driM driM dag /nges pa dag tu sbyar na ni/ /sngags pa khro dang ldan pa yis/ /khrag gi char 'bab
342a5(rgyud): byed par gsungs/ /tha mar hUM brjod ha ha hA hA bai tA li hUM phaT ces bdag gis bya/ sngags pa dpa' dang ldan pa yis/ /bskul nas myur du rmongs par 'gyur/ /tha mar
342a6(rgyud): hUM brjod ha ha ha/ /de bzhin an+ta ya dang phaT/ /bskul ba 'di dag dang ldan na/ /'gro ba dag ni mdongs par byed/ /tha mar hUM brjod de nas hUM/ /de bzhin ni driM driM dza dza gzhag/
342a7(rgyud): tha mar driM dang phaT ldan na/ /'gro ba de ma thag tu 'bebs/ /khro bo chen po 'di yi ni/ /phyag rgya de ltar grub gyur na/ /de tshe las rnams thams cad ni/ /yid kyis bskul
342b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis byed/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi/ /dam tshig rab tu bskod pa yin/ /sgrub pa gang dang gad 'dod pa/ /de ni thogs pa med par byed/ /gal te der ni ma
342b2(rgyud): grub na| |'di yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ /cho ga bzhin du 'bum byas la/ /de nas blo ldan sgrub la 'jug /de tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /snga ma'i dam tshig bskul ba bzhin/ /de
342b3(rgyud): nas slar yang sngags rnams la/ /thogs pa med par de bzhin sbyar/ /phyag 'tshal ba dang kun tu ldan/ /de yi thog mar oM bzhag la/ /oM zhes bya ba gzhan yad gzhag /

342b6(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /bka' lung gis ni phyag rgya de/ /gzir nas rang gis bzlas brjod bya/ /de ltar bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas/ /khro bo chen po de yis ni/ /kun
342b7(rgyud): la ci rigs bskul nas su/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya/ /khro bo gtso po de yi ni/ /bka' bzhin byed de gzhan du min/ /gang gis sngon du bsnyen byas pa/ /de yis
343a1(rgyud): bskul ba'i cho ga ni/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams la/ /ma grub na ni nges par sbyar/ /gzhan du sngags ni gzir byas na/ /bdag nyid nges par
343a2(rgyud): 'chi bar 'gyur/ /khyad par du ni dpa' bo yis/ /khro bo'i gtso bo'i snying po ni/ /phyag rgya 'di ni gzir byas na/ /'gro ba ma lus 'khrug par 'gyur/ /sngags 'di gang du

343a4(rgyud): tshad bdun gyi dkyil 'khor na/ /gzhan gyi sngags rnams gang yod dang / /dgra rnams dregs pa med par byed/ /'byung po skrag par byed pa dang / /de bzhin lha rnams

343a7(rgyud): cad med byed la/ /be con phyag rgya drag por bsgrags/ /dgra dang de bzhin gzhan dag kyang / /skye bo dag la 'di bcings bstan/ /gshin rje'i gshed po sbyar na ni/ /de yi

343b7(rgyud): bzung nas dgug par bya/ /mthe'u chung gnyis kyang nang du dgug /de bzhin du ni mthe bong gnyis/ /phan tshun bsnol te brkyang bar bya/ /shes rab can gyis ro langs 'di/ /
344a1(rgyud): rtag tu tshul bzhin khro bos bstan/ /khro bo gtso bo'i gsang sngags gang / /yi ge bcu bdun legs gsungs pa/ /de nyid 'di dang sbyar bar bya/ /ro

344b2(rgyud): dpal ldan rig 'dzin gyis/ /ro langs phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /gtor ma me tog dbul la sogs/ /rnam pa kun tu khro bos bya/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni khor yug gi /phyogs brgyad
344b3(rgyud): dag tu mar me dgod/ /dur khrod dag gi mgal dum mam/ /yang na gsal shing dag gis bud/ /seng ldeng dag gi gzar bu yis/ /tshil chen dag la lan bdun du/ /lho phyogs

345a1(rgyud): snying gar mnan nas ni/ /khro bo yi ni gtso bo yi/ /yi ge bcu bdun sngags bzlas so/ /oM a kro d+hi ka ya man+ta ka /ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ 'di ni/ rtsa

345a7(rgyud): ro sa la 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /de yi lus ni de nyid kyang / /gser du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de tshe grogs po rnams dang yang / /sems can rnams la ci bder sbyin/ /

345b5(rgyud): b+h+yaH/ a kro d+he kA ya man+ta ka ha na ma thA b+hany+dza hUM ge tha pi rak+Sha man+ta ta thA ga to Adz+nyA pa ya ti swAhA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi bkas brgyan pa ro langs kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya'i

346b7(rgyud): snying po 'di/ /gang yang rung bar ci 'dod par/ /bcur bsgyur ba yi grangs rnams su/ /che ga ji bzhin bzlas nas ni/ /rmad du byung ba'i las rnams kyang / /yid kyis bsam
347a1(rgyud): pas byed par 'gyur/ /gsang ba'i rig sngags dam pa 'di/ /las rnams thams cad byed pa'o/ /de nas de ni 'di yi las/ /khro bo'i rgyal po nyid kyis
347a2(rgyud): kyang / /cho ga zhib las gang gsungs pa/ /de dag mdor ni bshad par bya/ /rmugs dang gnad dang rmongs pa dang / /de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga dang / /dbang du bya dang byed pa
