347a6(rgyud): gang tshad la ni/ /bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa yis/ /mkhas pa dag gis bcings par bya/ /yu ba de yi rtsa ba la'ang / /mchod rten bzang po legs par bya/ /gro ga la ni
347a7(rgyud): gi'u wang gis/ /khro bos mthar byas ro langs bri/ /mkhas pas mchod rten 'og tu gzhag /de nas zla ba gzas zin pa'i/ /nub mo yi dwags phal chen gyi/ dkyil
347b1(rgyud): 'khor mtsho 'gram bris nas bzlas/ /de nas grub phyir sngags pa yis/ /mjug ma de la yid gtad nas/ /lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas ni/ /zla ba de la blta zhing bzlas//
347b2(rgyud): sems ni bdud kyis mi 'khrugs pa'i/ /sems dpa' chen po kha cig la/ /drod dang dud 'thul 'bar ba dag /mjug ma de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dro bar gyur pa mthong na ni/ /
347b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' 'dra ba yis/ /sems can rnams ni thams cad la/ /des ni phan 'dogs gnod pa nus/ /mjug ma bzang po de las ni/ /du ba 'byung ba mthong na yang / /myur
347b4(rgyud): du mi snang bar yang 'gyur/ /'dad pa'i gzugs can yid mgyogs bzhin/ /rga ba dang ni 'chi ba med/ /gnod sbyin rnams ni yongs su bskor/ /sems can chen po de yi gzis/ /
347b5(rgyud): gal te de ni 'bar 'gyur na/ /rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan par 'gyur/ /nam mkha' la ni myur du 'gro/ /bde ba kun dang ldan pa yis/ /rig 'dzin rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur//
347b6(rgyud): gal te zla ba gzas btang la/ /de tshe grub par ma gyur na'ang / /mjug ma lan gcig bskor pa yis/ /dbung rnams gnon pa'i dngos grub dang / /gang yang rung ba gcig
347b7(rgyud): kyang gnon/ /myos pas dregs pa'i glang po dang / /stag dang seng+ge wa rnams dang / /rta dang shing rta bya rnams dang / /gru dang gru chen bzhon pa rnams/ /bskor na thams cad gnon
348a1(rgyud): par byed/ /mnan ba dag las thar bar yang / /mjug ma 'dis ni gdon mi za/ /de nas gzhan yang ro langs kyis/ /rmugs par bya ba gsang bar
348a2(rgyud): bshad| |de nas tshil chen blangs nas ni/ /de yang thod pa'i nang du gzhug /a shwa ma ra dmar po yis/ /shing bal 'jam po'i snying po bya/ /gdol pa'i me yis 'brab byas
348a3(rgyud): nas| |nyi ma zla ba gzas zin che/ /thod pa'i dud pa blangs pas ni/ /zla ba'am yang na nyi ma dag /btang ba'i bar du bzlas par bya/ /yang na arka'i shing bal las/ /de yi 'og
348a4(rgyud): tu lcags thur gyis/ /mig gnyis dag ni bsku bar bya/ /de ltar mig gnyis bskus pa yis/ /gang dag bltas pa de dag ni/ /rmugs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za/ /de nas
348a5(rgyud): gdong bkrus bltas na ni/ /slar yang de las thar par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang rmongs pa ni/ /rmongs par byed pa mchog bshad do/ /arka gcig gi rtsa ba dang / /ka na ka yi
348a6(rgyud): rtsa ba dang / /a shwa ma ra ru rta dang / /mo ha na yi rtsa ba dang / /ma ha na la'i rtsa ba dang / /sha ra bu kar ldan byas shing / /yi dwags me tog snying par ldan/ /mdun so dag dang ldan
348a7(rgyud): byas te| |skyes pa dag gam bud med kyi/ /gsang ba'i pags pa dang ldan pa/ /pu mo 'dod pa ma spyad pas/ /mar gyi brgyad la legs par btab/ /phyis ni bud med khrag
348b1(rgyud): dag dang / /bong bu'i khu bas sbru bar bya/ /dur khrod thal ba dang sbyar te/ /de nas mar gyi tshes brgyad la/ /thog mar yi dwags mang bris nas/ /rig pa 'dzin pas mtshan mo bzlas//
348b2(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad ni legs bzlas na/ /de nas rdzas ni grub par 'gyur/ /rmongs par byed pa'i phye ma 'di/ /sems can kun la sbyar na ni/ /de nas rmongs par byed par 'gyur/ /'di la
348b3(rgyud): the tshom mi bya'o/ /'thab mo dang ni rtsod pa dang / /rgyal po g.yul ngo chen po la/ /bdag gi phyogs ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /sbyor ba shes pas 'di bskul ba'i/ /ba dan dag kyang bsgreng
348b4(rgyud): na ni| |dgra rnams kun tu rmongs par 'gyur/ /phye ma 'di yis reg na ni/ /de ma thag tu mi rnams rmongs/ /chur zhugs na ni thar par 'gyur/ /nges par gzhan du ma yin no/ /de
348b5(rgyud): nas gzhan yang dbab pa ni/ /cho ga'i mchog ni bshad par bya/ /ci nas 'byung po thams cad ni/ /mod la 'bab par 'gyur ba'o/ /stag gi pags pa dang ldan par/ /sbrul gyi
348b6(rgyud): shun pa brtags na ni/ /dug dang yung ba'i rtsa ba dang / /mo han dang ma la ti/ /ra yi gcin las btags nas ni/ /de nas de dag ril bur bya/ /tsa na ka yi 'bru tshad la/ /bdun
348b7(rgyud): nam brgyad dam dgu 'am yang / /gzhan yang ri bong khrag dag dang / /gur gum las su btags nas ni/ /bdun nam brgyad dam dgu dag tu/ /ril bu snga ma bzhin du bya//
349a1(rgyud): de nas snga ma'i ril bu la/ /sngags pas thod pa snod du gzhag /mar gyi tshes brgyad mtshan ma ni/ /brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya/ /gur gum can ni
349a2(rgyud): a ri sta'i/ /snod ni gtsang mar gzhag par bya/ /de bzhin stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ /rtse mor rab tu sbyar bar bya/ /sngar ni legs par sbyar byas pa'i/ /ril bu tha mal
349a3(rgyud): gdug pa la/ /btab na myur du 'bab pa ni/ /ring por mi thogs gzhan du min/ /bsams nas myur du btang ba ni/ /de nas gur gum ril bus bya/ /de nas gzhan yang
349a4(rgyud): grub pa 'di/ /dbang du byed pa gang gi mchog /rig pa 'dzin pa'i yid las 'byung / /las kyis nges 'gyur bshad par bya/ /rak+ta zhes ni 'dir grags pa/ /rtsa ba rak+ta mu
349a5(rgyud): li ka / der blangs sha ra bu ka dang / /mi las byung ba'i mdun so dang / /tshub mas btsugs pa'i shing lo ni/ /lding zhing lhag dang bcas pa dag/ gzhon nu mas ni mtshan mo
349a6(rgyud): btags/ /phye ma mchog de lan bdun du/ /bdag gi khu bas sbru bar bya/ /de nas bdag gis sbyar ba de/ /pad+mo snying po la bzhag la/ /gtsang mas mar gyi tshes brgyad la//
349a7(rgyud): blo ldan lag pas bzung nas ni/ /sngags kyis stong du gdab par bya/ /phye ma'i rgyal po dbang byed pa/ /de nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /bza' ba'am btung ba dag la
349b1(rgyud): sbyin| |yang na phye ma gdab par bya/ /yang na rlung gi phyogs su gtang / /yang na gos la lan gcig gdab/ /yang na byug pa'am so yi rtsi/ /gang yang rung bar sbyar na ni/ /de la
349b2(rgyud): 'dis ni lan gcig gis/ /myos shing dregs pa'i dgra dag ni/ /rgyang nas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur/ /bran bzhin du ni legs par byed/ /phye ma 'di yis reg pa ni/ /shi na'ang
349b3(rgyud): rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/ /gal te rgyad ni ring po nas/ /phye mas reg par mi 'gyur na/ /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas ni/ /phye ma 'di yis gdab par bya/ /zhag bdun gyis ni
349b4(rgyud): rig 'dzin gyi/ /ming ni de yis thos nas kyang / /bdag la 'dir ni sgor bcas pa/ /gdon mi za bar dbang du 'gyur/ /de nas sbyor ba 'ba' zhig gis/ /'khon pa'i las dag
349b5(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /rma bya'i mdongs ni bzang po dang / /de bzhin sbrul gyi shun pa dang / /rta dang ma he spu dag dang / /ka na ka yi sa bon dang / /a shwa ma ra'i me tog dang / /de bzhin
349b6(rgyud): glang po'i pyi pyi ling / /'di rnams thams cad mnyam byas te/ /byi ba byi la'i khrag las btag /bdag gis ril bu mnyam par bya/ /byas nas cho ga shes pa yis/ /mtshan mo
349b7(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /byi ba dang ni byi la yi/ /spu yi bdug pas bdug par bya/ /de nas sbyor ba shes pa yis/ /de la ril bu gcig blangs nas/ /gang dag dbye bar bya ba ni//
350a1(rgyud): de dag gcig gi spyi bo las/ /ril bu'am yang na phye ma dag /dbye bar bya ba'i phyir gdab bo/ /dbye par byed pa'i mchog 'di ni/ /khro bo nyid kyis
350a2(rgyud): gsungs pa'o/ /de nas 'di ni gsad bya ba/ /sbyor ba'i tshul bzhin legs sbyar na/ /dogs pa med par 'grub 'gyur ba/ /gsod byed mchog ni bshad par bya/ /mi dbang
350a3(rgyud): rnam pa du ma yis/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa/ /de la sbyor ba 'di sbyar gyi/ /ngan song gzhan la ma yin no/ /'di ni byang chub sems ldan la/ /grub par
350a4(rgyud): 'gyur gyi gzhan du min/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig 'di/ /dngos grub thams cad ster bas na/ /cho ga gzhan du legs par srung / /gzhan du byas na 'grub
350a5(rgyud): mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dngos grub kun/ /'dod na srog chags phan 'dod pas/ /'og dang 'phur ba'i dngos grub kyang / /bshol ba med par bsgrub par
350a6(rgyud): bya| |khro dang gtum pa'i spyod pa can/ /'dod phyir gsod par 'dod de la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub dag /rmi lam du yang dag la byung / /snying rte bzod dang de
350a7(rgyud): bzhin byams/ /rang bzhin gyis ni snying rje can/ /ji skad bstan pa'i sngags pa ni/ /byang chub sems nyid sems byed la/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kun//
350b1(rgyud): gdon mi za bar de la 'grub/ /gdug pa rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir/ /sbyor ba 'di ni kun tu gsungs/ /dkon mchog gsum la cher gnod la/ /bya bar bshad kyi gzhan
350b2(rgyud): du min| |sems gdug bsgrub par bya ba yi/ /rkang pa'i rjes kyi sa blangs la/ /de nas gtsang ma'i ma he yi/ /gcin gyis de ni sbrus nas kyang / /de yi gzugs brnyan byas nas
350b3(rgyud): ni| |dur khrod thal bas bsku bar bya/ /sol ba tsher ma rnon po dang / /de bzhin rus pa phub ma dag /de yi snying gar gdab par bya/ /de bzhin gzhan yang lto ba dang / /rna ba sna dang
350b4(rgyud): mig dang kha/ /rab tu bkang nas g.yang sar gzhag /rkang pa g.yon pas mnan par bya/ /de nas ro langs zhi ba'i sngags/ /phyin ci log tu ldog ste bzlas/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i
350b5(rgyud): ming smos nas/ /sgrub pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ /zlog pa'i rim pa 'di nyid kyis/ /phaT gnyis dag gi bar du gzhug /las 'di byas pas nges par ni/ /bsgrub par bya ba
350b6(rgyud): spos gyur nas/ /nges par 'chi bdag dbang du 'gyur/ /sro dang ldan pas bsgrub bya yi/ /dregs pas de ltar bsal byas na/ /na ba kun gyis btab pa de/ /de nas slar yang thar
350b7(rgyud): par bya| |gzhan du byas na mod la ni/ /nges par 'chi bdag mdun du 'gro/ /dkon mchog gsum ni bsrung ba'i phyir/ /gnod par byed pa thams cad la/ /nad la sogs pa
351a1(rgyud): sbyar na yang / /'chi bar 'gyur ba 'di bshad do/ /dam tshig shes la mi bya ste/ /gal te byas na bdag nyid 'chi/ /bskrad par bya ba'i cho ga yang / /'jam
351a2(rgyud): dbyangs rab tu dpa' bo yang / /khro bo nyid kyis ji skad du/ /gsungs pa de ni bshad par bya/ /seng ldeng las byas phur bu ni/ /sor brgyad tsam du byas pa la/ /yungs mar
351a3(rgyud): tsha bas byugs nas ni/ /dur khrod thal pas gdab par bya/ /de nas khwa ni rang shi ba/ /de yi pags pas dkri bar bya/ /sgrub pas nub mo phur bu de/ /skud pa dmar pos
351a4(rgyud): bcings nas ni/ /de nas ro langs phyag rgya ni/ /skad cig pa yi tshig ldan pas/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i ming smos te/ /mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas pa/ /de nas skrod par
351a5(rgyud): 'dod pa yis/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i sgo gar ni/ /phur bu de ni gdab par bya/ /'di ni skrod pa'i mchog tu gsungs/ /'on kyang brgya byin stobs ldan pa'i/ /bsgrub par bya
351a6(rgyud): ba'ang bskrad par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang gcig la gcig /'thab dang rtsod ba bshad par bya/ /dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed par/ /rig nas ji ltar 'dod
351a7(rgyud): pa ni| |de dag rang gi phyogs 'khrugs par/ /sngags pas ji skad gsungs bzhin bya/ /pa ra he dang ri tsi ra/ /pa tra dang ni ke shi ni/ /de bzhin tha ma su ka ra/ /rdzogs
351b1(rgyud): pa'i byang chub bzhugs bzhugs pa/ /mthu chen sman ni 'di rnams las/ /gang yang rung pa gcig blangs te/ /lo ma rlung gis btab par sbyar/ /de bzhin ba la ka ta dang / /go
351b2(rgyud): snyod nag po ldong ros dag / 'di dag btags te phye mar bya/ /mi yi tshil gyis sbrus nas su/ /ro langs stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas/ /nam langs pa ru gyur pa dang / /gdug pa

351b4(rgyud): dang / /dpung la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir/ /phan tshun gsod par bya ba la/ /bdug pa 'di ni sbyar bar bya/ /phan tshun 'thab cing gsod pa dag /ci rigs bstan pa 'di yin no/ /
351b5(rgyud): de nas gzhan yang mig 'phrul gyi/ /cho ga tshul bzhin bshad par bya/ /dur khrod dag gis thal ba yis/ /mig 'phrul dngos po 'grub par 'gyur/ /mi thod bzang por thal
351b6(rgyud): ba dang / /ri bong dag gi khrag blugs te/ /yi dwags phal chen dkyil 'khor gyi/ /ji skad gsungs pa bris pa gzhag /de yi nang du ro langs la/ /mchod pa chen po byas nas
351b7(rgyud): ni| |der yang lho phyogs sgo dag tu/ /zhugs thab tu ni me bus te/ /de nas thal ba de la ni/ /mar gyis bdugs te sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas thal ba de la yang / /stong rtsa brgyad
352a1(rgyud): du bzlas byas te/ /stong rtsa brgyad po de nyid kyis/ /nam langs par ni nges par yang / /mkhas pas mig 'phrul rtsed mo rnams/ /thal ba des ni
352a2(rgyud): byed par 'gyur/ /me tog dkar la thal pa des/ /lan re dag tu bskus nas ni/ /nam mkhar gtor na nges par yang / /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ston par 'gyur/ /thal

352a4(rgyud): kun| |ston par byed de gzhan du min/ /me tog dkar pos 'jig rten pa'i/ /lha rnams kun kyang snga ma bzhin/ /gang dang gang gi 'dod pa dag /yid la bsam pas ston
352a5(rgyud): par byed/ /me tog sngon pos de bzhin du/ /gnod sbyin srin po snga ma bzhin/ /yi dwags mkha' 'gro grul bum dang / /yang na gang dang gang 'dod pa'o/ /chu las lan
352a6(rgyud): bdun bzlas ba ni/ /gyen du gtor nas nges par yang / /mig 'phrul slar yang bsdu bar bya/ /yang na khu tshur bcangs pas so/ /khwa yi sgro bdun mi rus kyi/ /yu ba dag la
352a7(rgyud): bcings nas su/ /de la thal ba de bskus te/ /mig 'phrul bsams la ci 'dod par/ /tshogs kyi nang du bskor nas ni/ /mtsho dang rgya mtsho rgal ba dang / /de bzhin khang pa li
352b1(rgyud): pa dang / /g.yul dang 'khrug cing 'chi ba dang / /ltad mo chen po mchog rnams ni/ /rab tu sbyar ba ston par 'gyur/ /khu tshur bcangs pas de bzhin sdud/ /sa yi 'og kyang ston pa

352b4(rgyud): ni tshul bzhin bzlas/ /bdag gam 'on te gzhan yang rung / /bsgrub bya zhi ba'i tshig smos te/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas nas/ /me tog dkar po bzang po ni/ /bsung zhim yid du
352b5(rgyud): 'ong ba dag / tsan+dan dkar po chus btab nas/ /rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu nang du/ /zhugs nas re re la bzlas shing / /brgya rtsa brgyad ni dor bar bya/ /'on tang bdag gam gzhan yang
352b6(rgyud): rung / /mtshungs pa med pa zhi bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i yul lam ljongs dag gam/ /grong ngam yang na grong khyer dag /zhi ba'i las de byas pa yis/ /zhi bar 'gyur par gdon mi za/ /

353a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis mchod pa bzlas/ /gal te mchod rten ring bsrel can/ /yin na de ma thag tu 'gyur/ /bsgrub bya'i ming smos bzlas na ni/ /skyes pa bud

353a4(rgyud): pa dag gis dkyil 'khor bya/ /de nas der ni me tog dag/ shin tu yid 'ong dgram par bya/ /me mar rab tu 'bar ba brgyad/ /mkhas pas de la dbul bar bya/ /shin tu yid

353a7(rgyud): ltar nyin mtshan phyed byas na/ /zhi ba dag dang rgyas par 'gyur/ /rgyas pa'i las ni bshad zin to/ /gzhan yang sgrub pa po la ni/ /'jig rten thams cad nges par yang / /
353b1(rgyud): dga' bar 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /ji ltar ma la bu sdug pa/ /de 'dir de bzhin gzhan du min/ /mkhas pa yis ni gi'u wang dag /nges par bdag gi khrag dang sbyar/ /lan
353b2(rgyud): grangs mang du sbyar nas kyang / /mkhas pas de ni thod par gzhag /de nas zla ba gzas zin tshe/ /zla ba la ni mig bltas shing / /btang gi bar du legs par bzlas/ /nang par

353b7(rgyud): gtsang ma dag tu yang / /der ni yi dwags phal chen gyi/ /dkyil 'khor de bris mchod pa bya/ /khro bo'i gtso bos gsungs pa yis/ /ro langs khro bo ldan pa la/ /gtor ma rgya
354a1(rgyud): chen byas nas ni/ /de nas phyi rol 'byung po la'o/ /de nas de la lag gis mnan/ /mi thod nang du 'dug pa yi/ /zhags pa ji srid g.yo yi bar/ /zla ba la
354a2(rgyud): bltas bzlas brjod bya/ /de nas gyen du 'phar na ni/ /sgrub pa la ni 'grub ces bya/ /de tshe zhags pa blangs nas ni/ /'jig rten lha rnams skad cig gis/ /bsam pas de

354a5(rgyud): dbul| |gnod sbyin bu mo'am dri za mo/ /yang na lha yi bu mo dag /bdag gi drung du skad cig gis/ /zhags pa des ni drangs nas su/ /de nas rig pa 'dzin mchog gis/ /
354a6(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i las rnams byed/ /gal te bsgrubs na dman pa dag /'dod pas gdungs par gyur pa ni/ /de tshe zhags pa de nyid kyis/ /lha yi ngo bo bkug nas ni/ /dogs
354a7(rgyud): pa med par bsten par bya/ /'dod pas gdungs kyang bud med min/ /dga' dang mya ngan gyis gdungs na/ /nad dang gtso bos sma phab pa/ /gcin dang rdul dang dri ma can/ /
354b1(rgyud): mi yi bud med rtag tu spang / /gal te 'dod pas gdungs gyur na/ /lha yi bud med bsten par bya/ /'on te sems dpa' chen po de/ /de tshe brtse ldan ma yin na/ /lha yi dbang
354b2(rgyud): phyug dge ba dang / /gnod sbyin gdug pa dag gis bskor/ /rang gi gzhal yas khang bzang na/ /'dug cing gang du 'dod par 'gro/ /gzhal med khang ni bzang po dag /lha
354b3(rgyud): rnams de la rab tu dbul/ /bcud kyis len ni du ma dang / /dpag bsam shing gi 'bras bu yang / /lha yi dbang phyug mnyam ldan pa/ /dogs pa med par thob par 'gyur/ /bkres
354b4(rgyud): skom nad las nges par thar/ /rig pa 'dzin par kun gyis mchod/ /zhags pa 'gul lam g.yo na ni/ /dngos grub 'di 'dra thob par 'gyur/ /'gul lam g.yos sam
354b5(rgyud): gzhan pa dag / gal te grub par ma gyur na/ /ma grub pa yi zhags pas kyang / /'jig rten pa yi las rnams bya/ /skyes pa'am yang na bud med dag /yid la 'dod pa

361b5(rgyud): rig 'dzin gzhan rnams thams cad kyang / /de la mchod cing dga' bar byed/ /dbang phyug kun dang rab tu ldan/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can yid bzhin 'gyur/ /de ste rtse gsum du
361b6(rgyud): ba 'byung / /de na lus ni mi snang 'gyur/ /'on te de ni tsha gyur na/ /dpung dang lha ma yin gyi gnas/ /g.yul ngo chen po la sogs par/ /'jigs shing skrag par byed/ /
361b7(rgyud): de ltar dang po sgrub pa'i mchog /'di ni rab tu bshad pa yin/ /da ni ral gri bzang po yang / /'dir ni sgrub par rab tu bshad/ /ur mo'i lcags las byas pa yis/ /ral gri
362a1(rgyud): sor ni sum cu gnyis/ /legs par byas shing phan byed la/ /glang po'i so la dngo byed la/ /ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas su/ /mchod pa la sogs sngon
362a2(rgyud): bzhin bya/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /ral gri lag par bzung ste bzlas/ /sngags pa'i chang bas bzung nas ni/ /rab tu snang ba 'bar ba 'byin/ /'bar ba de ni
362a3(rgyud): mthong nas su/ /rig 'dzin mchog tu de 'gyur ro/ /de ste de las du ba 'byung / /de nas de ni mi snang 'gyur/ /tsha bar gyur na de bzhin du/ /stobs chen rkang pa mgyogs
362a4(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /lo brgya rab tu tshang bar 'tsho/ /'di la rnam par dpyad mi dgos/ /gal te 'di la ma brten nas/ /grub pa thob par ma gyur na/ /ral gri brtson 'grus
362a5(rgyud): mchog ldan pas/ /g.yul ngor phyin nas thams cad du/ /myur zhing mi ngal nyon mi mongs/ /pham pa med par stong yang thub/ /ral gri sgrub pa bshad zin te/ /da ni be
362a6(rgyud): con sgrub pa bshad/ /ko bi da ra'i be con nam/ /yang na seng ldeng dag las ni/ /gshin rje'i be con lta bu bzang / /sor ni bzhi bcu gnyis pa bya/ /de nas blo ldan dur
362a7(rgyud): khrod du| |gtor ma cho ga rgya chen bya/ /be con mchog la sngon bzhin du/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /gos dmar bgos shing thal ba dang / /me tog dmar
362b1(rgyud): bos brgyan nas su/ /bsreg gzhi der 'dug be con las/ /ji srid ha ha zhes pa dang / /lag na be con 'gul ba'i bar/ /de srid cho ga bzhin du bzlas/ /de nas dang po khro bo'i
362b2(rgyud): bdag / dbang phyug kun dang rab ldan pa/ /de yi bcibs pa ma he la/ /zhon na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /skra ni lcang lo 'khyil ba stug /snum zhing mthing ga lta bur 'gyur/ /
362b3(rgyud): dus mtha'i sprin gyi kha dog 'dra/ /de yi lus mchog stobs kyang che/ /gal te khro bo de 'dod na/ /be con gyis ni lha rnams gsod/ /be con sgrub pa bshad pa yin/ /de bzhin
362b4(rgyud): legs par mdor bsdus na/ /dgra sta bzang po sgrub pa dag /de bzhin bdag gis bshad par bya/ /snga ma bzhin du ur mo las/ /dgra sta bzang po byas pa yang / /yu ba sor ni
362b5(rgyud): bcu drug pa/ /dgra sta de ni sor drug pa/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin bsgrubs na/ /dngos grub de dag de yis 'thob/ /de nas gzhan yang lcags kyu'i mchog /sgrub pa bdag gis bshad
362b6(rgyud): par bya| |ur mo'i lcags las byas pa yis/ /lcags kyu sor ni bzhi par bya/ /de yi yu ba mnyam pa la/ /sor ni bco brgyad yod par bya/ /nyi shu dgu yi tshes grangs la/ /nub mo
362b7(rgyud): mchod pa gtor ma byas/ /ri yi rtse la 'dug nas su/ /lcags kyu cho ga bsgrub par bya/ /ser skya las byung mar dag gis/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /ji srid sgron ma bzhin
363a1(rgyud): 'bar ba/ /de srid lag pas bzung ste bzlas/ /de nas de ni thogs pa yis/ /the tshom med par nam langs na/ /'od ni me bzhin kun tu snang / /gyen du 'bar
363a2(rgyud): zhing 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa yi lha rnams ni/ /bran g.yog bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' mchog bzhin/ /bka' yang rab tu nyan par
363a3(rgyud): 'gyur| |'on te de yi lcags kyu'i mchog / du ba 'byung bar gyur na ni/ /de tshe du ba byung ba yis/ /stobs chen grib ma'ang mi snang 'gyur/ /sngags pa bya ba gsum du gson/ /
363a4(rgyud): gnod sbyin rig 'dzin rnams kyis mchod/ /bde ba kun dang rab tu ldan/ /'dod pas 'byor zhing stobs kyang che/ /khro bo sngags kyis mthu stongs nas/ /gal te de ni tshar gyur na//
363a5(rgyud): nang bar bkra shis byas nas su/ /lcags kyu bzang po de thogs nas/ /bzlas na brgya byin la sogs pa'i/ /lha rnams 'gugs pa gdon mi za/ /gnod sbyin rig 'dzin
363a6(rgyud): rnams dag dang / /de bzhin lto 'phye mi 'am ci/ /lha ma yin gyi bu mo dang / /de bzhin dri za'i bu mo dang / /yi dwags ro langs rigs rnams dang / /de bzhin gzhan yang myos
363a7(rgyud): dregs rnams/ /bkug nas bdag gis las rnams ni/ /ji ltar 'dod pa byed du gzhug /gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len/ /grub pa yi ni rdzas rnams dang / /gzhan
363b1(rgyud): yang yid la gang 'dod pa/ /de dag thams cad de la ni/ /lha dang gnod sbyin tshogs la sogs/ /ji snyed pa dag 'bul bar byed/ /de yi bka' ni thams cad kyang / /'jigs
363b2(rgyud): pas nges par nyan par 'gyur/ /ngo mtshar kun gyis brgyan pa yis/ /rang gi bzhon pas yongs bskor cing / /gnas dang skyed mos tshal mang po/ /ngo mtshar kun dang rab ldan pa/ /
363b3(rgyud): khyim dang slas kyi gnas rnams dang / /'jig rten ma lus ston par byed/ /rdzu 'phrul yon t+na longs spyod kyis/ /sgrub pa po ni dga' bar byed/ /ji srid lcags kyu 'chang ba'i mi/ /de
363b4(rgyud): yi bka' yis nges pa ru/ /gnod sbyin mo dag rang rang gi /'dod pa'i longs spyod na ye bar sbyor/ /de ste las kyi skyon dag gis/ /tsha ba tsam du ma gyur na/ /lcags kyu de nyid 'dir
363b5(rgyud): bzung ste/ /nang par dben par 'dug nas su/ /bu mo gang gi ming bcug ste/ /ji srid 'dod pa bzlas nas ni/ /dpag tshad brgya brgyan gnas pa/ /de nas myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /bu
363b6(rgyud): mo'am yang na khye'u yang rung / /ji ltar 'dug pa myur du 'grub/ /me tog 'bras bu de bzhin grub/ /shing rta dang ni ljon shing dag /ma grub na yang rtag pa ru/ /de ni nges par khugs
363b7(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /de ltar lcags kyu dam pa 'di/ /sgrub pa rab tu bshad pa yin/ /thod pa'i dngos grub gang yin pa/ /de yang 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /rtse gsum ral gri be con dang / /
364a1(rgyud): de bzhin dgra sta lcags kyu yi/ /sgrub pa gang dag bshad pa yi/ /lag pa g.yas pas gzung bar bya/ /thod pa la sogs gzhan rnams ni/ /lag pa
364a2(rgyud): g.yon pas bzung bsgrubs na/ /de nas de dag bshad pa bzhin/ /dngos grub nges par thob par 'gyur/ /shing las legs par byas pa yi/ /thod pa sor ni nyi shu pa/ /mnyam
364a3(rgyud): par rab tu legs byas la/ /nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa/ /ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas su/ /mchod rten gtor ma'i rim par byas/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas
364a4(rgyud): su| |sngags kyang srung ba mthu bskyed de/ /thod pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung / /lag pa g.yas pas bsten nas ni/ /de yi kha yang dgab par bya/ /ji srid de la 'bar ba dang / /du
364a5(rgyud): ba'am tsha ba byung gi bar/ /de srid sngags ni bzlas par bya/ /'bar nas nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten gsum gyi bdag por bshad/ /du ba byung bar gyur na yang //
364a6(rgyud): de bzhin nges par mi snang 'gyur/ /'on te tsha bar de gyur na/ /de yi tshe na gang bsam pa/ /thod pa de las 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de la rnam par dpyad mi dgos/ /'on te de ni ma
364a7(rgyud): grub na| |de nas sa la mi gzhag par/ /de yi thod pa blangs nas su/ /shing gi khri la gzhag par bya/ /ras kyis g.yogs te bzhag nas su/ /yid la ci 'dod bsam pa
364b1(rgyud): yis| |zan dang bza' dang bya na rnams/ /gang yang rung ba de dag nyid/ /ras g.yogs lag gis bzung nas su/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na/ /grub pa la ni nyin re zhing / /de
364b2(rgyud): nas gang yang rung ba'i zas/ /bya na bcangs pas nges par ru/ /thod pa de nang gang bar 'gyur/ /sems can rnams ni gang la yang / /bdud rtsi zas ni sbyin par bya/ /tshul bzhin pa
364b3(rgyud): yi 'og tu ni/ /gtsang sbra byas te tshul bzhin bza'/ /thod pa sgrub pa bshad pa 'di/ /lag pa g.yon pas gzung bar bya/ /mdung thung rnon po legs byas pa/ /bshol ba med pa
364b4(rgyud): bsgrub par bya/ /ur mo'i lcags las byas pa mchog /bkra shis sor ni sum cu gnyis/ /de nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/ /chu 'gram gtsang ma dag tu ni/ /sngon bzhin mtshan mo bsgrub
364b5(rgyud): par bya| |dngos grub 'bras bu gsum du bshad/ /de ltar ji ltar bshad pa bzhin/ /mda' bo che yang mkhas pas bsgrub/ /ur mo'i lcags las byas pa'i mchog /rab tu rno ba
364b6(rgyud): snga ma bzhin/ /bdug pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas su/ /tsan+dan dmar pos gdab par bya/ /sgrub pa pos ni cho ga bzhin/ /ri yi rtse mor 'dug nas ni/ /snga ma bzhin du mtshan mo bsgrub//
364b7(rgyud): grub na 'bras bu snga ma bzhin/ /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo ni/ /lag pa g.yas pas g.yogs nas su/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin byas nas/ /zla ba gza' yis zin pa'i tshe/ /stan
365a1(rgyud): gcig pa la legs 'dug nas/ /blo dang ldan pas bzlas byas nas/ /de nas mdzub mo de las ni/ /gdon mi za bar 'bar bar 'gyur/ /yang na du ba
365a2(rgyud): 'byung ba'am/ /de ni tsha bar 'gyur yang srid/ /de ni nges par 'bar gyur na/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /du ba byung bar gyur pa las/ /de bzhin mi snang 'gyur bar
365a3(rgyud): bshad| |de tshe rab tu tshar gyur na/ /rkang pa mgyogs par rab tu 'thob/ /de ste lag pa g.yon pa yi/ /mdzub mo grub par ma gyur te/ /dngos grub nyams kyang nges par ni/ /las
365a4(rgyud): rnams sna tshogs byed par 'gyur/ /khros nas de yis bsdigs na ni/ /mi de ji ltar 'dod pa ru/ /de ma thag tu 'gyel bar 'gyur/ /sngags mkhan dag gis bsad nas kyang / /
365a5(rgyud): de nas shi bar gyur pa de/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa yis/ /ji srid 'dod par slong bar byed/ /rab tu 'khrugs pa'i dpung chen yang / /de nas de yis bsdigs par nus/ /glang po
365a6(rgyud): dang ni rta rnams dang / /ljon shing dang ni nags tshal rnams/ /ring por mi thogs 'jig par byed/ /ri rnams kun gyi rtse mo dag /rab tu bzang zhing mtho ba yang / /de nas de yi mdzub
365a7(rgyud): mo des| |ring por mi thogs snyil bar byed/ /mdzub mo dngos grub kun sbyin pa'i/ /grub pa'i mchog ni bshad pa yin/ /de nas gzhan yang zhags pa yi/ /sgrub pa'ang 'dir ni
365b1(rgyud): bshad par bya/ /shis pa'i skra la zhags pa ni/ /sbom zhing yid du 'ong ba bya/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin bsgrubs na/ /de yis dngos grub de nyid 'thob/ /shing ni rab tu bzang po las/ /
365b2(rgyud): dbyug to sor ni bcu drug bya/ /legs par gzhogs dang legs bris pa/ /bzang po yid du 'ong byas na/ /de yi mgo bo dag la yang / /rab tu bzang po'i gser gyis dkri/ /de yi rtse
365b3(rgyud): la nor bu ni/ /pad+ma rA gas spras par bya/ /de nas tshul bzhin ri rtse la/ /cho ga sngon du bshad pa bzhin/ /mngon du bdug pa'i sbyin sreg bya/ /sgrub pa po yis nub mo bsgrub/ /'bar ba de
365b4(rgyud): ni blangs nas su/ /nam mkhar 'phags pa gdon mi za/ /snga ma bzhin du grub rnams kyi/ /gtso bor gyur cing 'dod gzugs can/ /du ba tshal sogs pas kyang / /de yi 'bras bu
365b5(rgyud): sngon bzhin 'thob/ /mtshon cha mchog rnams sgrub pa ni/ /de ltar mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/ /de nas cho ga las byung ba'i/ /dngos grub gzhan yang bshad bya ste/ /ji ltar khro bo
365b6(rgyud): mchog gis ni/ /nyid kyis mdor bsdus bshad pa'o/ /yi dwags mang po zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor thog mar bris nas su/ /rma med pa yi ro blangs nas/ /mkhas par khrus byas legs
365b7(rgyud): par brgyan/ /me tog spos kyis mchod nas su/ /sha dang bcas pa'i gtor ma sbyin/ /las ni dur khrod dag tu bya/ /'di ni gzhan du yong mi bya/ /me tog bkram pa'i gnas mal du//
366a1(rgyud): nub phyogs sgo phyogs mgo bstan gzhag /thod pa bzang po zas mchog gis/ /rab tu bkang ba blangs nas su/ /zas mchog dag gi nang du yang / /tshil
366a2(rgyud): chen dag gis blug par bya/ /mkhas pa de dag de yi tshe/ /khro bo sngags kyis btab pa yi/ /sbyin blugs brgya ni tshang tshang du/ /gzar bus mi yi khar blugs na/ /de yi lce yang
366a3(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de nas mtshon gyis gcad par bya/ /lce ni rtsa bar bcad pa las/ /khro bo mthu yis myur bar ru/ /de nas de nyid ral gri'i gzugs/ /bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis
366a4(rgyud): 'gyur| |de nas ral gri blangs nas su/ /grogs rnams la ni re re sbyin/ /sgrub pa po yis blangs nas ni/ /de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin de dag thams cad kyis/ /
366a5(rgyud): kun tu bkur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/ /grogs po de rnams dang bcas par/ /bskal pa bdun du gnas par 'gyur/ /yang na mkhas pas dur khrod du/ /yi dwags mang po zhes bya
366a6(rgyud): ba'i| |dkyil 'khor de ni bris nas su/ /mchod pa ji skad gsungs pa bya/ /skyes pa bud med shi ba yi/ /rma med pa yi ro blangs nas/ /legs par khrus byas rgyan gyis brgyan/ /
366a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor de yi sgor bzhag ste/ /de yi snying gar de 'dug nas/ /stong rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa bya/ /khro bo mchog tu gyur pa'i sngags/ /yi ge bcu bdun stong rtsa brgyad/ /de bzlas
366b1(rgyud): nas ni dngos grub thob/ /mi ro de ni ldang bar 'gyur/ /mchod yon legs par dbul bar bya/ /de yi mgo la lag g.yon gyis/ /de ma thag tu reg byas na/ /ldong ros me yi mdog 'dra
366b2(rgyud): ba| |de bas bdag nyid can de yi/ /kha nas myur du 'byung bar 'gyur/ /sgrub pa po yis de blangs te/ /yan lag thams cad bskus nas ni/ /btso ma'i gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /grogs
366b3(rgyud): rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin/ /de ma thag tu de dag kun/ /btso ma gser gyi mdog tu 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can 'gyur/ /rig 'dzin rnams ni thams cad kyi/ /thog mar
366b4(rgyud): 'gro ba de dag 'gyur/ /rdzas rnams thams cad grub par ni/ /grub na de la de nas yang / /dkon mchog gsum la cha gcig dbul/ /de nas mkhas pas bdag nyid bkur/ /grogs
366b5(rgyud): po rnams ni thams cad la'ang / /byin nas 'di nas nam mkhar 'phur/ /rdzas gcig grub par gyur pa la/ /cho ga gzhan yang spyad bya ste/ /rdzas gcig grub par gyur na ni/ /thog
366b6(rgyud): mar phyag kyang byas nas su/ /dkon mchog gsum la cho ga bzhin/ /bdag nyid rab tu dbul bar bya/ /de yi 'og tu rdzas de blangs/ /grogs po rnams la rim bzhin du/ /rdzas de
366b7(rgyud): byin nas 'phur bar 'gyur/ /phyi nas cho ga 'di rnams spyad/ /de ltar ma byas grub na yang / /de yi rdzas ni 'phrog par 'gyur/ /de bas dngos grub mchog rnams la/ /kun tu ji srid
367a1(rgyud): bshad bzhin bya/ /de nas gzhan yang any+dza na/ /bza' ba sgrub pa ji bzhin pa/ /dgos pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir/ /dam pa 'di ni bshad par bya/ /
367a2(rgyud): zhag gsum smyung bar 'dug nas su/ /dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri/ /de nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/ /der ni gtor ma'i las bya'o/ /de nas mi ro bsregs pa yi/ /thal bas
367a3(rgyud): bdag nyid bsrung bar bya/ /de yis bdag nyid byugs nas su/ /grogs po'i mchog ldan dga' ba des/ /de yis bdag nyid byugs nas su/ /any+dza na yi snying po de/ /gsal
367a4(rgyud): shing gis bsad mgo la gzhag / shi ba'i gos kyis g.yogs nas su/ /lag pas bzung ste bzlas byas te/ /dngos grub rnam gsum 'byung ba'i bar/ /blo can gyis ni de srid
367a5(rgyud): bzlas| |tsha ba'am yang na du ba 'byung / /yang na me bzhin 'bar bar 'gyur/ /de yis mig dag bskus na ni/ /'bar bas nam mkha' 'gro bar 'gyur/ /du bas lus ni mi
367a6(rgyud): snang bar/ /gdon mi za bar 'gyur bar bshad/ /tsha bar gyur na bltas pa yis/ /'gro ba dag ni gsod par 'gyur/ /slar yang legs par gso ba ni/ /ring por mi thogs
367a7(rgyud): gdon mi za/ /'di la sgrub par ma gyur na'ang / /mig dag legs par bskus na ni/ /bltas pas 'gro ba dbang du 'gyur/ /pus mos btsugs shing mgo bos 'dud/ /any+dza
367b1(rgyud): na yi cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas pas gi'u wang bsgrub par bya/ /dngos grub dag kyang de bzhin bstan/ /ma grub 'gro ba dbang du 'gyur/ /li khri dang ni ba la dang / /ldong ros dag/
367b2(rgyud): kyang de bzhin te/ /any+dza na yi dpyad bzhin du/ /mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya/ /shi ba'i gos kyang cho ga bzhin/ /sgrub pa gzhan dag de bzhin du/ /khro bo nyid kyis gsungs
367b3(rgyud): pa'i sngags/ /mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya/ /dur khrod dag tu dkyil 'khor bri/ /mchod pa dang ni gtor ma bya/ /shi ba'i gos de bgos nas ni/ /cho ga shes pas mtshan mo
367b4(rgyud): bzlas| |de nas gos de dang bcas par/ /mtshan mo rab tu 'bar 'gyur na/ /'bar zhing 'bar bas yongs bskor nas/ /nam mkha' dag la legs par 'phar/ /gad mo rab tu
367b5(rgyud): dgod pa'i sgra/ /'jig rten skrag par byed par 'byin/ /rtag tu 'dod pa'i gzugs dang ldan/ /khro bo bzhin du de spyod 'gyur/ /de bzhin du ba byung na yang / /gdon mi za bar mi snang
367b6(rgyud): ba'i| |mchog tu 'gyur bar rab tu bshad/ /sgrub pa de yi gos de ni/ /de bzhin tsha bar gyur na yang / /rkang pa mgyogs shing stobs cher 'gyur/ /sa steng rnams su khyab par 'gro//
367b7(rgyud): nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /de ste sgrub par ma gyur na'ang / /'gro ba ma lus dbang du 'gyur/ /gang rnams mthong zhing de bzhin te/ /mthong ba de dag bran bzhin 'gyur/ /gal te
368a1(rgyud): 'di dag gnod sbyin mo/ /mi yis sgrub par 'dod na ni/ /ba ti shing drung nyams dga' ba/ /de tshe dkyil 'khor bris nas su/ /skra ba shig gos kyang med
368a2(rgyud): byas la| |zas mchog legs par btsos pa yis/ /lhung bzed bzang po yongs bkang nas/ /mar gyi ngo yi mtshan mo bsgrub/ /de nas chang bu bdun phyung ste/ /sngags kyis lan
368a3(rgyud): bdun btab nas su/ /lha yi bzang po 'di bzhes zhes/ /byas nas de yi rgyab tu dor/ /de nas gzhan yang chang bu bdun/ /sngags kyis btab ste bza' bar bya/ /lha yi bzang
368a4(rgyud): po zhes bya ba/ /grub pa gnod sbyin kun gyi rje/ /'khor rnams mang pos kun bskor nas/ /de nas de yi 'od 'bar 'gyur/ /de nas kha bkrus de la ni/ /spos dang me tog
368a5(rgyud): mchog ldan pa'i/ /mchod yon chu ni dbul bar bya/ /legs 'ongs me tog dag kyang dbul/ /de nas stan bzang nyams dga' bar/ /me tog ldan pa phul na ni/ /da ni khyod
368a6(rgyud): kyis bdag grub ste/ /bka' bzhin byed cing de bzhin du/ /gzhan du mi 'gyur bka' nyan gyi/ /bka' stsol cig ces de la smra/ /ma 'am yang na sring mo 'am/ /mdza' mo'am
368a7(rgyud): yang na chung mar 'gyur/ /mar brjod pas ni nges par yang / /de yis ldong ros la sogs pa/ /grub pa'i rdzas ni mang po dag /gdon mi za bar de la ster/ /sring mos me tog
368b1(rgyud): 'bras bu dang / /bdud rtsi mchog dang gser 'gyur rtsi/ /rtag tu sgrub pa po de la/ /gdon mi za bar ster bar 'gyur/ /mdza' mor gyur cig ces smras nas/ /mtshan mo lding khang
368b2(rgyud): mchog rnams dang / /yid du 'ong ba gzhan rnams kyang / /bdag nyid dga' bar ston par byed/ /myur du chung ma sdug pa dang / /dpag tshad brgya nas khri de 'ong / /gzhan yang sgrub pa
368b3(rgyud): po de la| |des shing 'dod dang dga' ba ster/ /de ste de la chung mar smras/ /'dod pa'i gzugs can rnam par mdzes/ /dbang phyug longs spyod thams cad kyis/ /grub pa de ni dga'
368b4(rgyud): bar byed/ /des shing 'dod pa dga' ba ster/ /'dzum zhing sri zhu 'jo ma dang / /dbang phyug longs spyod thams cad ni/ /sgrub pa ji srid 'dod pa spyod/ /gal te mngal nas skyes pa
368b5(rgyud): yis| |sha za mo dag sgrub 'dod na/ /sgrub pa po la de yi las/ /de dag 'di ni bshad par bya/ /she la ka ta'i shing drung ni/ /gtsang mar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /mchod pa chen
368b6(rgyud): po byas nas su/ /gtor ma'i las kyang sngon bzhin bya/ /der ni dur khrod shing dag gis/ /sngags pas mi ni rab sngar nas/ /gos med skra yang hag byas te/ /de nas mi yang 'bar ba
368b7(rgyud): la| |der ni gzegs ma'i sbyin sreg rnams/ /sngags kyis stong rtsa brgyad bsregs na/ /de tshe gdon me za bar yang / /sha za mo ni 'bar ba'i gdong / /'ong bar 'gyur te de yi tshe/ /
369a1(rgyud): sems ni dpa' bar byas nas su/ /mi 'jigs mdun du mchod yon dbul/ /de yi 'og tu de la ni/ /bdag nyid gzugs ni bzang por ston/ /de yi ming ni
369a2(rgyud): kang rang gi / rang ming sngags kyis sbyin sreg bya/ /gang bsam pa yi nor de rnams/ /'ongs nas ring por mi thogs par/ /gdon mi za bar rab tu dbul/ /kang rang gi ni zhes bya
369a3(rgyud): ba| |sha za mo ni kun gyi mchog / sgrub pa po ni sems dpa' zhing / /gzi yang rab tu che ba la/ /gdon rnams thams cad rab tu sgrub/ /de ltar min na myur bar ni/ /sgrub po yang
369a4(rgyud): ni gsod par byed/ /de ste klu yi bu mo dag /de la rig 'dzin dpal ldan pas/ /sgrub pa dag tu 'dod pa la/ /de yi cho gar 'di bshad do/ /pad+ma dkar po'i mtsho 'gram du/ /song
369a5(rgyud): nas cho ga snga ma bzhin/ /yi dwags mang po zhes bya ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor der ni bri bar bya/ /de nas der ni mkhas pa yis/ /gtor ma'i cho ga snga ma bzhin/ /u dum ba ra'i yaM
369a6(rgyud): shing gis/ /thog mar me ni rab sbar nas/ /nA ga ge sar phye ma dag /mkhas pas stong rtsa brgyad du bsreg /sbyin sreg byed tshe myur bar ni/ /de nas klu yi bu mo dag /'jigs
369a7(rgyud): shing skrag nas 'ong bar 'gyur/ /gal te mtshan mo de bsregs na/ /sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa/ /gdon mi za bar rab tu ster/ /de ste sngags pa lha min gyi/ /phug sgor song
369b1(rgyud): nas ci dga' bar/ /lha ma yin mo thams cad ni/ /las 'di dag ni thams cad bsgrub/ /dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris nas/ /gtor ma'i cho ga rgya cher bya/ /bring ku yi shing
369b2(rgyud): dag gis/ /zhugs thab tu ni me sbar nas/ /cho ga bzhin du sngags zlos shing / /yungs kar dkar po gur gum la/ /smyugs nas stong rtsa brgyad bzlas la/ /de nas nges par
369b3(rgyud): bsreg par bya/ /de nas sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe/ /lha min na chung 'byung bar byed/ /sgrub pa po ni gang 'dod pa/ /gdon mi za bar rab tu ster/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas dag tu/ /bde
369b4(rgyud): ba'i lam nas 'jug par byed/ /dbang phyug kun dang ldan par ni/ /de na de ni 'grub par byed/ /gal te 'dir ni sngags pa dag /sha chen dag ni 'chong 'dod na/ /dang por dur
369b5(rgyud): khrod 'dug nas su/ /dpa' ba'i sems kyis sha chen blang / /blangs nas srung ba byas nas su/ /lag pa g.yon pas chu gri thogs/ /g.yas pas sha chen skyo med gzung / /
369b6(rgyud): mtshan mo dur khrod du zhugs nas/ /sems pa dpa' bas gshin rje'i gshed/ /khro bo yid la zlos byed cing / /sha 'tshong pa yi sgra sgrog go /bdag nyid chen po de yi tshig /
369b7(rgyud): srin po dam tshig med pa dang / /sems can phra mo kha cig gis/ /thos na rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur/ /gang gzhan lhag pa'i sems yod cing / /drag po'i dur khrod gnas
370a1(rgyud): skyong ba| |sna tshogs gzugs can stobs po che/ /de dag lus ni ston par byed/ /grub pa 'jigs par mi bya bar/ /de nas sems ni drag po des/ /

370b1(rgyud): ni mthong ba yis/ /de dag thams cad mthong ma thag /mnan te ri bzhin mi g.yor 'gyur/ /glang po rgyal po myos pa dang / /shing rta rta dang glang por bcas/ /rkang thang 'khrugs pa

370b5(rgyud): 'gyur| |yang na lha khang stong par 'gro/ /phyir yang stong par yong mi bya/ /de nas der yang thal ba de/ /nam nangs bar du bzlas bar bya/ /nam ni nangs par gyur pa na/ /thal ba da ni

375b2(rgyud): gzhan du gar yang yong mi sbyar/ /de nas gzhan yang bskrad pa'i las/ /'di dag gar yang rung bar ni/ /de bzhin byed par 'dod pa la/ /de bzhin par ni bshad par bya/ /de bzhin

375b6(rgyud): rab tu tsha ba'i nad kyis 'debs/ /de nas zhi ba'i cho ga yis/ /bdag nyid kyis ni zhi bar bya/ /de ltar ma byas zhag bdun gyis/ /gdon ma za bar 'chi bar 'gyur/ /de la sogs
375b7(rgyud): pa'i las rnams ni/ /bde gshegs sems dpas yong mi bya/ /sems can rnams ni thams cad la/ /zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa bya/ /byang chub sems kyi bdag nyid can/ /ring por
376a1(rgyud): mi thogs 'grub par 'gyur/ /de nas sems can thams cad ni/ /bde phyir zhi ba'i las rnams dang / /de bzhin du ni rgyas pa'i las/ /ji skad gsungs
376a2(rgyud): pa bshad par bya/ /mchod rten dag gam dkyil 'khor du/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bya/ /dkon mchog gsum po dag la ni/ /yang dang yang du phyag kyang bya//
376a3(rgyud): nyin par dang ni mtshan mo yang / /dge ba gang dag ci bsags pa/ /dkon mchog gsum la de brten nas/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i bsam pas bya/ /'di yis sems can
376a4(rgyud): thams cad ni/ /shin tu sdug bsngal bder gyur cig /de yis dngos grub cung zad gang / /phra mo dag kyang 'thob 'gyur ba/ /rtag tu sems can rnams la ni/ /mkhas
376a5(rgyud): pa dag gis phan par bya/ /mkhas pas mchod rten las bya zhing / /de bzhin dam pa'i chos kyang bklag /dge ba cung zad gzhan dag kyang / /chung du zin kyang 'di nyid
376a6(rgyud): la| |dngos grub mchog ni thob 'dod pas/ /rtag tu sems can rnams la bsngo/ /de ltar 'di ni byang chub sems/ /chos kyi don du yul du 'gyur/ /byang chub sems
376a7(rgyud): dpa' nyer bsnyen pa'i/ /mtshan nyid rnams kyang rab tu bstan/ /de ltar blo gros brtan byas nas/ /dge ba dag ni spel bar bya/ /dge ba dag kyang spel nas su/ /sems
376b1(rgyud): can rnams la yongs su bsngo/ /sngags pa bde gshegs sems ldan gang / /de lta bur ni rtag pa ru/ /sems can kun la phan byas nas/ /zhi ba dag dang rgyas pa 'phel//
376b2(rgyud): thog mar dkon mchog gsum po la/ /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas su/ /de yi 'og tu khro bo mchog /gshin rje'i gshed la me tog ni/ /dkar po mchog gis mchod pa
376b3(rgyud): bya| |mchod pa byas nas 'di dag tu/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /bde zhing stan la bder 'dug la/ /rab tu dang zhing bde gshegs sems/ /de yi ming smos zhi 'gyur zhes/ /
376b4(rgyud): khro bo'i tshig gis mthar sbyar te/ /bau Sha Ta dag kyang tha mar sbyar/ /gang yang rung ba zhig la ni/ de ltar stong du bzlas pa bya/ /yul dang yul gyi phyogs rnams dang / /rgyal po
376b5(rgyud): dag la nyis 'gyur bya/ /rta rnams dang ni glang po dang / /ba lang dag la stong du bzlas/ /ra lug dang ni ma he la/ /rtag par stong du bzlas par gsungs/ /yang na lus can
376b6(rgyud): thams cad la/ /bzlas pa dag ni byas nas kyang / /byang chub sems dang ldan pa yis/ /zhi ba'i mchog tu nges par 'gyur/ /de bzhin du yang rgyas gyur pa/ /khyad par du ni me
376b7(rgyud): tog mchog / dkar po tsan+dan gyis bskus pa/ /bzlas shing bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin/ /'jam dpal khro bo'i spyan sngar ni/ /'o mas gang ba'i snod du dbul/ /stong gis rab tu
377a1(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur/ /snying la rab tu dga' 'gyur ba'i/ /rgyas pa de dag bya 'dod na/ /gang yang rung ba de yi ming / /cho ga bzhin du tha mar sbyar/ /mkhas
377a2(rgyud): pas rgyas par gyur cig ces/ /de mthar bshad pa sbyar nas su/ /me tog yid du 'ong ba rnams/ /'o mar blugs pas rgyas par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang dpal 'dod pa/ /
377a3(rgyud): der yang snga ma bzhin du ni/ /tsan+dan dkar pos bskus pa yi/ /me tog yid du 'ong bas mchod/ /a kar nag po bzang po yis/ /bdug pa dag kyang sngags kyis dbul/ /
377a4(rgyud): nyin re de ltar byas nas su/ /cho ga bzhin du bzlas pa bya/ /dpal ni bdag la stsol cig ces/ /mtha' ma dag tu sbyar nas su/ /de nas na maHswAhAr ldan/ /cho ga sngon
377a5(rgyud): bzhin khri bzlas te/ /de nas rgya mtshor rab 'gro ba'i/ /klung gi 'gram du song nas ni/ /lte ba nub par chur 'dug nas/ /me tog puN+Da rI ka ni/ /tsan+dan dkar pos bskus nas
377a6(rgyud): ni| |bzlas shing bzlas shing chur 'bul ba/ /blo dang ldan pas 'bul byas nas/ /de yi mjug tu dpal chen 'thob/ /yang na pad+ma dmar po ni/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus
377a7(rgyud): nas ni| |gal te de ru phul na ni/ /de nas de yi mtha' ma ru/ /las 'di dag gis nges par ni/ /mi zad pa yi gter 'thob 'gyur/ /a ti muk+ta'i me tog rnams/ /bzlas shing
377b1(rgyud): bzlas shing snga ma bzhin/ /gal te chig 'bum phul na ni/ /cho gas gsungs pa bzhin gnas pa'i/ /sngags pas nges par de mthar ni/ /'di nor 'bum ni thob par 'gyur/ /'di
377b2(rgyud): la rnam par dpyad mi bya/ /de ste de yi snga ma bzhin/ /sum 'bum dbul bar byas na ni/ /gdon mi za bar gnod sbyin ma/ /de yi dbang du 'di 'gyur ro/ /cho ga 'di yis sgrub pa po/ /
377b3(rgyud): rin chen dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ /de ste sngags pas snga ma bzhin/ /me tog sna tshogs mang po ni/ /tsan+dan dag gis bskus pa rnams/ /de nas sngags pas chig 'bum du/ /chu
377b4(rgyud): yi nang du phul na ni/ /sa yi steng na 'dod pa 'thob/ /yang na pad+ma dkar po ni/ /mngar gsum dag gis bskus pa rnams/ /me 'bar nang du legs bsregs na/ /de yis dpa' bo
377b5(rgyud): mngon sum mthong / /de yis de la 'dod mchog dang / /nor dag kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /blo dang ldan pa zas kyi mchog /mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba dang / /zhag bdun du ni
377b6(rgyud): gzar bu yis/ /de yis de la 'dod mchog dang / /nor dag kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur/ /'bar ba'i me la bsregs nas su/ /yul gru bdun rnams rab tu 'thob/ /'di la rnam par
377b7(rgyud): dpyad mi dgos/ /yang na 'bru rnams thams cad kyi/ /sbyin sreg don rnams thams cad sgrub/ /sbyin sreg cig 'bum byas pa yis/ /de dag nyid ni mi zad 'gyur/ /bil ba mar
378a1(rgyud): gyis bskus pa 'bum/ /me ni rab tu 'bar ba la/ /bsregs nas sa yi bdag po la/ /nor bcas dag ni thob par 'gyur/ /dur ba'i 'jag ma ma grub
378a2(rgyud): pa| |na ma swAhA mthar ldan pas/ /'o ma las smyugs bsregs na ni/ /mi yi tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin mar dang sprang rtsi dag /'bar ba'i me la rtag tu bsreg /gdon mi
378a3(rgyud): za bar gyur ba ru/ /yid gzhungs pa yang thob par 'gyur/ /rgya skyegs shing gi me dag la/ /de bzhin nyin re mar gyi hom/ /byas na tshe dang yid gzhungs grags/ /rgyas dang
378a4(rgyud): stobs dang gzi brjid dang / /dran dang dga' dang mdangs bzang dang / /dpal dang sems dpa'i dngos grub dag /thob par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /de bzhin zas rnams
378a5(rgyud): kun bsregs pas/ /gzi dang rgyas dang stobs dang grags/ /'dod pa thams cad phun sum tshogs/ /thob par 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /ji ltar cho ga phyi ma las/ /phal cher
378a6(rgyud): 'jam dbyangs khro bo yi/ /pad+ma'i zhal nas nges 'byung ba/ /de dag mdor bsdus bshad pa yin/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo gshin rje'i gshed rnams
378a7(rgyud): par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo kun gyi phyi ma las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi khro bo'i cho ga zhib mo phyi ba rim par phye ma ste dgu pa rtogs pa phyi ma rdzogs so// //de
378b1(rgyud): nas cho ga thams cad kyi/ /phyi ma'i phyi ma zhes bya ba/ /sbyar bar bcas shing rgyas pa yi/ /cho ga da ni bshad par bya/ /yi ge bcu bdun sngags kyis ni/ /dpa' bo brtul zhugs
378b2(rgyud): bzang po dang / /de bzhin sngon du bsnyen la sogs/ /cho ga dag ni 'dir bshad zin/ /da ni yi ge 'bru gcig pa/ /sngags mchog dag ni gang gsungs pa/ /de yi las kyi cho ga
378b3(rgyud): bshad| |dpa' bo brtul zhugs med par yang / /'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo gang / /ming ni gshin rje'i gshed ces bya/ /de yi snying po mchog de ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i yi ge
378b4(rgyud): gcig / thog mar oM bzhag cho ga bzhin/ /ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su/ /'di ni 'bum phrag bcur bzlas nas/ /de yi 'og tu sgrub la 'jug /de nas de yi ri mo mchog /

378b6(rgyud): bskus la/ /tshon rtsa bzang po sbyin med pas/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed bri bya/ /zhal ni bgrad cing 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ /smin ma ser zhing spu yang ser/ /char sprin nag
378b7(rgyud): po'i kha dog 'dra/ /thod pa dag gis rgyan du byas/ /spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes/ /zhal gcig pa la mdangs kyang gsal/ /phyag gnyis pa la be con bsnams/ /

379a3(rgyud): pa yan lag mchog gis mchod/ /sngags pa brtul zhugs brtan pa ni/ /de yi 'og tu brag phug zhugs/ /ri mo'i spyan sngar 'dug nas su/ /kha zas za ba dag spangs nas//
379a4(rgyud): ri dbang de ni ji tsam du/ /g.yo bar 'gyur gyi/ /bar du bzlas/ /yang na khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/ /bzhad dam g.yos kyi bar du bzlas/ /yang na rab tu 'bar gyi bar/ /bzlas

379a6(rgyud): bsam pa ni de dag kun/ /ring por mi thogs 'byor par 'gyur/ /khros na sa yang 'gas par 'gyur/ /chu dag kyang ni skam par 'gyur/ /ri rnams thams cad snyil bar nus//
379a7(rgyud): rgya mtsho dag kyang skam par byed/ /de la sogs pa'i las rnams ni/ /ya mtshan chen po thams cad dang / /sems can rnams ni thams cad la/ /phan pa rnam pa sna tshogs
379b1(rgyud): byed| |cho ga snga ma gsungs pa kun/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs/ /bsgrubs nas sems can thams cad la/ /'bras bu mchog rnams sbyin par bya/ /grub pa'i mthu ni gang
379b2(rgyud): yod pa| |bde gshegs bsams na de dag kun/ /'jungs pa med pa'i bsam pa yis/ /skye bo phongs pa rnams la sbyin/ /snying rje can gyis bdag gis lus/ /phongs pa dag la
379b3(rgyud): rtag tu sbyin/ /de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/ /dri ma med par bsgrubs nas su/ /dge ba 'di yis sems can kun/ /bde bar gshegs ldan dge bar 'gyur/ /bde ba thams
379b4(rgyud): cad yongs rdzogs shing / /dge ba kun gyi snod gyur ces/ /yid kyis yongs su bsngo bar bya/ /gang zhig de ltar sngags bsgrubs kyang / /di ma med pa'i byang chub sems/ /bde
379b5(rgyud): ba rtag tu spyod pa de/ /dngos grub rtog las gang gsungs pa/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung / /thams cad de la nye bar gnas/ /sgrub pa po de rdzu 'phrul gyi/ /yon
379b6(rgyud): tan kun dang ldan par 'gyur/ /de ltar 'jam dpal khro bo yi/ /zhal nas gsungs pa'i cho ga ni/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgya cher bstan/ /cho ga thams cad bsdus pa 'o/ /'jam
379b7(rgyud): dpal gyi cho ga zhib mo khro bo thams cad rnam par rgyal ba'i cho ga zhib mo bsdus pa las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje'i gshed kyi cho ga zhib mo phyi ma'i yang phyi
380a1(rgyud): ma rim par bye ba ste bcu pa'o/ / //'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi khro bo yi/ /yi ge gcig pa bshad zin te/ /de nas gzhan yang de yi ni/ /cho ga
380a2(rgyud): zhib tu rgya cher bshad/ /gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa yi/ /zhal ni hUM zhes bya bar bshad/ /de nas 'jam dpal khro bo ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba mchog rig bya/ /de yi dkyil
380a3(rgyud): 'khor gzhan yin te/ /'dod pa kun sbyin shes par bya/ /dur khrod gnas su bya ba ste/ /dur khrod gnas pa gang yin pa'o/ /'khru brgyad las ni sgro bzhi pa/ /yang na khru
380a4(rgyud): bzhi pa yang rung / /dur khrod gnas pa bzang po ste/ /dur khrod thal bas bri bar bya/ /de yi dbus su yi dwags ni/ /phreng ba dag gis brgyan pa bri/ /sgor ni yi dwags ro

380a6(rgyud): bas bri| |de ste de dag ri mo ni/ /bri ba dag tu mi nus na/ /de tshe sa gzhi bzang po la/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus nas su/ /dur khrod gnas su dang por ni/ /sngags pas yi
380a7(rgyud): ge dgod par bya/ /de nas gshin rje rab 'joms pa/ /de ru spyan drangs mchod par bya/ /'jigs pa'i zhal ni 'bar ba drug /de bzhin zhabs kyang drug dang ldan/ /
380b1(rgyud): spyan gsum char sprin sngon po'i mdog /phyag kyang bco brgyad dag gis brgyan/ /khro bo gshin rje rab 'joms pa/ /gzig lpags na bza' gsol bar dgyes/ /mtshon
380b2(rgyud): cha bzang po du ma bsnams/ /yi dwags steng du mchod pa bya/ /'jam dpal khro bo gshin rje'i gshed/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod nas kyang / /mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar ba yi/ /'o
380b3(rgyud): ma 'bras thug gtor mar dbul/ /a ga ru yi bdug pa dbul/ /mar me dag ni mar las bya/ /de nas gshin rje rab 'joms pa'i/ /sa bon yi ge gcig pa 'di/ /khro

380b5(rgyud): gi zhal ni zlos shing gzung / /btsud nas de yi snying gar ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba gzhag par bya/ /de nas shU la'i phyag rgya ni/ /ras kyis g.yogs te bcing bar bya/ /slob ma dag

380b7(rgyud): gshed| |de yi yi ge 'bru gcig sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa yang byas nas/ /khro bo de ni gshegs su gsol/ /shU la phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /de bzhin rtag par gshegs

381a2(rgyud): mkhas pas lag pa gnyis dag gis/ /sor mo phan tshun bsnol nas su/ /gung mo'i sor mo mchog gnyis ni/ /dbus nas gyen du bsgrengs nas gzhag /srin lag

381a5(rgyud): pa 'di| |sngags rnams thams cad ma lus pa/ /dkyil 'khor 'dir ni smra bar bya/ /oM hUM triH/ dbus kyi yi dwags kyi'o/ /oM hUM laM lA ha/ yi dwags phreng ba'o/ /
381a6(rgyud): oM hUM dzraM triH/ yi dwags ro smad de/ sgo bzhi char du'o/ /oM hUM hA/ 'og ste tha mar ro/ /oM hUM hrI/ Sh+TIHkha/ shU la bzhi char gyi'o/ /oM hUM hrI haH/ thod pa rnams kyi'o/ /lho
381a7(rgyud): phyogs kyi ni sgo phye nas/ /lhag ma gzhan ni gcad par bya/ /dur khrod gnas su rtag pa ru/ /gshin rje rab tu 'joms par ni/ /sngags rnams kyis ni rab brgyan na/ /dur
381b1(rgyud): khrod kyi ni gnas su 'gyur/ /tsan+dan dmar pos bskus pa yi/ /sa gzhi khru gang tsam la ni/ /ji lta bur yang gang yang rung / /dkyil 'khor dag ni bris nas su/ /dkyil nas
381b2(rgyud): cho ga shes pa yis/ /sngags kyis mchod pa'i rim bzhin bya/ /oM hUM hrIHSh+TIHa gats+tsha ya yaM phraM tha na swAhA/ spyan drangs pa'o/ /oM hUM hrI kA li thA na ha/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /
381b3(rgyud): oM hUM hrIHSh+TIHkhuM kha/ dri'i sngags so/ /oM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ka ra la ra na ha haH/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM hUM tri/ hUM ba shi kha hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so/ /oM dzraM dzraM hA/ mar me'i
381b4(rgyud): sngags so/ /oM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM khad ka kha/ gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM hUM swAhA/ khro bo'i snying po'o/ /oM hUM hrIHSh+T+riHgats+tsha hUM pu na rA ga ma nA ya swAhA/ slar gshegs su gsol
381b5(rgyud): ba'i sngags so/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal pa'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i rgyal po'i
381b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rim par phye ba ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / //de nas de yi ri mo'i mchog /sgrub pa po yis bri bar bya/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'i/ /
381b7(rgyud): bzlas pa'i las ni rab tu bya/ /ras phran khru gang tsam po ni/ /bzang po gsar pa bkrus pa la/ /tshon rtsi dkar po sbyin med pas/ /gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa bri/ /zhal drug
382a1(rgyud): dbu skra gyen du brdzes/ /de yang spyan gsum 'jigs 'jigs ltar/ /khros pa'i phyag kyang bco brgyad pa/ /zhabs rnams rab tu gsal ba drug /
382a2(rgyud): gzig gi pags pa na bzar gsol/ /tshul bzhin yi dwags steng na bzhugs/ /shU la ral gri 'khor lo dang / /dgra sta mchog kyang sbyin pa'i phyag /lcags mda'
382a3(rgyud): be con rdo rje dang / /mda' bo che yang bsnams pa ni/ /g.yas pa'i phyag ste g.yon pa na/ /dbyug to zhags pa gshol dang gzhu/ /thod pa lcags kyu mdung thung dang / /rtse
382a4(rgyud): gsum gdengs dang de bzhin bsdigs/ /de ltar ji skad gsungs pa'i gzugs/ /bung ba dang ni sprin 'dra ba/ /bris nas de yang legs par sba/ /yid du 'ong ba'i gnas
382a5(rgyud): dag tu| |bzhag nas bzlas pa dag kyang bya/ /bzlas pa'i cho ga 'dir bshad do/ /rig pa 'dzin pas rtag pa ru/ /'bar ba'i sngags kyis khrus bya 'o/ /bdud rtsi 'byung
382a6(rgyud): ba'i sngags kyis ni/ /thog mar tshul bzhin rab bkrus nas/ /bdag gi lus la sngags shes pas/ /de nas srung ba legs par bya/ /de yi 'og tu cho ga bzhin/ /mkhas
382a7(rgyud): pas khro bo'i khang par 'dug / zhugs nas bu ga las byas pa'i/ /stan bzang de la 'dug nas su/ /de nas cho ga sngon gsungs pas/ /khro bo la ni mchod par bya/ /lag
382b1(rgyud): pa gnyis ni dris bskus pas/ /sngags kyi nor bu blangs nas su/ /nyes pa'i skyon dag spyad pa'i phyir/ /khro bo bdud rtsi lan bdun bzlas/ /de nas sngags pa khro bo la/ /mngon
382b2(rgyud): par phyogs 'dug bzlas par bya/ /rab tu dang zhing rtse gcig yid/ /yid ni mi skyo bar du bya/ /de nas mkhas pas bzlas pa'i mthar/ /khro bo gshin rje rab 'joms pa/ /shU
382b3(rgyud): la'i phyag rgya bcings gshegs gsol/ /de ltar legs par nyin re bzhin/ /yi ge gcig pa'i sngags 'di ni/ /rnam pa kun tu cho ga bzhin/ /gang zhig bye ba gcig zlos pa//
382b4(rgyud): de yis dngos grub dam pa 'thob/ /de nas gzhan yang ci bstan pa'i/ /khro bo nyid kyis gsungs pa yi/ /cho ga dag gi sngags rnams ni/ /sgrub pa rnams la phan phyir bshad//
382b5(rgyud): oM hUM dI b+ha te dza swAhA/ khrus kyi sngags so/ /oM hUM a mr-i ta pra b+ha paM pa/ kha bkru ba'i sngags so/ /oM hUM sa sarba ha rak+Sha man+ta ta thA ga to dz+nyA na pa ya ti swAhA/ srung ba'i sngags so/ /oM
382b6(rgyud): na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhUM many+dzu g+ho Sha dz+nyA na ya sarba duSh+TaM ban+d+ha ban+d+ha swAhA/ bdug pa rnams bcing pa'o/ /na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhUM d+h+r-i ka pra kA ra phaT/ ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM na maH
382b7(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHhUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ ya ma pra ma thA na rak+Sha rak+Sha/ na maHsarba b+hu ta b+ha ye b+h+yaHta thA ga to dz+nyA na pa ya ti swAhA/ 'di ni/ yan lag thams cad srung pa'o/ /oM hUM kA la ma
383a1(rgyud): thA na phaT/ khro bo'i khang par 'jug pa'i sngags so/ /oM hUM rak+Sha rak+Sha maM swAhA/ gdan gyi sngags so/ /oM hUM si t+yi ba hUM dzraM dzraM/ sngags kyi nor bu blang
383a2(rgyud): ba'i sngags so/ /oM hUM kro d+ha a mr-i ta dza gad pra b+ha swAhA/ sngags kyi nor bu la gdab pa'i sngags so/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi
383a3(rgyud): ma'i yang phyi ma las/ gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge gcig pa'i ri mo dang / mchod pa dang / bzlas pa'i cho ga rim par phye ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de yi
383a4(rgyud): sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ /bye ba gcig tu nges par bshad/ /khro bo brtul zhugs phyis spyad na/ /dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur/ /shing las byas pa'i thong pa ni/ /nyi
383a5(rgyud): shu rtsa drug sor tshad byas/ /mkhas pas rtse gsum rnon po ni/ /lag pa g.yas dang g.yon du bzung / /gzig lpags kyi ni gos bgos nas/ /lus ni thal ba dag gis bsku//
383a6(rgyud): rus pa dag gi phreng ba yis/ /rgyan du byas nas brtul zhugs spyad/ /'jig rten 'jigs par byed pa yi/ /gad mo sgra chen dag kyang 'byin/ /dur khrod dam ni shing gcig
383a7(rgyud): gam| |ri 'am yang na tshal yang rung / /mkhas pas zla ba drug tu ni/ /lci ba bza' zhing brtul zhugs spyad/ /blo ldan grong du yong mi 'jug /mnyam par bzhag cing
383b1(rgyud): tshig mi smra/ /gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dul/ /rtag tu bde gshegs sems dang ldan/ /byang chub sems dang kun ldan zhing / /khro bo brtul zhugs gang spyod cing / /rtag
383b2(rgyud): tu bzlas la brtson byed pa/ /de ni dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur/ /gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/ /dngos grub gzhan du yong mi 'gyur/ /gang tshe 'di yi brtul zhugs ni/ /
383b3(rgyud): bsnyen par bya bar mi nus na/ /de tshe lci ba za zhing ni/ /tshul bzhin bye ba gsum du bzla/ /bzlas pa byas pa'i tha mar yang / /mkhas pas mchod pa rgya cher bya/ /de nas sna ma'i me
383b4(rgyud): tog stong / /ri mo dag la phog par dbul/ /rig pa 'dzin pas legs pa ru/ /de yis phog par phul nas ni/ /gang tshe rab tu 'bar gyur pa/ /de tshe ri mo de yis ni/ /nam mkhar
383b5(rgyud): 'phar bar gdon mi za/ /de nas rig 'dzin thams cad kyi/ /mchog tu 'gyur te thog mar 'gro/ /'on te phog par phul na ni/ /rab tu g.yo bar gyur na ni/ /che ga zhib las
383b6(rgyud): bshad pa bzhin/ /de la dngos grub 'bring du 'gyur/ /de ste rab tu mi g.yo bar/ /ri mo rang bzhin du 'dug la/ /dngos grub tha ma thob par 'gyur/ /ji ltar 'bras bu rnam gsum
383b7(rgyud): bshad| |lus ni nyon mongs spyad pa las/ /dngos grub rnam gsum 'thob par 'gyur/ /brtul zhugs smyung la rab tu 'bad/ /yang na chu yi klung dag bza'/ /ci la ma chags
384a1(rgyud): phyugs gcin btung / /byang chub sems dang kun ldan na/ /de tshe dngos grub dam pa 'thob/ /rig pa'i mchog kun bsgrubs pa la/ /dngos grub mchog
384a2(rgyud): dang 'bring rnams dang / /tha ma dag ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /'di dag spyir ni sgrub bstan yin/ /gang tshe dngos grub mchog rnams dang / /'bring yang gal te mi 'dod la/ /
384a3(rgyud): longs spyod rtag tu 'dod na ni/ /de tshe rtag par bzlas par bya/ /'di yi cho ga gzhan dag kyang / /de nas mdor ni bshad par bya/ /sa gzhi rab tu mdangs dga' ba/ /lci
384a4(rgyud): ba bzang pos bskus pa la/ /der ni tsan+dan dmar po yi/ /dkyil 'khor dag ni mkhas pas bya/ /de yang bzang po khru gang tsam/ /rab tu mnyam zhing yid du 'ong / /gshin
384a5(rgyud): rje rab tu 'joms pa'i gang / /dkyil 'khor dur khrod gnas gsungs pa/ /de nas der ni sngags dag gis/ /dkyil 'khor mchog de byas nas ni/ /de yi 'og tu sngags
384a6(rgyud): rig pas/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las dag gis/ /ci 'byor pa dang ci nus kyis/ /khro bo la ni mchod par bya/ /nyi ma re re cho ga bzhin/ /bzlas pa dag kyang stong du bya/ /de
384a7(rgyud): ltar rtag tu byas pa yis/ /'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/ /'jig rten thams cad dga' bar yang / /gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur/ /de yi dgra yang med
384b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ /nad med par ni gdon mi za/ /de yi longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur/ /gang zhig rtag par cho ga 'dis/ /gshin rje'i gshed ni
384b2(rgyud): zlos byed na/ /de las de yi dbang po dang / /g.yo dang mi g.yo 'jig rten rnams/ /byang chub sems ldan de yi ni/ /dbang du 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga
384b3(rgyud): zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa'i yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i brtul zhugs rim par phye ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //de
384b4(rgyud): nas gzhan yang brtul zhugs kyis/ /sgrub pa'i las rnams bshad par bya/ /dngos grub mchog rnams thams cad ni/ /gshin rje rab tu 'joms pa 'di/ /brtul zhugs
384b5(rgyud): dag ni 'di nyid kyis/ /rnam pa kun tu bsgrub par bya/ /phal cher dngos grub mchog rnams ni/ /brtul zhugs med pas mi 'grub ste/ /de bas gshin rje 'joms pa yi/ /brtul
384b6(rgyud): zhugs spyad pa byas nas su/ /dngos grub mchog rnams legs par bsgrub/ /mkhas pas gzhan la ma yin no/ /ji skad bstan pa'i mtshon cha rnams/ /rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga
384b7(rgyud): bzhin| |sngags rig sbyor ba snga ma bzhin/ /de dag rtag tu legs par bsgrub/ /de la 'dir ni rtog pa ru/ /dur khrod gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dngos grub thams cad rab
385a1(rgyud): 'byin pa/ /bye brag tu ni logs shig gsungs/ /ral gri sa 'og ro langs dang / /mig 'phrul any+dza gi'u wang dang / /yungs kar ba bla btsags
385a2(rgyud): rnams dang / /gzhan yang las dag ci 'dod dang / /mi snang ba dang rkang mgyogs dang / /gser 'gyur rtsi dang bcud kyis len/ /gnod sbyin mo rnams sgrub pa dang / /klu yi
385a3(rgyud): bu mo la sogs sgrub/ /dgug pa'i cho ga dam pa yi/ /bud med dam pa spyad sgrub pa/ /rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga yis/ /tshul bzhin gnas nas sgrub pa bya/ /de las 'di ni khro
385a4(rgyud): bo 'di| |yi ge 'bru gcig khyad par bshad/ /de nas ji skad gsungs bstan kun/ /ma smos pa yang bsgrub par bya/ /'jam dpal khro bo'i snying po 'di/ /hUM zhes bya ba rgyas
385a5(rgyud): pa ste| |'di ni rtsa ba'i cho ga yin/ /bsdu ba yongs su bsgrags pa 'o/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ khro bo gshin
385a6(rgyud): rje'i gshed kyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhi ba mo bsdus pa rim par phye ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / //rtog pa mdo ru bsdus pa dang / /rgyas pa dag tu bshad pa dang / /brtul zhugs
385a7(rgyud): dang ni nges pa yis/ /de nas khro bo gzi can gyi/ /zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags/ /bzlas pa tsam gyis grub pa ni/ /gsang ba mdo ru bshad par bya/ /brtul zhugs spyad
385b1(rgyud): dang brtul zhugs dka'/ /de dag 'di la yong med de/ /lan gcig bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang / /las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur/ /oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ hUM hUM hUM
385b2(rgyud): hUM hUM hUM| ya ma pra ma thA rak+Sha rak+Sha maM sarba b+hu ta b+ha ye b+h+yaHta thA ga to dz+nyA na pa ya hi swAhA/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gsum 'di/ /khro bo bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub/ /dngos grub thams
385b3(rgyud): cad rab tu ster/ /sangs rgyas kun gyis mngon par bstod/ /de ni rtag par bzlas na ni/ /dngos grub thams cad ster bar bshad/ /dur khrod gnas su rtag par ni/ /rtag tu
385b4(rgyud): zlos pa cho ga 'dis/ /lha dang lha min dri za dang / /gnod sbyin srin po klu yi rigs/ /dpag tshad bdun ni khor yug tu/ /de yi gzis ni 'byer bar 'gyur/ /khro bo gshin rje'i
385b5(rgyud): gshed mdzad pa/ /zhal drug hUM gi sngags 'di ni/ /gang zhig zlos pa byed pa ni/ /'gro dang mi 'gro 'jig rten na/ /de la dka' ba cung zad med/ /zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags//
385b6(rgyud): shU la phyag rgya ldan pa ni/ /khro bo rnam rgyal rgyud 'di la/ /de ni grub par rab tu bsgrags/ /dur khrod gnas su cho ga bzhin/ /de yi sngon du bsnyen pa ni/ /thog ma nyid du chig
385b7(rgyud): 'bum bya/ /de nas rtag pa'i cho gar spyad/ /rtag par spyod pa'i cho ga yis/ /de nas chig 'bum bzlas nas kyang / /de 'og ji skad gsungs pa yi/ /las rnams kyis ni sgrub la
386a1(rgyud): 'jug / rtsa ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga yis/ /de nas thams cad las grub par/ /zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba yi/ /cho ga 'dir ni mdor bshad pa/ /'jam dpal
386a2(rgyud): las byung khro bo ni/ /hUM zhes bya ba'i zhal nyid yin/ /gshin rje gshed ces bya bar grags/ /'di la dka' ba'ang ci yang med/ /khro bo'i zhal nas mdo ru ni/ /cho ga bzang po
386a3(rgyud): ci gsungs pa'i/ /cho ga de bzhin bdag gis bshad/ /zhal drug hUM zhes bya ba 'dis/ /hUM zhes bya ba drug tu bsgrags/ /de bzhin gzhan yang rtog pa ru/ /hUM gi mtha' ni
386a4(rgyud): bskul bar bya/ /hUM traM shU la'i phyag rgyar ldan/ /ri rnams kun kyang 'gas par byed/ /hUM tri rab tu sbyar na ni/ /myur du ras kyang gos par 'gyur/ /hUM tshig rig sngags thams
386a5(rgyud): cad dang / /mtshon cha rnams ni gcod par bshad/ /shU la'i phyag rgya dang ldan par/ /hUM kha rtag par rab sbyar nas/ /sdang ba rnams ni za ba dang / /dgra yi dpung dag rab tu
386a6(rgyud): 'jig / hUM ga rab tu sbyar na ni/ /glang po gnon pa rab tu bsgrags/ /hUM tha mtshon cha kun 'phel tshe/ /lha dang lha min 'jigs par byed/ /hUM ha dpung rnams 'jig pa dang / /rmongs
386a7(rgyud): par byed pa yongs su bsgrags/ /hUM dgra rab tu sbyar na ni/ /phan tshun mtshon cha 'khrug pa byed/ /hUM a rab tu sbyar na ni/ /slar yang thar par byed pa yin/ /hUM ga glang po seng+ge
386b1(rgyud): dang / /rta dang mi dang bya rnams dang / /gru dang shing rta'i bzhon pa dang / /'bab chu dag kyang myur bar 'dir/ shU la'i phyag rgyar ldan byas na/ /gnod par byed pa'i mchog yin no//
386b2(rgyud): hUM ba rab tu sbyar na ni/ /mnan pa rtag tu thar par byed/ /hUM d+haM rab tu sbyar na ni/ /lha dang lha min gzhan yang rung / /dngos grub phra mo thams cad la/ /bskul na de yi 'bras bur
386b3(rgyud): 'gyur| |hUM baM kun tu dbang byed pa/ /tha mar ra bzhag dbye bar byed/ /ha dang sbyar na sdang bar byed/ /ma dang sbyar na gsod par byed/ /ya dang sbyar na de bzhin gsod/ /la dang sbyar
386b4(rgyud): na mig 'phrul byed/ /zhi dang rgyas la 'ba' zhig go /de la sogs pa gzhan rnams kyang / /rtsa ba'i cho gas sbyar bar bya/ /de nas ji skad gsungs pa yi/ /las rnams kyis ni sgrub
386b5(rgyud): par byed/ /de ltar gshin rje'i gshed 'di yi/ /dngos grub nges par 'thob par 'gyur/ /'di ni khro bo rnam rgyal gyi/ /rtog pa'i yi ge gcig pa gang / /'jam dpal khro bo gtso
386b6(rgyud): bo yi| |gsang ba gzhan dag bshad pa yin/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed zhal
386b7(rgyud): drug hUM zhes bya ba las byung ba'i cho ga zhib mo rim par phye ba ste bco lnga pa'o/ / //de nas cho ga zhib rgyas pa/ /gshin rje'i gshed po gcig po yi/ /cho ga kun gyi
387a1(rgyud): mchog dang rab/ /don grub ces pa bshad par bya/ /de la rig 'dzin dpal ldan pas/ /las rnams thams cad bsgrub pa'i phyir/ /mnyam bzhag
387a2(rgyud): byang chub sems ldan pas/ /thog mar dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /mtsho 'am rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag gam/ /gcong rong dur khrod du yang rung / /de dang der ni sa brtags
387a3(rgyud): nas| |me tog sil ma dag gis brgyan/ /dpa' bo gcig pa'i sngags 'bar bas/ /me lce 'bar bas 'khrugs byas te/ /sa dang skyu ru ra la sogs/ /bsangs nas
387a4(rgyud): khrus la brtsam par bya/ /rig 'dzin khrus byas gtsang ma yis/ /de nas sngags des thams cad ni/ /bdag gi lus la dgod par bya/ /khro mig dmar por gyur pa
387a5(rgyud): yis| |de nas sa phyogs gtsang ma ni/ /phyag dar zang zing yongs spangs pa/ /bgegs rnams zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gsang sngags zlos shing blta bar bya/ /de nas khro
387a6(rgyud): bo gshin rje'i gshed/ /dpa' bo gcig pu'i sngags zlos shing / /dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi par/ /dur khrod thal bas bri bar bya/ /nub phyogs sgo gdong sgo bzhi
387a7(rgyud): par| |de yi dbus su pad+ma bri/ /be con phyag rgya rtse 'bar ba/ /gra bzhi dag tu bri bar bya/ /'di ni be con mang po yin/ /shU la can gyi shU la mang / /mdung thung rnams kyis
387b1(rgyud): yongs bskor ba/ /de bzhin mdung thung mang zhes bya/ /de bzhin thod pa mang po yin/ /mi ro dang ldan mi ro mang / /mi ro mi sdug mgo med pa/ /yi dwags 'bar dang srin por ldan
387b2(rgyud): phyogs bcu kun nas 'jigs pa can/ /de ni dur khrod mang zhes bya/ /gshin rje'i gshed po dpa' bo yi/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa drug tu bshad/ /de la be con mang po ni/ /
387b3(rgyud): longs spyod thams cad 'phel bar bshad/ /shU la mang po srin rnams ni/ /'joms pa rab tu bsgrags pa yin/ /de bzhin mdung thung mang po ni/ /bgegs rnams thams
387b4(rgyud): cad tshar gcod pa'o/ /thod pa mang zhes bya ba rnams/ /'khrul 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jigs/ /mi ro mang po zhes bya ba/ /ro langs thams cad sgrub pa 'o/ /dur khrod mang
387b5(rgyud): po rab grags pa/ /dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin pa'o/ /de la pad+ma'i dbus su ni/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyi khro bo'i mchog /gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba de/ /cho ga bzhin
387b6(rgyud): du bzhugs par bsam/ /in+d+ra nI la bcag 'phro'i mdog /zhal drug spyan yang 'jigs par gzigs/ /khros shing zhal yang bgrad pa ste/ /'jigs 'jigs lta la
387b7(rgyud): 'jigs par gnon/ /spyan gsum dbu skra gyen du brdzes/ /tshems kyis sgros mnan 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /bco brgyad phyag ni dran par bya/ /zhabs kyang rab tu 'bar ba
388a1(rgyud): drug / mi ro mgo mang phreng ba yis/ /se ral kha yi rgyan du byas/ /mdung thung tho ba zhags pa yi/ /ral gri lcags kyu mtshon cha thogs/ /shU la rdo rje
388a2(rgyud): dbyug to dang / /be con mtshon cha rnams dang ni/ /de ltar g.yas pa'i phyag na bsnams/ /g.yon pas bsdigs shing dril bu dang / /thod pa bzang po kha T+wAM ka /mi mgo
388a3(rgyud): rlon dang keng rus dang / /'jigs pa'i mi ro dbyug to 'bar/ /de dag phyag na rtag tu thogs/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni/ /shi ba'i ro yi steng na bzhugs/ /'jigs
388a4(rgyud): ba mtshon gdengs 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /dur khrod na ni rtag tu bzhugs/ /sbrul dang srin po thams cad 'joms/ /lha rnams kun gyis phyag byas shing / /khro bo thams
388a5(rgyud): cad legs par 'dud/ /sku ni rab tu 'bar ba can/ /'khrug cing rab tu za ba rnams/ /stag lpags na bza' mnabs par dgyes/ /'jig rten lha ni khro bo rnams//
388a6(rgyud): mtshon cha dang ni mthu spangs nas/ /rjes su 'brang zhing phyag byas pa'i/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed dran bya/ /de ltar 'jigs med byas nas su/ /bdag gi sngags
388a7(rgyud): kyis dran byas nas/ /spyan drangs tsan+dan gyis bskul nas/ /me tog spos kyis mchod par bya/ /rtag tu rig pa 'dzin pa yis/ /tsan+dan dmar po dbul bar bya/ /bdug
388b1(rgyud): pa dang ni gtor ma yis/ /rim pa bzhin du mchod nas ni/ /slob ma khro bo'i sngags dag dang / /sangs rgyas spyan gyi sngags dag gis/ /bcud nas me tog 'dor du gzhug /de
388b2(rgyud): nas rig 'dzin dpal dang ldan/ /bdud rtsi thab sbyor bzlas nas su/ /phreng ba tsan+dan dkar la sogs/ /mchod pa byas nas slob ma la/ /de nas sangs rgyas spyan yang bzlas//
388b3(rgyud): khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po ni/ /'jigs pa pha rol gnon pa sbyin/ /lha khyod bdag gis mnos so zhes/ /de skad slob mas lan gsum smras/ /de nas sngags rig cho ga
388b4(rgyud): bzhin| |bla ma dag la phyag byas nas/ /cho ga bzhin du dbang bskur bas/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bzlas/ /'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga zhib mo khro bo rnam par rgyal
388b5(rgyud): phyi ma'i yang phyi ma las/ khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje'i gshed rim par phye ba ste bcu drug pa'o// //de nas gzhan yang gshin rje yi/ /gshed po'i sngags 'di mnos
388b6(rgyud): nas su| |mi ro dag gi gos blangs nas/ /de la de yi gzugs kyang bri/ /de nas tshon rtsi sbyin med pas/ /bzang po snga ma bzhin du bya/ /bzang po khru gang tshad du bya/ /yang na khru
388b7(rgyud): bzhi'i tshad du bya/ /gang tshe sdags ba bdag nyid kyis/ /bri bar mi nus de yi tshe/ /bzo bo smyung ba byas pa ni/ /khrims mnos pa dag 'bri ru gzhug /shi ba'i ro yi steng du
389a1(rgyud): bzhugs/ /phyag ni bco brgyad rnams kyis brgyan/ /zhal drug zhabs kyang drug tu bstan/ /'jigs pa gnon pa 'jigs 'jigs lta/ /kha cig bzhad
389a2(rgyud): cing kha cig ni/ /ljags 'dril kha cig mche ba gtsigs/ /kha cig zhal gdangs kha cig khros/ /kha cig 'jigs pa pha rol gnon/ /khro bo de 'dra'i zhal 'dra ba/ /smin
389a3(rgyud): mtshams ser la spyan yang ser/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i mtshon cha rnams/ /phyag na bsnams pa bri bar bya/ /dben zhing 'du 'dzi med pa ru/ /sngags pas de ltar 'brir gzhug
389a4(rgyud): go / de ltar bris nas sngags mkhan de/ /ri mo la ni bltas nas 'dug /cho ga shes pas 'bum bzlas te/ /ri mo bris pas de nyid kyis/ /de nas sgrub la 'jug par bya/ /
389a5(rgyud): gshin rje'i gshed po de yi sngags/ /drag po gang yin de bshad do/ /oM ni de yi dbang po yin/ /a zhes bya ba gnyis pa yin/ /kro zhes bya ba gsum pa ste/ /d+he zhes bya
389a6(rgyud): ba bzhi pa yin/ /ka zhes bya ba lnga pa yin/ /ya zhes bya ba gsang ba drug /mAn zhes bya ba bdun pa ste/ /ta ni brgyad par shes par bya/ /ka ni dgu ste hUM dang bcu/ /de bzhin
389a7(rgyud): phaT bya lhag pa ste/ /mi mnyam sngags ni bcu gcig pa'o/ /'jam dpal gyi ni khro bo mchog /gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba de/ /cho ga phyi ma'i phyi ma ste/ /sangs rgyas
389b1(rgyud): kun gyis mngon bstod pa'i/ /sngags de de ltar mnos nas su/ /cho ga mnos nas bzlas byas nas/ /rig 'dzin go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /oM a kro d+he ka ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT/
389b2(rgyud): gshin rje gshed po lha'i lha'o/ /oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ sarba big+h+na na ta kr-it+ta na hUM hUM hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi'o/ /oM bud+d+ha lo tsa ne swAhA/ sangs rgyas spyan gyi'o/ /de nas
389b3(rgyud): gzhan yang bzlas pa yi/ /gnas dag ji ltar yin par bshad/ /dur khrod yang na ri yang rung / /tshang tshing pad+ma'i mtsho 'gram du/ /khro zhing gshin rje gshed po ni/ /bzlas na
389b4(rgyud): dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /ku sha'i rtswa yi stan la 'dug /ri mo la ni phyogs 'dug ste/ /lag pa gnyis ka dris bskus nas/ /ru rak+Sha yi phreng thogs la/ /sngags pas rtag tu
389b5(rgyud): bzlas par bya/ /de bzhin 'dug pa arga dbul/ /myur ba dang ni bul ba dang / /de bzhin yi ge 'dres par ni/ /nam yang smra bar yong mi bya/ /rtag tu rab tu gsal bar smra/ /cho
389b6(rgyud): ga bzhin du yid bsam nas/ /bu don la ni sems bzhag ste/ /skye ba med pa'i sems kyis ni/ /yi ge go rim bzhin du bzlas/ /'bum gcig bzlas pa'i tha ma ni/ /bsgrub
389b7(rgyud): par bya ba bshad kyi nyon/ /mtsho yi 'gram du dkyil 'khor ni/ /dur khrod mang po bri bar bya/ /de yi nang du ri mo bkram/ /sems dpa' mtshan mo zhugs nas ni/ /grogs bzang

390a2(rgyud): gshed| |ri mo la bzhugs khro po'i spyan/ /ri mo de ni nges pa ru/ /g.yo 'am yang na 'gul bar 'gyur/ /de nas lha de grub gyur nas/ /gang 'dod pa yi las rnams byed/ /de ste
390a3(rgyud): grub par ma gyur na/ /gzhan yang chig 'bum bzlas par bya/ /de nas de yi mtha' mar bsgrub/ /des kyang ma grub gsum pa la/ /mtshams med lnga rnams byed pa yang / /gdon
390a4(rgyud): mi za bar 'grub par byed/ /grub pa'i las rnams gang dag 'dir/ /byed par 'gyur ba bshad par bya/ /bsgrub par dka' ba'i las rnams kyang / /yid la gang dang gang 'dod pa//

390a6(rgyud): kyang ni skam par nus/ /dpung rnams mi g.yo gnon par byed/ /khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed/ /stong dam yang na 'bum yang rung / /de ma thag tu gsod par nus/ /
390a7(rgyud): gnod pa dang ni rmongs pa dang / /de ma thag tu 'bebs par byed/ /shing rta'am yang na gru dag dang / /glang po myos pa gnon par nus/ /pha rol dpung dag 'khrug par byed/ /yul
390b1(rgyud): phyogs myur du rmongs par nus/ /khros nas sa yang g.yo bar byed/ /gling dang nags tshal sreg par nus/ /de ni gang ba'i mtsho yang skem/ /bskams pa dag kyang 'gengs par nus/ /
390b2(rgyud): sprin yang legs par gnon par nus/ /char pa dag kyang 'bebs par byed/ /dus min char yang 'bebs par nus/ /klu yi bdag po dag kyang 'gugs/ /de ni nag pos zin pa yang //

390b4(rgyud): yal ga dag gis brgyan pa'i shing / /bltas pa'am yang na rdo 'phangs pas/ /glo bur du yang 'gyel bar byed/ /de ni sbyar ba tsam gyis su/ /sa yi 'og kyang 'khrug par byed/ /de
390b5(rgyud): bzhin lha dang mi rnams dang / /gnod pa chen po 'byung bar byed/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni/ /nges par dbang du mi 'gyur ba'i/ /dngos po 'das dang da ltar dang / /phyis 'byung ba dag

391a4(rgyud): bltas pas rnam pa du ma yi/ /cho ga gzhan gyi cho ga yang / /ring por mi thogs 'grub par nus/ /yul dang yul phyogs dag tu yang / /gnod pa dang ni nad kyang 'byin/ /
