396b1(rgyud): bstan nas ni/ /mthong ba tsam ni nyid kyis su/ /rig 'dzin dam tshig can du 'gyur/ /de nas rtog pa las gsungs pa'i/ /las rnams myur du byed par 'gyur/ /de ltar khro bo'i
396b2(rgyud): rgyal po yis/ /mchod pa legs par byas nas su/ /sgrub pa po ni ma yengs par/ /sngags brjod slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /slar yang gshegs par mdzad nas su/ /slar
396b3(rgyud): yang gshegs pa'i tshig gnyis brjod/ /me tog snyim pa bkang nas su/ /phyag 'tshal slar yang gshegs su gsol/ /dkyil 'khor dag gam gsang sngags bzlas/ /de
396b4(rgyud): nas bzhan yang phyag rgya ni/ /rab tu 'bar ba gcig pu bshad/ /gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba'i lha/ /gang gis grub par gyur pa'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo yis/ /mthe
396b5(rgyud): bong sbas te gyen du ni/ /bsgreng bar bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /be con zhes ni grags pa yis/ /lha nyid kyis ni sngags ldan pas/ /las rnams kun la bcing bar bya/ /spyan drangs
396b6(rgyud): pa dang mchod pa dang / /gshegs su gsol dang bzhugs pa dang / /las rnams bya ba'i tshe dag dang / /gzhan yang rgol ba byung ba'i tshe/ /tshul bzhin phyag rgya 'di bcings nas//
396b7(rgyud): gshin rje'i gshed kyang lha bzlas so/ /sngags pa'i rgyal po'i drung 'gro na/ /mgo btud bus mo btsugs nas su/ /gdon mi za bar dbang 'gyur ba/ /bdag nyid dang ni nor gyis
397a1(rgyud): so| |khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i phyi ma las/ khro bo rnam par rgyal ba bcom ldan 'das
397a2(rgyud): gshin rje'i gshed kyi rgyal po rtog pa phyi ma'i yang phyi ma gsang ba'i rim par phye ba ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / //ma me mA mi mu mU mu/ /mu mi mA me ma yig zung / /thog ma
397a3(rgyud): tha ma zung gcig tu/ /zung dang gnol ba'i bye brag gis/ /sbar bar bya ba 'dir bshad do/ /sa bon zhes bya dkyil du gzhag /khro bo dag ni so so ru/ /zung ma'i zung min tshig
397a4(rgyud): 'di la| |tha ma'i zung ni ma yin no/ /zung ma'i zung ma tshig 'di la/ /he he ha ha hi hi hi/ /hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar/ /khro chen tshig gis thog mar bcas/ /oM oM swA hA phyag
397a5(rgyud): 'tshal gzhag / rgyas par 'dod pas dga' bzhin du/ /mel tshe thun gcig rtag tu bzlas/ /ri mo/ cho ga bzhin du sgrub pa yis/ /rtag par mchod pa'i cho ga 'di/ /mdo
397a6(rgyud): ru bsdus nas bshad pa yin/ /bzlas pa dang ni ho ma dag dang / /brtul zhugs dka' thub ma byas kyang / /sngags kyi dngos 'di shes nas ni/ /mchod pa 'ba' zhig dbul
397a7(rgyud): bar bya| |'di la mchod pa bya ba nyid/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rtag pa ru/ /mnyes byas yin par gang shes pa/ /sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ /rtag tu sngags pas
397b1(rgyud): sems pa dang / /rtag tu sngags kyi bdag nyid 'gyur/ /rtag tu yid la zhen pa dang / /rtag tu mchod la brtson pa dang / /rtag tu khro bor 'du shes pa/ /las rnams thams cad
397b2(rgyud): 'grub pa'i phyir/ /cho ga mdor bsdus dI bshad pa/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtogs par gtogs pa ste dang po'o// //
397b3(rgyud): ma me mA mi mu mU mu/ /mU mi ma mai ma'i yi ge /zung dang ya bral bye brag gis/ /thog ma tha ma zung gcig tu/ /'khor lo 'di ni ci rigs par/ /sbyar bar bya ba 'di bshad do//
397b4(rgyud): sa bon zhes bya dkyil 'khor gzhag /khro bo dag ni so so ru/ /dbang dang 'khon dang gsad pa dang / /de bzhin bskrad dang zhi ba dang / /yang na rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ /zung dang
397b5(rgyud): bsnol bas mur du 'grub/ /khro bo zhes bya'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /dkyil du bzhag ste so sor/ /zungs shig tshig gnyis tha mar gzhag /tsheg mo zhig dbang du byos/ /mtshon
397b6(rgyud): cha med pa'i sa bon gzhag / swA hA'i tshig ni bar bar gzhug/ /bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs byas nas/ /de la rkang pas brdzi ba ni/ /sngags pas 'greng ste 'dug pa ni/ /rkang skyo
397b7(rgyud): ba yi bar du bya/ /rgyal po dbang du ma gur pa/ /de yi dbang du myur du 'gyur/ /gcig bo de la spos nas su/ /myur du go rim bzhin bzhag pa'o/ /sa bon gnyis pa gnas
398a1(rgyud): la ni| |gnas nas gdong yang bsgyur nas su/ /zung shig tshig gnyis tha mar gzhag /che ge mo yi mdza' bo de/ /sdang bar gyur ces tha mar bya//
398a2(rgyud): bskrag par bya ba cung zad med/ /sgrub par bya ba gnyis ka yi/ /gzugs ni 'jigs pa'i las byed de/ /gcig tu dpa' bar mnyam ldan par/ /gnyis ka la yang
398a3(rgyud): rkang pas mnan/ /sngags mkhan de la gnas pa yis/ /mel tshe thun ni phyed tsam gyis/ /de nas sgrub pa 'dod pa bzhin/ /de gnyis phan tshun dgrar gyur pa/ /khro bo
398a4(rgyud): rim bzhin bsgoms pas ni/ /lan gcig byas pa tsam gyis 'gyur/ /sa bon gnyis pa de las kyang / /drag po rtsal gyis spos nas de/ /khro bo chen po mig rtsa dmar//
398a5(rgyud): gnas ni gsum pa la gnas te/ /g.yon pa'i gnon pas mnan pas ni/ /drag po shugs can ma lus mnan/ /kha dang brla dang rgyab kyang bsgyur/ /dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra
398a6(rgyud): myur 'gyur/ /phyis kyang rim gyis 'di la gnas/ /logs shig khro bo'i 'khor lo'i bkas/ /rkang pa'i tsham ngam de bzhin byas/ /gdong yang dal bus bsgyur nas su/ /dang
398a7(rgyud): po'i sa bon gang yin pa'i/ /dbang du byed la rgyas par 'gyur/ /de yi mtha' yang lhan cig tu/ /me dang 'dra ba 'bar ba ste/ /kun gyi las ni grub 'dod na/ /shin tu legs
398b1(rgyud): bar sbyar bar bya/ /de yi zung mas bskul ba yang / /so so'am gcig tu'ang rung bar bshad/ /khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i mthu/ /brgyad pa dag las myur bar gnas/ /rim pa snga ma'i
398b2(rgyud): tshul gyis ni/ /'khon pa'i sa bon dag gis bskul/ /sa bon zung mas bskul ba yang / /brgyad pa 'byed par sgrub pa la/ /mdza' ba myur du bzlog pa'i phyir/ /cho ga bzhin du rim par sbyar//
398b3(rgyud): rim pa snga ma'i tshul bzhin du/ /myur du gsad par 'dod pa yis/ /khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas/ /dgu pa A ba tsi ra yi/ /cho ga 'di yis dgra bo dag/ myos par byas nas/ /'jigs par 'gyur/ /lha
398b4(rgyud): rnams kyis ni sbas pa yang / /gshad pe'i drung du khrid par 'gyur/ /rim pa snga ma'i tshul gyis su/ /khro bo yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas/ /bcu pa dag la rim gyis gnas/ /drag shul can gyis drag tu
398b5(rgyud): mnan| |de yi sa bon gyis kyang phye/ /sngon gyi sa bon rab 'bar ba/ /snga ma bzhin du rim gyis bzlas/ /sngar bshad pa yi las bsgrub bo/ /'khor lo rim pa bcu gcig po/ /gang yin pa ni de bzung nas//
398b6(rgyud): de nas zhi bar byed pa yis/ /sa bon de yis bskul bar bya/ /snga ma'i bzhin du bskul ba dang / /snga ma'i las ni byed par 'gyur/ /zhi bdag la gang gsungs pa/ /rgyas pa dag la sbyar bar bya/ /'khor
398b7(rgyud): lo yi ni gnas kyi mchog / bcu gnyis pa la gnas nas su/ /de yi sa bon bskul bar byas/ /bdag gis mthu tsal gnod brtags pas/ /sa bon zung ma sbyor ba yis//
399a1(rgyud): sa bon mthu ni 'bar ba can/ /'khor lo bkod pa'i las rnams ni/ /sngon gsungs pa dag grub par bya/ /de ltar khro bo'i 'khor lo ni//
399a2(rgyud): cho gar bcas pa rgyas pa dag/ gsang ba bskul mar bcas pa yi/ /sbyor ba ma lus bshad pa yin/ /sa bon zung mas bskul ba gang / /gnyis pa rab tu grags pa
399a3(rgyud): yin| |de 'dir sa bon gnyis pa yin/ /myur du grub par 'gyur bar bshad/ /tha ma'i sa bon thams cad la/ /phul ba'i tshig gnyis rtag tu sbyar/ /zung ma'i zung
399a4(rgyud): ma'i tshig 'di la/ /ya mtha' dag dang tha ma ru'o/ /'khor lo bkod pa bstan pa 'di/ /ji ltar rim par shes na ni/ /sbyin sreg bzlas brjod ma byas kyang / /khro bo'i
399a5(rgyud): rgyal po'i dngos grub 'thob/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo gsang ba ni/ /'di mi shes par gang sbyor ba/ /de 'di dngos grub mi 'thob kyi/ /myur du smyo ba thob par 'gyur//
399a6(rgyud): ma me ma mI mu mU yi/ /yi ge drug po rnams kyis ni/ /dbang dang 'khon dang gsad pa dang / /bskrad dang zhi dang rgyas pa'i mthar/ /mkhas pa dag gis bsgrub par bya/ /de
399a7(rgyud): dag nyid la bzlas pa yis/ /de bzhin de ni bskul bar bya/ /ji skad gsungs pa 'di rnams ni/ /ma grub na ste gzhan du med/ /mu mU mi ma mai mI ni/ /ma ni rgyas
399b1(rgyud): mthar de bzhin du/ /'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi gnas rnams ni/ /de dang de dag gnyis su sbyar/ /de bzhin 'khor lo'i nang du yang / /khro bo sku mchog sa bon yang / /bzhag
399b2(rgyud): nas tshig gi mtha' mar yang / /khro bo'i dril bu dkrol ba dgod/ /'khor lo'i mu ran nang dag tu/ /zungs shig ba yi tshig gnyis brjod/ /mkhas pas 'khor lo'i mig gi
399b3(rgyud): nang / /sa bon bkod pa rnams la gnas/ /khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa ni/ /shes na ji skad bshad pa yi/ /dngos grub rnams ni thob par 'gyur/ /dngos grub tshul bzhin
399b4(rgyud): 'thob 'gyur ba/ /de yi sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /thog mar phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /sku nas sku ni skur bsgyur te/ /las rnams tshul bzhin mthong ba yis/ /sbyor ba dag
399b5(rgyud): ni legs par bya/ /gdong dang kha mig rkang pa mnyam/ /rab tu dang zhing zhi ba'i sems/ /snying yang de bzhin rab tu dga'/ /dbang du bya ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ /shin tu
399b6(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag pas bsgrub/ /rkang pa ya gcig thung ngur gzhag/ gdong dang nu 'jing gcus te mnan/ /kha dang mig ni ya gcig 'dzum/ /tsham ngam gnon pa chen
399b7(rgyud): po byas| |be con la ni mig gis bla/ /bsgrub par bya bsgrub la 'bad/ /gang dgar bye bar 'dod pa yis/ /de dag dbye ba brtsam par bya/ /rkang pa gnyis pa bteg pa
400a1(rgyud): yis| |tsham ngam bya bslar la gzhag / bzhin bsnyer phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /khro bar lta zhing yid kyang khros/ /rab tu dpa' ba sran dang bcas/ /rtsal
400a2(rgyud): gyis gnon par rab tu 'dud/ /sngags pa sngon bzhin sngags tshul gnas/ /gang 'dod pa ni gzhom par bya/ /de la rkang pa ya gcig kyang / /drag shul can du brkyang
400a3(rgyud): ste gzhag/ /bzur te 'dug pa'i tshul du gnas/ /gdong yang yon par bsnyer bar bya/ /mdzub mo bsgreng ste gdengs pa dang / /bre con phyag rgya dag gis bsdigs//
400a4(rgyud): dgra dag bskrad par 'dod na ni/ /myur du bskrad par bya bar 'gyur/ /de nas rkang pa mnyam par gzhag/ lag pa g.yas pa mtho bar bya/ /dpa' dang ldan pas
400a5(rgyud): g.yon pa smad/ /zhi bar 'dod na zhi bar 'gyur/ /phyed ni dma' bar bkug sto gnas/ /rkang pa g.yas pas tsham ngam bed/ /sngags tshul gnas pas bsgrims
400a6(rgyud): nas ni| |rgyas par 'dod na thob par 'gyur/ /slar yang de bzhin shes bya ba/ /ldog ste bya ba gzhan du med/ /grub pa bdag nyid chen po yi/ /tsham ngam rim pa drug
400a7(rgyud): gsungs pa/ /dang po'i ming ni log par phyogs/ /de yi 'og ma rgyab kyis phyogs/ /de bzhin tsham ngam gsum pa ni/ /khro bo che zhes bsgrags pa yin/ /bzhi pa
400b1(rgyud): mdzub mo bsgreng ba yin/ /lnga pa la ni stobs zhes bya/ /drug pa stobs po che zhes bya/ /'di rnams tsham dam drag tu bsgrags/ /tsham ngam gdangs pa byas pa yis/ /dgra yi 'khor
400b2(rgyud): rnams g.yen spyo ba/ /'khor lo'i mchog la goms byed pas/ /grags pa chen po thob par 'gyur/ /khro bo chen pos gsungs pa yi/ /rab gsungs pa yi rgyud 'di dkon/ /khro bo
400b3(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba 'di/ /de bas kyang ni shin tu dkon/ /gsang ba'i rtog pa bzang po 'di/ /kun tu dngos grub kun spyin par/ /gsang ba'i rtog pa de bas kyang / /'khor lo
400b4(rgyud): 'di ni shin tu dkon/ /hom dang ldan pa yongs mi dgos/ /sngon dub snyon pa bya me dgos/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i brtul zhugs dang / /dka' thub drag po'ang bya mi dgos/ /bsam
400b5(rgyud): gtan sbyor ba'ang mi dgos te/ /gang la 'khor lo 'ba' zhig yod/ /gang gsungs pa yi dngos grub nas/ /de ma thag tu dngos grub thob/ /de bas 'di ni gsang byas nas//
400b6(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa'i sgrub pa pos/ /bdag gi don mchog gang 'dod pa/ /shin tu legs par bsgrub par bya/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog
400b7(rgyud): par gtogs pa ste gnyis pa'o/ / //khro bo'i rgyal po'i dngos grub ni/ /sna tshogs thogs med tha dad pa/ /sngags pa 'dod na cho ga mchog /dang por byas
401a1(rgyud): na dngos grub thob/ /rab tu gsang ba'i sngags 'di ni/ /re zhig 'di yi mtshan nyid ni/ /gzhan dag 'dir ni bshad par bya/ /de yi las ni gang gsungs
401a2(rgyud): pa| |gang dag phyis kyang grub 'gyur ba/ /dpa' bo gcig pu 'ba' zhig gis/ /thams cad nyid de gang gsungs pa/ /thams cad de ni bshad par bya/ /sngags des
401a3(rgyud): las rnams kun byas pas/ /rgyud la dngos grub gang gsungs pa/ /dpa' bo gcig pu'i mthus kyang 'grub/ /oM ni de yi thog ma ste/ /bde bar gshegs pa'i dam
401a4(rgyud): tshig yin/ /thog ma dang ni gnyis pa yang / /drag po'i brtsegs kyis phul ba'i lugs/ /klad kyi 'khor gyis mnan pa'i rigs/ /sngags kyi yi ge phreng bkod la/ /sngags
401a5(rgyud): rnams thams cad gsal byed pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying po ni/ /gsum po de nas sbyar bar bya/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yi/ /sku ni de yi 'og tu bstan/ /sngags pas
401a6(rgyud): sngags rnams kun gyi mtshan/ /de dag rtag tu rig par bya/ /thogs pa med pa'i sngags rnams ni/ /bdag nyid chen po'i thams cad kyis/ /srung la sogs pa'i las
401a7(rgyud): rnams kun/ /go rim bshad pa bzhin du bya/ /thams cad bdag nyid chen po 'dis/ /srung ba dag ni byas nas su/ /sngon gyi tshul bzhin rab dben pa/ /sku gzugs
401b1(rgyud): don mchog gzhan nas ni/ /cho ga ji skad sngar gsungs pa/ /cho ga bzhin du mchod pa bya/ /nyin re me tog phreng ba la/ /lan bdun bzlas pa rnams kyis mchod/ /mchod nas
401b2(rgyud): kA ra bI ra yis/ /me tog dmar po kha 'bus pa'i/ /brgya ni rtsa brgyad grangs rnams kyis/ /bu don la ni phog par dbul/ /cho ga 'di ni dus gsum du/ /zla ba gcig tu byas
401b3(rgyud): na ni| |khro bo mngon sum nye gyur nas/ /rmi lam du ni dngos grub ster/ /cho ga 'di ltar sngar byas na/ /gang 'dod pa yi dgos pa dag /de tshe gdon mi za bar 'grub/ /de yi cho ga
401b4(rgyud): mchog bshad pa/ /de ltar zla gcig bsnyen byas na/ /mi yi las rnams gang bya ba/ /de yi cho ga mdor bsdus nas/ /da ni legs par bshad par bya/ /de nas dang 'gro dang sbyar
401b5(rgyud): ba'i| |dug ni rnam pa gsum dag dang / /gdon dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / /lto 'phye srin por bcas pa 'jig /bdag gis byas pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags/ /sbyor ba
401b6(rgyud): lan gcig bdag gis srung / /yid la bsam pa tsam gyis kyang / /gzhan dag gis kyang mchod par byed/ /bzhi ba'i rims la sogs de yang / /thos pas myur du med par
401b7(rgyud): byed| |ma dang byis pa'i gdon rnams dang / /thal ba'am yang na sas kyang rung / /bdag nyid dag par bsams nas ni/ /bdag dgar phab nas dgos pa'i don/ /gang
402a1(rgyud): dang gang dag 'dod par ni/ /bsgoms pas de dang de dag byed/ /yid la bsam pas de dag thar/ /rdo la lan gsum bzlas pa yi/ /chu srin kum+b+hi
402a2(rgyud): ra la sogs/ /mche ba can dag phyogs med par/ /chu bsal ba yi mchog tu 'byung / /'gro tshe yid la bzlas na ni/ /lam na rkun po'i 'jigs pa med/ /seng+ge stag
402a3(rgyud): dang dgra rnams dang / /nad kyis 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po'i drung du 'gro na yang / /sngags kyi spyi gtsug bcings nas ni/ /rgyal po khros pa myur rab tu/ /brkyang
402a4(rgyud): nas thal mo sbyor bar byed/ /shags 'gyed pa dang rgyan po dang / /mtshon dang me yis 'jigs pa la/ /yid la dran zhing bzlas byas na/ /mi bde kun las thar par
402a5(rgyud): 'gyur| |'tshe ba thams cad zhi ba'i phyir/ /mi bde nyam thag gyur pa la/ /sngags 'di myur dran brjod byas na/ /sprin dag mnan par bya ba dang / /'dod bzhin myur du
402a6(rgyud): slar yang zlog / gnam lcags ser ba 'bab pa yang / /dbyug pa'i phyag rgyas zhi bar byed/ /phyag rgyas bcings pa de nyid kyis/ /yid kyis sprin rnams dbab par bya/ /
402a7(rgyud): de ltar phyag rgyas bsdigs nas ni/ /smin mtshams dag kyang bsgyur bar bya/ /rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/ /gnam lcags ser ba gcad par bya/ /sbyor ba mkhas
402b1(rgyud): pas ci 'dod pa/ /char pa dag kyang gcad par bya/ /gos ni sngon po bgos nas ni/ /kho ra khor yug bsrungs byas nas/ /mid pa nub par chur zhugs te/ /nyin gsum legs
402b2(rgyud): par bzlas byas na/ /brgya byin gyis ni sprin bsdus nas/ /'dod pa bzhin du char pa 'bebs/ /de nas sprin chen las byung ba/ /char babs sa steng khyab par 'gyur/ /nyi ma la ni
402b3(rgyud): mngon phyogs nas/ /nyin re rtag tu bzlas byas na/ /bdag dang de bzhin gzhan rnams kyi/ /nad rnams de nas med par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dbang du bya yang rung / /yungs kar
402b4(rgyud): dkar po bzang po las/ /gzugs brnyan legs par byas nas su/ /de yi gzugs kyi steng 'dug la/ /gang gi ming smos nyin bdun du/ /bzlas brjod legs par byas na ni/ /de ni
402b5(rgyud): myur du cho ga 'dis/ /bran bzhin du ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhag gcig smyung byas pa yis/ /dmangs rigs dag ni dbang du 'gyur/ /zhag gnyis smyung ba de bzhin du/ /bzlas
402b6(rgyud): na rje'u rigs 'dod pa bzhin/ /zhag gsum byas pas rgyal rigs te/ /zhag bzhi dag gis bram ze dag /bzlas pa'i cho ga bzhin byas na/ /'dod pa bzhin du dbang du 'gyur/ /
402b7(rgyud): 'bru dang phub ma thams cad las/ /bu dang bu mo gang yang rung / /de bzhin gzugs brnyan byas na ni/ /dmangs rigs la ni mtshan gcig gis/ /rab tu sdang ba bya
403a1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ /rje rigs la ni zhag gnyis kyis/ /de steng tsog pur 'dug na ni/ /de bzhin mdza' dang bral bar byed/ /nyin zhag gsum dang bzhi
403a2(rgyud): dag gis/ /rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze'o/ /ji ltar ji skad gsungs pa yi/ /las kyis bya yi gzhan gyis min/ /gang yang rung ba'i gzugs brnyan ni/ /dur khrod
403a3(rgyud): sol bas legs pa ru/ /snga ma bzhin du legs par bri/ /de nas seng ldeng phur bu la/ /sngags kyis stong du bzlas byas nas/ /de yi 'og tu lus la gdab/ /dgra bo
403a4(rgyud): de yi ming smos nas/ /de la khros par byas nas su/ /de nas de yi snying gar 'dug /phur bu btab ste bzlas bya ba/ /de nyid lag pas bzung nas su/ /dus gsum nyi ma
403a5(rgyud): gsum byas na/ /dgra bo gang du btab pa der/ /gzer thabs drag pos btab nas su/ /'gul mi phod par sa la ltung / /zhag bdun lon nas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /
403a6(rgyud): ma mo'i gnas su song nas su/ /lag pas be con phyag rgya bcing / /lag pa g.yon pa'i mdzub mo yis/ /bsdigs shing nyi ma nub nas su/ /khros shing dgra yi ming
403a7(rgyud): smos bzlas/ /de nas dgra bo mo gdon gyis/ /zin nas spyod pa sna tshogs pas/ /'chi bar 'gyur ba dag ni byed/ /de nas sgrub pos zhi ba yi/ /cho gas de la zhi bar
403b1(rgyud): bya| |ma mo rnams kyi mdun 'dug nas/ /zhi ba'i cho ga mkhas pa yis/ /dbang po bsdams shing yid bde bas/ /nyin zhag gsum du bzlas byas nas/ /de nas de la las de yi//
403b2(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za/ /nyi ma la ni mngon phyogs nas/ /lag pas dgra bo'i mgo byug cing / /dgra yi ming smos mnan nas su/ /nyi ma nub tu bzlas byas na/ /de yi klad
403b3(rgyud): pa na 'gyur ba/ /tshabs chen shi la thug par 'gyur/ /de nas thal mo sbyar nas su/ /nyin par zlos shing zhi bar bya/ /sa steng rkang pa gcig gis 'dug/ nyin par lag pa
403b4(rgyud): gyen du brkyang / /mi dga' khros shing bzlas byas pa/ /dgra yi ming smos ci 'dod par/ /nyi ma nub kar de nas dgra/ /mi dga' ba dang myos 'gyur te/ /gnyen dang mdza' bo
403b5(rgyud): rnams por te/ /de nas gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro/ /de la 'dir ni zhi ba 'am/ /'on te rgyas pa bya 'dod na/ /gtsang sbra byas te gos dkar bgos/ /bde zhing brtan par ma g.yos
403b6(rgyud): par| |mchod pa bzang po byas nas su/ /de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /'o ma btung zhing bzlas byas pa/ /zhi bar 'gyur gyi bar du'o/ /de ltar 'di ni sna tshogs
403b7(rgyud): pa| |sbyor bcas rgyas par bshad pa yin/ /rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du ni/ /ma gsungs pa yang legs par sgrub/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rtog pa
404a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs pa ste gsum pa'o/ / //de nas gzhan yang bzang po 'di/ /he la'i dkyil 'khor rgyas pa ni/ /de bas bzang po
404a2(rgyud): gzhan med pa/ /ji ltar rigs pa bshad par bya/ /dang por he zhes gang gsungs pa/ /skul ba'i sa bon thams cad pa'o/ /de ni len dang 'dzin pa ste/ /las la myur
404a3(rgyud): du skul ba 'o/ /de bas thog mar bskul ba dang / /don bzhin du ni gzung ba las/ khro bo yi ni rgyal po yi/ /he la'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bstan/ /he he ha ha hi hi
404a4(rgyud): hi| |hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar/ /khro chen tshig gis thog mar sbyar/ /zungs shig pa yi tshig gnyis pa'o/ /zung drug 'khor lo'i mtha' mar dgod/ /mu ra na rtsibs
404a5(rgyud): kyi mig rnams su/ /sngags las 'byung ba'i re re 'o/ /don rnams thams cad sgrub par 'gyur/ /bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs pa'i sngags/ /gnas su ji ltar dgod
404a6(rgyud): pa dang / /ji ltar smos shing gang gnas pa/ /so so'i las la sbyar bar bya/ /de nas 'di dag bkod pa de/ /sngags rnams bsdu ba tshul bzhin bshad/ /de'i nang
404a7(rgyud): mu ran gsum po dang / /dbus kyi mu ran bzang por ldan/ /mtha' yi mu ran drug po dang / /rtsibs kyi zur drug rab bzang ba/ /rab dben 'du 'dzi med pa'i
404b1(rgyud): sar| |cho ga bzhin du legs bris nas/ /de yi gnas su sbyar ba dang / /de yi go rim bzhin du sbyar/ /da yi tsham ngam gsal ba yin/ /sngags rnams 'di ni bsdu bar
404b2(rgyud): bya| |dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa yi/ /snying po mtshan ni brjod pa'i mchog /bzhag nas de yi gnas dag la/ /sngags ni grub par byed pa gzhag /mu ran gnyis la
404b3(rgyud): gnas nas su/ /khro bo'i snying po gzhag par bya/ /de ni khro bo'i zhabs kyis mnan/ /dril bu dkrol ba'i sgra yang bsgrag/ khro po zhabs kyis bcags byas pa/ /rtsibs rnams
404b4(rgyud): khro bo mthu dang ldan/ /dbus su snying po dag par ldan/ /rab tu 'bar zhing nges byas pa/ /mu ran gsum gyi bar du ste/ /thams cad don rnams kun 'grub pa'o/ /he he ha ha hi
404b5(rgyud): hi hi| |hi ha ha he he gnyis sbyar/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig dbus nas/ /sa bon gzung ba'i phyi rol gzhag/ thog mar skul ba'i tshig rnam dgod/ /khro bo du mas bskul ba ste/ /
404b6(rgyud): thams cad kun tu don rnams kun/ /grub pa'i phyir ni de la gnas/ /de ltar 'khor lo byas pa yi/ /phyi nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa gzhag /skul ba'i tshig rnams bkod pa'i
404b7(rgyud): mthar| |khro bo gzhan rnams dgod par bya/ /de nas gzhan yang rim bzhin du/ /khro bo chen po dgod pa'i phyir/ /skul bar byed pa bcu gnyis po/ /'di dag tshul
405a1(rgyud): bzhin bshad par bya/ /dang por khro bo rgyal pos gsungs/ /'bar ba'i phreng ba che zhes bya/ /rdo rje me yi rgyal por gzhag /rab tu drag po'i shugs
405a2(rgyud): gzhag go/ rab tu drag shul stobs po che/ /rgya che khro bo lnga pa yin/ /drug pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /'jig par byed pa zhes bya ba/ /khro bo bdun par byed pa yin/ /
405a3(rgyud): zur du khro bo brgyad po grags/ /phongs pa sgrol ba de bzhin dgu/ /rab tu 'joms pa bcu pa yin/ /de bzhin kI li kI li gzhag /kI li kI la chen po dang / /bcu gnyis
405a4(rgyud): su ni gsungs pa yin/ /khro bo rab tu snang byed pa/ /bcu gnyis bgrangs pa 'di dag ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal pos kun tu mnan/ /thams cad rim pa bzhin du gsungs/ /
405a5(rgyud): 'khor lo'i phyi rol gnas pa 'khod/ /'bar zhing drag po'i mthu dang ldan/ /thams cad bstan nas 'khod pa ni/ /khro bo chen po snang byed pa/ /mthu rtsal chen po
405a6(rgyud): stobs su ldan/ /kun kyang bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'o/ /sa bon snga ma mtha' yas rnams/ /gug skyed drug dang ldan par bya/ /steng du klad kyi 'khor gyis mtshan/ /sa
405a7(rgyud): bon bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'o/ /dang po dkyil 'khor na gnas gcig /tshig dang bcas pa'i don kun bsgrub/ /rab tu 'bar ba'i sngags kyi mthar/ /'bar ba'i
405b1(rgyud): preng ba can gyis bsgrag / sa bon gnyis pa gang yin pa/ /tsheg dang bcas par de bzhin gnas/ /rdo rje me rgyal zhes bya ba/ /khro bo don kun grub byed pa'o/ /dang po'i sa
405b2(rgyud): bon gsungs pa yang / /snga ma bzhin du tsheg dang bcas/ /rab tu shugs drag cher grags pa/ /khro bo'i rgyal po khro bor snang / /snang byed khro bo'i rim pa las/ /tsheg
405b3(rgyud): drag de bzhin khro bo che/ /de ni stobs po che zhes gsungs/ /gnyis par 'khor lo tsheg mtha' can/ /gang gsungs khro bo rgya chen ni/ /de ni snying por grags pa yang / /mi thub
405b4(rgyud): gtso bo tsheg dang bcas/ /de yi gsum po tsheg bcas pa/ /de yang de bzhin bsgrags pa yin/ /'jigs pa zhes bya rab tu che/ /khro 'di khro bo snang byed pa/ /rgya chen gyi ni
405b5(rgyud): rim bzhin du/ /bzhi pa yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /tsheg bcas rab tu drag po nyid/ /su ru khro bo de bzhin gzhag /de yi sa bon lnga pa yin/ /'bar ba'i phreng chen
405b6(rgyud): zhes bya gang / /tsheg dang bcas pa de bzhin du/ /khro bo phongs pa sgrol zhes bya'o/ /lnga po rgyal chen nyid yin te/ /tsheg dang bcas par bsgrags pa'o/ /rab tu 'joms
405b7(rgyud): pa zhes bsgrags pa/ /khro bo khro bo snang byed pa'o/ /sa bon snga ma mtha' med las/ /snga ma tsheg bcas de bzhin gzhag /kI li kI li bya ba yi/ /dngos grub thams
406a1(rgyud): cad rab tu ster/ /de bzhin de yi sa bon nyid/ /tsheg bcas de bzhin 'dir bshad do/ /kI li kI lI chen po de/ /khro bo khro bo snang byang pa'o/ /khro
406a2(rgyud): bo'i rgyal po de dag ni/ /sa bon 'di dag rnams kyis bsgrags/ /khro bo'i rgyal po sbyor ba yis/ /rab tu snang bar byed ces bsgrags/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i 'khor los
406a3(rgyud): gnas| |gshin rje'i gshed po yin par gsungs/ /dang por de ni 'khor lo bstan/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / /khro bo'i rgyal po de las gzhan/ /khro bo'i bdag
406a4(rgyud): po snang byed pa'o/ /de ltar khro bo gsum po de/ /gang dang gang du rab sbyar ba/ /de dang de ru sngags rnams ni/ /skul bar byed pas de bzhin bskul/ /cho ga shes pas
406a5(rgyud): nan tan du/ /gang dang gang 'dod bsgrub par bya/ /khro bo sgom dang ldan pa yis/ /he la'i 'khor lo yongs bsgoms nas/ /dka' zhing bsgrub tu'ang mi rung ba/ /brtul
406a6(rgyud): zhugs ho ma dang bcas la sogs/ /de yis dgod pa ma byas kyang / /sngags dgod shes na sgrub pa'o/ /he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pa/ /de yis dka' ba ma byas
406a7(rgyud): kyang / /gdon mi za bar myur du 'grub/ /brtul zhugs ho ma dang bcas gtan dang / /ji ltar gsungs pa'i dka' thub dang / /mngon par brtson zhing dad pa'i
406b1(rgyud): bdag / lan grangs bcu gnyis gang bsnyen pa/ /rtog las gsungs pa'i las rnams byed/ /rab tu ya mtshan ston pa'o/ /he la'i 'khor lo tshul shes pas/ /ring por mi
406b2(rgyud): thogs bde ba ni/ /khro bo sgom pa dang ldan zhing / /he la'i 'khor lo gnas 'dug na/ /khams gsum dag kyang lan gcig gis/ /thogs med myur du g.yo bar byed/ /de
406b3(rgyud): bas rab tu bsgrims nas su/ /khro bo sgom pa goms byas te/ /he la'i 'khor lo las 'byung sngags/ /sbyor ba dag gis goms par bya/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba yi/ /rtog
406b4(rgyud): pa dang por gang bsgrags pa/ /de yi rtog pa gsang bshad pa/ /cho ga 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog /khro bo'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di/ /cho ga de bas shin tu gsang / /khro bo'i
406b5(rgyud): 'khor lo gsang bshad pa/ /rab tu snang byed de bas kyang / /he la'i 'khor lo bsgrags pa 'di/ /rab tu gsang ba'i mchog yin te/ /rtog pa 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /rab
406b6(rgyud): tu gsang ba bshad pa yin/ /rtog pa rab tu gsang ba ni/ /'di dag rnam pa kun la yang / /he la'i 'khor lo 'dra ba yi/ /'khor lo ma byung phyis mi 'byung / /gang zhig 'di
406b7(rgyud): yi don thos nas/ /khro bo'i grub pa sgom byed na/ /de yi 'bad pa ma byas kyang / /'jig rten na ni bsgrub dka' med/ /he la'i 'khor lo'i gnas la ni/ /ji ltar 'dod
407a1(rgyud): par gnas su/ /khro bo sgom dang rab ldan pas/ /khro bo'i gzugs su gnas nas ni/ /rtse gcig tu yang tshig gi mchog /grub pa mchog ni
407a2(rgyud): sbyin par byed/ /thogs pa med par 'jam dpal mthong / /ji ltar rig pa'i don bzhin du'o/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba'i rtog pa las/ gsang ba'i rtog par gtogs
407a3(rgyud): pa ste bzhi pa'o/ / //khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis gzhag /skul cig ces pa'i tshig gnyis mthar/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil
407a4(rgyud): pa'o| |khro bo chen po phreng ba dang / /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa 'di yi mthar/ /kun tu dang po g.yo ba dang / /sngags shes tsham ngam mdzes pa yi/ /he la'i 'khor lo la
407a5(rgyud): gnas te/ /dang po gnas su 'dug nas su/ /be con phyag rgya lan gcig bcing / /de nas khro bo'i sngags bzlas pa/ /sngags pa 'greng ste 'dug pa ni/ /rkang pa gnyis
407a6(rgyud): ni bsgyur ba dang / /khro bo sgom pa 'di la ni/ /sems ni rab tu zhen byas nas/ /sa 'di rab tu g.yos pa 'am/ /ri dwags g.yo ba'i bar du 'o/ /de nas 'khor lo
407a7(rgyud): sgrub pa yis/ /gnyis pa'i gnas la song nas su/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig mthar gnas/ /skoms shig ces par dbang bskur ro/ /de tshig thog mar bkod nas ni/ /
407b1(rgyud): de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /de bzhin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/ /rdo rje me yi rgyal po'i sngags/ /rab tu g.yo ba mdzes pa dang / /tsham ngam gsal ba dag la gnas/ /
407b2(rgyud): be con phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ /khro bo bsgoms pas sngags bzlas so/ /rab tu sbyor ba'i thabs 'di ni/ /mtsho dang rdzing chen klung chen rnams/ /khros pas myur du skem par
407b3(rgyud): byed| |'bab chu dag kyang gyen du 'bebs/ /khro bo mthu chen gnon ldan pa/ /sngags kyi yi ge dgod par bya/ /rtsibs rnams rim pas kun mnan pa/ /gnyis po de las
407b4(rgyud): 'phos nas su/ /de nas gsum pa'i gnas la 'dug /mthu rtsal ldan pas rim par mnan/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /bskrad par byos zhes tshig gnyis bskul/ /
407b5(rgyud): de ni snga ma bzhin bkod nas/ /de yi tha mar bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i mthar/ /rab tu drag pa'i shugs gzhag go /rnam par skrag byed gsal ba yis/ /
407b6(rgyud): khro bo tsham ngam bsnyen par gnas/ /glang po myos pa'i shugs can dag /mngon du 'ong bar gyur na yang / /de ma thag tu skrag par byed/ /myos pa'i shugs kyang rab tu 'dor/ /
407b7(rgyud): slad du log par phan tshun du/ /bskor zhing mi dga' bzhin du 'gro/ /glang po'i rgyal po de myos shing / /bde ba ma thob babs par 'gyur/ /sgrub pa khro bo sgom pa yi/ /cho
408a1(rgyud): ga'i tshul ni de bzhin no/ /he la'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i/ /bzhi pa'i gnas la 'dug nas kyang / /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /non cig ces pa'i
408a2(rgyud): tshig gnyis bskul/ /de nas cho ga sngar bshad pas/ /bdud rtsi'i 'khyil pa gzhag par bya/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba de yi mthar/ /khro bo chen po stobs chen gzhag /
408a3(rgyud): kun tu sdom pa mdzes pa yi/ /tsham ngam gyis ni mi g.yor mnan/ /dpung ngam yang na glang po 'am/ /gru 'am yang na shing rta 'am/ /rta dang rnga mo lug la sogs/ /
408a4(rgyud): khro bo bsgoms pa'i tshul bzhin byas/ /sbyor ba de la gnas nas ni/ /rab tu mnan pa byas par 'gyur/ /de nas he la zhes bya ba'i/ /'khor lo lnga pa la gnas nas/ /
408a5(rgyud): khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /dkrugs shig dkrugs shig tshig gnyis gzhag /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /mtha' yi tshig gi gnas su gzhag /khro bo rgya
408a6(rgyud): chen zhes bya ba/ /rab tu 'bar bar gyur par bya/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /rab tu 'khrug pa zhes bya ba'i/ /tsham ngam mchog gis myur du ni/ /dgra
408a7(rgyud): yi dpung rnams phan tshun du/ /rab tu rnam par dkrug par bya/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /rim pa drug la gnas nas ni/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /
408b1(rgyud): rmongs par gyur ces tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang / /tshig gi tha mar kun tu gzhag /khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa/ /cho ga snga ma bzhin du bskul/
408b2(rgyud): rmongs par byed pa'i tsham ngam gyis/ /cho ga bzhin du rab bskul nas/ /ri mo dag la gnas pa bzhin/ /'gro ba myur du rmongs par 'gyur/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo 'di/ /
408b3(rgyud): rim bdun pa la gnas nas su/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /sgrogs shig sgrogs shig tshig gnyis gzhag /khro bo 'dzin par byed pa yis/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa
408b4(rgyud): skul bar byed/ /'jigs par gyur pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ /khro bo'i tsham ngam myur bar ni/ /dus min par yang sprin gyis khebs/ /de nas 'dod bzhin char pa 'bebs/ /
408b5(rgyud): de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /rtsi bas kyi rim pa brgyad pa la/ /gnas nas 'dir ni snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /he he sa bon gnyis bzhag nas/ /de
408b6(rgyud): yi 'og tu bdud rtsi 'khyil/ /khro bo zur du de bzhin du/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i tha mar gzhag /khro bo tsham ngam kha gdangs pa/ /mchog ces bya ba myur bar ni/ /rkang pa
408b7(rgyud): ya gcig gdangs pa'i stabs/ /sad dang ser ba rlung la sogs/ /dus sam yang na dus min par/ /sgrub pa khro bo bsgoms pa yis/ /khro bo'i sngags kyi tshul bzhin
409a1(rgyud): du| |sa yi steng du 'bebs par byed/ /he la'i 'khor lo gnas brgyad po/ /sgrub pa yi ni sar bo nas/ /khro bo'i sa bon tshig gsal ba/ /dgu ba bzang
409a2(rgyud): po la gnas te/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /slong zhig pa yi tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yi/ /tha mar phongs pa sgrol ba gzhag /khro bo bsgoms
409a3(rgyud): pas mdzes pa yi/ /tsham ngam gsal ba byas nas ni/ /khro bo gshin rje'i gshed po bzlas/ /khro bo nyid kyi tshig gis gsal/ /hUM zhes bya ba bzang po yis/ /khro bo dngos
409a4(rgyud): por bsgoms nas ni/ /shing gi rtse dang yal ga dgug/ /yang na shing chen rtsa nas 'byin/ /me tog 'bras bu glog pa 'am/ /yang na 'dod bzhin g.yo bar byed/ /ljon
409a5(rgyud): shing chen po rnams kyang ni/ /ji ltar 'dod par mi g.yor 'gyur/ /he la zhes bya'i 'khor lo yi/ /rtsibs ni bcu pa la gnas nas/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /
409a6(rgyud): choms shig ces pa'i tshig gnyis bskul/ /khro bo chen po rab 'joms pa/ /khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i mthar/ /snga ma bzhin du gzhag par bya/ /'jigs par byed
409a7(rgyud): pa'i tsham ngam byed/ /ri chen dag gi rtse mo dang / /sgo dang lugs sgrog rnams kyi ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal por sngon bzhin du/ /bsgoms na rab mchog grub byed pa/ /he
409b1(rgyud): la yi ni 'khor lo yi/ /rtsibs ni bcu gcig la gnas te/ /khro bo chen po'i tshig gi mthar/ /snyil cig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul/ /khro bo kI li kI la yis/ /bdud
409b2(rgyud): rtsi 'khyil pa bskul bya ba/ /tshig gi tha mar gnas pa ste/ /cho ga bzhin du bshad pa bzhin/ /kI li kI la zhes bya ba/ /tsham ngam mchog la de bzhin gnas/ /be con
409b3(rgyud): gyi ni phyag rgya bcings/ /gshin rje'i gshed po bsgoms pa ni/ /ri chen rtsa ba brtan pa yang / /rtse mo nas kyang snyel bar byed/ /yang na ri khar skye ba yi/ /brtan pa'i shing
409b4(rgyud): rnams 'gyel bar byed/ /de nas he la'i 'khor lo yi/ /bcu gnyis pa yi rtsibs la gnas/ /khro bo chan po'i tshig gi mthar/ /zhugs shig ces pa'i tshig gis bskul/ /
409b5(rgyud): bskul nas de yi tha mar ni/ /bdud rtsi 'khyil ba gzhag par bya/ /khro chen kI li kI la ya/ /de yi tha mar gzhag par bya/ /kA li kI la chen po zhes/ /bya ba'i tsham ngam de
409b6(rgyud): bzhin bya/ /be con phyag rgya bcings nas su/ /khro bo chen po gshin rje'i gshed/ /yid la rab tu goms byas na/ /rtsig pa shing skam rdo la sogs/ /babs na phyung ste
409b7(rgyud): nam mkhar gnas/ /nam mkha' la ni byung nas kyang / /'dod pa bzhin du ltung bar byed/ /'di ni rang byung ngo mtshar la/ /dI ni dus gsum sngon du byung / /spyod pa
410a1(rgyud): gzhan yang snga ma bzhin/ /khro bo bsgoms pas byed par gsungs/ /he la'i 'khor lo dgod pa ni/ /rab tu gsang ba yin par bshad/ /gsang dang
410a2(rgyud): bcas shing sbyor bcas pa/ /shes na dngos grub theb par 'gyur/ /de nas gzhan yang ci rigs par/ /cham ngam bcu gnyis sbyor ba dag /mdo dang rgyas pa'i tshul
410a3(rgyud): dag gis / da ni rab tu bshad pa bya/ /kun tu g.yo ba dang po yin/ /de bzhin rab tu g.yo bar bshad/ /skrag par byed pa gsum pa ste/ /bzhi pa kun tu sdom par
410a4(rgyud): byed| |rab tu 'khrug ces bya ba lnga/ /rmongs par byed pa de bzhin drug /myur ba tsham ngam de la gnas/ /kha gdangs pa ni brgyad par bshad/ /mdzes zhes bya ba dgu
410a5(rgyud): pa ste| |'jigs par byed pa bcu pa yin/ /kI li kI la zhes bya dang / /kI li kI la chen po yi/ /khro bo tsham ngam bcu gnyis so/ /'di dag rim bzhin bshad pa yin/ /
410a6(rgyud): thog mar bsdigs pa'i rim pa yis/ /pe con phyag rgya ldan par bya/ /phyi nas rang gzugs ji bzhin du/ /sngags pa ngag gis shes par bya/ /rang gi gzugs kyang
410a7(rgyud): rab gnas pa/ /bsdigs shing tsham ngam byed la sogs/ /skrag par byed pa'i kha ni zab/ /khro bo'i lta ba gdon 'gyur ba/ /rkang pa 'gyed par bzhag pa dag /
410b1(rgyud): tsham ngam mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /rkang pa ya gcig myur du bzhag /gdong dang nu 'jing yon po byas/ /khro gnyer 'jigs par byed par bsnyer/ /g.yon pa mdzub mo gcig
410b2(rgyud): gis bsdigs/ /tsham ngam byed cing be con gdengs/ /gdong dang brla dang rkang pa g.yon/ /kun tu g.yo zhes bya ba ste/ /khro bo tsham ngam snyems dang bcas/ /kun tu g.yo
410b3(rgyud): ba'i rim gsungs la/ /rab tu g.yo zhes bya ba ni/ /cung zad du ni dbus dman pa'o/ /rab tu g.yo ba brtag par bya/ /de bzhin dpung brkyang pa dang / /rkang pa g.yon
410b4(rgyud): pa gdangs pa dang / /lag gnyis drag tu rdob pa ni/ /de bzhin skrag par byed par bshad/ /be con la ni lta bar gtad/ /rkang pa g.yas pa gsal bar 'phyar/ /de ni
410b5(rgyud): kun tu sdom par bshad/ /g.yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs par byed/ /dpung pa gdengs pa g.yon bzhin du/ /mig ni mdzub mo gcig la gtad/ /rkang pa g.yas pa
410b6(rgyud): 'phyar ba ni/ /kun tu 'khrug pa zhes bya'o/ /rkang pa g.yon pa gdangs byas te/ /g.yon phyogs su ni 'phyar zhing bskor/ /dpung pa brkyang pa'i be con gdengs/ /bsdigs
410b7(rgyud): pa gcig tu rmongs par byed/ /myur du tsham ngam zhes bya ba/ /de nyid dpung brdabs bsdigs pa'o/ /de nyid las ni kha gdangs pa/ /kha gdangs pa zhes bsgrags pa yin/ /
411a1(rgyud): sran dang bcas la bzhi ni bskor/ /mthu rtsal che ba'i stabs su stsol/ /mchu yi mtha' ma so yis mnan/ /lag pa phyar te bsdigs par byed/ /

411b1(rgyud): la'i 'khor lo'i mthu sngags dang / /tsham ngam g.yas kyi mthu dga' yis/ /las rnams rab tu ngo mtshar ba/ /ji skad gsungs pa'i las rnams bya'o/ /sgrub pa de dag
411b2(rgyud): gsang rgyud dang / /he la'i 'khor lo 'di shes na/ /khro bo dngos dang gcig 'gyur bas/ /khro bo'i skad du spyod par 'gyur/ /rtog pa 'di ni gsang bar bcas/ /gsang ba'i
411b3(rgyud): snying pe'i mchog tu bshad/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i rtog 'di las/ /mchog tu gyur pa gzhan med do/ /khro bo rnam par rgyal ba las/ /rtog pa phyi ma'i phyi ma 'di/ /rab tu
411b4(rgyud): gsang ba zhes bya ba/ /thos nas gsang ba'i don bsgoms pas/ /lha de thams cad yi rang nas/ /khro bo mchog la phyag 'tshal te/ /rab tu dga' ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/ /

416b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'ad/sa bdag gis kyang gzungs 'di'i cho ga bshad par/

417a1(rgyud): ma gtor la/ tsan+dan gyi bdug pas bdugs te zla ba tshes pa nas brtsams nas tshes bco lnga'i bar du dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing gos kyang
417a2(rgyud): lan gsum du brjes te kha zas bsreg bya 'tshal zhing / gso sbyong dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang // zla ba nya'i bar gzhag gcig smyung
417a3(rgyud): bar bgyis te/ rma bam gyi steng du mchis shing / rtswa bam bting ba'i steng du nyal la sems rtse gcig tu bzlas pa bgyi zhing / me tog dri zhim po lan brgya stong du
417a4(rgyud): gtor nas g.yo bar 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong bar 'gyur/
417a5(rgyud): gzungs chen po thos ma thag tu ci 'dod pa de thob par 'gyur/ thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
417a6(rgyud): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang /

417b1(rgyud): ba'i gzungs rdzogs so/ / //rgya gar skad du/ A ya bi dza ya pa ti nA ma pra t+yaM gi rA/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa phyar zlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhas bya ba/ sangs
417b2(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rig sngags

439a5(rgyud): 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go / phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze sa'i dbang po chen po shing sA la chen po lta bus bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs

452b7(rgyud): ldan pa| shes rab kyi blo dang ldan pa/ gsung gi mchog dang ldan pa/ spobs pa mchog dang ldan pa/ mkhyen cing gzigs pa dag gis bstan cing bshad pa yod de/
453a1(rgyud): gang dag de shes pa dang / gang dag de 'dzin pa de dag gis ni/ myur ba kho nar chos lnga thob par 'gyur ro/ /lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ thos pa 'dzin pa'i
453a2(rgyud): dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /brjed nges pa med pa'i dran pa dang ldan zhing chos bzung ba rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i blo gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rnon
453a3(rgyud): po thob pa'i rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / yi ge dang don dang tshig la 'jug pa'i spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams

466b5(rgyud): ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyis na/

473b5(rgyud): du nyin re zhing rtsabs khyor gang la rigs pa 'di lan bdun btab ste/ nyi ma shar ba'i tshe 'thungs na tshigs su bcad pa stong 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig 'thungs na lnga brgya 'dzin te/ nyin gcig bzhin du

473b7(rgyud): sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
474a1(rgyud): lo| |'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi steng lho'i gnas na bzhugs te/ de nyid du 'khor rnams kyi nang nas lha mo sgrol mas 'di skad ces smras
474a2(rgyud): so| |mtho ris rin chen lta bu 'di thob nas/ /las dang las kyi 'bras bu shes par byos/ /bzang po sten cing ngan pa spang bar gyis/ /gang dag sdig pa'i las rnams spyod byed pa/ /
474a3(rgyud): 'jig rten pha rol thur du 'bab 'gyur te/ /dud 'gro glen lkugs gcig la gcig za dang / /gyen thur 'bab 'dzeg g.yang sa ngal ba'i lam/ /'jigs shing dngangs skrag
474a4(rgyud): shin tu skyi g.ya' ba/ /zon dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /yi dwags ltogs shing skom dang lus mi 'tsham/ /bza' btung snang yang gzhan gyis bsrungs pa
474a5(rgyud): dang / /kha cig zos kyang me dang mtshon du 'gyur/ /ltogs shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can de dag ni/ /rang dbang med
474a6(rgyud): par gshin rje gdug pas khrid/ /bsregs shing btsos te mtshon gyis rab tu 'thug /bsran glags med pa'i sdug bsngal tsha dang grang / /des na tshe 'dir sdig pa'i las
474a7(rgyud): byed pa/ /rang gis rang la mngan ni cher byas yin/ /bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs/ /thar pa'i dus med bsran pa'i glags kyang med/ /dran pa gsal
474b1(rgyud): bas las kyi 'bras bur shes/ /sdug bsngal ma bzong smre sngags rang la rmo/ /skad ngan drag po'i ku sgras gzhan yang skrag /de la sogs te sdug bsngal bsam mi khyab/ /gang dag
474b2(rgyud): nyes dmigs rab tu shes gyis la/ /ngan song gsum gyi rgyu rnams rab tu spangs/ /sdig pa'i rnam pa phra rags gang la yang / /lus ngag yid kyi sgo nas spyad ta re/ /rang yang bde la
474b3(rgyud): 'gro rnams yongs la phan/ /chags sdang rmongs spangs snying rje'i rtsa ba brtan/ /sgo gsum dang bas 'bad de dge ba spyad/ /shin tu zab pa'i snying po 'di la 'bad/ /me tog sad kyis
474b4(rgyud): khyer ba'i 'bras bu la/ /so nam byas kyang myu gu mi skye ltar/ /sdom nyams the tshom zos pa'i gang zag gis/ /shin tu zab pa'i rig sngags bsgrub gyur kyang / /byin brlabs 'byung ngo
474b5(rgyud): snyam yang 'byung mi srid/ /rtsol ba de dag nga la ba don med 'gyur/ /rig sngags de yang skye bo'i tshig dang mtshungs/ /ting 'dzin rnams kyang byis pa'i bsam pa 'dra/ /skyon med skyes
474b6(rgyud): bus rig sngags de bsgrubs na/ /ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du myur du 'grub/ /dper na n+ya gro d+ha yi sa bon ni/ /shin tu phra yang chu lud legs bran na/ /dgung zla bdun na dpag tshad tsam
474b7(rgyud): du skye/ /bems po phyi yi 'gyur yang de 'dra na/ /rig pas rig pa bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ /'od gsal nang gi 'gyur la dpag tu med/ /tshong dpon lam la mkhas pa dag la brten/ /gru
475a1(rgyud): tshags legs pas rgya mtshor zhugs gyur na/ /rin chen 'dod pa bzhin du rnyed gyur nas/ /rang gi gnas su legs par phyin pa yin/ /byams dang
475a2(rgyud): snying rje dga' dang btang snyoms rten/ /byang chub sems ldan dge ba spyad gyur na/ /yang dag rdzogs kyi lam la zhugs 'gyur te/ /nges par mkhyen nyid sa la 'gro bar 'gyur/ /mda'
475a3(rgyud): nyid skyes bu'i 'theb nas shor gyur na/ /mi 'phang snyam yang shin tu 'phangs par 'gyur/ /chos nyid don kun chub pa'i gang zag ni/ /mi phyin snyam yang pha rol phyin par 'gyur/ /bya
475a4(rgyud): cha'i rnam pa rang bzhin rdzogs gyur nas/ /sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'thob par the tshom med/ /chos nyid rnam par dag pa de rtogs na/ /bdag med srog med srog kyang gcad du med/ /
475a5(rgyud): las med de yi rnam par smin pa med/ /mtha' rnams rab spangs skyes bu rnam par grol/ /de don rtogs phyir bdag gis bshad pa yi/ /snying po 'di la gus pas bzlas gyur na/ /
475a6(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med gsum gyi sdig kyang 'dzad/ /ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal kun/ /rab tu sbyong zhing sgrib pa rnams kyang 'dag /don dang ldan pa'i snying po 'di
475a7(rgyud): lta ste/ /oM byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo/ lha mo khyod kyis bskyab tu gsol/ /oM na mo AR+ya a ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA
475b1(rgyud): ma| tad+ya thA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TAn/ pra duSh+TAn ma ma kr-i te/ dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT swAhA/ ma ma AR+yA ba lo b+ha yA na rA/ bo d+hi satwA/ ma hA satwA ni/
475b2(rgyud): a d+hiSh+ThA na/ a d+hiSh+Thi te ma ma sarba karma A ba ra Na swa b+hA ba/ shud d+he bi shud d+he/ sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya hUM phaT swAhA/ de nas sangs rgyas nyid kyis su/ /lha mo nyid la rab tu bstod/ /thugs rje
475b3(rgyud): shin tu che bas 'gro ba'i don mdzad ma/ /mtshan dang dpe byad rdzogs shing rin chen rgyan gyis spras/ /shin tu mdzes tshul 'dzum zhing bzhad pa'i bzhin/ /spyan gyi skye mched zar ma'i pad+ma
475b4(rgyud): 'dra| |snyan gyi skye mched ug cos bye ba 'dra/ /shangs kyi skye mched ut+pal bum bu 'dra/ /zhal gyi skye mched ha lo rgyas pa 'dra/ /sna tshogs sku mnga' na chung mtshan ldan sku/ /chos kyi sgra
475b5(rgyud): sgrogs ka la ping ka'i gsung / /sems can kun la byams mgon thugs rje'i thugs/ /'khor ba'i skyon gyis ma gos pad+ma g.yon/ /sems can don rnams mdzad phyir skyabs sbyin g.yas//
475b6(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab nyi zla'i gdan la bzhugs/ /rje btsun sgrol ma la ni skyabs su mchi/ /'khor ba'i g.yang sa che las bdag skyobs shig /'gro drug rang kha'i gnas su 'khor ra re/ /thugs
475b7(rgyud): rje chen mo'i zhags pas bdag zung shig / ngan song gsum gyi gnas su shor ra re/ /'khyams med pa yi lam du bdag chug shig /log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes sa re/ /bla ma byang sems
476a1(rgyud): mnga' dang bdag sprod cig / bshes gnyen ngan pa dag dang phrad ta re'o/ /seng ge glang chen me dang sbrul/ /mi rgod chu dang rims rnams dang / /sha zas 'jigs pa brgyad po las/ /skyob mdzad
476a2(rgyud): khyed la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jig rten 'di dang gzhan dag tu/ /'jigs pa brgyad las bskyab tu gsol/ /pha rol 'bras bu ma thob par dag tu/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dang / /bsam
476a3(rgyud): gtan shes rab thabs dang smon lam dang / /stobs dang de bzhin ye shes pha rol phyin/ /bcu po de dang mi 'bral 'grogs par shog /rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos 'di bri ba
476a4(rgyud): dang / bklag pa dang / kha tog dang / kun chub pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bya ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams
476a5(rgyud): yi rangs te mngon par bstod do/ /rje btsun ma sgrol ma 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob pa'i mdo rdzogs so// //mdangs phyir mi 'phrog pa ces bya ba bai dUR+ya'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/
476a6(rgyud): oM ma ma rak+Sha sA ga re ma hA sA ga re/ pu ru tse bu tsu ru/ sa ma ne me/ de ba be/ hu lu hu lu swAhA/ gla rtsi dang / shu dag dang / b+hi su nag po la 'de gu byas te/ lkog mar thig le byas te sngags
476a7(rgyud): lan bdun bzlas na/ 'byung po rnams kyis de'i mdangs 'phrog pa lta ci smos kyi/ blta bar yang mi nus so/ /rdzogs so// //
